horrible tutor, I have ever met.

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body:
If you want to get A or A+, it is very hard. Helena will take all your scores in this course into consideration. This summer, you may fail to get an A if your score of final is less than 80, even your total score is high enough. You will also fail to get an A+ if your score of final is only a bit higher than 80 while your total score is even higher than 90, which means your score may be even higher than some students who get an A+. That is to say, Helena prefers the final. She tends to pay more attention to the final performance than the weight she told you in the class. This is very ridiculous.
If you only wish to get an A-/B+, you can take this course. The assignments are easy. Prepare the project and final well, you can get what you want.
唔多嘢做，但係啲topic幾難。有counting, biology, cryptography。仲有啲game theory同set theory。

Coursework 如下:
1) Weekly online assignment: mc 題, 有兩次attempt, 不難攞分(20%)
2) Infographic (圖文並茂的poster): Group project (3-4人一組), infographic 最好少字同多d 圖注釋, 睇落會簡潔d (20%)
3) Argumentative essay: 自己選topic (會派suggested topic handout俾你參考), 分兩次交, 有兩個分. 交左第一次draft後會有consult session (個人覺得越早consult越好,如可以的話, 可以快d 知道自己篇文章有咩不足) (20%+20%)
4) Self-Assessment: 寫你在呢個course 學到什麼&有咩睇法, 不過因為上年社會運動, self-assessment變成optional task(15%)
5) Participation: 不走堂同在課上踴躍答老師問題便可 (5%)

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
建議對physics 有興趣先好讀，冇興趣會好辛苦。
3個 test, 1project(report 2000 words+presentation+Q&A), 1Exam.
test 同 exam 要explain物理現象，英文表達能力要求高，而且concept要清，仲要畫diagram.
test評分標準比Exam輕手，好多人full mark，所以一分也不能少。
Project要搵好隊友以降低workload, presentation要準備好。
Exam好手緊，而且問題好刁鑽，要溫所有notes+lessons.

Assignment:40/50
今年summer轉咗由Jimmy代教，佢作為一位執業多年的大律師，堂上面都分享咗好多佢見過的cases去幫助我地了解課題，雖然講書比較悶，但相對易明
Lecture有Roll call for class participation ，tutorial都會隨機分組討論然後搵一位代表去答問題，所以要準備的野唔多，而且唔識的話同gpmate傾然後就爭取做代表拎participation Mark
比較chur的係Assignment，尤其今個summer court有時唔開同埋減少咗座位令到好難去做Court report，而且份報告都要成2000字。但無論係Court report同presentation只要唔hea做都可以拎到比較高分。特別係presentation，內容跟足佢要求基本上可以滿分。
考試4選一，講過maximum 3000但實質寫得2000唔夠，題目唔難而且openbook，我覺得同tutorial的題目差唔多mindset
只可以話呢科係多勞多得，雖然8小時的Court visit好似workload大但係對我黎講無Group project咁多野要去take care

body:
2019/20 Sem B
聽得出林學忠係有料，上堂講書會有啲快但係幾得意，佢唔會淨讀ppt ，佢會講吓一啲自己嘅有趣經歷所以唔會悶，我個人覺得佢仲講得有啲黃子華嘅風味李浩訓會比心機比啲comment 你，都會比足指引你點做，都係一個唔錯嘅導師

上Wang 嘅堂就一定要take note，佢大部份上堂講嘅野ppt 上面都冇，多數得圖，你對你記憶力有信心可以唔take
第一堂會叫你form gp (每組人數要睇返有幾多人reg 咗呢科，大概5-7人一組)，呢個gp 會跟足你成個course，無論係做classwork 定係gp project，所以一定一定一定要揀好隊友Classwork: 每一堂每一組都有一份要做，份野唔難，而且Paul 會比時間你做，唔會有咩大問題

course name: Applications of Game Theory to Business
body:
千其唔好讀
無錯依科比較鬆手
但絕對係令你懷疑人生
讀左幾堂apply左late drop
從來未試過一堂3個鐘完全聽唔明如何一句話
難到痴線 
利申GPA 3.3

I am a year one business student and it is very difficult for me. Half of the class are non-local or exchange students. They always ask questions during the class. Many students study related subjects before. You also need to discuss in class. You may want to study this course if you like foreign teaching style.

The examination is quite difficult. Even a small picture and details were used to be a part of quizzes - but it highly impacts and significant for this course. The examination consists of multiple choices, fill in the blank, and short writing. The key is to manage your time well and complete your confident part.(30%) Two-quizzes in first-half and later-half of the course
(40%) Group presentation
(30%) Final Examination

Workload is not really heavy if you know what is going on, but you won't understand what is going on as the teacher doesn't teach well...
Originally need to download two software: GREET and BIM, for the course, but a lot of student complained in class so BIM was removed.
Exam is too vague, and the score given for final exam so low (ard 3x/100), but the grade was unexpected.Conclusion: I don't know what I have done, I don't know how I got this grade, but this course is annoying

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body: Lots of content for philosophy. Lawrence is a nice tutor. You can ask him if you find difficulties. Amount of workload is okay, the guidelines of assignment however not clear enough.
The heaviest workload is the 2k word essay. Other than that is ok. As long as you choose a good topic with quite deep analysis, the grade will be ok. Use theories from the lecture

teacher: Lecture: 黃佩賢; Tutorial: 黃海濤
body: 好老實講中文能力好唔好同呢一科冇直接關係。我本身expect A Range，自問都畀咗好多心機落篇final report喥，但最後得B，相信係tutorial個prof比分比得緊手。Lecture: 好似當故仔咁聽，講下古代社會文化、道教等等，上堂都好輕鬆，Prof Wong仲會每次都早半個鐘落堂。本身on-site佢要你即日交一篇百零字嘅reflection，轉咗用zoom就變咗homework，隔一個星期交，150-200字。
錢老師熱耽教學，秉持「獨立之精神，自由之思想」的宗旨，鼓勵學生多發問，多思考，多讀書。

Discussion 基本做咗就20%

project find good ppl, workload will not be too heavy
quite hea but grade not too good
can recommend if b range is sufficient for you

The teacher was very informed, and the assignments were quite interesting and interactive. I learned a lot about food science and how it benefits us in daily life. I even change my diet to vegetarian because of this course. Overall, it is a course that is worth everyone's credits.

course name: Language in Art, Invention and Inspiration
body:
The teacher was very helpful. The content might be a bit advance, but it would not be too difficult for those who paid attention in class. The midterm quiz and exam were quite easy too (open book). 
If you love linguistics, keep calm and take it!

(This review is informative for Chinese and Taiwanese only, local and foreign friends may not refer to this nonsense comment :P)首先，如果你是對中國歷史（或馬克思史觀下的中國歷史）并不熟悉，例如中國的國際學生和台灣學生，我不會建議選擇普通話課程（ Summer Semester 并不提供英文課程，無奈選擇）。普通話 Session 會默認你已經經受過中國的歷史教育，並跳過相應的内容。在不瞭解相關知識的情況下，我個人很難理解課上的内容，且很難認同講師的一些政治觀點；因此這門課對我是非常痛苦。

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body: An interesting and useful course. Helena is very helpful and will answer you many questions. The most important part is the group project and you need to find good teammates. However, competition is so fierce that getting an A is very hard.

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body:
Asgx2 16%
Midterm 20%
Group project 20%
Lab progress 4%
Exam 40%
Helena係一個好有心嘅lecturer，如果俾心機上堂啲嘢其實都唔難明，我係non cs major，都覺得幾容易上手，內容只係一啲基本嘅數學，最主要都係學logic，不過呢一科係拉curve，而且好多CS major嘅人，攞A range唔係太易，而且Midterm asg average都好高，project唔難做但係要俾多啲心機搵合適嘅data source，exam都幾簡單，應該有9成分，本來以為自己得A，點知最後有A+。

I had the classes via ZOOM and there are only 3 assignments: 
1) Portrait 2) Decisive moment 3) Creative Landscape OR StorytellingI was an beginner at photography beforehand, so I was worried about my lack of technical knowledge, but as long as you have artistic sense, like understanding motif, conveying meaning etc, you are good to go. 
Light workload is a plus for this course too.

teacher: Chan Hung Shek and Jr-Hau (JH) He
body: Professor Shek teaches the first half of the course and he is a very polite and helpful teacher. The course is fairly straightforward and going through the lecture notes carefully is enough to get a good grade. The second half of the course is taught by Jr-Hau (JH) He whose english is heavily accented but does answer any question you have.
總共有兩個quiz（30%），全部mc同埋幾個T/F，mc多選，係真嘅考理解，而唔係運氣，所以要認真溫書，因為會考到好仔細嘅觀念。project同report占40%，自己訂topic。揀自己鐘意嘅topic會幫助後邊嘅工作，好好做嘅話會學到好多野。
其實有Phy 底真係唔太使溫書, 唔上堂都得, 好少野做, only have 1 below 500 words reading assignement, + a few short question , + 1mid term+ exam 我mid term exam 都8成幾,都係得B+ 可能online exam D人拉高左curve, 不過輕鬆ge, reg 得過

teacher: lecturer: 李果; tutor: 李果
body:
workload輕鬆.
派grade.
誠心推介.

輕鬆，今次有得揀唔駛用BLM而去普通寫份green technology嘅essay ,所以assignment輕鬆好多。
要用greet拎啲data整份report同present,不過用greet就個個啲data一樣咁濟。唔會差得去邊.
quiz同exam 都係吹水野，答三條long question,而且因為唔考software,有幾課唔駛溫.

有bio底可以讀會比較輕鬆，但如果你係對人體結構比較好奇想當common sense 咁學下但係又冇Bio底，咁你要預咗花好多時間去吸收上堂去聽同埋溫習佢講嘅嘢，佢每一堂都係唔同老師，教嘅嘢算係深入，連你諗唔到嘅一幅圖一堆唔為意嘅字都可以考到，個人認為microarray bioPhotonics 係最難。呢個課程會講好多topic但係每一個topic都唔會講好入。有2次closed book Mc quiz，出嘅嘢深入但係唔知點解有人係可以好高分，我自己兩次都係below mean and 50% of full mark。
至於40% group project ，最好搵有底嘅隊友，Topic自訂，但係由於佢唔會比template 唔會比suggestion 話邊一個topic好，自訂題目要小心啲，做嘅過程要不斷email問佢問題，因為唔問就唔會知道佢嘅要求同埋想你寫啲乜嘢。Btw佢本身覆email都算快。
30% 考試會可以俾你帶一張貓紙。建議快啲溫書諗吓自己有啲咩唔識寫落嗰張紙度，程度同quiz差唔多。
如果你係冇底嘅話唔係幾建議讀，有底會輕鬆啲

同意上post既意見，教學認真和用心。
讀cciv，揀雙李。

Flora is a friendly, helpful and diligent instructor, imparting some necessary writing things to me. 
But to do achieve a good grade, you may expand your reading after classes since what taught in lectures is somehow basic and simple.
Workload is okay, don't worry about it.

2019/20 Summer老師好有心機教，我覺得lecture同tutorial都一樣幾好
lecture主要係聽書然後做堂課
tutorial方面，project嘅大題目可以用佢比嘅方向或者自己嗰組揀其他有關呢科嘅題目
口頭報告後，老師好清晰同有耐性咁向我哋組講解final paper有邊啲地方可以改進，然後佢認真解答我哋嘅疑問，同埋主動比有建設性嘅意見,啲意見真係好有用!

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body: percent 問好多野

I am responding to the student who wrote in English and got a B grade. Absolutely double-standard lecturer. Being strict and stubborn on student’s deadlines and arrangements (with little mercy) while failing to redeem his own promises. Always say “I am a strict teacher” but being not strict for his words. The grade is already there. But Alex if you see this, would you just be a little responsible and tell us what happened, simply by writing a post on canvas? Such a behaviour is unacceptable even as a student, let alone a Uni lecturer. Please be a man of your words, not a coward like this.

4 lab reports
few simple quizzes in lesson 
one group project (4~5 ppl per grp)
exam only have one pages mostly related to lab report
my whole group with or without science background also get good result

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body: People who love philosophy would find this course interesting as it covers topics like justice,governance,moral values etc.The teacher is willing to answer your questions during lessons and after lessons.However,the guidelines for online test and individual paper is a bit unclear so you can't tell whether you have written in a appropriate way and have met his requirements.

當初因為冇grp project reg呢科 
冇數底冇諗過攞到A+ 真係幾好讀 
workload又細 得4份asm+midterm+exam 每份asm得3題 大約1個鐘就完成 有上堂一定識做 佢會俾hints
Jon Lo好好人 有咩唔識問佢都覆得好快又詳細 
不過冇數底嘅人上堂真係要好留心同要勤力溫書 我係zoom上 好多時都有唔明要重睇recording 同埋真係做咗好多次佢俾嘅problem set做到熟曬先有呢個grade

淨係上咗頭幾堂
之前完全無接觸過攝影
Zoom上所以無計attendance
交三幅相 portrait, landscape, decisive moment
呢個course叫creative photography
Creativity重要過攝影技術
所以就算無影相底但有art sense都可以靚grade

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
summer讀，堅係忙到癲。
week3/4/5 quiz，不斷刨notes係唔夠仲要認真上堂，每分每秒都唔可以聽漏，因為題目就係出佢講嘅野多。
week5 交Project(PPT+2000words writing )，如果你臨交一個星期之前先做chur死你。Q&A問得好深入，要認真搵清楚所有資料，每一個角每一副圖。
week6/7 present 冇堂上。20分鐘present，只要準備好200%present內容就夠。癲到可以2堂教3個chapters。唯一有趣就係做實驗
一封Email 都唔覆

認真讀，無standard，爛grade 首選
淨係考Buddhism，啱鍾意religion 嘅人讀
4日交一份長assignment

I took the course during COVID-19 so the class was done online. However, Alex Wong chose not to record and upload the lectures online. When students emailed him saying they’re residing in countries where the time zones are very different he responded rudely and did not care.I would say approximately 20% of the class is taught in Chinese with 20% of the lecture notes also written in Chinese despite Alex Wong knowing there are non-Chinese students in class.
Got all full marks in two quizzes, but still got B+. Maybe I didn't perform well in the final exam which is much harder than quizzes and tutorial questions. An easy and useful course, though.

每日上堂都要交500字reflective
Group project groupmate好重要
因為要一個present 一份final paper
仲要做3選2嘅exam
除非寫文叻 如果唔係嘅 不了

Professor 反口，話會出每份Assignment既分數，最後出左Grade，但個細分都仲未出。明明宗教係好個人既諗法，但夠膽死拉curve拉得咁harsh，harsh得黎又唔肯比feedback我地既功課，削弱我地學習既成果。
極認真讀都係咁既Grade，係教得幾好，學到好多野，發人深省。但值唔值得為左學野讀一科Median Grade係B-既GE就見人見智。
希望今個Sem既其他學生都留個言，隔住個Mon見大家問左咁多問題但又無機會見，想知下你地考成點。

course name: Discovering the Dynamics of Contemporary Cities and Architecture in China
body:
15% quiz (x2) [open book] 13/15, 13/15
15% photo collage B+
15% Map drawing A-
40% Guide book B+勁hea既一個course, 但係要攞A range都有少少難, 多數人都攞B+
Quiz完全冇溫過就考 有3題long questions 啲答案可以開住ppt直抄 玩大包圍、咩都寫就得
Photo collage要俾啲創意諗個design
Map drawing有啲晒時間同無聊 不過呢個就送分既
Guide book要揀一個中國城市黎介紹 寫大約2000字 求其搵下資料就得 都唔算太難
好難讀救命，大家小心!!!!

course name: Discovering the Dynamics of Contemporary Cities and Architecture in China
body: 輕輕鬆鬆又一個暑期，推薦懶人上。今個Sem用Zoom上，因武肺可以唔使返大陸。全Course只需交一次Assignment，包括2500字travel guide (topic任set)、一張photo collage、畫一張地圖。唔使form group，完全無壓力。

暑sem用zoom所以每堂lecture完左之後都需要喺3日內做返堂課，大概250-350字到
Lisa講野好溫柔，好文人feel，有時都少悶，但佢每堂有d位會令我有反思
因為zoom所以project無咩點consult李果，都係email來往過幾次，佢比嘅feedback清晰
不過真係一分耕耘，一分收穫，自問中文本身普通(DSE攞3)，但因為擺左好多心機，groupmates都好所以算係咁

An easy A+ if you’re good at mathematics. The professor’s lectures were very effective. So, no additional materials are required. However, during the summer term there was around 30 students who took this course, which made it a bit challenging at first to get an A+. But if you manage to score good marks in the class test and final exam then it is an easy A range course.Course evaluation might be slightly different for your sem. For my sem it was
50% class test - (20% + 30%) - Easy
50% final exam - It can get quite challenging if you struggle at Maths and have no prior knowledge in Statistics.

千祈唔好揀佢嚟reg, 爛grade首選

course name: The Life and Times of the English Language
body:
Semester should be 19/20 Sem A
Grade should be Pass
頭5堂係literature, 後5堂係linguist每個星期都要寫一份200字嘅learning portfolio (20%) 
最後只係會抽兩份改，所以點都要交
我兩次都爛grade, below mean

Should be 2019/2020 Sem B
課程內容簡單實用，會講下個人理財方法、買樓、唔同嘅投資產品等等
不過 Powerpoint 內容好舊 好多野都冇改
所以如果有sources，基本上CA 部分會滿分咁滯
有Mid term, Exam 
Mid Term 可能係因為用Canvas Quiz 功能 好多問題都出錯曬
Exam 都係因為online 原因而變成open book
所以都比較簡單有樣唔好嘅係 佢唔會覆email，mid term 出錯唔覆、group project 有問題都係唔覆
有咩事都係Zoom online lesson 嘅時候問佢會好啲

Workload其實還好，in-class worksheets 大部分題目 power point 有答案/計好簡單既數，然後 individual assignment 同 final exam 其實d 題目來來去去都出翻 worksheets d 問題，只要你參與過做in-class 唔 freeride groupmate 就輕鬆高分。但個人認為 group project 好難做得好，要求好高。

利申中學有讀econ攞5, 讀中文econ都搞得掂呢科 不過要花少少時間記返英文terms
基本上差唔多無上過堂, 內容都係d中學econ野加環保(4R之類)
而且Ho tong ming d 英文係Chinglish 
上堂Econ graph係唔會explain 淨係講佢自己d personal experience (所以唔洗上堂)
project 同 final test 都容易做，都係好似DSE
Weekly journal Hea寫自己做5樣環保加d圖，吹話用環保袋、回收水樽就ok推薦有econ底既人讀 因為Workload真係細嘅

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
1. 每堂in-class exercise
2. mid-term
3. final exam
雖然每堂都唔知佢講緊咩 但係有溫exercise mid-term answer就夠考試
輕鬆靚grade~

錢華老師是一級捧的好老師，為我們解決了很多學習上的困難。
lecture和tutorial都比較有啟發性。

course name: The Life and Times of the English Language
body:
呢科好悶，一半係講英文文學(Eric教)，另一半係講語言學。Eric會要求大家上堂drop notes，好多考既野唔會打係PPT，要聽佢講先有notes，每堂完左之後都有participation quiz，認真上堂一定識。另外個台灣老師講英文有口音，要求同Eric完全調轉，ppt有齊notes。兩個老師都好好，不過真係太悶。可惜Group project遇到差隊友，全部Deadline fighters，Deadline前幾日先開始做，project爛grade。
(2019/20 SEM B讀，但佢唔比我揀)
Sumie 好好人又好比心機教，Email問野基本上好快覆，Individual Essay 有 Consult Sumie，有用過EMAIL問過SUMIE意見，每次佢都有比實用Comment，唔會講到1999。大家遲到早走都唔會黑面。REG 得過!

Light workload and (expectedly) low grade.The course is really simple for engineering / science, who have okay math background. But just because of this, it's hard to reach high marks, since the high scores always clutter, and when it's curved, the high score could be only a mean (average).

Background：有些BMS psycho的人在上 local和international比较多 内地生相对较少
Wordload：基本上就是听听课背背书啦 一周花几个小时认真复习成绩肯定不会差的 当时Jan说80%以上是不错的成绩 
**很多老师人很好的会告诉要考的重点 所以最好不要走堂！！**
Quiz：我们这个sem因为提前结束取消final所以一共6个quiz 我的百分比最后平均下来在87.83% 拿了A

I do expect a course about ethics can be boring but it turns out it is more interesting. The theories and concepts are not difficult although you still need to memorize the terminologies. English is still critical element in getting good grades. If you aim for A grade, you need to work hard and revise on weekly basis.The course does not have a mid-term or individual assignment, so you don't really feel the heavy workload until last 3 weeks (the group report, group presentation and yes, the exam). There is a mini-case with poll questions per week, which is ok as it only takes 15 minutes to read the case. (you could do it during the break time in case you forget to prepare). But the case classwork is group-based and thus, it would need extra time to work on it. Class exercises takes 10-15min to complete per week, not too bad either.

course name: Ageing Society: Hong Kong and Beyond
chinese course name: 香港及其他老齡化社會：挑戰及機會
body: 好多野做，又要約個廢老，好在成績都唔錯
功課不多，小組project只要問清楚Ted想要咩方向就無題Exam真心送分，有上堂就會識，我notes都無溫哂

Ted gave many support to our group assignment. Exam will be relatively easy if you study his PPT and notes.I was quite surprised that I hv got an A+, thought it was just a B+ since our team didn't give many effort on the project.

Good teacher, she is willing to spend time to follow up your works and answer your questions to help u obtain good grade. B+ is already fine for me as these kind of compulsory course is hard to obtain A range

It is a trap for me. Answered/Raised 3 questions in his lectures, all feedback was B+, most of the students got B+ as well and those 3 questions carries 50% of the final course grade; completed an individual essay with 23xx words, which carries the remaining 50% of the course grade. I can say that the essay seriously pulled down my grade, the marking scheme is unclear.

Professor is nice and there is quite a lot of consultation session for this course, he is willing to answer your enquiries. However, the grade/mark you received wasn't matched with his comment, he seems to be generous when giving feedback, but not at all when distributing the final result, it is quite disappointing.

Weekly quizzes during class. 
No assignments or projects. 
Only a final Exam.
You will be good as long as you fully revise the PPT slides.
cciv雙李，hea爆之選，誠意推介。
啟發思考，用心聆聽學生的問題。

其實我系2019/2020 sem A 讀嘅，見個時間岩就隨便簡左。workload唔算太多，兩個quiz（一個midterm一個final quiz, 因為肺炎全部都改take home），一個gp project（隨便簡個國家講下佢同中國嘅關係，可以拍片都可以寫essay）。lecture真系好悶，你對政治/外交關係完全冇咩興趣嘅話你會悶死。每堂都會播記錄片比你睇，睇完會有discussion，我一次都冇答過都B左。

唔係讀BBA既人唔好揀，伏到不得了，信錯左呢個網 (比讀BBA D人屈爆左)。
但老師都幾有心

上堂style同改功課比較hea同悶, 最好consult多幾次問清楚要求, 不過其實幾好人Essay topic唔好揀咁悶同大路野 佢唔鐘意 新奇啲佢都比較多心機同你consult
Presentation Q&A有機會西你面同問好多問題 但最後我個組份inforgrapic個班最高分(Groupmate其實唔太好重要, 自己一個都完成到)

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body:
Peter 上堂會設計好多活動讓大家可以無咁悶 (佢自己都話個課程難)
英文差都唔緊要 Peter唔會特色偏心啲native speaker 
Peter功課要求清晰具體 唔洗點追問都會掌握到 同埋佢改功課好細心好詳細 如果主動問問題 佢會好有心同你講更加多comment同詳細點改會更好Attendance: 記得唔識答都要主動撞下比下反應 Peter好認得人 靠上堂答唔答問題比分
CET: 唔好盡抄sample, 因為大部分sample都係伏 (最好提早做成份先交draft, 等peter直接comment哂你有咩改)
LDP: 咁小字就唔好搵partner, 自己一個完成 好過同人夾 
Reflective writing: 要寫得全面 唔好淨係重點講一兩個point
Timed essay: 唔洗太長 我淨係寫左六百字 一定要match題目背景同起承轉合 如果唔係Grammar幾好都扣分 (例如叫你寫個故事 apply 獎學金就一定要前後寫埋apply用途, 你讀邊科, 自己優點, 唔係淨係寫個故事就夠)
Her comment is strict and not thoughtful for students. Her comments sometimes makes contradiction too. Don't recommend to register her tutorial lesson....

one project 
two quizzes 35% each
all are MCs
so easy if you have studied biology and chemistry in college

course name: Language in Art, Invention and Inspiration
body:
continuous participation 20% 只要你肯按時交200幾字assignment 就有分
Mid term 20% 
Exam 40%
全部都係open book, 理解能力ok同對文學（？）有興趣基本ok
Term paper 20% 800字essay 唔sure接下來係唔係出會出翻同一個，類似用上堂教過的知識來分析poem/firm script/novel我覺得個GEok，prof好nice，本人year one bba,英文dse Lv.4 writing 得Lv.3 對於我來講對個grade 都幾滿意(因為我英文真心差)，理解能力好同對語言學有興趣的同學可以試一試。
It is a good course for psy students. Cover many important topics that our major course (both neuro psy and bio psy) do not teach. And good grade despite my medium grade in quizzes and final exam

依科無數底/sense既唔好亂reg，我des lv 5，但唔係數學major
有counting, biology, game theory
我已經全部problem sets都做過哂，去到midterm/final都係炒另外，依科要9x分先有A range，reg前考慮清楚
So freaking hard. Though i got A+ for MA1200 and A for MA1201, it's still hard to manage the concepts in the assignments, given I practiced all problem sets.
Actually it is 2019/2020 Sem B. Stephen is a nice tutor and always patient to his students. Don't be afraid to ask question. The course is relatively fair -- the more you pay, the more you will get !

course name: Thinking Philosophy: Bridging the Gap between Arts and Sciences
body:
2 short questions x3
1 presentation
1 individual paperThere wasn't any feedback provided which is disappointing as I wanted to know whether my answers were correct after doing pages after pages of reading. I think the presentation was our weakness as more philosophical ideas could be covered.

There were lots of lengthy assignments on every topic. The PowerPoint slides sometimes have only graphs without any proper explanations and you will have to google what it is about if you don't attend the lecture. The marking was very arbitrary and seemingly unfair. I compared my answers with the full mark answer, which were graded by the teaching assistant, and found mark-bearing points also in my answer on multiple occasions. (But I did not make an attempt to email the prof so I bear some of the responsibility for this) Another example is where the marks discrepancy between me and my 2 friends was very high,50%, 62%, 8x%.The final project (worth 50% if Im not wrong) (we chose to do a study on the California drought), which was done by me and them, was 27 pages long. I suppose that project salvaged by grade., but not enough to pull it to the A-ranges. Despite the treacherous amount of work, we learn a lot about how climate change is affecting different parts of the world and modern solutions that aim to tackle them.

Pass Failed this course. 2019/20 B.HORRIBLE course. The content might be interesting, but the questions & assignments make NO sense. Questions asked have nothing to do with concept, but include BASELESS rote learning. Memorizing the country bar codes for every country. Memorizing 5 digit RFID for different applications. Same questions are repeated. Marks are cut even if the answer is correct but not what the prof wants. In MCQ, 3/4 options will be correct, prof himself will agree, but you'll get marks for the one which is "most correct". And that is very very vague. DO not take this course.
2019/20 BBarely any workload. Interesting assignments (Just 2). I pass failed it though, but I guess I would've got an A. I regret doing that.

Took 2019/20 Sem B.
Easy score. Totally new to economics, didn't attend a single class, and didn't need to either. Lecture slides explain the concept very well.
But you don't get a single mark released ever, for anything. And every single thing is lined up in the last month, which can be tough.
Penalty to not write a progress report & give presentation, but no such marks for them.
Difficult course if you're not a STEM student, but for STEM students it's fun. Compulsory for EE. You'll have to work hard and lab assistants can and cannot be helpful depending on their mood.

Took it 2019/20 Sem ASumie CHAN sucks. My work was much above average, if not the best, in class, and she herself said that in her comments, yet gave me an average grade. The people in my class who could barely speak english (and never bothered to participate (there are marks for that)) got a better grade than me. I so regret I didn't pass fail is. There is no pleasing her.

2020 SEM B
Pre-proposal 
1 Assignment 
Midterm
Final Report (Business Plan)
Final Presentation
Final Exam 
The course is easy and the workload is okay. Special knowledge is not required. The midterm was super uncomfortable: a lot of questions with the numbers, in the beginning, so you have to scroll every time. Because of the online semester, there were time limits and hard questions. The assignment is easy if you read the ppt slides. Find normal groupmates and come up with a good idea. Professor is cool and friendly, always answers your questions. But idk why I got B+, I was expecting A- at least tbh. I guess that happened because of the online semester. The overall impression was good, recommend taking that course.

course name: Word, Sound and Image: Writing for Creative Media
body:
我係2019/20讀嘅
上堂笑騎騎，比grade放毒蛇（借隔離po句嘢用下）
所有嘢準時交足冇走過堂
每份功課都要peer review
典型吹毛求疵
改完又改都唔合佢口味
比嘅comments同marking criteria完全相反
eg：first draft叫你改個故事加多個人物，final product就話你做咩加多個人
完美中伏

Nice tutor
But PowerPoint slides are somehow messy
Very big words and a few words for one slide
Easy to have high marks in assessments

course name: Hong Kong Legal System and One Country,Two Systems
body:
Clear explanation
Not difficult to understand
100% exam due to Wuhan
Ask 3 people, all B+
Suspect all class B+

took this in 2019/20 Sem B
John is super nice and his guidelines on assignments were very clear. If you follow his instructions, you will do decently for sure. 
The coursework has changed a bit due to the Wuhan Coronavirus, not sure if these changes will keep in next year or not. But make sure that you attend every lecture and tutorial, participate in class and do your work, then everything will be fine. Just like the previous comments, the exam is pretty easy to handle as most of the information could be copied from your lecture notes, yet you are still expected to offer personal opinions on some controversial issues discussed in this course's lectures and tutorials.
Conclusion: hard work will certainly pay off.
This is not a course for students with zero economics background. It is requires a lot of work and feels like a core course

This semester only have is conducted online through zoom. But I still consider it as my favourate course this year.In the course, the professor might present to you some surprising counter-intuitive ideas. Don't take what he said at face value. I think the purpose of the course is to inspire you to think for yourself and look for the answer yourself. You should look into the recommended readings or other material for the whole picture of the topic after finishing each lessons.

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
Coursework同Exam好似係3:7，coursework係MC(4-5份，每份9-1x條)，大把時間比你做/google，唔亂做應該有8成5以上。 
Exam 今年有5x題(120min，open book)，絕大部分(4x題)係MC，幾題計數(難，最好看formula sheet，不過睇完都未必識)，全部每題1分。 在canvas考，今年MC有多選題。2-3成MC問得好直接，上足堂+溫熟notes應該會識。個人認為一部分題目幾難(有些題目問法同notes不同)，concept唔清會GG，另外有幾題我覺得溫熟咗notes都未必識 = = 。
無讀過physic的會有大劣勢(基本上認同前面同學所說，理科人坐底B range)，不求A range 的可以一試，workload係我讀過眾GE中最細的，相對地有更多時間比你溫/學呢科。

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy
chinese course name: 茶道：歷史、藝術、建築與哲學
body:
這個課程是在剛剛的一個學期讀的（2019/2020 SEM B）
因為online learning關係，本來的兩個quiz 以一份additional assignment代替，佔比是30%。另外，Creative Assignment 佔比20%，小組佔比30%,課堂參與佔比為20%。
這個課程為什麼推介給大家呢？
（1）教授內容相當豐富
第一堂你會接觸到日本的茶道歷史，歷史的東西難免有點沈悶，可是之後就會慢慢教一些禪學理念，茶道儀式，日式庭院建築，和服和菓子，插花等。相對於其他GE課程，這門課涉獵的範疇蠻廣且豐富，平時只是多去接觸日本文化的話定不會覺得乏味的。有一個小建議：對於一些課本內容多做做資料收集較穩妥，先去摸索一些專用的人物、物品的名詞用途等以便上課時較易吸收。
（2）邀請不同嘉賓來講
比如有幾節課有請來 中式茶藝師，禮儀師，插花大師
感覺從不同嘉賓身上可以對這門課多一個了解，不單單只是從書本上囫圇吞棗，因每堂課末總有一個發問環節，你可以從專家中補充所學。
（3）小組
大概是6人一組（記得當時在城大茶室中分了組）全組就一個topic 交個策劃書（proposal）然後製作幻燈片並且準備不多於12分鐘的即場分享（可以預先錄製影片）小弟的組友都很努力做～只是不知道當時老師開不了影片檔而當了遲交（明明是準時遞交功課

I was actually surprised to get an A grade since teacher does not give any comments on your assignments. Since this semester was mainly held as online teaching, I literally turned on the lectures and went back to sleep. Still I got an A. What a surprise.

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body:
我係2019/20 Sem B，自己一個人讀呢個course
多課後exercise同quiz，3-5題，google search就揾到Ans。2份assignment，多shot Q，都係google search or bible website，notes基本上冇直接答案。
有啲question唔識答唔緊要，我問過教會傳道人同神學院啲人，佢哋望完都覺得有啲題目嘅字眼唔合適，甚至錯誤。
overall 高過mean就ok。
heavy workload for a ge, not really helpful tutors and strict markings
Really nice.

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body: 我是19/20 SemB 只有assignement, tutorial exercise, reading quiz同埋term paper冇考試 group project, 建議這一科找熟悉隊友一齊讀, 不是宗教的宣傳但是相當考驗聖經的了解, 擁有十分強google search 能力相當重要, 英文唔使話太好, 英文聖經睇唔明都可以搵中文, btw John 好好人上堂講嘢詳細流暢, 有無數reading quizzes tutorial exercises和兩個assignment, 要留意reading quizzes和tutorial exercises的deadline日期, 我起初也不留意但唔小心miss咗幾個, 通常截止日期係上每堂之前, assignment 不是考lecture notes, 沒答案的, 要自行Google, 有上堂都未必識, 上堂只會加深你對背景嘅認識, 唔會有助你完成題目, 所以要有隊友互相幫手, 如果唔係一個人做做差唔多半日都未做好, 要預留三至四小時做一個assignment, 一個15%, reading quiz tutorial exercise 大約半小時做好, 視乎有多少題目, 最關鍵就係term paper, 約莫一半分數, 決定你嘅grading, 通常交一個月前會公佈題目最好快啲揀定開始做資料搜習, 1200 words maximum, 好似dse綜合咁樣將所有嘅資料combine 之後分析, 呢度都係靠google search, 引用聖經十分重要, lecture notes冇答案, 所以總結而言上堂只係foundation, 要有超好嘅google 能力同埋細心諗題, 但真心推薦比想要瞭解聖經嘅人讀唔會宣傳宗教, 如果冇上堂嘅話自學都比較難, ADD OIL
2019/20 Sem BNot as daunting as everybody says here. As long as you work hard that I think you will get a grade that you want.

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body:
Studied in 2019/20 Semester B.
Esther is very nice and well-prepared for the class. She makes the class fun and easy to follow, despite it's an online class due to the disruption of Wuhan coronavirus. 
The courseworks are the same as the previous comments, and their suggestions are still valid. Do follow your instructor's guidelines and comments to get a better grade:) 
Strongly recommend Esther to those who are looking for a fun class and will be dedicated to the course. Your hard work (and English ability) = Your final grade
P.S. it's better to get 85% or more for an A grade (80% or above would be an A-)

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body: While during the course the professor was very warm and welcoming, this changed as soon as we started questioning her. She gave us way too many questions which were all very wordy covering topics we didn't even learn due to the semester being cut short. Any student that sent her an email about this or questioned her was given a rude remark.

it was actually 2019/20 sem B, the system won't let me choose it. 
Anyway, despite the fact that the course was carried out thru zoom online teaching, the result is still satisfactory. 
There were quizzes after every lesson, so you better go to the class or get a friend to complete them for you. 
There was one big presentation, and a video was required, for 6 people per group, the workload per student is not that heavy (if there is no freerider) .
The exam was easy, basically just the questions in the notes and assignments.And most importantly, should you choose this course if you are not a science student ? i would say yes , since it is one of the easier courses in area 3. The questions distributions are around 50% calculation and 50% theoretical. the theoretical part is ez to deal with since they are directly from notes. For the math part, if you studied basic science before, it should be simple for you. It leans more towards the Physics side rather than geography. Being a physics major student, I grab the A grade with zero effort and zero hour being put into revision, so easy that its like grabbing your girlfriend. So yeah, i rate 9.5/10 for a area 3 course, especially for those who likes big classes or natural disasters (the same thing actually).

Tiffany好好人 好有心教 
每次問佢問題都好快答

對比過其他tutor Tiffany一定係教得最詳細
特別係APA style 
我Year1 乜格式都唔識但又成日要打essay 
APA Style學得好日後好有用
Assignment 只要跟足佢guideline做就唔會差
同埋記得有問題一定要問
DSE得Lv4 本身好驚UE會爛grade 
所以自己都好用心做Assignment
最後有A- 已經好滿足了
最後最後！有心上堂一定要reg Tiffany!!!

test 2個exam 1個 考埋曬啲無聊嘢 notes入面啲人樣呀年份呀 又會考啲淨係上堂講過嘅嘢 例如有題係問notes入面個圖個衛星係係邊個地方 本身張圖已經係補充資料 你上堂補充個補充資料 大佬邊個會抄低呀

Prof. James is nice and makes this GE course be easier. His samples and styles will help you to accomplish a good grade with full of knowledge. The homeworks are presenting below.1) The weekly assignments are necessary to review your content. It's not hard but relates to the course content each week. (I forgot to complete it one time and lost of my score)
2) The infographic really high impact on the final grade. I suggest you group up with someone who has skills in infographic design. It is a trick for someone who is not familiar with poster design.
3) The academic essay is the most important part. You have to develop the selected topic with taught of references. You might be lost the score if you fail to provide a correct reference style, writing structure, and the level of words.

GE2258, for me, is an excellent course! I took it in sem A 2019/20.
1) You have to complete the homework (which related to the lecture) each week. The homework is a multiple-choice question (around 5-6 items per week). Then select one answered the question to explain within 200-300 words.
2) The group project is fantastic. The topic is free to choose from. The only issue that students would remind is trying hard to apply the information from the lecture to explain your selected problem.P.s. Prof. Ho is very nice and always encourages students to having critical thinking on the samples. If you are looking for someone who has high empathy, Prof. Ho will not make you disappoint :)

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body: I had actually been very excited to take the course. And, even while doing it i enjoyed doing the presentation and studying for the finals because I was very interested in Statistics. However, I received a B- even after all of this, and when asked as to how this came to the particular grade, I was never told the marks or given any feedback and hence till date I still do not know where I went wrong. I would suggest never to take the course, if you truly want to learn and know what you are doing wrong, as no feedback is ever given.

course name: Science and Technology: From Past to Future
chinese course name: 科學與科技：過去與未來
body: 千祈千祈唔好Reg，伏到仆街。教嘅嘢係好深同埋好多， exam又出得好難

I study it at 19/20 SemA. I cannot identify the appropriate sem so i just randomly select one and type it here.Just watch movie and discussion for different topics during lecture. Week 1 is introduction of the course. A topic is being covered for 2 weeks. The first 2 hours of first week is teaching of concepts on a specific topic. The third hours will start watching the movie with Chinese subtitles. At the first 1-2 hours, just continuous to watch the rest of the movie with English subtitles and start group discussion on 4-5 questions after that. The worksheet need to be submitted at the end of the class. It is a routine process every two weeks. The lecturer may give some tips and ask some guiding question at they first group discussion.

body:
19/20讀揀唔到
懷疑自己個組俾佢針
Dse英文4 ielts 6.5

講野又句句有骨咁
Gp pj跟足佢講既野改又勁低分
都唔知佢想點
加上上堂會點堂叫人讀文
如果pre reg中佢建議立即reg走
否則祝你好運

Weith's requirements for the essay are very unique, only one source for one paragraph and the structure of the essay is fixed to be 5 paragraphs. No flexibility at all. Am I a primary student?? Really??
p.s. (Don't expect that he will upload the results of your work on canvas. )
easy course materials, If u know a few programming, that's enough for u to get a grade above b. Although there are quite many stuffs to do, many of them is not important, just ignore it is okay.

If you want to be respected by others, DO NOT choose CALVIN WONG .He is the one who will SATIRIZE you when you just ask a simply question about a topic in the course and he says "this is a common sense" but never give you constructive response.

但由於停課關係最後exam都係取消左
呢科自由度好大，堂上基本上唔教書，主要靠canvas discussion自主學習

body:
Nice course if you like philosophical discussions about the role of technology in your daily/academic life. Really good teacher that understands and helps you anytime. The workload is okay, not heavy. No group projects and exams.

Technological diary 
Technological diary(choosing 1 from each area and writing about it)
Excursion Report (trip)
Presentation 
Final project (essay)

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body:
2019/20 SemA讀
language discovery project 1000 words
Inclass timed essay
Reflection on inclass essay 200 words
Critical Exploration of Text 750 words成個course算輕鬆，language discovery project係2-3人一組寫1000字，好易寫爆字，份野個內容有啲似linguistic啲野，研究下邊啲字係邊個範疇比較常用，解釋下原因咁。
最難搞係inclass essay，似dse eng writing。預先畀8條題目你，主要係寫返你自己嘅個人經歷，例如遇過最大嘅困難、你買過最難忘嘅嘢。難係難在我已經好耐冇寫過呢啲文，好多字都唔記得點串。建議大家可以8題都寫定大綱，查定啲會用到嘅字先。
Sarah好靚，講野好溫柔

The tutor is nice and willing to help, you can consult her and ask for advice for all weighted assignments such as infographics and the argumentative essay. I would say that consultation is important for students in order to meet her standard and get good grades.

2019/20 Sem A讀著名講師李果呢點就唔駛多講，year 1 Sem A就reg到真係好好彩。
更好彩既係遇到一班好比力好比心機既Groupmates:) 大家一齊奮鬥，一齊共享靚grade
不過都係hard work pays off，consult多啲就會知tutor想要啲咩

I took this course in 2019/20 Sem A.Mark is a very passionate teacher. He encouraged students to actively participate in the class and would make some jokes to make the lesson even more engaging to students sometimes. He responds to email very efficiently and that happens even on weekends, so do ask him questions if you have something uncertain or need his advice. I enjoyed taking his course so much. I agree that Mark is not a teacher who will give A grades easily, but hard work will certainly pay off 

2019/20 Sem A
constructive advice and encouraing responses. he allowed and encouraged us to explore freely and express our original opinions, sometimes contrary to conventional ones.

course name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship for Young Professionals
body:
Dr. Sun is a very passionate teacher who is willing to inspire students.
However, I think the grades really depend on the "creativity" of your work and your groupmates' efforts. If you are lucky, you can get a higher grade.
In general, this course helps you know more about innovation and stuff, like intellectual property rights.

We can really learn a lot from her classes.

Light workload, good teacher, interesting course!

body: Gd ge course I recommend u guys to reg it!

19/20 semA 讀 
上堂教嘅內容有用,professor教得好。
Inclass assignment : 通常最尾嗰個鐘做,自己做完在canvas交,有難度,唔識請上堂&問附近的同學&google。
Midterm x1: 前面幾條計數(有條溫熟都唔一定識,有難度,自己搵咗D額外練習做先大概識),後面一大堆mc(簡單,溫熟嘅都應該識)。Mean: 35.1/70 我：60/70 （今個sem好似話有40幾就A range(淨計midterm)）
Group project: 今個sem 7-9人一組買股票、債券等等方法投資,要整pt,同present(提早完sem,取消了present,淨交pt),你最好要做D嘢
1. 搵同系嘅人一組（時間方便,佢唔會失蹤到）
2. 組員有人買過股票,對股票有認識(無都無所謂,professor 會教如roe,pe係咩)
3. 搵sources,睇下上年/上個sem讀嘅同學的pt大概點做！！！
4. 上足lecture, 睇清楚你groupmate 整咗咩出黎,否則你/你groupmate 整咗堆垃圾出來你都唔知！中學讀過econ會稍為著數。

body: I worked very hard but still got a B- while one of my groupmates who did not work much got an A-. I don't know whether I did not work hard enough or I am just suck but I am very disappointed

For a GE course I think the workload is unreasonably high. The exam is heavily based on the text book which requires extensive studying after class. This GE course seems more like a core subject due to its workload and strict attendance requirements. I suggest anyone who want to take this course to rethink again as it will possibly pull down you CGPA if not managed appropriately. Even if you attended all lessons and submitted all in-class discussion worksheets, assignments, the risk of failing the exam is high if weekly revision is not conducted. I urge you to RETHINK before taking this course !!!

teacher: L: 林學忠 T: 張為群
body:
2019/20 Sem A （上面冇得禁）
背景：Engine
首先雖然今個sem尾提早咗，但我地組一早已經完晒presentation，而且我地係比較早要交essay嘅一班。講咗Lecture先，林學忠嘅Lecture好informative而且好有趣，語速係快但好清晰，真係學到好多文化知識。而且每堂完左做嘅quiz都緊扣課題，題目有時會係上堂最開頭播果條片嘅內容，通常都係啲答咩都得，睇你解析嘅題目，而且佢要你控制字數係100字以內，重質不重量，唔比你幾百字大包圍。

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body: 勁多哲學野。功課要求唔清唔楚，每堂比篇文＋有段時間比人討論，好尷，dead air。
輕鬆但爛grade，你覺得你自己好幸運ge可以試下，反正和你努不努力完全沒有關係。assignment ge成績有他講無你講，他中意就高分咯，一句講嗮，想撞彩就讀啦。
NICE TUTOR 本身DSE得3 grammar亂七八糟都輕鬆B+

course name: Food Production in the Modern World
body: GODDD please do NOT reg this course if you are not from the science background! I took this course with 90% of classmates majoring in vet. They are super nice and friendly, just like the professor... BUT YOU CAN HARDLY CATCH UP WITH THEM since they are all experts in the field as a beginning. I usually score A range in most of the courses and this ruined my transcript. Regret not to drop it.

I know nothing about an earthquake or any geographic things before the courses, but still, get an A-.Exam and project are very important, choose good groupmates and study hard for the exam,
even if you are so stupid as me, you can still get a good grade.

learn nothing...
You need to choose good groupmates otherwise, you will suffer.

i forgot the lecture name, it was a girl, she was the worst lecturer ive ever had. teh course is too vague. she never provides exactly what shes looking for in your presentation and individual work. dont even have a proper attendence sheet for class. We asked her serveral time to provide us guidelines at least a marksheet to get an idea of what shes looking for in our presentation, the while class asked for it and she kept saying she cant provide it, or its useless its only for me to mark for your grammars etc. dont take this course really.
首先對住phil呢啲藝術家脾氣Professor，影出嚟嘅作品其實好難對中佢口味，好難捉摸，四份功課又要唔同主題，要做好多research，其實花咗好多時間，即使影開相，如果同concept唔係扣得好深，已經會扣分。而且phil會偏心，如果你上堂唔係好active,令佢冇記住你,其實好難話有靚grade！攞B雖然未到最差，但實際上花咗好多時間，好大機會拉低左其他course嘅grade。

最後都係呢個grade

Weekly journal都好俾心機寫
吹到自己變係海邊跑步邊執垃圾
或者簡單到自己重用咩台式飲品店啲杯來做筆筒同埋用不鏽鋼飲管咁
點知 佢自己親口話
'就算你嗰個禮拜寫自己淨係做垃圾分類扔係黃啡藍回收桶 都係俾一樣分 唔使咁俾心機寫'

This course takes a small proportion of the exam, and the papers take a larger proportion than usual. I personally don't recommend this GE, as long as this GE I got a C range. However, if you want to easily spend a semester or recommended.

body:
E一科真係好易讀, work load唔算好大.

Have to admit, did not expect my grade to be that low as I prepared for the exam and had coherent answers for all the questions. The course really is interesting and light in itself, but the exam expectations are far too high to get graded highly for questions that can come up from ANYWHERE in what you've studied throughout the semester.It doesn't make sense for your comprehension of the course to almost solely reflect on the exam alone. Even a practical lab exam (identifying chemical, making own product, etc.) would be better. From what I heard almost, if not all GEs have final exams so choose what will interest you with a grain of salt. That being said, the teachers aren't to blame for this and Alex is still a wacky treat in a midst of monotone voices.
利申: fm, major chem輕鬆，高中chem level。lecture講下唔同質地嘅化妝品嘅化學結構，整soap嘅原理，同一般高中chem堂冇咩分別，但有時有啲堂好無聊，例如five senses。
2018/19 Sem B唔錯，鄭sir講嘢會用啲生活化例子，上堂唔會悶。講到明如果走少過兩堂嘅話，係未試過有人fail。我就100%返齊嘅。

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
我系2018/19summer
上堂規則比較多，唔可以食野同飲野
唔比傾計，佢見你傾計會停系度望住你，然後就會行過黎問你咩名同SID No. 
佢上堂講野好lur而且好悶，真系有興趣先好讀
無phy底的同學上堂落足心機上應該都handle到。
Presentation 要求不太高
有Lab visit一定要去，會take attendence, 基本上就系介紹一下EE lab然後寫lab report 。
唔好以為無attendence分就好爽，要靚grade肯定系上堂要聽書然後不停jot notes, 好鐘意考上堂講嘅野而且notes無，真系分心一秒都唔惦至於點解我F我都唔清楚
Ps. 無讀phy,專心上堂，無走過堂

workload真的很轻：
平常没两节课为一个单位，讲一些concept，看一部跟这个有关的电影，然后in-class group discussion，平常没有课后assignment，非常舒服。
final exam要复习ppt+recommend reading，但是要复习得细一些，考的挺细的。
storybook就是选一个自己感兴趣的电影结合课上的theory来分析，这个占比比较大。
这门课整体给分都比较好，强推！（就是有的时候prof课上讲theory会有点无聊）

course name: Discovering the Dynamics of Contemporary Cities and Architecture in China
body: Just want to say that the quiz is quite difficult.... Not as easy as someone commented before. The content is very detailed, hiding in the corner of the Powerpoint.A good team is important. For this course, the group size is very big (About 9-10) and difficult to control. I got a lower mark partly due to the group project.

I took this course for 18/19 summer. 
The course is a good course. It is not because the instructor gave a higher mark, but because she gave a fair mark. I did not get an A range but I think the score is quite reasonable when compare to the contribution.The course work including participation five photos, 2000 words essay, in-class test and group presentation. The workload is heavy. If you want to get higher grade in this course, you need to pay attention to each part. The in-class for Marianne is essay question, so be prepared of it.

呢科真係on撚9
10% Written/PosterAssignment 兩份assignment黎，第一份就written report，topic關於手機，頭幾個week已經要交，第二份就要整poster，跟拍片個topic，sem尾交
10% Video Assignment 佢會比個topic你要拍片同剪片
10% Presentation 就係要present翻你條片
上堂會派d classwork嘅工作紙，佢會收黎改，但又冇清楚講計唔計grade :o)
之後有兩個test，一個10% ，一個20%，有mc有lq，佢test有時會考你lecture slides入面冇嘅野(姐係佢上堂口講嘅野，變相冇得走堂) 然後考slides入面有嘅野就係完全死背(例如比幅科學家嘅人像圖你，問你呢個係邊個黎，佢係邊個年份做過d咩，有咩成就咁)考呢d根本就係on9，一黎只係考你記野叻唔叻，二黎記黎根本冇意思，考完都唔會記得，完全學唔到野
最後仲有個40%嘅exam，format同test差唔多諗下你讀ee嘅ge科又要拍片剪片又要present又要整poster，又要寫report，仲要考3次test，你話大唔大workload啦?

文科人堂堂都唔知發生緊咩事
唔知marking scheme
所以唔知自己assignment and quiz 算高分定低分
仲要有group presentation同group paper
所以都幾多野做

2018/19 Sem B
EL0200B

佢就話篇essay幾好,但出黎個grade衰咗,可能係因為exam

2)做 Show & Tell (SnT)
3)早啲Group present
…多到唔記得，但唔知每樣加幾多分

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body: well prepared and passionate, a rare tutor these days...u have to attend the class as she will remember ur face if you want to gain that 10% participation marks.

Exam is VERY VERY VERY important! There is not much to do throughout the course but you must attend every class (she takes attendance & collect daily classworks). No mid-term and indiv assign sounds good, right?! NO! the course is more difficult to get nice grade than you think esp the gp project. You need perfect Eng in order to get A grade Exam is unbelievable long & covers the whole textbook. Even starts revise a week before is not enough. Worst, you must need the text for exam.

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices
chinese course name: 全球商業作法的革命轉變
body: 雖然話無pre-requiste，但對無商科底的我係有一定難度，因為第一次接觸business course，所以好多terms要背，好花時間。Gp project 比較幸運，有group mate讀 BBA嘅，所以幫忙很多。workload算是合理，無indiv assign，無mid-term，不可以走堂因為每天都take attendance 有classwork做，exam其實不算太難，不過會cover成個week schedule，我最後個禮拜才revise，有B算好彩（應該是grp project 拉高咗個分）d bba groupmate 全部 A grade @.@。Toni 常說她是 tiger，她在係嚴師（上堂不能食野）除此之外，其他都ok，可以用notebook上堂，上堂不會死讀，是GE不錯的選擇。

course name: Social Innovation and Entrepreneurial Venture Exploration (SIEVE)
body:
Project 40% 好重要 (presentation + group report + audience mark + internal peer evaluation) 
individual assignments 都幾多野做
差唔多每堂都有in-class exercise, 係幫你做下project既野
lecturer好nice，係比較多野做

功課有4份：
1）Portrait 2）Decisive Moment 3）Landscape 4）Photo Series前3份交1張相，最後一份就係10張以內。前三份當然可以交多過一張相俾佢睇，但係佢只會為其中一張（你自己揀一張）評分，同埋每一份功課都要寫Artist Statement講解下你份作品。所以其實workload大唔大係睇你自己。你可以試好多attempt，影到自己滿意為止，亦可以求求其其。我自己就因為暑假淨讀佢，所以真係用左好多時間周圍影同埋影自己嘅Self Portrait。

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body: every lesson there are 2 in-class questions, if you pay attention, you know the answer, or, you can just google the answer. easy job. if you miss the lesson, you can do a make-up question.a quiz and an exam, the questions are similar to the in-class worksheet, but with more details and a slightly higher degree of difficulty. if you revise well (recite the ppt) you get a good grade. i didn't finish my revision for the quiz so i got a lower than average mark. but the exam was better.

course name: Discovering the Dynamics of Contemporary Cities and Architecture in China
body:
Sem workload:20% Workshop x 2
15% Case Study proposal
25% Case study report 
40% Quiz + Individual Essay

(18/19 summer讀嘅)
建議唔走堂 可以自己獨立完成essay嘅同學去讀gp project： 1500-2500words
gp project plan presentation： 4mins each person
Individual work: 5 photos
Class activities: quizzes, presentation comment form...
雖然佢俾分唔算嚴 但係上佢堂完全學唔到野！！！特別係APA referencing style 佢講得唔清唔楚 對SS人嚟講 我地成日寫essay APA style好重要

-major studying computer science (i think if u study ICT in secondary school you can get a good grade too) , highly recommend CS students to reg
-must consult the prof. first before presentation 
-quiz is simple and easy (MC + short questions) ; just remember to read the notes
-exam will have long questions ; i think the questions are very similar to the quiz 
-don't skip lesson if possible ,because have attendance(and in-class quiz sometime)
千其唔好讀除非你想拎low grade，workload超重。而且基本要英文好先讀得掂，如果唔係就預拎c range啦。dennis人係幾好，不過教得好難，自問讀書唔差，唔知點解呢科讀到d，勸大家搵啲穩陣既科。

To be honest, the work load of this course is not heavy at all. I was too lazy to get a better grade.1 Group project (Presentation + Proposal + Peer Review)
1 Mid-term
1 Exam
1 Problem solving exercise
asm4份全部送分,佢第一堂會比你睇上個sem啲人嘅grade,大部份都坐底B+,我冇做佢啲problem set 但有睇,點都一定要睇因為佢Mid term final啲題目十成九都一樣就係改左個數字
2份assignment 各2條問題 加1個project 1個final test workload好細下 我1份assignment C+左 份pj做得普通 test考得正常 都有a range 抵讀
第一堂講到明唔計attendance, 只有幾堂(presentation and quiz/exam)一定要出現, 鍾意走堂一定要上, 成個sem只要出現3/4次, final溫好notes直接去考就可以, Dennis勁好人

5 quiz
1 exam
差唔多隔個禮拜就有quiz，加上要溫嘅嘢非常多，所以都幾辛苦，不過effort=grade，肯努力就會有回報，但你想hea又想攞靚grade嘅話咁呢科唔啱你。有5個quiz，淨係計最高分嗰4個，所以有一次失手都唔緊要。全部quiz都係close book，有3次係MC + 幾題short Q，其餘2次all MC，每次淨係問2-3個chapters嘅嘢。而exam係all MC，cover all chapters。另外，個course唔take attendance，所以可以走堂，個人亦認為上堂冇乜用，溫notes就夠。

2018/19 Sem B 讀
脷伸無底，計數差，讀得好吃力
計唔到數的千祈唔好reg不過個course都無想像中甘伏
臨exam前溫熟每堂的classwork
prof都係出返類似長題目黎考

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body: g f v v v v v v v v v v v v v

Same as previous 2 comments, 18/19 sem B讀不過未有得揀. 
Easy course! You only have to ask 4/5 questions in 13 weeks of classes, he will give a grade to your question, usually B range. 
+ Exam
Exam means hand-in an essay to canvas during exam day and time. He told you the essay topic at the beginning of day1 class. And he is very nice, you can consult him of your essay topic. 
-No attendanceYou need to follow his rules in class. Don't talk with your friends during his class! and you can come and leave the class anytime without notice him.
Very difficult course. You will get C range or below if you don't have foundation on Physics / (Engine). I don't understand the course contents at all. Totally not recommend for a GE course.
俾佢一科拉低哂個CGPA，喊出黎。Lecture上齊哂。Tutorial個個星期得一組present，仲要答全部同學問題，成個問答大會咁。GE科搞到咁認真，當個個都好熟識中史同中化。未讀既唔建議reg佢
Ppt present比較兩知名政領袖的風格（冇限定）。計齊attendance，交paper(用番present內容所以workload唔多)，加上tutor人nice, 輕鬆又一sem。

唔chur，平均兩堂一份assignment，五個人做一份2500字關於人物或者事物creativity嘅group project，同埋一個open book final quiz。
基本上有上堂就會識，所有野都好貼近生活所以好容記。

真心唔推薦大家去讀佢
好嚴格
好chur利申：本人DSE 5

2018/19 Sem B 讀
有prog底/EE/engine仔會易明d, 冇興趣/本身work load重 唔建議regEE仔必修嘅GE course, notes整全, 簡單易明, prof指示清晰, 有問必答, 係中學老師feel~~~~
用micro:bit(一塊好得意嘅電路版/CPU)為中心教學, 駁input sensor, prog micro:bit, 然後到output
Lecture教唔同sensor/circuit design/Micro:bit嘅特性同原理, 仲有sensors同micro:bit(s)之間嘅連接同溝通, prog micro:bit嘅技巧, 畫下flow chart, 識c++/java/python都走唔甩, 冇得寫pseudo code代替, 畫啦!
冇Tutorial但會有tutorial question比你做練習, midterm/exam問題相類, 明白個原理, 做熟d題目就會識做
Project 係全course最煩嘅野, prof比components/theme你, (eg bike system), proposal(寫有咩function/點做出嚟)+interview(比prof lab session con一con) + 整完要拍片demo + presentation + report

The course is now revised and there will be a final examination. The course requires Madarin so don't take it if you don't understand Mandarin Chinese. Assignments are quite time-consuming and are not easy any more. About the group project, as the groups are assigned by prof herself, it really depends on your luck that teammates may contain free riders. Although free riders are punished, they definitely will affect your grade if they perform bad in the group presentation. Final is easy and are from the materials.In all, not recommended.
本身理科底，組員有商科人同社科人。大家都想攞A range，積極準備同問問題，落堂都問問題。Calvin都一一細心回答同建議睇咩書，very helpful。最後全部人A range（大課有人上齊認真交足堂課，有人就走左啲堂）。

course name: Become a Smart and Responsible Consumer
body: 個 tutor 要勁出位先可以靚 grade, 要堂堂答問題, 否則都會爛 grade

An intro course of mass media. Not difficult overall. Classes ok in general but some topics can be boring (e.g. topics about newspaper). Can tell teacher is trying hard to make the class fun so still interesting in general. Not too much to do in class except simple classworks. No indiv assignment, just group project. Good, responsible team members are critical especially in presntation. Need the textbook for exam revision. Exam has quite a lot to do but cannot remember exact details but most of the exam is MCQs and not difficult. Teacher is nice, friendly and supportive. Just email her & her reply is quick. A good choice if you need a good grade.

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices
chinese course name: 全球商業作法的革命轉變
body:
Pros: Toni 老師有責任心，上課有趣，有很多分享機會，課程不難（若你是商科生）因大部份concepts在已經Yr 1, 2 讀過，無individual assignment，只有group project & classwork 所以打大部份時間是輕鬆的。我個人覺得考試還OK，因大部份係MC，SQ跟classwork有關，essay 只有一條。
Cons: 每一堂都take attendance，最後一個小時一定有classwork，要高分絕對不能走堂，會扣掉attend, participation及classwork分，好大鍋！而且有min attend require，注意！！需要慎選groupmate，因為group project 是很重的。EXAM MC 一定要 textbook。

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body:
上堂好輕鬆好fun （上足堂）

In Dong Yang, we trust!

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong

body: TOTALLY RUBBISH

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body:
每次上堂前都要點名，遲過15分鐘就要扣分。
上堂不停要人答佢問題，冇人答就跟住attendance list輪流問，每堂至少問1-2round。
Lecturer對呢個course嘅資料唔太了解，連assignment字數&deadline都唔知，任何大小事都話要問完supervisor先答到我地。
因為呢個course新開，以上所講嘅都尚可容忍，但身為一個lecturer竟然連上堂嘅日子係公眾假期都唔知，喺公眾假期前一日仲出email叫我地聽日上堂記得要present...
仲要比分極手緊，真係可避則避。

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
成個course outline 好simple好easy
course work 30%
Exam (~40 mc) 70%
唔tick attendance, 每兩堂轉一次professor
所謂course work 只係每星期上canvas做10條mc, 可慢慢上網search or refer to notes, east to get full marks.
而exam 只需用一天睇睇notes內的文字&背書既野, 佔exam mc 2-3成分
而exam剩低的mc則需要你有physics 底 (高中有選修phys,唔洗好勁都得,佢考得好淺好淺), 但佔分又很重
workload十分輕鬆, 我走了8-9成堂
建議理科人選修 挪A+無難度!!
至於從未讀過Phys的同學則不建議修讀!!!
因為我肯定professor上堂無教過相關既野,
佢assume你地識, 因為於理科人來說好basic
但如果你無讀過phys, 即使你背曬成份notes,
你都只能墊屍底了....

course name: Real Estate Development: Principles and Process
body:
工作量太大
而且lecturer係唔會覆email
要問野就好上堂問定先

大 伏 ！
assignments既評分標準好模糊，冇收過真正既marking scheme，只有上堂講解同幾個大剔之後比分你
In class quiz一遲到就冇得做，仲要因爲唔夠時間由四個變三個，miss 一個已經冇左差不多8%
份report同presentation做到死死下，Project presnetation果陣佢聽聽下訓著左，中途先醒番LOL
無論你有冇Geog底都唔建議你去讀

唔知收唔到功課定點 中學冇讀過phy 所以F咗 
基本上第一堂搵咗groupmate就可以走堂 佢上堂都係個notes 
p.s.冇走過堂

18/19SEM B讀不過未有得揀
HEA讀之選
淨係問3條問題+一份essay
啲問題亂問都會有b+
唔洗驚問唔到 好多人走堂
去到後期得幾條友上堂 一定問到
又唔計attendance 極端啲講如果一堂問到3條既話咁就唔洗再上了
至於essay 我覺得最緊要題目揀得夠特別
唔好同人撞, 有哂正反
我只係寫左1700字only

teacher: Geoffrey Lau / Rebecca Chin / YUAN Hsiang-Yu Sean
body: It is important to study hard for the quizzes. The first quiz is really easy, but the second quiz is quite tough. As for the poster presentation, it is very important to appear professional and not read off from cell phones instead of looking at the audience .
Exams are okay - not very hard, not very easy. Mid term and final exam are most important to get a good grade.

課程：主要介紹大眾傳播的發展及理論，是基礎課程，所以課程不難明白，只是英文名詞比較多，平常功課不多，只有40％ gp project， 20％ attendance/participation/classwork， 40％ exam （強烈建議買textbook，考試題目差不多從書找到, MC 60%, T/F 10%, 1條essay 30%）。每天都有classwork所以不能走堂，需要好團隊慎選groupmate。我是最後兩個禮拜才認真讀，有這樣的成績是驚喜，我估計classwork救不少分數。另外present weeks 一定要出席，因為分會加重（根據多少group present）。老師方面：Toni 是非常有經驗，講課有趣不會悶，只是講話好快速，英文不是很好所以有點吃力。Toni 是很友善的老師，回答問題好快，我們group project 遇到不少難題，Toni 都很耐性的解釋，甚至將的時間改到weekend，遷就我們做part time 的同學，最後project 拿到A，我們真的非常感激。A very nice teacher, highly recommended!!

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices
chinese course name: 全球商業作法的革命轉變
body: This is my second time having Toni class. She is demanding in class but also friendly, responsible and very helpful especially in the group project. Scores breakdown is group project 40%, attendance, participaton & classwork 20%, final exam is 40%, no individual assignment. The workload is very heavy at the semester end especially for the group project. Having the right group members are MUST. Also, don't miss her classes especially during presentation weeks. Students are required to give presentation groups comments and that is counted as participation & classwork marks. We have 4 presenting groups each week and thus, there are 4 classwork marks counted. Textbook is also a must for exam. Need to study at least 3 weeks early for that.
幸運遇上認真既隊友，全組A range。

course name: Become a Smart and Responsible Consumer
body:
[Is was 2018/19 Sem B]
As a student from college of business, it's not so difficult to handle.
There are individual assignment (2500words max), group project, one debate for every student, and final exam.
The instructor prefers students who answer and comment to the issues discussed in classes. I was not one of them. She made her every class full of information for entire 3 hours.
Individual assignment and group project weren't difficult, and the exam was quite easy. Debate depends on personal speaking ability, but don't be too worry, just give it a try.
It's nice to meet lots of exchange in class.

非常有用的course，professor很好人，教書質量高(ps. 本人yr3)
有quiz(mean：66，我：82)
有inclass-assignment，但係可以靠隊友交，可以係屋企做(隊友提你)
有final，分量足
project 自己一個人做，workload不算大，而且實用總結而言，因為系non-bba course，感覺d野好簡單
垃圾course, 個lecturer 教得又垃撚圾，又話quiz all mc , 點知每次都最尾有兩三題要文字解釋，如果冇bio 底真係讀得吃力，又多野背又難記d terms, lecture notes 又垃圾，都唔撚知點温。 想爛grade 就讀la。 總而言之 呢科垃撚圾，讀黎無撚用，又學唔撚到野，教個個又垃撚圾 ，waste my time.
耐心回答我組的問題和解答我的疑難，電郵回覆詳盡。自問缺席了幾堂lecture，否則肯定A。
換左人教啦,要識聽印度英文,讀PHYSIC就好D, 如果唔係唔好找死,我科科A-以上就F左喱一科

semB嗰陣waiting list勁多人排緊呢科，所以我有日等佢落堂嗰陣就去咗揾佢問佢可唔可以批多個位比我。結果入到去嗰陣佢自己一個人好寂莫咁喺度播緊歌，而咁啱我又記得首歌個名叫做Libertango，所以就走埋去同佢搭散，佢好surprised估唔到會有學生會識呢首歌仲同我傾咗陣，傾完音樂之後我再同佢講返話我想讀佢呢科但係冇位，佢聽完笑咗聲就話肯開多個位比我

本人於2018-2019 sem b take呢一科
呢科有quiz ,homework, report 同 exam,
無可厚非的是Report workload大，而且唔好諗着hea做，因為佔course 40 percent.
Quiz 10個percent，而且扣分制，出D野亦唔係notes有，不過堂上有mention 過，所以佢自己都話quiz 就唔好太緊要，勝在(open book)
Homework. 20 percent,5分種做完，超簡單 
Exam(close book),30percent ,深度還可以，唔難， no pain no gain 啦!不過notes真係要温，all exam questions from note總括：Reg得過，唔伏，文理法科都各有優勢，.btw 唔明點解得A-。。。(area 3 必reg科)

course name: Urban Green City: Pollution and Solution
body: Rewarding experience given by an experienced and nice professor, the lectures consist of multidisciplinary materials ranging from chemistry, economics, physics to history. The course provides an introductory yet deep overview and analysis to the status quo of the energy, pollution and environmental issues. In terms of learning, if you find yourself interested in the environmental issues and would like to get a decent grade this course is a good choice.Had good teammates but did not do well on my exam that's why I only got B

我係2018/19 Sem B讀嘅 呢科對我嚟講可以話係特別辛苦 因為我嘅groupmates有一半係freerider 所以係各個assignment上面都比較多嘢做
呢科有5份assignment 2份in-class email writing 1個business meeting simulation 1份business proposal report&present 各佔20% 
in-class email writing要求你帶自己部laptop去做 所以讀大學唔用laptop嘅人點都要借到部嚟用 其他assignment就跟返佢嘅要求嚟做 business meeting根據唔同嘅tutor有唔同嘅dress code Terry就會要求你smart casual/full suit 而business proposal presentation就必定要著suit
呢科做得特別差除咗因爲佢比所有人嘅分都係踩acerage之外 我自己係第一篇adjustment email係炒炒地 所以就B-咗
上堂氣氛唔差 可能係我哋group特別多嘢講 所以上堂都算係幾fun Terry有時會問下大家問題希望大家講多d英文同埋多d interaction 整體嚟講呢科係睇tutor做人 assignment內容大家都差唔多 英文能力先係分水嶺

course name: Chinese Cultural Heritage in Modern Perspective
chinese course name: 中國文化遺產與當代社會
body:
著名講師李果。cciv都係add佢，兩課都係A。
至於想學野，不了。走堂，hea過，靚grade，首選李果。

其實係18/19 Sem B take嘅，不過未有得揀住。
呢個GE好輕鬆，hea讀之選！
3個Verbal Assignment就佔20%@, 1份term paper 40%! 
發言三次真係好容易，3個鐘堂有2個鐘discussion time，一班得30幾人，仲要好多人都會走堂，如果咁都發言少過3次就係自己問題。
唔take attendance，可以瘋狂走堂，我上過3堂發言過4次，3次B+，1次B，好少人上到A-，所以夠3次B+已經可以走堂架啦。Term paper自訂topic，講一個technology對society嘅影響就得，好自由，但係最好specific啲。有問過John，佢比個例子係用smartphone對interpersonal relationship嘅影響。其實就係好似argumentative essay咁，要有stance，正反都要講，有example support。至於點比grade就唔知道，冇出paper嘅grade，但係fyr我冇consult過，寫左2700字左右，應該paper ok先會拉到A嘅。

Lecture 要 reg 黃佩賢，一個鐘就可以落堂做in class Assignment。
Assignment係寫文，有寫野就有分，中文沒信心可以reg佢Lec，咁就唔會MC 3/4 機會零分。Tutor上忠哥堂，佢講野幾得意。
利申DSE中文3，個Final group project都係用左兩日做。個A應該係每堂Tutor都有答問題，平時分拉番尼。
effort = grade = fair
本身對中文/歷史一啲興趣都無，覺得依科根本無用同埋浪費時間，但無奈地依科係必修科，而且會影響到CGPA。Tutorial無得揀之下揀左KC Wong。如果你同我一樣對依科完全無興趣，咁佢既風格絕對唔適合你。參考左身邊朋友既情況，若然你只係想輕鬆地完成依科，又想拎靚grade，咁請你盡力reg某李姓導師。

唔好比佢嗰啲評語呃到 佢個網站話大約有三分之一嘅人會有a range
我相信你決定係三分之二嗰幾個

1819 Sem A 依個course有段小插曲，一開始course leader 話明60%係quiz，其餘40%就係presentation， 無exam。
啲quiz係3周一次，第3周係教完果堂既lecture就quiz，所以有一課係一定要預先温，e個professor好中意數字，所以温lecture Note 記得背下數字。例如：問你人體內有幾多%係水，人既大腦佔身體幾多重量等。

This subject is not that hard if you put some effort. It is quite teacher-specific, so pay attention to that. Also, the progress you make throughout the course plays a big role in the final grade.Prof John is super nice, and he likes students who participate and engage in discussions. My advice is to attend all tutorials and do everything carefully - ask him for feedback, do peer review etc.

course name: Enhancing Your Service Leadership for the 21st Century
chinese course name: 為 21 世紀強化你的服務領域領導力
body:
The course itself is interesting as the professor could invite guest speakers during the lectures. There were two big assignments: Service Diary and Group Presentation. The Service Diary (20%) was a bit challenging, but it was a platform to share our service experience. The Group Presentation (15% for presentation and 25% for report) was okay, but you were assessed by 3-4 professors (including Dr. Yanto). However, for Science and Engineering Students, they may need to revise more on the short test to be familiar with the test questions, as it counts for 30% of the final grade. Plus, participation will be required in the course as it contributes 10% of your final grade.
For those who would like to enroll to this course, unfortunately, this course may not be offered starting the next semester.

Conny is the best lecturer that I have ever met in CityU. To be specific, she is very warm-hearted and constantly willing to offer students the necessary help. Indeed, I am not an outstanding student in the class and do not spend too much effort on this course. However, Conney provides clear instructions and guidance for me to follow, creating a congenial atmosphere during the classes. That's the main reason why I can obtain grade A in this course. In light of this, she has our respect and gratefulness. Thank her for illuminating my voyage of life with her own light of life. My grateful sentiments come from the bottom of my heart.Back to the topic,
The lecture is boring and stupid, but good grade anyway. This course heavily depends on team project. You would require a team of good teammates, else you die.

course name: Architecture and Space in Chinese Culture
body:
Li Lin好好人，上堂有點悶。
Groupmate 得一個Y3其他都係Y1 一個freeride但係都有呢個成績
一個Quiz （係 fill in the blanks)
用英文教 但係ppt都有好多中文
會教建築特色 空間 都會有教小小風水嘅elements
我自己鍾意中國文化 所以都ok
但係如果唔鍾意嘅話 上堂就可能有點吃力～～
但係Li lin唔take attendance 
而且都好好人～～ reg得過
盧嘉琪好好人，又俾到啲specific comments ，勤力啲就應該A range. 李果lecture係要寫短文，其他班好似做MC.

Demonstration is not as important as report. Programming is not hard. Test and Exam consists of programming problems and few concepts. If you work hard, it's probable to get an A even A+.
Not so difficult... After all MicroBit is for child to learn programming and have fun. You should care more about your lab report rather than try to remember everything.

同前面個post一樣，lectures全走，叫fd代槍做assignments。
tutorials走一半，功課亂做，最緊要有維基百科。

堂堂有in class, attendance

course name: The Chemists Kitchen (The Science of Food and Cooking)
teacher: Professor Hoi Lun Kwong, Dr. Andy Siu, Dr. Vincent Ko, Dr. Kai Chung Lau
chinese course name: 化學家的廚房（食物以及烹飪的科學）
body:
呢科學既主要係煮野食涉及到既chem
有底既人學好簡單 無底既信相都會無問題 因為大部份都係中學junior science
只有tutorial會take attendance 而d professor講野都幾無聊(得頭幾堂得意) 
而workload就有2份individual reports
一份係關於field visit 個visit可以免費狂食豆腐花 旅遊巴接送
另一份係關於tasting experience 
d professor會煮牛排比你食 同埋可以試酒 個人覺得都幾好玩
最尾仲有份gp project 要拍片煮野食 同埋要了解入面既原理 Q&A d 問題都唔算難
而exam只要有溫就識做 都係背下野only但有一點唔好既係 d assignment既guidelines唔係好清楚 無格式 又唔知大概要寫咩
而且我唔知自己d assignment同gp project做成點 佢透明度唔高

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
The workload is much heavier than it used to be starting from this semester. 1.The content of the course it self is quite interesting and useful, and the instructor had done experiments in the lecture every time. 
2.There are quiz over the semester. They are not difficult, but however is kind of stupid in my opinion when your score is in fact the number of keywords you have written.
3.Do pay attention to what they've said during the lab visit since no one has a clue what those machines are for and you are required to produce a mutli-page report with zero knowledge.
4.The presentation was going in the way that I am not expecting. Essentially, the more words you put in your keynote, the higher mark you will get. Professor does not appreciate graphs and pictures as he thinks that is a act of laziness. Put paragraphs in your keynote and be prepared for fundamental questions then you'll nail the final project and presentation.

quiz真的很重要!!

工作量挺重!!
三个assignments都是800-1000 words的essay,还有一个group project,要写一个15页（没人1000+左右）的proposal+设计一个app or 拍一段video(proposal分比较重要)

quiz 2:16/25
proposal +app: 17+8.5＝25.5/30
extra points: 1.5 /3(上课多回答问题赚分)
anyway 不是一个有pain 就有gain 的课，谨慎选择！！！

有少少account底
有3份大型ASSIGNMENT
1份GROUP ASSIGNMENT
同有OK多既ONLINE EXERCISE (10MINS 內做得完)
佢要你買ONLINE TEXTBOOK
最好買因為包左ONLINE EXERCISE同ANS
EXAM (FINAL QUIZ)考既同上堂既差唔多
佢上堂講既例題係TEXTBOOK 例題
ONLINE TEXTBOOK有ANS
基本上考前溫下D ANS 就識我3份ASSIGNMENT 接近無交
ONLINE EXERCISE 無交齊
走左2,3次堂 上堂吹水玩手機多
GROUP ASSIGNMENT 幾好
EXAM 拎大約80%~85%
最後C- 預期之內不過不失
呢科幾適合夠分又差GE requirement 既人讀
如果求PASS真係可以好輕鬆

做既野其實唔多，係煩。
首先講一講%分佈：
Toni既In-class works 10%
Toni既Self Exploration Analysis 10%
Janet既In-class works加attendance 15%
Janet既Q&A 5%
Janet既ePortfolio 20%
Janet既Group assignment 40%
注意地方：
1.上堂要take attendance
2.每堂最後都有野做，即堂交。可以唔聽書靠自己睇ppt去做。Toni既，記得check好Grammar,兩份我拎B+同A。
3.最後Toni交代要每人寫篇Self Exploration Analysis，個篇因為我有三個地方冇加“”，所以F左。唔好諗住左抄右抄前改後改，其實係吹個人能力有邊到好邊到差，用上堂d筆記去證明自己邊到好邊到唔好係冇用。
4.Janet既Q&A又唔係真係要瘋狂答，其實得5%，你可以當係答5條就ok，佢問d問題全部係哂ppt到揾到哂。你唔想答到得，係最後一堂present既時候問其他組問題（夾定）都得。
5. ePortfolio係煩左你要自己整個網頁去介紹自己，用Google整又得，用其他都得（佢會介紹其他可自己整網頁既網）。如果你有拍埋自我宣傳片會仲好，但我冇拍到，最後B左。個人覺得唔好會Google，因為十個有七八個都揀Google，用下其他加多effect會好d。呢份功課係哂時間，你做唔切唔緊要，因為你交既時候係交個網址，佢又唔係即刻check，所以你可以交完個網址後再慢慢改靚仔去。不過呢份我係通宵做出黎，做完之後我都冇懶得去改，最後D左
6. Group Assignment! 因為我早排F左，所以呢到特別拎多d野做。Freerider出現機會較少，因為你只要將最最最簡單既野俾佢就得，資料性既野全都係Copy冇得改，佢高唔高分純睇佢點Present同份Report。份功課要打埋分工表，所以佢死佢事唔關你事! Janet都會留意表面功夫，所以串錯字既，執位功夫唔可以少! Present記得睇時間，會cut人。最後Present完會有其他組問你，自己做好資料搜集就得。
7.呢個Course有個Talk要take attendance，我有fd take完attendance就閃左，我就聽哂。個Talk可有可冇，純粹睇你幾睇重份Group assignment，因為份Group assignment有分3 parts，第3 part係自由選擇做唔做，做就介紹兩個Web tools（上堂有介紹唔洗驚）+總結係Talk到學到既野。
8.少少提醒! Grp assignment係自己做Reports同ppt，reports提過既野全都要present出黎，所以timing好重要! 我個組因為有綵排過，最後俾Janet cut左，有人present唔到。。。。
。
最後祝Reg呢科既朋友仔好運，因為俾我揀多次我唔會Reg呢科。

Workload:
1.每堂交一份reflective paper 
2.一個group present
3.一個group paper 
4.一個test
5.attend一個pride parade好似好多野做 其實全部都好hea
我有2堂堂課無交 
group present 六個人十分鐘 paper又係六個人做9000字左右 有好多堂都係邀請guest 有transgender homosexual sex-worker等等 全部都好有趣 
Test既format係t or f同fill in the blanks 其實淨係print曬所有notes出黎就ok 因為係openbook 我附近所有人都係test個時先搵答案 但都有百幾頁紙 所以都唔係想像中咁易 不過整體黎講 係一個好玩既course

peer evaluation就是一切, 無視當中努力的成果
一組人(~10人左右) 去完成一份powerpoint+ present
大家workload相若,workload平均分配,各司其職, 為何最後個grade可以差別咁大?一堂lecture 3小時, 可以2小時左右就走得
仲有堂所謂tutor 係廢, 無一堂需要返 搞到個schedule大失預算
lecturer早放 學生可以早走 大家固然開心 
諗住上呢堂GE可以輕鬆學習 點知最後比分個機制係咁不公
神級伏前面有人講左

workload:

好多physics嘢背。 
quiz 雖然系mc， 但係要揀曬啱嘅答案出黎(唔系普通mc)。有d mc 題目notes系冇講過(20題入面有2-3題). 三次quiz，預計自己都有7成.

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
Students without physics background should not take this course
Every class's power point slide is like more than 100 pages and you would have thousands of medical/biological/engineering terms to remember. That is a bit harsh when you consider the fact that you are taking a GE course but not core.The quiz to me is more like a memorizing game than exhibiting what I have learnt.

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
非常非常伏既一科，完全學不到野，教既野完全係垃圾之於仲要超悶，
上堂要做埋D 咩問題，俾分既標準完全唔知，叫人寫水蛇春咁長，
會點名贊人寫得好，但亂寫一通都贊，但唔知係咪真係俾左分。
功課要求十分多，指示不清楚。因為要全組人都要跟足指示寫先會拎到分，
但我果組D 人全部FREE RIDE，仲要DEADLINE FIGHTER，基本上最後
份PRESENT我一個人做晒咁濟，老師係完全唔會幫你既。佢俾既意見亦到十
分廢材。總之組組PRESENT完佢都讚，但係俾分就炒晒。無必要千期唔好選依科!!!!

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
呢科真係算好輕鬆,基本上個課程學D野無咩用(教下你用one drive,email 開folder分下類咁),佢唔教我自己都識.
佢堂堂都upload一篇好長嘅文要人睇,但我就一次都無睇過,因為佢之後上堂都會講番. 最麻煩係佢一路上堂一路要你用facebook同ilearn答問題,不過D問題好易,完全無難度,再唔係睇下人地點答自己再改下都得
Project算係最難,因為佢個題目好廣,同埋要同資訊科技有關.不過只要有consult就得,完全無問題. 
Exam就真係要溫書嘅,要記下D term,不過你平時有用開電腦真係唔會覺得難,想好grade呢科真係必揀
(Summer要一個week上2堂,會比較chur少少,好多人見咁多野做都drop左,不過上落其實一D都唔chur,中間有幾堂仲可以早走)

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
堂堂都係坐係電腦面前聽佢講足三個鐘，不過有電腦係面前點會悶
好多都只係日常生活的physics例子，讀過下dse physics都明佢講乜
幾乎堂堂都有quiz(幾條mc)但唔需要計數
Prof. Shek的quiz大部分都係Google/Wiki搵到答案
唔識就細細聲同隔離位商量
最後一堂要寫篇essay，題目個個唔同，有難有易，我就抽中條齋背powerpoint
寫之前有時間俾你準備，所以冇idea都可以趁呢段時間Google/求救呢科真係讀過physics會著數d

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society

Assessed Tasks:
10% In-class participation (都唔知有冇)
10% Assignment * 1
20% Presentation (incl. Peer Rating)
20% Project Report
20% Robot Demo (incl. Peer Rating)
20% Final Open-note QuizGroup Project 為主既 GE course
第一堂, Instructor 會主動提同學仔試下搵唔同既 partner
分組 5 - 9 人, 唔可以全組人都係讀同一類別 major 既同學
比如全組人都係 engine 仔, 或者全組人都係 business 女

Hea科 
workload唔大 要做weekly journal 但最尾個week先交 唔洗寫好長
上堂有participation 但其實只係1組答1條問題 就全組都有果分
冇考試 得個MC QUIZ
個quiz用到既econ concept唔多 關environmental多d
group proj 10個人一組 雖然要剪段片 但唔麻煩
present就係播片 跟住Q&A
proj另外淨係交4頁summary~利申: Quiz岩岩合格,journal hea做
但proj差唔多包尾 所以A+ 如果proj高少少分既實C range (問左好多人都C range)
(我都有d後悔 咁易a都拎到)

有兩個quiz 一份report，都係講d econ, 環境野，有econ底會好少少，quiz都係廿條mc，d人多數錯3,4題我錯多幾題，quiz如果有溫note其實都ok，我只係前一日先溫，每堂有d in class exercise都係hea做，同埋每堂要上網答幾條題目都係hea打段野比佢，可能report做得麻麻，因為都佔得多分，report可以主要講環境既議題，唔一定要講好多econ都得，所以好似geog或當通識咁做，同埋佢有比sample，跟著做都ok

我有上莊既
成日走堂
有in class ass 但係唔係堂堂
會估到佢幾時有ass
但係好多時都係開始做個時我個fd call我入lecture做
有fd既話走堂 做in class都冇難道
周記好多時我都係100字hea比佢
Midterm岩岩好合格
有A+都幾好彩
有讀econ可以諗下
但係佢d quiz都唔係好econ 注重concept多d inclass就真係考econ

每堂要tick attendance (自己tick)
上堂答問題 (求其up 幾句都過到骨)
最主要決定你個分數係個group project 同個quiz
個quiz 我就覺得幾難下, 睇隔離先pass 到
佢最後要拍個video report, 之後有個peer evaluation
group project 就係 ur gpmate ur fate
如果大家都肯做野, 個workload 其實唔大
no offense, 見到下面啲人comment話好hea 好hea 又好grade, 
如果個個都認為呢科好hea 唔做野,
最後成group都係爛grade 
最好同 一大班 識既人一齊讀(並確保唔係free rider)
唔係既話撞到free rider 就真係幾努力都無用 (我就係成功既例子)

再將答案放上blackboard
答幾行就得,基本上我組係每個人輪住做

course name: Thinking Philosophy: Bridging the Gap between Arts and Sciences
body: 我覺得阿sir唔hea喎，嗯⋯⋯啲留言好似唔係咁fair！其實只要肯問佢，佢會好仔細咁答，真係答到你明喎～試過落堂問，佢真係差唔多用咗成粒鐘同我哋傾～不過本身呢科係難，我嘅意見係有心讀先好take

course name: Everyday Physics: Its Impact on You and Society
chinese course name: 物理與日常生活：對你和社會的影響
body:
It is a trap. Some quizzes are easy but most quizzes cannot google so you may not get high marks in the quiz part. In the last lesson, you would be distributed a question to write an essay about physics ranging from mechanics, optics, electromagnetism to nuclear energy. The topic distribution is random so you would not know the topic before the lesson. My topic is typical and i am confident when i was writing. However, the final grade is bad.
IT IS NOTICED THAT NON-SCIENCE STUDENTS WOULD DROP THIS COURSE AFTER WEEK 1

Absentees can hand-in their in-class assignments, which are used to count attendence, in the following lesson. They can simply copy from friends or groupmates.At the end of each lesson, a video clip is played and several open-ended questions are posted on blackboard. Each group needs to post answers onto the discussion board. Only short answers of 5-6 lines are required. Group members can take turn to answer.

利申: 中學讀econ包尾, 中五drop左, 無econ底每堂睇完片/reading會有2,3條問題做group discussion
再將答案放上blackboard
答幾行就得,基本上我組係每個人輪住做
唔太關econ事, hea答就得

5 bi-weekly journals, 8 course activity sheets signed by your classmate on the class and presentation evaluation report have gave you 23 marks in sort of freely way. The things you need to focus on are just final exam and project report. I did not have any economic background before and have a little impression on the course in 4 days before the examination. After learning about 20 hours, I got a good grade, near the highest grade. For the project, applying what you learn from this course is so important. But once you do like that and have no obvious area to be improved in the project. You will get high level. Doctor Ho is a very friendly and humorous person who you will always like. I learnt many essential economic concept in interesting ways but save much time and energy. I am so grateful for the level I got.

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
上堂既野幾難明 又悶
上左都唔知有咩用 (關於環保/環境/綠化)
上左幾堂就冇上 (好多人都係咁)5個assignments
individual essays/report + field trip x2 + lab (關於導電)
應該各佔10%
加埋50%
冇埋特別
之後final project 50%
呢科50% In class test, 35% Group project+present, 15% Individual site visit report。教嘅野其實都幾general，裡面engine野又唔太多，有唔明都唔緊要，因為冇測。In class test係嗰堂教完落堂之前即堂test，除左兩堂之外，其他都係open book，所以根本唔洗記。8個test裡面計最好成績個6次。

I think my grade is disappointing.Site visit to Kowloon Bay Zero Carbon building and Wanchai HolidayInn Hotel
2 site visit reports
1 poster design group project + presentation 
you can design your own investigation topic for the project

呢個sem 只係上堂take attendance同埋一份report
---------------------------------
上堂講既野差唔多完全唔關份report事, 唔識既上足堂都唔會識做, 識既一堂都唔上都會識做take attendance 話就話嚴謹左, 仲話會睇返attendance黎adjust你個grade, 就算你功課好好出席率唔高都唔會好grade, 但根本都係好多人幫手take

course name: Chinese Cultural Heritage in Modern Perspective

body: Just so so... Liguo does not mean very good grade

(唔知做乜對上一次打既出得三分一出黎=_=)
估唔到有A+, 因為覺得自己QUIZ表現一舨(錯多過5條Out of 50條), 而且大部分Lecture都係由一位好重口音既非洲男人教..真係大部分時間上左堂都等如冇上堂, 唔明佢講乜...我都見到除左第一堂同Mid term quiz嗰日之外, 其他堂平均得唔夠一半人上堂lol (我亦知道有d朋友上左第一堂之後就冇再上過堂) 的確唔計attendance的, 不過我見佢話每一堂回答佢嘅問題都會有一分extra bonus mark 加，雖然加喺嘅位都係寫learning log嘅位(which is suppose我都拎足咗滿分)，但係我每一堂依然都係踴躍回答
溫書嘅時候覺得好冇方向唔知自己溫左啲咩，所以真係勁冇信心，但係考完之後知道自己都唔會錯好多，就放鬆番少少，雖然都係覺得表現一般
不過根據佢份outline，quiz 錯少過12條都有A range(75%out of 100%)，所以都真係幾容易，因為佢問嘅嘢都好簡單，基本上望過下啲lecture slides 就已經識答，諗返轉頭都真係唔使上堂都得XD
工作量算係輕鬆，除咗最後嘅essay好花時間寫之外。每星期寫嘅learning log我都擺咗唔少心機寫，平均每個寫500至600字，不過好多人都寫二百幾字，但係整體來講都輕鬆的。
個人認為最分高下嘅係份individual essay。本人唔係讀social science 的，讀linguistics major，所以寫有關social science嘅topic真係冇優勢，不過我好用心咁寫，寫有關紐西蘭青少年自殺問題，發左好多日時間落去寫，佢嘅要求係寫2000字，我本身寫咗2800左右，好辛苦cut到啱啱好2000字，用咗32份references。。。真係搞咗好耐，俾咗好多心機落去

估唔到有A+, 因為覺得自己QUIZ表現一舨(錯多過5條Out of 50條), 而且大部分Lecture都係由一位好重口音既非洲男人教..真係大部分時間上左堂都等如冇上堂, 唔明佢講乜...我都見到除左第一堂同Mid term quiz嗰日之外, 其他堂平均得唔夠一半人上堂lol (我亦知道有d朋友上左第一堂之後就冇再上過堂) 的確唔計attendance的, 不過我見佢話每一堂回答佢嘅問題都會有一分extra bonus mark 加，雖然加喺嘅位都係寫learning log嘅位(which is suppose我都拎足咗滿分)，但係我每一堂依然都係踴躍回答
Don't choose Calvin!

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices
chinese course name: 全球商業作法的革命轉變
body: it's a trap

Nice course. No project or assignment so no need to worry about free riders and shitty groupmates. Quizzes on every other week tho so you do need to put some effort into it. Final is fairly easy. MCQ for both final and quizzes. It'd be better if you have some bio background. The content is interesting. The accent of the English prof is easy to understand, but it is impossible to decipher the Korean prof's accent (not to be racist). You can get everything you need from the lecture notes tho so it is fine if you can't understand the Korean prof.

Overall not many difficult areas; mainly open-book quiz, final exam, & group presentationHowever do be prepared for the tutor to be prone to picking on random people and mood swings, especially during presentations or opinions he disagrees with.
中學有讀過physics就可以上，group project workload唔大
In Andy I trust ^^

Exam is easy because it based on the tips given in that lecture. One of the midterm is in essay format. I didn't have any revision at all but i can still get B+ in that midterm.

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body:
I recommend. Teacher is nice. The lectures were boring but mostly I just hung out and chatted with friends. If you have a fun and hardworking group, this class is great. Workload is very manageableClass participation (20%)
Group presentation (40%). 5 people, each person presents for ~7 min
Term Paper (40%). 1,200-1,500 words

I highly recommend this class. The prof. is really nice and the class is fun. A lot of international and exchange students take this course. We took field trips and watched videos in class and talked about some really interesting topics. As long as you can write and talk, you can do well in this course.Inequality Assignment = 20%. You make google map with some pics and a bit of writing. Group project
Personal Maps (2a) or City Blog (2b) =20%. 1000 words, not too bad
Documentary = 45%. Can be a group project, you can film on your phone
Missions & Games & Participation = 15%

course name: The Life and Times of the English Language
body: I major in English, so this course wasn't too hard for me.The course content mainly revolved around linguistics and literature, which was quite fun in my opinion. I especially enjoyed the lectures on forensic linguistics (we got to analyze ransom notes and suicide cases!) and crime fiction. The lectures about negotiation and conversation analysis were quite useful as well.

新professor 教，唔再係上年個好grade professor 教
比分冇透明度，中意比邊個高分就邊個高分，係個professor 既major 學生會有著數
冇得走堂，要點名

The course's workload is not heavy (but please read my further comment). There are no group projects, and for all 4 assignments, you can do it within 1 hour, the latest, for each, as long as you are familiar with the topic.
However, this semester, the grading is quite competitive. In order to get A- or above, you should get your exam 87 or above, while for the exam, it would normally take you 110 out of the available 120 minutes.
On the other hand, the instructor is excellent in terms of speaking and giving bonus points. He once told that his English is not so good, but it's understandable. Then, he provides 2 chances for bonus points:
1. Code-cracking, only for the fastest student, +3 added to final mark.
2. Bonus project (5-7 min video), open for all students, from +0 to +3 added to final mark.
The instructor is also willing to help on students' difficulty. He also provides students chances to recheck their mid-term and final exam so that you may know where are your mistakes.
At last, this course won't give you much pressure throughout the teaching period. However, I guess that if you want to get an A+, try to have an average of 96 or above, so get ready to do the assignments, bonus project, and compete during the mid-term and final if you want to get a high mark.

Tim係一個好好嘅tutor，上堂有笑點，唔算悶。
每堂一開始都有熱身遊戲。例如用某d指定alphabet拼vocab出嚟，諗得最多嗰組可以點歌。
Syllabus有一份infographic (group project)，一份argumentative essay，一份reflective essay。記住consult佢，佢會俾好多意見。
我份argumentative essay draft交咗俾佢之後，因為佢係用綠色筆改。俾返我嗰時，交唔多成份野都變咗綠色，可所言知佢寫咗幾多comments。不過，comments入面讚多過彈，但係個分又唔見得好好……
本身諗住根據佢d comments嚟睇應該有 a range......不過overall，tim真係好好人。((仲要幾靚仔XD
最重要：記住做online module

其實依個course無想像中咁易a range (因為睇之前d留言話好易靚grade)
我係year 1，諗住啱啱喺中學上到嚟，中學又讀過econ (有level 4, 但係原本predict level 5)諗住趁仲記得d concept就reg咗依科。
依科講易唔易，話難唔難。syllabus係要你由week 2開始上堂做in-class exercise。做就做咗差唔多10份，但係計分淨係計當中嘅6份。做完之後喺3日內upload上canvas就得。基本上唔難，因為可以上網搵到答案。
Assignment方面有bi-weekly journal。只係寫下你喺日常生活中做咗咩可以幫助改善環境同埋簡單解釋下同econ有咩關係。total 做4次，每份大約2分，喺sem完之前一次過交上canvas。
有group project，係講下d社會環保議題同economic explanation。topic絕對唔難諗，只係考你點解釋。遇到好groupmates好重要。
考試嘅話有mc同long question。mc 大約40條，long question得一條，佔20分，有分abc parts。自問有econ 底嘅話都唔可以輕視。long question真心唔知點俾分，因為我已經寫晒佢上堂講要寫嘅野，consult佢嗰時佢都話我答晒要答嘅野。不過我結果都係得大約一半嘅分數。exam我個分係高過mean不過都係得b，唔知係唔係俾group project拉低個分。
不過ho to ming真係好nice，上堂有講有笑咁，氣氛好輕鬆。同埋lecture notes有好多相，係日常生活嘅例子。
如果大家諗唔到reg咩ge嘅話都可以嘗試reg依科。就算中學無讀econ都唔會好難，好多都係易明嘅microeconomics 野。唔明嘅話ho to ming會好樂意答你 :)
本身dse econ level4 ，又有溫書原本打算會靚grade 最後發現好多人都有dse econ 底／大學有讀econ
