This course has six in-class exercise, one bi-weekly journal, one group project (progress report + final report + presentation) and one test (including MC and 3 essay questions)Although the workload is light, it is not a GE course that surely A range. There was no difference between students who studied at microeconomics or not before study this course. The 2-hour test was quite difficult to me, especially the essay questions, I only got 9 marks out of 20(not sure the total marks of short essay questions). I'm that English comment you're looking for. 
I stuck with this course because of the comments that it was very light, A+ and all that good stuff. BUT this was the first time the course had EXAMINATION with NO GROUP PROJECT, so take this in your own discretion.Course and Lecturer in themselves are interesting where I admittedly messed up in Midterms and Finals to get this grade. Alas, Prof. Jon is very approachable and forgiving where you can look at the exams and he will give you a bonus video and one other bonus to do which can pull your grade up. Assignments are not the easiest to do but they are doable nonetheless.

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body:
讀完之後覺得依科比起其他英文GE應該要輕鬆得多 (可能因為新開)
有2份assignment同1個in-class essay
個人覺得最難嘅係第1份assignment Language Discovery project(25%), 有3條題目俾你揀, 大致都係關於啲verb點解要咁用, 唔同用法會唔會有唔同意思之類, 要用coca個網去搵data support返你篇文 (上堂會教)
第2份Critical Exploration of texts(25%), 就係俾3篇文你揀, 再分析下佢啲genre, purpose同target audience, 相對第1份簡單好多
之後個in-class essay(35%), 會係之前俾定8條題目你, 其中一條就係你個日要作嘅(唔會話俾你知係邊條), 所以你要準備哂8條題目 (唔同ta唔同題目, 但同一個ta就全部一樣) 
最後有一個佔5%嘅咩feedback, tutor會派返篇改好in-class essay俾你, 你自己寫下有咩可以改善下篇essay, 大紉200字到
平時分就attendance同埋participation (10%)P.S. 好好彩咁reg咗個好tutor Tiffany, 佢好有心咁教, 堂堂都會準備哂啲notes俾我地, 又會有activities等我地真係清楚明白個堂學緊啲咩, 又會安排時間俾我地consult下啲功課(真心要consult 唔係好易錯方向) 最warm係專登係Halloween請我地食糖, 真係一個好好嘅tutor!

依科真係幾輕鬆 workload唔大 
平時分就計你attendance同埋group discussion 
Group disussion通常隔個禮拜, 睇完套戲會俾幾條問題你討論再寫返落worksheet到 啲問題都唔算難, Andus會俾guide, 唔識都可以直接問佢, 做完交俾佢就走得
Assignment淨係得一份individual嘅storybook, 睇一套電影再用返上堂教嘅psychology theory apply落去, 仲要限1000字, 一日時間已經搞得店
最後係個Exam 有mc,fill in the blank同埋short question, 問題都好直接,唔會fake你
肯背下書就一定識
Overall無揀錯依科 真心好讀!!!!!!

隔個禮拜有open-book Quiz，頭嗰幾個自己做所以成績好差，之後出抄人答案高分好多
隔個星期嘅Tutorial有啲on9小實驗
有好多唔同國籍嘅lecturer，佢地啲accent好難聽得明
Quiz同Exam都喺Canvas度做，主要MC題嚟，可以出貓

2 key of success: ATTENDANCE & GOOD PARTNERS. The min attendance is 10 classes throughout the semester, which looks pretty ok?! The answer is NO! An extra 10pts will apply if you cannot meet the min requirement. When absent, you will lose attendance + participation + classwork marks (25%) at once, very terrible. If you happen to have a free-rider, which is even worst as it definitely pull down your gpa. Prepare to buy the textbook if you do not want to screw up in exam. I find Toni is ok, at least responsible and friendly but her class require too much preparation for the weekly case classwork. If you need a relaxing course, think twice!

Dr. Chan Ho Mun is a very responsible lecturer, he always tries his best to explain the materials in class. Pay attention to the examples he applied, it might be useful in the workshop and final quiz. Strongly recommend choosing Germanine as your tutor. She is so patient and responsive in answering all the question no matter in email or in person.The workload is quite light,

全年只有2份assignment （煩但不難）+ 一份group presentation 
最難的是考試，雖然open book 但全班mean低過50% 有伏

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body: 明明份份Assignment都無八成，竟然有A-，只能講韓國人俾grade真係好鬆手。

Guideline話就話每個禮拜都有Quiz，
但係今個Sem已經轉左每隔一個禮拜先有一次open-book quiz，
其他嘅Tutorial就變左啲小實驗，幾好玩。
有好多個唔同國籍嘅lecturer，意味住你上lecture就要適應曬佢地啲accent，
不過個人覺得就算上lecture因為accent而聽唔明或者走堂都無乜大損失，
因為啲notes已經好清楚講曬要考嘅野，
Lecturer口講果啲points反而對Final無乜用，
所以溫Final刨notes就得。
Open-book quiz係Canvas做，難度還好，大多數都係MC，
係得第一次有啲long-questions，我都做唔切得七成分，
好彩後面啲quiz拉翻有八成幾。
Final都係Canvas做，依然係純MC，
興幸佢Vision問得多啲，因為自己果part溫得比較熟，
同埋有啲題目會有啲好明顯錯嘅答案，例如"make our brain great again"，
所以做落都唔算太難太刁鑽。
做完就出Percentage，都有八成。
初頭只係估自己B+/A-，因為自己無乜Bio底，
同埋以為好多讀Bio嘅人會入黎屈Grade，
攞A+係意料之外。
如果你自問背野能力唔錯，又對神經方面有啲興趣，呢個Course應該幾適合你。

輕鬆 attendance唔重要 如果你讀過micro 其實可以走晒咁多堂 佢好中意吹水 上堂又唔洗話專心先識 coursework分係Reflective journal10%(真係好鬆手 是但寫應該都有分 佢講到明有做一件環保嘢就比晒2分 5個短文就10分滿分) in class ex 8%呢個真係正 佢上堂派張紙 有題目叫我地寫完影相upload係canvas 但其實你可以落堂錢係佢枱拎 然後雖然難但佢話如果個個都唔識會當大部分人都啱然後比分 gp proj 32% 呢個不得了 可以8個人寫(一組最多8個人) 遇到好gp mates好重要 如果唔係一定做餐死兼爛grade 淨係計份report 所以大家要醒醒定定認真做好report啊 quiz 輕鬆 有溫書睇lecture notes實識 上lecture會嚇死見到勁多版 但要背嘅佔好少 勸諭大家唔好咁衝動即刻印曬出嚟 你肯定會後悔 In hotoming,we trust

course name: English for the Humanities and Social Sciences
body:
分數比重:
Language discovery project (25%)
In-class timed essay + 200 words reflective essay (35%+5%)
Critical exploration of text (25%)
Participation (10%)
Assignment 之間有一啲小presentation同分組活動，係Pieta自己俾嘅，我諗係計participation分啩。不過本身個course已經多野做咁樣就百上加斤喇。好在兩份assignment有sample跟，guidelines算清晰，所以唔算吃力。LD係搵幾隻字做corpus研究，做完一頭霧水；timed essay俾八條問題你幾日前prep然後出一題，無得你揀，題目似dse形式，最緊要對題。派分後再寫二百字反思；CET draft唔計分，Pieta只係計tentative score，再俾參考分數等你改final。佢嘅評語幾清晰，跟著改應該唔差得去邊。感覺Pieta係跟足呢個course嘅標準去改卷，啲分數每個domain都寫曬原因，唔知其他tutor係點喇

我係SS department 既學生，所以其實我係take 緊SS1012
所以雖然你讀緊既可能係GE 但係大部分既同學都會係人院既人 
甚至有啲係SS department, 讀Sociology/Psychology 既 咁佢地因爲之前讀開 所以靚grade好正常
不過放心 你reg既係GE1226的話 計分係同人院果班人（即係reg SS1012既）分開計既，所以唔洗怕俾人屈你機。
.
呢個course workload 其實都幾輕鬆
1. Canvas discussion (30%)
呢30%基本上係送俾你。只要你每個lecture 完咗之後入canvas 打番啲feedback 或者答番ppt 問既discussion question 就可以。
平時上堂答下問題會額外再加分俾你。2. Term Paper (40%)
好多人院JJ都寫慣paper 架喇，但呢個course 因為係1字頭，所以要求比較簡單。
份功課要你就住依家一個青年問題，用Social Science 既theory 去解釋，最後俾番一啲方法去解決問題。
當然啦 theory 果啲上堂係會教既,
但都可以用一啲冇教過既theory
只要你用到個theory apply 到咁就可以
要求唔算太高。

Poster Presentation:好易 比d common diseases 叫你去介紹下 網上大把source 比你參考
Assignment x2:又係好易 得幾題題目 有限字數要求你答好短 記得最長好似都係叫你唔好超過100字
Quiz 1:60mcs 1 hr 好易 頭個5課書都係d basic bio野 記左實冇死 基本上一望題目就會掃到個答案
Quiz 2:60mcs 1hr 難過quiz1大概8倍 某部分題目背左都未必一定答到 考你運用 
提提大家記野嘅過程係辛苦 因為一課lecture都成80-100張slides

3-4份in-class assignment 唔難，個人出現就得（邊堂要做course outline有講）
至於堂唔係堂堂要上除有in-class assignment既堂exam方面考既內容唔多
考試前用左大概18hr溫書時間 寫筆記+溫習（平時上齊堂不過唔係聽曬書+平日無溫過）
不過exam考得幾深入 考你點應用學過d野 MC都幾難
有好多MC都唔識最後以為考衰左 點知都有B+
(year1非BBA學生，但有BAFS底)in-class assignment(10%) : 毎堂都會有，而且時間極緊逼，好多時要答唔少野，但有時純計數題唔太難，試過滿分，有時tutor仲會只要交左就比full marks(因為時間真係好唔夠......)，今個sem有8次in-class只計最高分5次。

2 Assignments(10% each): First assignment was to do an analysis on a 5-mins movie clip by stating different application of basic film techniques. E.g. how many different shots in this clip, what’s the camera angle in this shot.
Second one was to write a 350 words essay to analysis a 10 mins long clip, specifically what are the cinematography elements used and how sound interacts with the cinematography.
Overall, they are not hard
Presentation(40%): given a list of films, each group were assigned to 1 film based on result of lucky draw. Main assement criteria that April has was to see whether students grasp the main theme of the film and can they present their idea in a structural way. Workload is not demanding, adequate research on film background is required. 
Final exam(30%): In open book format, 40 MCQ, pretty tough since every open book exam is a trick, a lot of details regarding understanding of different cinematographic elements and film history were asked
To conclude with, it’s not a hard course but you do need to spend extra effort if you would like a decent grade. E.g. consultation with April on your project...

要quiz, 要assignment, 要group project
好多都好難 唔識唔合格好正常
C+就……算好了

quiz x 2 30% each
Booklet and poster 40%
偶然會take attendance。quiz有背書就識，唔算難。
但係booklet and poster好多嘢做，又要design，又要寫essay，一定要提早做。
Consult好重要！！！consult完之後，好似發現新大陸咁。建議大家最好早D去consult，快D開始做。
個grade麻麻，應該喺booklet嗰度出事，因為最後冇時間加上分工唔平均，搞到自己做好多嘢，做出嚟嘅嘢，連自己都覺得唔滿意。
本身有讀過其他psy course，都有A range。今次冇其實好sad，不過唔關lecturer事，係自己問題。建議對psy有興趣，識design，有fd一齊讀嘅人reg。

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body:
The lecture is pretty straight forward. Even for people who are from different departments, the lecture slides are enough.As for the professor, he gives the grading without any explanation and refuses to revaluate any final papers. The finals again was straight forward questions about mean mode median etc. but the professor does not care at all.
I worked really hard but the professor does not actually care and is very stubborn. Questions are not even entertained properly. Will not advise anyone to take this course if the professor is still there.

2018/19 Sem A
EL0200A
Year1
老師好好人，體諒學生，比左好多唔同意見，又成日提你的 IL, Essay deadline，上堂輕鬆，可惜 B- , semB 要繼續讀

呢科轉左做英文教，但係3個鐘lecture入面可以聽下歌，認識下中樂少少樂理知識就輕鬆上完堂。
對樂理、樂器有認識都可以reg，上齊堂做齊功課，好大機會靚grade
1）以前有師兄讀過話係堂堂有class work，仲要係9:00就即刻來。我開頭4個星期都好準時，但今個sem佢去到好似去到week 5先開始有，同埋佢會講幾時有，而且今個sem係CMC上堂，佢好明白我地好辛苦來上堂所以就10:00-10:30左右quiz，我有幾次都係差唔多10點先返到去，係佢派QR Code之前到達就得了，如果你到lecture個陣佢開始左派，就會認住你唔派比你。（比較有性格的Professor)
2）Present會夾雜係lecture中間，抽籤排present次序，而最後個Project係完左week 13交。係做同推廣中樂有關的野，可以係拍mv、整個promotion board、甚至話book間房做中樂鑒賞都得（唔使有人來，整完影下相就得），但我個組就唔係做呢d所以唔太清楚，總之都係輕鬆的。Present要聽清楚佢要求係咩，同埋唔好用太難的英文，簡簡單單講到main point就得。
3) 有兩次field trip，係聽音樂會或者睇show，去完寫返500字報告，睇完7日內交就得。
3）最後一堂有final quiz，半個鐘左右做15題MC，只要有上堂做過class work都會識，唔難。

This course contains heavy workload, and unfair judging method on presentation. This course is very difficult and will not launch in the future. According to Lu Yang, only Law, English, BBA, and BMS students obtain A-range. Many students from Engineering background only get B-range, and even lower than that grade. This course is trap and unreasonable. And cut-off mark is very high =_=. To sum up, I do not recommend students to take this course anymore if this course will be restarted. NO GE1330, No trap course anymore.

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society

teacher: Dr T T Chow Dr.Square Fong Dr. Norman C F Tse
body: It is a Good course

The course is really amazing. It gives you a very holistic idea about the future of China and how did it reach here. The professor makes the class very engaging and meaningful. At the end we had to write a policy memo which I thought was pretty cool. It gave me a whole new view on seeing relations between Pakistan and China. I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to have a critical view on China's rise!

2 500-word essays about interesting economic topics, also have to do one presentation for the first essay (about 10 mins). Students have to find good topics themselves like why brides always buy their wedding dresses but not only rent them. 
1 group project for a bigger topic like the Trade War

Final exam! But we can bring 2 cheat sheets, sooooo easy, no calculation lolGood Teamwork is the most important thing! Remember that CB students cannot register this course, no chur students in this course hahahah

Easy, low workload!爆4之選!!

course name: The City in Chinese History and Culture
body:
上齊堂，認真做曬assignment同project，最後拎B grade其實有d唔理解。
呢科大約week 6之後就唔走得堂，每堂有in-class assignment寫每堂內容既conclusion或者人地group present既review。
之後有個field trip俾每組去，先自己寫一個600字左右既介紹作field trip portfolio，然後組內每人圍繞題目各自以不同既theme 做一份ppt present 再各寫1500字既thesis combine 成一份final report。
最後再要寫2份各~500字既online discussion 評論其他組既presentworkload主要喺:
·每堂in-class assignment（每堂~300字）
·field trip （自選香港古跡 組內自己約時間去）
·field trip e-portfolio（~600 words）
·field trip presentation （group work 每人3~5 mins）
·field trip final project （group work 每人~1500 words）
·online discussion （ ~600 words ）x2

chinese course name: 化學家的廚房（食物以及烹飪的科學）
body:
上lecture通常早放，唔take attendance。氣氛都算輕鬆，大家做下自己野。
成個sem有兩個活動要參加。一個參觀豆腐花工廠，2頁report；第二個tasting experiment，4頁report。兩個活動剩係隔咗一個星期，仲要喺最忙嘅1、2個禮拜。雖然唔heavy但有d壓力。會take attendance。
present 1-3人一組。就係講一個菜式入面有咩化學原理，要拍3分鐘片。要返。
exam就MC+Long Q，做下past paper，就認得4成題目。背曬d notes就差唔多。
講好靚grade，但失敗。推薦有chem底先好讀，最好揾朋友一齊present。
最伏係兩份report要講到嘅原理要做曬、交曬先教...如果攞到上年嘅Notes記得唔識就喺入面揾左先。

Workload: One presentation, One 2-page reflective essay, One exam, and participation.Structure of this course: This course will cover some introductory Buddhist teachings, and also the relationship between the Buddhist worldview and science (quantum mechanics).

teacher: Lecture: 李磷 Tutorial: 張為群
body: Li Lin's lecture is easy. Most of the in-class tasks are MC questions. There is one compulsory guest lecture, which you will have to write a 300-500 word essay. Other than that, there is not much to do.Dr. Sharon Cheung's tutorial is fair. Each tutorial, you will have to give some comments on the presentation. You are also expected to raise questions during the tutorial in order to score participation marks. Dr. Cheung will give clear instruction on the presentation and the essay. As long as you follow her instruction, there will not be much trouble.

A1 (Adjustment email): 17.5

A3 (Persuasive email): 18
A4 (Business plan presentation): 15
A5 (Business plan): 16.5Conny is a nice teacher ^^

course name: The Life and Times of the English Language
teacher: SANDBERG Eric Peter, LI Tsz Ning M., PECORARI Diane
body: 本身讀英文系，對英文有興趣，所以 reg 左個 English Department 嘅 GE 讀。個 course 啲 prof 好好人，有啲之前教過我，如果你有問題佢地都會留低答你。Grp project 輕鬆，每人寫幾百字就搞掂。有得俾你揀上堂學過嘅題目做。我哋組做咗題關於forensic linguistics，幾有趣。

Course is a bit boring in the beginning. Exam was easy. Most of the important classes are on very basic game theory. No math background needed (I have none). I got a B+ because I kept forgetting to submit Econ Journals so I am satisfied.

course name: Become a Smart and Responsible Consumer
body: Rhonwyn is a great instructor. The lectures are pretty interesting and she offers consultations all the time, for every assessment component. She is always really helpful and I am pretty happy with my grade.Don't register for this class if you have poor English since there are debates, presentations, participation points, etc etc.

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
1 presentation + 1 group report (3000 words) ---> 6 people in one group (15% +35%)
1 exam (60mcs +10 True or False + 3 choose 1 long essay questions) (30%)
Attendance and participation (20%)For group report, apply as much psychological theories as possible into the report and remember to check grammar. For presentation, try to be more presentable and get audiences attention. I got B+in presentation and A- in group report.

垃圾伏科。勸喻各位reg之前一定要小心新學期既tutor有無變。一般人睇GE指南都會發現e科係靚grade科，因為exam之前個Jason會upload重點上去，有温一定攞曬分。但自201819 開始轉做tutors。
今年分左3個tutors教e科，完全3個都唔知教緊乜，讀完成個sem，乜分都唔知，都唔知個分係咪亂比。
Exam雖然話全部都straight forward，但係乜lectures 都cover曬，精準至問你第XX年既城市人口，背書勁既人先好reg，背書麻麻，唔好再以往年評論參考啦。e個course 無promise過會靚grade架

伏 
英文唔好唔好take！要睇唔少reading 
自問英文好 對法律有濃厚興趣嘅話 上堂先唔會瞓着
同埋要去court visiting到一定時數，本身多野做／take得多credit就唔建議揀 
靚grade要勤力
Tania好好人 有問題可以唔明問到明 如果無接觸過VBA或者任何Programming Language最好向Tania問清楚Concept因為系星期一堂 我Home Exercise大多數時間都系星期日個日做曬 然後上堂就整系做Demo同埋留Remark系個PowerPoint度 聽完take左attendance就走左(因為住得遠但系reg唔到hall)

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
Think twice before adding this course.
The lecturer is very nice and always glad to help but still, I find the workload is extremely heavy.
I wouldn't suggest anyone taking this course unless you belong to at least one of the following groups.
- you are a non-year-one psy major student
- you are used to reading books (in this course, you will need to study a whole book around 3 or 4 hundred pages)
- you are free most of the time and are willing to spend them on this course
- you really want an A and don't mind the heavy workloadworkload:
mainly lies in the project and final while the other parts are easy to handle
For the project, you need to form a group of 5-6. Conduct a presentation and hand in a report with 3000 words (maybe, can't remember it well)
For the final, mc + a 3-pick-1 long question. mc will cover most of the chapters. You need to demonstrate a good understanding towards them (not need to recite but at least know what it is). For the long question, you probably are asked to explain a part of the theory in depth.

成個course要做三個project，第一個係temperature sensor/photo sensor/有一個唔記得咗，第二個係watering system，第三個遙控車。每做完一個project，每組交一份個人report同埋group presentation。而點為止係做完一個Project呢? Hardware d connection 搞掂，software d program 搞掂，喺instructor面前demo完，冇fail先得。所以要搵groupmates 最好搵啲識programming底嗰啲，唔係成個course可以F。另外，佢啲mid term/test都幾伏下，d題目類型都唔係好正路，考嗰啲嘢呢，lecture notes都冇cover到。

course name: The Life and Times of the English Language
teacher: SANDBERG Eric Peter, LI Tsz Ning M., PECORARI Diane
body: 有好多個 EN prof 一齊教呢科, 教返自己叻個範, 所以學到幾多野。Workload細, 最多prep in-class test 個陣要睇下d readings。In-class test 有溫到書就唔會死。

2018/19 SemA
Year1
出席率100%1. 自學教材練習（5%）-- 錯別字、簡轉繁 ⋯⋯
2. 閲讀札記（1000-1500字）(20%）-- 19篇提供的文章中選兩篇
3. 課堂口語練習（15%）-- 3 分鐘presentation
4. 說明寫作練習（約600字）（15%）-- 份presentaion既講稿
5. 説服能力評核活動（20%）-- 時事論擅
6. 課堂寫作：論説文（1000-1500字）(25%）-- 就題目在堂內寫論文，可以上網搵資料、帶書

成個 course 淨係上堂問/ 答三條問題同埋寫一篇文, 篇文內容自己訂, 字數不限, 最重要係訂到個題目係可以做 critical analysis, 例如 AI 對社會既影響.一堂三個鐘佢只會講一個鐘然後啲時間就用黎問問題, 可以係上堂講過既野或者係關於 Technology and Society 既問題. 一個 sem 最多可以問/ 答最多五條, 而佢只會計最高分果三條. 如果想比佢揀答問題就最好坐頭果幾行, 頭果幾堂可能要早少少去霸位. 答既野只要正正常常都會有 B+, 但係好難上到 A range, 印象中都係比過幾次 A-. 我答左四條, 三個 B+ 一個 B. 到 Week 14 佢會特登開多堂比未答夠數既同學返去攞分. 基本上上堂個個都係做自己野. 答夠三條之後多數人都走堂唔會再上.

course name: Become a Smart and Responsible Consumer
body:
堂堂最後會有個Class participation時間，舉手答問題，問題易答，你肯舉就可以答到。真係好多Exchange嘅人讀。有Group Project，design a social marketing campaign，重創意。1500 word內嘅week spending / consuming self reflecting journal. Prof. 好用心教，會盡量記哂啲人名，又會開好多Section for consulting group project and exam studying！有一次上堂每人Debate嘅session，每人任意講幾耐就幾耐，有人講30秒有人講2分鐘。Exam有MC section同埋 short questions，啲問題唔係好難，MC係問一個情況嘅Marketing術語係咩，有溫過書都ok。我自己係一名Locals，平時上下堂，功課交齊唔算出色，考試最後一日先溫，拎到B好開心！- a very caring and nice tutor! She held studying and consulting session for us and remembered our name
Workload:
- 1 debate time (1-2min per person in class)
- class participation time (for bonus marks)
- attendance 
- 1500 spending / consuming self reflecting journal
- group project
- Exam (MC+Short Questions, just test for concept)

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
Reg之前聽聞靚grade加workload細，但佢由呢個sem開始就加左個exam同lab report
呢科workload都算大 有phy底會有著數
兩次in-class quiz，有mc, true false, 畫圖, long question，long question答到key point就得，自問冇咩溫過書，所以兩次都好似低過mean
Lab visit，會有一堂去ee個lab參觀，參觀完要寫份report，佢要我地寫兩、三版紙，但根本就no idea寫咩，所以都係亂寫
Presentation+Group report，4-6人一組，要同optics有關，group report一組作1500字，都輕鬆
Exam，全部long question，其實大部分題目同quiz一樣，但當時我冇溫過quiz...
自問quiz同exam都冇咩溫過書，如果溫得熟我相信grade會靚好多
呢個course教既係基本既phy，個prof都肯俾consult，未phy底或者phy底差既要自己衡量

Allan is the worst teacher I have ever meet since my primary school, and is also the first teacher who knows absolutely nothing about how to teach writing course and how to polish the phrases and vocabularies in the essay. 
Nor can he explain clearly what I should do to edit my essay. What he did in the classroom are only chatting unrelated things and playing silly games that do nothing good for our writing ability.
Despite requests, he refused the unveil the standard he used to mark essays and infographics. This is very confusing--- we are expected to achieve the goal that we don't know exactly. 
In summary, if you can choose and if you want to improve your writing, Allan should never be your choice.

It is a very inspiring course that encourages us to start personal financial planning early for achieving the goal of financial freedom. The course is so practical that covers various aspects closely related to our daily life such as investment, housing, insurance, retirement and so on.

Individual assignment (20%): compare different credit cards and write a reflection on an article you selected about personal finance
It is not difficult. Just do some research about credit cards. Relate the selected article with what you have learnt in the course.Group project (30%): provide a financial plan for the client in the case study
You should start to do it early since you need to spend much time on doing research in different aspects such as mortgage, health insurance plan and mutual fund. Assuming the project as a real case, you need to consider some realistic situations such as inflation, having kids after marriage and change in MPF after job promotion. After finishing the project, you will know more about how to make a sound financial plan.

body: Here look at me ( • ̀ω•́ )I think Toni is a very nice teacher, funny and enthusiastic about her job, You should know that to get a good grade in this course requires a LOTS of reading, the textbook (over 300HKD) is definitely require which you can acquire thought bookstore or friends who have brought it before, and should at least read thoroughly once in that semester to get a good grade in examination.(revision might requires you to read to whole book once more as it was a lot of knowledge that you can easily forget)

1. Infographic：分組，3-4人1group，諗個topic，整張圖文並茂嘅海報出嚟，啲圖可能要自製，圖要多，重點要係presentation嗰陣highlight出嚟。唔難，但唔好照住讀，亦都唔好寫定稿。

course name: Personal and Firm Profiling in the Digital Society
body:
The lecture content is straightforward to the business student. Dr Tong is friendly, patient and willing to answer any questions!Group project:
The project theme was of great importance to capture the attention of Dr Tong. It was about Chinese Intangible cultural heritage and we bought props for classmates to give it a try. Our group also put a high emphasis on the art design of group project ideas, powerpoint slides, and reports.

嗰course好生動有趣，喺講nervous system
有 lecture, tutorial(quizzes), midterm (mc),exam (MC+ long questions)全部close book
13嗰星期有12堂tutorial都有quizzes(我哋同professor反映左，唔知下年會唔會少d)唔好妄想收唔到要quizzes既email. 雖然我成日都妄想。終於最後一次Tutorial冇quiz嘅email,但係其實嗰堂係有quiz(quiz 咗12嗰星期，我嗰班全部人都有温，冇人中招:) 温quizzes變咗係嗰pattern,可歌可泣)
因為tutorial 同lecture 相隔1日，所以上完lecture就預備tutorial嘅quizzes,所以每次上完堂温書測驗會對學咗嘅野更深刻
同埋quizzes完professor會upload答案，温翻quizzes咁midterm同examMC都可以答得唔錯
Exam 有MC+long questions. Long questions共15條，擇其中十條黎做
嗰人認為係一個好ge，但係要高分就一定要好勤力
Ps: 2(transmission of nerve impulses (electrical)),4(好似係講brain engineering嘅野)8(hearing)堂特别難
Ps:11,12堂特别好玩(講addiction)
Ps:教授們好nice,風趣幽默，教得好用心
係一個適合熱愛大腦，勤力又喜歡挑戰的你的ge選擇

靚grade首選，頭幾堂教theory悶啲，中間有guest speaker上堂

body:
2 x Assignment
1 x Project presentation with paper (3-6 ppl)
1 x Exam
Workload is very low, you can easily finish the assignment in a day and marks are good. Project is not difficult if you find good partners, remember to consult Peter about the topic and content. He will give very useful suggestions and this will help you to get high marks. I think some DSE econ background is preferred but not necessary since course materials is not difficult to understand. The examination is not difficult, most of the answers you can directly found in notes and discussion questions.
conclusion: highly recommended : )

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
A trapped course: Effort is not equal to grade. If you register this course, you should drop this course undoubtedly.
Say No to GE1204.

Ms Lauw, a Singapore English teacher, seems very nice to all students. However, she prefer gives a high grade to international students. Therefore, local students may not have any benefits in obtaining a high mark from her judgement. She also produces an excuse which tell you that you cannot get a high mark from her judgement (Excuse: Three India students had registered her course and gave three of them A minus in previous semester. Due to this incident, she was blamed by Dr. Becky Kwan.) However, Dr. Becky Kwan expressed to me that there was no incident like that and said that her judgement is like that which show her personality. Scream and horrific!!! If you have register or are preassigned Ms Lauw as your teacher of GE2410, you should change to another teacher because you deserve getting a better grade from another teacher. 
My mark allocation:
Task 1:14.9/20
Task 2: 15.3/20
Task 3: 7.4/10
Task 4: 15/20
Task 5: 15.1/20
Attendance(Maybe): 8.5/10
Cut-off mark of B+(Around): 76/100

body: 算吾錯既GE,本人有2個GE 在身, 另一個GE 花在大量時間CARRY D freeriders, 但turn out 都有a- 算吾錯. exam 吾算難亦吾算易, 我花左大量時間去背D history 但吾考, 有D SAD. 好彩有背到D architect 同bldg names. long qu 問返你功課D野, 有比心機做應該識@@. 但其實時間有D 吾夠, 同系岩岩夠鍾完成. 功課吾算難, 但要比心機做, 我都hea 左小小, 2份都分別用左1日完成, 因為佢地系同時間要交,要D chur. 但其實再努力D 拎A 不是夢.

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body:
呢科無考試, 但有group project, workload 都算幾大, 所以吾建議一D想hea 讀又好grade 既人讀, 但其實都算好grade 既科。 
首先, 個course 既tutor 好好, 講野好清楚, 課後好樂意俾你問野. 佢既workload 主要系分左group project, reflective journal, in-class exercise 同埋 take attendance.
個百分比系:
group project: 50% 分phase 1(15%), phase 2 (25%), 同埋presentation(10%)
reflective journal: 7% wk1-wk4, 8% wk5-wk8, 15% wk9-12
in-class exercise&attendance(20%): 堂堂都有, 但下個wk 先交, 計落attendance 分
先講我個grade, albert 都幾好人,透明度好高,D grade 會系dashboard 都出哂.
我就group project 拎, phase1, phase2 A-, presentation 吾知, 我一向present 都差, 我估B+到. attendance 100% ,同埋D in-class exercise 都做得OK, 應該都有a+,
果3個journal 都系a+. All in all, 拎呢個分都幾合理. 但個前提就系要選好隊友, 吾系既話會好辛苦, 好似本人咁, 個group project 基本上我做哂咁滯, D in-class exercise 就系, 一個人CARRY 6個人既workload, 我打左成萬字, 可想言之可幾辛苦, 再加上本人仲有一個GE 要讀, 又要返工, 所以有好既projectmate 系幾咁重要, 仲要佔既百分比系好大, 拎到a- 已經萬幸, 如果隊友正正常常肯做野, 應該workload 會細好多,同埋應該A 到. 個group project 既內容主要系諗一個intimacy relationship, 同給一個problem- solving solutions, 要用information management 去解決, 我就用左親子關係, 但其實用business 野會好D,始終呢科係business 既野黎。 
事實上, 呢科其實系幾簡單, 你識吹水英文正常肯做野, 實有a range.利申: asso 仔, area2無得選擇下take 左呢科. 另一個ge A-。

所以背書勁可以考慮reg呢科Group project 最好就創新啲,因為之前組組都係講關於地震既教育, 佢聽到悶曬, 所以題目特別,佢一定會加分

course name: Experiencing our Built Environment: Appreciation of Contemporary Architecture
chinese course name: 體驗環境：賞析當代建築
body:
Workload: It must be admitted that the workload is quite heavy... Particularly since the course is offered in the Summer sem, of which you must be able to manage your time wisely. There are several journals and site visits arranged in the course schedule. The workload is quite a great deal particularly at the end of the semester. There is only a very short time interval between the assignments so you must work quite hard successively. Attendance is not really important for the grading though. Nevertheless, class participation such as answering questions may help you to gain a good impression.

Grading: Someone say that the tutor is a killer but I can hardly agree with this. In fact, you must pay attention to the comments of which the tutor makes and modify your assignments accordingly. If you simply cross your arms and do nothing after consultation then it is virtually impossible for you to get a good grade. At least the tutor will not have a good impression on you.Site visit: It is quite important for you to concentrate during the site visits. Moreover, if you choose a place to describe in your assignments, then you shall actually visit that place or at least find some information beforehand on the internet. If you chooses a place of which you are unfamiliar with, then it is not really possible for you to generate a decent and innovative piece of work.

There are two assignments and an exam in this course. I am majoring in accountancy and find this course quite useful in planning for your own asset portfolio. I am honored to get the highest marks in both assignments so in turn getting the A+.1) Individual Assignment (20%)
Mean 14.x Highest 18.x
It requires you to do a self reflection on a news related to finance. Any topics would be fine. But make sure you write more and include some other references such as graphs and charts about related concepts (e.g. time value of money). Not difficult to get marks above mean.

John is actually very nice and is really passionate about teaching. Some of the lectures are quite interesting as they involve lots of controversial criminal cases. Attendance is taken for both lectures and tutorials so that might be an issue if you cannot put in time to attend classes. The workload is not bad in comparison to many other GEs. Exam is actually pretty straightforward as it is an open book exam. The notes that you go through in class contains about 70% of the answers so if you have read them before attending the exam you will do decently.

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
He's the most talkative and interactive local teacher!!! I like him a lot!
I've read previous comments before signing up for the course. Comments were all about how heavy the workload the class was and how your grade would suck if you don't have a good proficiency in English.To be honest, I didn't contribute very much to the group project (group presentation and group report). I only gave an easy introduction and conclusion for our group presentation. There were even 2 people who freerode our whole group work. 3 people working on 5-person work.

body: Mr.Pak is very kam

Midterm
Final
A few in class assignments, but you have a day to work on them and submit online. They are easy.Very nice (and nerdy) professor. He clearly loves math and is very smart. He also is really into movies. I really liked his course.
Actually a very interesting course if you are interested in knowing flaws in logic and try to be inventive about ways to perceive things.

course name: Understanding Phenomena Around Us: An Introduction To Systems Thinking
body:
Sherman is easily one of the most caring professors. He is kind and considerate and knows all his students by name. 
The course is very abstract. It's actually rather easy, but if you're as anxious as me, you can easily overthink things and make things harder than they need to be because the guidelines aren't always very clear. 
As with any GE course, very important to have a good group with you. The group assignment and the final group report can be demanding. However, Sherman, as he is in most aspects, is rather kind with the grading.

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body:
If you don't mind dosing off to someone saying cliched bits of advice, take this course. Estella can be a little insufferable sometimes and Ray is probably the most timid man I have ever encountered, so them telling you how to be is actually very ironic. It's almost funny. 
Also, if you end up in a group you don't share the same style or idea with, it can be messy. Especially since one single presentation carries 40%. 
It's a pretty easy course, just showing up will get you through it all with an A range . However, as far as I heard, it really depends on the tutor. I had some friends who took it the previous term rave about being able to express themselves and all the lecture notes being interesting. It was definitely not the case with Estella and Ray.

呢科係膽粗粗take，係fd推薦Toni，結果佢係幾nice同knowledgeable，但同時亦係嚴師，上堂唔可以食野。個course係有頗多theory, model，原理不難，但及一定要背熟，這科無考試（話係最後一年無考試，明年會有新syllabus，所以下面只可作為參考）：course breakdown: 5% attendance, 10% ckasswork, end-term quiz 10%, individual assignment 35%, team project 40%.
Toni 係有心，有熱誠的老師，亦可以開玩笑。一般上堂兩小時，最後一小時係group classwork，早做完可以早走。唯一缺點係每堂都計分，所以無得走堂。

course name: Social Innovation and Entrepreneurial Venture Exploration (SIEVE)
body: This is a course with no textbook, no mid-term and no exam. 40% self-reflection assignments, 20% class participation & classworks, 40% group project. The course is designed to have a group exercise every week to build up the project at the end. The group project is very heavy weighted and having great peers is critical to good grade. Toni is very knowledgeable about the subject and shows great interest in our innovation ideas. She is one of the rare professors that is very approachable whenever our group encounter problems. I also get a much better understanding about the social problems in Hong Kong, which is quite inspiring. It is a great fun GE course. The only downside is the class time, which is Monday early morning class.

course name: Sustainable Development in China and its Global Impact
body:
For a student who has all China courses in a single semester, it is definitely interesting for me to take this course though it does not stress too much on critical thinking. Anyways, good combination of group mates and hard work matters so to speak. 
You gotta be very outstanding in sense of analysing and gathering information in a witty way in guaranteeing you the best grade. Straight A (s) gogogo! :DDDIf you expect it to be very hea, then yeah you can give it a try but surely you won't get a perfect mark for like A- or above. Haha

上課前從未對tutor作過任何了解，經過一學期學習，俞發覺得物超所值，我本身是ddl fighter,在ddl一周前開始構思final report，期間約時間做consultation，最後抱佛腳send email做darft review, tutor從始至終都好有耐心指出不足，解答問題。
後來聽說tutor之前亦是城大的學生，自然有reg過cciv,想必非常理解不少學生所說 ‘理科生不了解歷史‘ ‘文學素養不高如何作文‘此類難處。A range tips:
pre3脫稿
多次conslut

workload:
1. 3次quizzes（30%）
2. 1 project (report+presentation) (40%)
3. exam (30%)
好多bio同physics嘢背。 
quiz 雖然系mc， 但係要揀曬啱嘅答案出黎(唔系普通mc)。有d mc 題目notes系冇講過(20題入面有2-3題). 三次quiz，預計自己都有7成.
project 自定topic，冇咩guideline，點做都得。
exam可以俾你帶1張cheat sheet，但有d題目notes冇講，所以都系唔會識做。
哩個GE好彩有拉curve同有份project，如果唔系實B range

This subject is only useful if you are really interested in the curriculum and are expected to possess certain level of fundamental knowledge in the field of civil engineering.Jason to a certain extent is an excellent teacher in terms of his passion yet is far from praise-worthy in terms of giving clear instructions and proper delivery of lecture. It's not interactive and drive people to sleep.

Although i have done a lot of extra works or join extra activities that he recommended, it is so hard to get A+. However,overall, Dr Jason is a very charm, social and prestigious professor. His lecture is so useful and down to earth.

body:
Melody is a good professor in terms of teaching or explaining the requirement of the assignment, she might not be a lenient examiner when marking assignment/giving grade.20 % Class Participation
Tutorial/Lecture would take attendance, don't skip any of it. DONT SKIP the presentation session in last 2 lecture since you have to fill in the evaluation form for each group and it count into your participation.

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body:
1. Class Attendance and Participation (10%)
TA would use card reader to take attendance at the first 15 minutes of every lecture/tutorials. If you care your grade, don't skip any of the it.2. Online Homework (15%)
There were 3 online homework in this semester. Each homework contained 5-7 short questions related to the teaching material covered in the tutorial. You would have no problems to get all the answers if you have attend those tutorial session. John would give one week for us to complete the task on Canvas, though you only need 15-30 minutes to finish them.

body:
Individual Assignment 5%
Mid-Term Test (Only Multiple Choice Questions) 15%
Questionnaire feedback questions about the computer virtual reality learning 3%

成個course學既野唔難,唔係讀理科既同學都冇問題
總知又輕鬆又好grade

Coursework同final test嘅比重就睇下面啦。
final test有啲難，因為sem尾好多野做，淨係用一左一日半時間溫，好多野背，有啲心理學上嘅term要分得好清。份卷又有好多題係問兩句statement前後對錯，呢part真係要好熟先答到。開頭做完仲好驚會爛grade，因為真係有啲送分題都答錯，可能因為project拉到分。
個人覺得project都易做嘅，同埋我個組有個幾chur嘅人carry，所以份project都應該做得幾好掛。
如果有興趣可以讀下。但final year就唔好啦 無謂令自己擔驚受怕畢唔到業
P.S. 佢啲ppt簡短得尼得Definition 要聽佢講/自己上網查先知點解

course name: Probability in Action: From the Unfinished Game to the Modern World
body: Very easy mathematics course. As long as you attend lectures and tutorials and finished those trivial exercises, the grade will be great. Recommend the course and Dr. Zhang Qingfu.
Allan's course is not interesting. For me, I didn't learn from him a lot. He just read ppt and sometimes organized a boring activity. But undeniable the grade was...was acceptable, though not good.

course name: Data is Beautiful: Visualization in the Humanities
teacher: Dr. John S Y Lee, Prof. Webster
body: Recommend the course without reservation. The course mainly talks about how to use different software to visualize some features of the text. The workload is heavy: paper of 2500 words, 10min individual presentation, a proposal and a final exam. My presentation is no creative, but I got an A-. Already satisfying.

Almost every week will have a quiz. 
Also, there will be a individual lab report.
Lastly, there is an exam. (All long questions)For quiz, I got around 80% mark for each quiz
For individual lab report, we dont know the mark as he didnt distribute to us
For exam, I answer 70% of the questions.
識reg一定reg李果。

as a computer science student, i found this ge course very useful as the course content covers different areas of managing personal finance(saving, budgeting, credits, mortgage, investment, retirement)this is not an easy course for non-business students since it is a bit too technical, but hard work will help

Inclass Discussion, 計participation 30%
有五至六堂會做discussion, 計participation, 所以一定要出現。呢一部份, 最緊要搵到SS Dept嘅人同自己一組, 因為佢地多數都讀過晒呢科野嘅內容。你只需要睇五套戲, 例如我就睇左life of pi, 被偷走的那五年, the beauty mind, The Silence of the Lambs等等, 之後答吓好簡單嘅問題就走得。Final Quiz (35%)
我自己係Psychology minor, 讀過幾個psy嘅courses都係拎A, 但我覺得呢科考得好深。樓上個個講到呢科野好簡單, 但呢科其實有涉及bio psy嘅內容, 會提及睡眠同腦電波嘅關係, 有好多腦神經科學嘅字要記。如果剩係考MC, 咁呢科都係簡單, 但呢科有30%係fill-in-the-blank questions, 你會見到一句句子, 然後喺無choices嘅情況吓做。換言之, 你一唔記得一個字就已經玩完。我自己讀過2字頭嘅psy course, 覺得呢科GE比果一科更加深。根據我對psy嘅認識, 考試我大約岩65%。

個輕鬆係睇你part啲咩groupmate
Groupmate對呢個course非常非常重要
Group work佔成個course 60% 
成也groupmate敗也group mate
同埋呢個course教埋既野同其他area1/2 GE既野都差唔多 theories為主
無太多有趣/你想像中18禁既野睇
最多只係喺啲slides度印左啲無打格既J既圖（釣狗公果啲）
初初真係預B range算 話晒都係大GE有二百幾人心諗邊有咁易靚grade
所以攞到呢個咁好既grade係喜出望外
講講呢個course有咩要做：
1）兩份Group class work（30%）
兩份都係問情景題 要套用返啲theories落去
兩份都可以睇printed materials但唔可以用電話（偷偷地用是常識吧）
佢唔會話你知邊兩個week做（我地係8同11）
不過有個小提示 你一發覺果個week得二三十張slides（正常四五十張）就好醒水叫齊groupmates返黎做野 
通常係堂尾果40分鐘攞黎做
2）Group Paper（30%）
通常係case study 集中香港一單案件
見有岩既theories要套落去
有唔明要問lecturer 佢地好nice
3）Final Test（40%）
呢個一定一定要留兩三日溫
Week13又要交paper又要做呢個 你未必會做得切
我地果陣係問80條MC
有幾乎一半都係double statement問你係咪上半岩下半錯咁 要好小心睇佢啲形容詞會唔會陰你
總之係有付出就有回報既科
今年轉左制，3個Quiz （45%） 轉左做2個 （20%）+1 Exam （45%）. Exam有背書就識，但係都幾多野背。

今個sem 開始 多左exam (30%), coursework 70%
先講考試
分2 parts - mc 同 lq
mc 50題, 都係出返lecture notes 內容 背熟就識晒大部份
但個別幾題 question wordings 未必同notes一樣 可能需要自己判斷

(全部都係黎至: okay, if you ask you a question) - 唔mark低/冇上堂
唔會識答
但佢都講過 只要answer係合理, 佢都會比分coursework
mc quiz x 4 (30%) 每次25-28題
同上面提到exam mc section 一樣
肯溫notes就識9成題目

course name: Architecture and Space in Chinese Culture
body:
1 group project
1 present
1 test (10mcq）
1 individual essay (1500 words)
上堂會take attendance。
第二堂會分組同抽topic。每組會有一個建築類型，組組都唔同，present同group project都係圍繞住呢個主題。
present 算係同instructor 傾吓個 group project，主要係講吓想點寫，簡單介紹下個建築咁。
group project 就可以跟返present 同佢俾嘅建議寫。
test雖然得10題mcq，不過唔算好簡單，都要溫下書。
individual essay 就係自己簡一個主題寫自己的睇法，個主題可以係上堂講過，亦可以係冇講過嘅。
冇consult過，覺得只要跟住佢俾嘅guideline嚟寫，就可以啦。

There are four parts in this courses: 
Quiz
Assignment 
Group project 
Exam
Quiz is quiet difficult , even though I am BBA student , I only got 37/50(A grade)
Assignment (full marks), better find someone who have studied this course and give you resources
Gp-our group consulted Mr.Ho for many times, he is nice and smart, every time he can answer our questions and give meaningful advices. If you are hardworking and consult him frequently, you will get a good grade.
Exam-very hard! Some calculations even we haven’t learnt in class! If you have a good business sense, you can reg this course. If not, good luck!
利申我係2017/18 Sem B take, 但呢度得2016/17 Sem B揀。同大家一樣都覺得Jason係一個幾nice嘅as a person, 但nice又唔代表好嘅as a professor。

One Group presentation one 2000 word essay 1000 word reflection
Structure is similar to UE but workload is relatively light.
Class attendance not compulsory as long as your friends help you tick it.
An easy course, really good gradeEasy quizzes

course name: Architecture and Space in Chinese Culture
body: 多d consult 就ok, individual assignment要多d own feeling, 但grade 麻麻，本身預A 的

鴻仔lecture 唔單止教你中國文化，仲滲透咗好多人生道理，尤其係佢分享自己愛情故事啲一課。只可以話，cityU有此用心教書、借課堂提點同學的良師，實在難得。
家豪老師可以無限consult，不過本人覺得佢比既意見有d虛無，大多數執着係註腳。但佢都係一位公正、人品頗好的tutor.....
PS我地全組5個人都A range

2017/18 sem B
1. 兩個星期一次quiz (short question)， 正常有9成分數
2. Assignment x1 ,本身有4份assignment但最後得一份(普通計數+essay(2版A4紙)，交hard copy)
3. Lab report (個lab visit 主要系影相，資料要自己上網搵，交hard copy)
4. 因為 今年第一年有exam. 所以Exam頗簡單，唔會好深 (問physic嘢唔會好detail)建議: 有physics/chem 底先好reg
grade = effort
he is picky on grammar and pronunciation, but less care about contents and wording.

allen prefers factual topics than some controversial topics,
e.g. should uber be legalised in hk/ should renewable energy be promoted in china? (what he like)
e.g. plastic surgery/ political identity of hk ppl/ gay marriage (he will be picky n give many discouraging comments)lesson is relaxing n free but he doesn't like late students, and he seldom give useful guidelines to us
he is a christian but i wrote moral essay (turn out i got a B)

2 quizzes: not so difficult just memorise some key concepts/ keywords/ logic flow
1 presentation: make a booklet and deliver a ppt (shld find some pjmates who are good at design/ graphics), to showcase n apply all theories from lectures.my quizzes scores: 75-85%
present: idk cuz the tutor didn't show us

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong

body:
Open Book Quiz x1, 開份notes 可以搵到大部分答案
Essay x1, 即日交, 上網搵資料就得, 可以唔洗聽書
成個course你肯背就ok,但係背嘅野有小小多, 我兩次quiz都係weekend先溫都背得晒quiz 1 40題, 35分滿分; Mean: 26.3 High: 34.1

依科工作量都幾繁重，幾乎每個禮拜都有野做，但好係好在付出同收穫成正比（啲野唔難，肯比啲心機做一定會做得唔差＋Crystal 比分鬆手）Breakdown: 
Quiz 1 92%
Quiz 2 80％
Assignment 1 8.5/10
Assignment 2 8.5/10
Assignment 3 9/10 
Attendance 100%

有兩個quiz, quite straightforward, 溫咗就得，適合勤力嘅人。
Andy 好nice, 雖然有啲悶，但係啲ppt好。
Anthony 冇ppt，要自己寫notes, 唔可以遲到，比較難觸摸，不過份人都ok嘅。
啲quiz都有認真prepare，不過最尾project做得唔係太好，所以個grade麻麻。

有兩個quiz, quite straightforward, 溫咗就得，適合勤力嘅人。
Andy 好nice, 雖然有啲悶，但係啲ppt好。
Anthony 冇ppt，要自己寫notes, 唔可以遲到，比較難觸摸，不過份人都ok嘅。

上堂幾輕鬆，不過比分幾嚴，特別係最後嗰篇essay，要好具體先會高分。take attendance，要準時。

一同佢意見分歧，要即時drop啦
合佢心意就pass，唔係就預fail
利申:meet曬所有attendance 同交齊野，匯報比佢質完，fail左

普通話上課的老師，人三觀很正。lecture的課程比較輕鬆，聽不聽講無所謂，每堂課課後會讓答一個問題，一般老師上課會講說是重點，然後重點聽聽好了，就能答題。
tutorial的課程主要是presantation比較重要，而且上課要點名，最後寫論文按照她的要求修改，成績不會特別差。

個course會涉及唔同範疇既中樂知識，都幾新鮮有趣，聽下歌，有時會請人返來表演介紹樂器
雖然中國音樂用英文教，但都唔算好難，咁有中國音樂底既會好啲，不過冇都冇問題
每堂會有quiz，但都係好簡單，有上堂都實識
淨係得一個present，王sir俾自由定topic，個闊度都好大，只要係有關中樂，就可以
最重要係你個topic夠創意，因為老實講，wiki既佢實睇得出
你問佢方向意見，佢唔會100%話岩定錯，但會guide你，俾你自己諗多啲
係一個幾輕鬆學到野既course！

上堂notes主要講東西方cinema movement, 睇電影video clip, 內容唔難明
兩份MC quiz (@10%): 唔長, 直接, 所有答案notes都有
group presentation (40%): 大概4人一組, 由佢個movie list揀題目, present前一定要consult, Derek會比好多有用嘅意見同講想你點做
attendance & discussion (20%): 最好每堂tutorial present完都問下問題或比意見, 建議上返Derek教嘅tutorial
一篇individual film review (20%): 可以做返group presentation嘅戲, 亦可以自己揀任何一套戲
教學認真，一絲不苟，充滿熱誠，鼓勵學生思考和發問，真良師也。

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body:
伏科 唔好reg
個prof 比分好嚴 
group project 佔60% 
我地組consult佢幾次 但最後turn out 得B真係唔知咩事
exam用左好多時間溫 不過好多要睇書先識
always attend lectures and tutorials. attendance matters. be punctual too.
follow the instructions in lectures and tutorials. do the readings, consult the tutor. I put effort and got a reasonable reward.

2. Argumentative Essay in academic tone

一份individual essay,有題目簡
一個gp presentation, 一個week一組，題目係嗰個week lecture

就係咁多 冇quiz冇exam冇gp written report嘅GE邊度搵

You have 2 Individual reports, 2 group projects and 2 quizzes; The name of the course is very misleading it is more about 3d printing than design and the lectures are very boring as well. Th course teaches us a lot about 3d printing but you're not allowed to 3d print at all. The quizzes have very open ended questions and it is difficult to get a good grade on it

course name: Urban Green City: Pollution and Solution
body:
3 tutorial assignment：
內容比較簡單，professor 都會同你討論埋答案，多數可以即堂交。3 assignment: 
3頁紙以內，回應返professor自製board game裡面嘅問題，1.5 spacing 12 time new roman。 我寫咗頗多，3份都800字度。順帶一提assignment係TA改嘅，俾分都算鬆手。

In-class assignment 15%，有2個，加埋30%。
(有一個佢會話你知幾時，而另一個就唔會預先話你知。）
內容就都幾難，不過都係靠吹水。
Group project 30% ～4000 words (case study 一宗crime case）
佢會俾sample essay，跟住format做應該唔會點差。
Final Quiz 40% 80 MC 考返晒十二個lecture d 嘢，都幾多嘢要背。 
總共有三個人教唔同topic。
不得不說，final quiz arrangement 好差，可能因為喺大lecture hall考，安排都好白痴，好浪費時間。

in-class assignment after lessons, quite difficult and time-limited
if you have great time management and work hard, you can prepare well for mid-term and exam
it is not a good option if you want to get a good grade easily and effortlessly

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body: Professor唔中意人上堂講野，唔好比佢認得你。無group project，無present，無essay，靜係每堂做兩題class work，好輕鬆。上堂雖然唔知佢講咩，但都考到好成績，exam無想像中咁難，懶人必reg。

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
Profressor好好人，第一堂就講呢個係GE course，比我地拉grade，所以唔會比太低grade。
今個sem改左制要exam，一開始聽到要exam有D驚，但exam考既野都好簡單，溫下書就識，30分鐘就做完走人。上堂一開始堂堂都聽唔明，但最後記住D基本野，都會識答exam D題目。仲有每堂做2題class exercise，所以唔好走堂，同埋professor唔會UP PPT上canvas，上堂要專心同影低D重點。總括：reg得過，正！

course name: Ideology and Creativity: Unwrapping Japanese Culture
body: workload唔大，但真係要答多啲問題。衰喺答得唔夠多問題
In general, I can say that it is not the course that you can decide ur grades by working hard. If u want to get good grades then PLEASE!!! don't choose this course cuz you need to face huge risk.

This course was kinda boring, but not that difficult.
We had a group project and an essay. For the essay, we had to submit 2 separate drafts.

1. A Killer who appeared to be nice2. The highest mark of the argumentative essay 1st draft in our class is around 16 to 17. I am one to two marks lower. Infographic (I met free riders) is the average of ALL CLASSES (Congrats to killer class) Self commentary sem end that's y idk. Get a B.

3 份 assignment看reading 做critical essay
另外的都是descriptive essay 用字重要 英文不太好 所以寫好久 TT

chinese course name: 說服力－理論及日常實踐
body:
Weighting: 
30% Presentation (7-8 people per group) 
30% Quiz 
20% Individual Paper 
20% In-class exercises and participation (Must attend the lecture, must take attendance)As a local student, I think the course is not difficult, but be very careful when forming groups. 
The tutor will ask a lot of questions after each group's presentation. 
The individual paper requires you to write around four pages. 
If you like skipping classes, then it is not the course you should take. You will get an "F" grade if you skipped more than 3 lectures. 
I personally just skipped once because you will have to put your name down on the in-class exercise worksheets which is given out every lectures.

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
見到個成績呆左，傳說中既靚grade呢？竟然連A range都無？！(+3)
雖然冇A range , 不過hea讀都有B+算係咁啦
適合有econ底嘅同學讀，assignment輕鬆，除左econ嘅部分之外都係common sense，quiz冇野要背，不過econ唔係幾好嘅同學就可能要多啲時間溫下啲concept。另外Group project比分算幾鬆手，大家合作啲分好工就輕鬆攞分，我成個project前後用左個幾鐘就搞掂。值得一提嘅係個professor好nice，所以成個course氣氛好輕鬆。

Background: 今年year 1，揀GE嗰陣時唔知道有GE指南，所以其實係睇到個title有興趣而揀呢科我呢一班有兩個老師教，頭五堂都係Joseph 教，三堂Miss Pan 教，我會覺得兩個都教得麻麻。Joseph佢上堂唔係會慢慢同你講每一個theory，佢會似用一種同你discuss嘅形式講課(加上佢啲英文講得真係麻麻Hong kong口音，好容易就悶到訓着)， 而另一個Miss Pan就相反會將喺PPT嘅每一個point都講一次(不過佢啲英文發音---典型大陸英文發音真係唔准所以其實有時聽唔明佢講乜)。我覺得上呢一個GE最有得着嘅就係佢將最basic 嘅psycho theories 同你介紹 (不過呢啲theories 上網其實好多網站都有介紹,而且仲比上堂更詳細!!!)，大概比你taste一下psychology。

佢真係hea到痴線 求其跟住啲工作紙讀下就算
每次上堂都遲到(大概遲6mins)放break放20-40mins tick attendance就好遲tick hea就真係hea啦 但grade好爛 明明認真做功課比佢 唔知點解grade都係咁差 唔知係咪之前比人投訴過 攞我地嚟開刀 爛grade之選 ps gp mates英文好好都係b&b- 所以想hea唔怕爛grade先好揀佢！想靚grade就千祈唔好reg佢 伏到喊！！！！！

Google the quiz answers before lessons so you can play computer games. :o)
Final exam is so difficult and even though you have studied all the notes(lecture and word note), you may still don't know the answer. If u have physics and chemistry backgrounds, it will be more easy for you to get high marks in mc part.
For the fill in blanks, just leave it blank is better than writing the wrong answers and deduct marks, as there are not many marks you have owned T.T
Also, it is suggested to go to the solar lab to do the field trip report, my friend and I have done so and we both get higher grade than our teammates who do the VR space trip, even though our final test mark are nearly the same.

5 bi-weekly journals, 8 course activity sheets signed by your classmate on the class and presentation evaluation report have gave you 23 marks in sort of freely way. The things you need to focus on are just final exam and project report. I did not have any economic background before and have a little impression on the course in 4 days before the examination. After learning about 20 hours, I got a good grade, near the highest grade. For the project, applying what you learn from this course is so important. But once you do like that and have no obvious area to be improved in the project. You will get high level. Doctor Ho is a very friendly and humorous person who you will always like. I learnt many essential economic concept in interesting ways but save much time and energy. I am so grateful for the level I got.

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body: A good course to learn the very basics of data mining and analysis.The group presentation is VERY important (50% of your grade)! Best way to get good grades is to pick smart and good English speaking teammates. The group presentation is not too hard if you leave yourself enough time and prepare well.

Amy真係好好人 每堂都專登搞下笑令課堂更加融洽
每堂啲online quiz都一定係範圍裏面 上google査下就得!
Workload黎講算輕鬆 都係quiz,field trip同group project 每人只係做幾版
A range之選

infographic 有熟人 carry

條友話睇唔明，剩係check咗grammar
笑撚咗
最後個reflection佢話800字我就寫咗650都有咁嘅grade
算好人㗎啦

多嘢做，要多諗嘢
但係如果你係鍾意死讀書/唔鍾意諗「不切實際」嘅嘢嘅人唔建議take
因為冇興趣要預得D/F
要expect prof有好多爭議性嘅諗法，challange你嘅價值觀。

she is a nice and patient tutor.

Only infographic and one argumentative essay.
Zarah will explain everything to us, reg her if you want a good grade

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body: Throughout the whole course, I only attended 3 lectures, the first lecture, the quiz, and the presentation.And the best part is, you only need to come in when you need to present. I only studied one night before the quiz, and I got 36/50, while the mean is 27.3 (or sth similar).

teacher: Lecturer: Qian Hua Tutor: Chen Ying
body: The lecture is conducted in Mandarin. You may ask her questions about your own presentation even you are not in her tutorial class. It's a little bit boring lecture but if you do pay attention, you will learn something new.The tutor is cute and friendly. Standard workload.

teacher: Keung Fai J. WU, Haimin PAN
body:
兩次Quiz + 一個Project(Poster & Booklet) + Presentation
In-class Quiz 1: 全部都係MC Questions, 係ppt會有, 會考得好detail
Quiz2: 15條MC+2條Essay, 都係ppt會有, 但Essay會考埋運用theory
Poster & Booklet: 揀一個專業, 利用課堂學過既Theory去分析[都可以用自己搵到既Theory去做(少)]
會有Mentor Guide成組應該點做
原本Predict自己得B/B- (第一次Quiz剛剛過Mean,第二次唔會show分)
如果想學Psychology Theory都reg得過

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?

body:
剩係要返頭9個week點名 內容都幾有趣同簡單
仲有1個present week同final test
50% mc test 25題 問得好tricky 高過mean少少
47% project 自己part要寫名

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong
chinese course name: 建築業是建構現今香港的其一基石
body:
40% 25題mc 錯4題 基本上係考raymond以外既prof同miss教既野
60% 3揀2essay 雖然raymond份ppt全部都係圖 但已經有寫重點可參考
有去聽seminar 佢話會加分
點名好無系統 唔覺得計分 有時點名有時又唔點工程之美 德國教育
我就唔講廢話既 頭先個幾十秒就係廢話
尾個幾行唔俾坐 演唱會第一行既飛最值錢 (入戲院睇戲你係咪買第一行)

teacher: WONG Marianne P Y, CHUI Lisa L S
body:
呢科頗伏！
GE指南幾年前話有國畫堂，宜家已經唔會有了。
上堂都係睇ppt同聽書，少互動。不過quiz都係open book又可以用電腦search嘅，幾輕鬆。
點解話伏呢？因為個presentation同report都要用英文嘅，但幾乎9成source都係中文，譯死你。揀題目嘅時候要考慮埋英文資料易唔易搵，如果做正同古詩文有關嘅野，真係祝你好運。篇文要寫1500字英文，唔習慣寫英文report或者英文差嘅同學建議唔好reg。
成組present同report都盡力了，gpmate最高都係攞B，仲有攞D

Mark is a really kind teacher, he is very patient and I find him really funny sometimes. Overall, I enjoyed taking this GE class with him as my tutor. Most of the time, the class were divided into groups to do exercises, which is pretty fun. The assignments that were given were not that hard either. I could've gotten a better grade if I just put a little more effort into my work.

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong
chinese course name: 建築業是建構現今香港的其一基石
body:
成個學期得一份MC一份essay
25題MC 40%
essay 60% 上堂即場作(2hrs)
本身MC話close book,RW最後應承大家可以open book(佢話自己係student friendly既老師）
essay靠吹水，唔洗溫書
如果你想hea hea地咁讀一科GE,呢個都算係唔錯既選擇

呢科真係勁多野做 每兩個禮拜一個assignment 交個完成品俾佢唔會高分 一定要將你自己畫嘅野遂個step俾佢睇到先高分 雖然個tutor每次都有問必答勁詳細 
一定要有會做野嘅朋友同你上 一俾人freeride你個grp project就係咁先個pj要講20分鐘講你睇個套電影有咩拍攝技巧 佢grp project有俾高分嘅example俾大家睇但跟著做都唔會高分lol
如果唔中意畫畫唔中意睇啲好有深度嘅電影千祈唔好揀 勁多workload 唯一好係lecture可以走曬佢

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body: 工作量一般係因為有識英文聖經隊友carry，加上本有D聖經底。完全無聖經習背景既人讀都得既，不過就辛苦D，可能上堂就要專心D啦。group project同individual project都輕鬆既，上網找找資料就有架啦，不過份online assignment就真心難，我60幾分就B，我個FD80幾分先B+(不過唔知佢其他部分做成點～)不過上堂真心輕鬆同開心的～
文科生放心之选，除了gp工作量有点大，其他的几乎都是高中地理英文版，得B+大约是gp没做好，因为前面的quiz和assignment我都有快90%

記緊, attendance 非常重要
workload 非常輕, 3 份pick最高分1份, 有80就應該夠 B+

Kevin is one of the most passionate teachers I have encountered in my first semester in CityU.As a native speaker, I was very well-challenged and my mind was broadened. Even other course mates who were not native speakers were also able to follow very easily.

fm不reg ELLIOT 為人生憾事. UE必reg!

伏。

Groupmate臨陣到海外留學，份inforgraphic一腳踢都幾係嘢...... 
Lecturer收功課後不會show grade，班房細所以佢會認得你，無返會知。
其實升上大學要學APA style嘅essay確實要時間適應，唔似以前吹水都當point，醜grade唔賴人，都係睇你俾唔俾心機..功課：
每星期有一個online quiz
Infographic (group work)
Argumentative essay draft & final
Self assessment
Very boring but low workload, only two assignment.
Very nice course to get a good grade to improve ur GPA. The workload is low since there are only two assignment. The group project has 50% score so u should find some good teammates.

大課黃老師講課生動有趣, 但遲到15分鐘就無得計attendance, 佢係用class work計ge, 但你expect要每堂起碼寫150-200字, 其他lecturer通常做下mc就算. 不過黃老師教書真係幾好, 好似去聽故事咁.李磷個個都話好, 我諗佢好在hea lor, 成個sem好似剩係上左5堂, 不過project照佢consultation講ge野去做, 最後佢ge評語話個flow唔好... 最後靠篇essay拉返b+
DSE Eng 啱啱好lv.4，所以本身對呢科冇乜期望，一開始pre reg係乜就乜，冇改過。我唔係幾鍾意佢上堂成日都要同隔離位discuss或者分組discuss。佢會俾我地一個號碼，之後叫同一個號碼嘅坐埋一齊。試過一堂調咗3次位，行嚟行去。整體上都OK，就係覺得佢俾啲guidance有啲唔清晰同唔夠多。好嘅地方係每堂都有break同唔會遲放。攞B grade 算係預料之內。

teacher: 大課：錢華 導修：李磷
body: 大課嘅professor係內地嚟嘅，用普通話上堂。唔可以遲到超過15分鐘。每堂嘅PowerPoint都超豐富。正正常常。如果reg唔到廣東話嘅堂，又識聽普通話，我覺得都可以揀錢華。導修基本上就係俾我地做功課嘅，最緊要係問多啲professor嘅意見。李磷俾啲意見都幾實際同有用。

今年上莊無咩時間做功課,幾份都臨尾幾晚先寫出來,算係多錯但依然幾高分,仲要幫你全篇改好曬d錯處係draft隔離,final果份copy and paste番上去就又高幾分,超好人

一開始就pre-reg到佢真係好好彩

sad到爆,全程笑笑口咁俾你分,一直收番來啲分都唔錯,但最尾出到來得B, 明明同其他班每份assignment 都差唔多分,上一個留言咁ge分 仲有A- 但我得B, 已經算係全班最高分嗰堆,應該全班都爛哂grade.
根本亂改,email consult又hea 覆得嗰幾句又話ok,但之後出到來又話可以做多好多其他方面ge嘢,但同時又要求我地一隻字都唔可以過1000:800, 得嗰咁少字數點寫哂全部嘢呀大佬,搞到我逼住cut好多嘢,重點係其他班過200,300 字都ok, 超唔公平.
啲功課圈得幾個錯處仲可以低分過人地班好多錯嗰啲. 唯一解釋到就係一係佢每次都hea改,一係就好緊手.
可能以前ge guide俾人讚得多上哂天咁,如果有得做多次TLQ實俾番佢爛grade
出完grade email都唔覆,強烈建議大家去review,因為佢俾分真係好唔專業,浪費同學心機.
Yr1仲要揀major真係多得佢唔少

body: 堂堂都要計attendance分，又有min. attendance rule，不能走堂。功課量不算多，只有group project + exam，不過exam真的好難，MC我只有成肯定，essay難度合理。如果英文不錯，提早睇晒本拿應該無問題。老師人友善，上堂輕鬆（只是不能係堂上進食），係ge不錯選擇。

Group member is VERY VERY VERY important. We have a freerider that pulls down the report grade, terrible! We should tell Toni earlier but we did not able to find out terrible problem until the last few days before presentation. The course is interesting with a few difficult business concepts. But generally, reading the textbook can help. There is a weekly classwork every week. Exam covers almost all of the textbook. The assignments workload is ok but the revision of exam is very heavy. The lecturer is nice and friendly. She is very quick with email reply if you have any problems (just do not send her anything serious last minute).

body:
Course work
每堂都quiz 5%*10=50%

Project report 30%+Present 20%=50%Course materials on canvas
ppt 
Paper (Danny Li wk4~wk7)

成個course好hea, 成日早走仲有堂睇戲，得三堂會教嘅嘢(Critical thinking)會出喺Quiz度
前面講creative thinking可以不理，同group project都冇乜關係
計分方面，mind map 亂畫都冇乜所謂，個個都咁上下分
Creative blog 就最好認真啲做，最好夠特別，寫吓Apple冇創意之類
Briefing 計5%，唔好太離譜就得
Present 就好緊要，都係嗰句啦，隊友最重要，PowerPoint唔好太多字，用吓啲互動嘅方式，睇吓片咁啦
至於Quiz，唔好靠哂啲lecture notes， 自學睇吓啲Fallacies，睇吓書咁就最好啦。TL;DR Hea科，好grade，睇logic能力

Coursework:
1: Short quizzes: 10*5%
2: Group prj report: 30%
3: Oral presentation: 20%呢一科毎堂完咗之後都會有個小測, 換言之呢科係唔可以走堂, 小測會考返嗰一堂教嘅野, 有professor會俾open book,有d唔俾, 其實d小測唔難, 有聽吓書就一定會識

攞到呢個分唔意外，因為真係有太撚多勁人拉高晒個curve。
堂唔返都得，因為佢完全唔計attendance，除左兩個quiz同兩日present。
呢個course要做既野如下：
1.MC quiz（60條，考返module1,2既野，入面考好多有關數據既題，見到Notes slides啲數據背得幾多得幾多，執分題黎）40%
當初知道得42/60，仲要個mean係42時就知道同A range無緣T_T
2.15條MC+一板essay既quic（呢份係唔會知考成點，因為佢永遠唔會派）30%
3.present（poster+booklet，果陣因爲係present空少空姐果啲，所以present果陣用左好多welcome on board果啲野襯返主題，好在個Xiaoyu都幾鍾意加左唔少分，如果唔係肯定得B都似）30%
60題MC個Quiz係打底用，所以一定一定要溫得好好，果個quiz攞到5字頭，你就見到個A）
同埋3個活動一定要返，你唔返，佢啲補考係十級難，等於同自己過唔去。
同埋我未聽過GE Course係唔俾appeal...

轉左老師的確係hea好多 不過hea唔一定係好事 因為佢俾分唔大方
雖然岩岩出左消息話下年將會將十個Eng discipline courses合成一個
不過都值得睇下呢個comment
唔好睇到隔離有個17/18 SemA既comment好似拎左個A-就覺得好易好grade
基本上一班得廿幾人 要攞A range係好難
啲人話鬼婆俾分好似鬆手過華人 其實未必係
因為呢個course啲rubics分得好細 一份30分既功課可以分做5/5/5/5/5/5
咁佢每個俾3分已經去左你12分 但佢覺得咁樣俾分係無問題 我地都好無奈
佢評語雖然係仔細好多 又讚又盛 但個分係點 有目共睹
呢個course要做既野：
1.reading response（其實係堂上做左兩張評同學既紙俾佢就得，啲乜鬼in-class exercise唔做都得）15%
2.creative nonfiction（佢好注重5感，盡可能諗一個情景你係擺到5感入去，同埋要整片，slideshow就得）30%
3.poem（又係要整片，又係slideshow就得，不過唔知整片既用意係邊）25%
4.group tv & drama script（4個人一組揼個script出黎）30%呀仲有 佢講啲guidelines非常之唔清楚 成班人上完堂問大家都唔知佢想要啲咩 個個又喺度扮明咁 都伏伏地
溫馨提示：呢個course十有八九係year3/4既同學 如果year1/2想快啲reg eng discipline courses既話 我勸你讀到上去先好reg 又或者做好俾人虐既心理準備

唔好見咁多人好GRADE就REG
上堂好HEA
自己睇NOTES仲好過上堂
伏

Group project 40%
Attendance+classworks 30%
Final Exam(2 hours) 30%
老師人好nice，亦負責，會主動關心同學，不過exam kills (我無買書，死咗！)。堂堂take attendance及計分，不能走堂。

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices
chinese course name: 全球商業作法的革命轉變
body: 這科對商科生不難，有些concepts theories 在management或strategy course 已經學過，對 freshman會有點多，需要早作準備。workload 來說還好，無 midterm，無assignment，只有group project 及exam，不過exam 比想像中難好多（MC部份），反而essay 比較易，其中compulsory 嗰條同class 係一樣，上堂比心機做可以輕鬆拿滿分。Toni係負責任的老師，會主動關心同學有無問題，她的class不會悶，不過attendance好嚴，而且每堂有要計分，想要走堂就不要take。除了不能走堂，不能在課室進食，這科是有趣的，老師人很好,不過year 2讀才可能會易d。

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices
chinese course name: 全球商業作法的革命轉變
body: As a year 1 engineer student, this GE is not easy and everything need to learn from scratch. I treat this GE like my core subject. Getting good grade requires time and if you are able to complete the chapter readings (2 chapters per week!) and revise much earlier. The classworks are easy and as long as you show up class on time and write longer, you should get the grade. The group project is very important and by luck, I do not have any freerider in the group. The research of data can be time consuming and should start earlier. Toni is a very patient and kind lecturer. Our group consulted her a couple of times and get A in the report. The MC of exam is quite difficult. It is surprising. Some of the questions ask for very details in the textbook. Toni is a very responsible and caring lecturer. The only problem I can find is her powerpoint, which is not very helpful in exam revision. But Toni already tells us that ppt is her teaching tool, not our studying tool!

The most important one is the final test. But also easy if you have studied Economics in secondary school.
