course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body:
基本上無乜workload，非常輕鬆，但唔代表好grade，Engine仔都唔會識啲quiz。
雖然話唔take attendance，但其實每堂都會叫你簽名，而且會令個grade郁。

course name: Celebrity and Scandals: Contemporary Issues in Hong Kong Popular Culture
body: 其實最後攞到呢個grade真係令人喜出望外，因為我起初只係predict自己攞B range。Stella平日都幾nice，上堂都講解得幾詳細，但time management 較差(其實咁同好多同學present overtime 有好大關係)。

Choosing a good projectmate is the most important thing for this course or you will like me who was doing the poster and booklet alone!(yes! only one doing the proj!) if u dont mind this then no wonder u must reg it

無文學底但major英文，見GE指南話好grade就reg左。呢科3個quizzes，一個group presentation，兩篇assignments。每個禮拜都要睇reading，都係一d近代亞洲作者寫既英文小說節錄出黎既短篇故事，唔會好難，部份幾好睇。Quizzes都係考番佢俾既readings，有d似中學閱讀理解。Assignments同presentation都係分析番d readings，俾分幾鬆手。上堂除左聽作者生平、作品分析、教文學概念詞、小組討論，仲會睇吓戲，雖然聽書有d悶，但其實又幾有趣（好矛盾）。

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy
teacher: Melody Chong, Dennitza Gabrakova, Xiao-lin Wang
chinese course name: 茶道：歷史、藝術、建築與哲學
body: 無日文底，但對日本文化有興趣就揀左呢個course。有3堂tutorial可以去ac2茶室，幾好玩。呢個course有兩個tests，一個group presentation，一篇reading assignment。雖然話係B1，但程度同workload絕對屬於B2......

沒有想像中好, 雖然每節課她都有準備過, 給分的準則也很清晰, 但是對提升grade沒有用處. 之前看GE指南說有努力就有一個好grade, 完全不覺得. 
她只派了3份功課的成績,每份我都過mean了,拿這個grade簡直出乎意料,不知道哪份功課死了

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body: 教授選擇放羊模式，可以經常走堂，reading也可以不看。整個課程，我只是看了assignments要求的readings，考試（open book）前也沒看完考試範圍的reading。所以總體來說不算是辛苦，如果英文能力好的話，可以讀得更輕鬆。教授很nice，你有不懂，可以在email問他，他會回覆你的。

Not that hard..
Ace student

Jason一開始就promise我地好grade，佢都有show比我地睇佢上個sem比學生嘅grade，基本上B+或以上無難度，所以全程我都輕鬆上。
呢科最唔討好就係望落好多嘢做，有individual assignment，有midterm，有 group project report 同presentation，仲有 exam。但事實全部都唔係難嘢，份individual真係做5版就ok，我當佢LS啲essay咁寫。Midterm得幾題，而且有温佢high light嗰啲ppt就一定會識，背少少嘢嘅定義就ok。group project 都係每人present五分鐘加report幾版紙，佢會因應你嗰group嘅人數而增加或減少你workload呢點我覺得幾好。exam就同midterm差唔多，都係温佢叫你温嗰啲就ok，考唔夠一個鐘啲人就走晒，因為真係照背。
但我就覺得要佢留低印象可能會有幫助，因為同我同組有個好中意呢科成日問jason問題，雖然佢唔係堂堂反齊，份project做嘅part亦唔係特別好特別突出，但jason可能對佢印象深啲，比咗A+佢。
總之，想拉gpa就泥讀呢科啦，輕輕鬆鬆又可以知多啲LS嘢。

course name: Celebrity and Scandals: Contemporary Issues in Hong Kong Popular Culture
body: 我有appeal所以知自己breakdown。Assignment x 5 ( A+ )係fb打野only，好簡單。樓下有人屌人做爛市，話人寫得多字，我真係笑而不語。如果你係勁既當然可以用百幾字去概括好多論點，但做果陣好多人都真係當隨筆咁寫，但其實用個腦諗下都知要refer返notes佢講過既論點，再用果啲point去elaborate。多字係在所難免。佢雖然睇落好hea又冇講字數限制，但往往呢啲位先係最伏。

拿普通话写啦，可能要对不起international了、、、
个人还是推荐这门GE的，用到的数学知识比较基础，是不是数学系的来都无所谓了。
给分看1.in class assignment 2.quiz 3.pre3
in class assignment主要是签到，只要去上课了基本上都可以满分的。
quiz没有他们说的那么简单了，想做满分得把课件上的所有东西都弄明白啊，还有，sample question一定要好好做（一百个重点号）。professor人不错的，很有耐心要勤问他问题。
pre3自然是核心，多跟professor沟通一下（虽然他总是很敷衍给不出什么建设性意见咳咳），但还是要多刷刷脸啦。 pre3没太弄好也没关系report还有机会，好好写report还是有机会A level的。
总之professor人还是很不错的，给分也挺良心的，我当时pre3就搞得不太好，但report好好写也没影响到grade了。GE课看态度更多一些只要认真都是可以搞到好成绩的。
多跟professor沟通，认真学就ok。还有组队！！很重要！！！！！

in class assignment(20%)
呢科煩在要做9張in class assignment (wk1-wk10, except wk 7 midterm)
即係冇得走堂 (你都可以同groupmate 夾吓輪流番)
不過其實係一張worksheet,好快做完,其他時間做自己嘢都得midterm(20%)
close book, 唔難, 有True false, 有MC, 有short essay, 有calculation
比一個鍾你做

讲道理，上学期被UE摧残后，我本是不对英语课抱有A range希望的。但Jenny真的是一个好的老师，人格魅力和亲和力就在那里，谈古论今，贯穿中外，望之温温，即之温温，可以近之。
也真的是Jenny，让我对好好上英语课又抱有了极大地热情。（UE好好上了也是烂grade）。
EFE workload不算重，但是在pre3和meeting的时候一定要收放自如，要有气场（比如我们的team leader），something beyond English may be more important.
再次感谢 Jenny。
如果你不想好好上课，只想混个分数，请不要选她的课，我心疼她，谢谢。

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body:
讲道理低于我们所有人的预期。
也可能是前一学期给分太好这一次来的人都好厉害。
assign几乎全部满分，quiz也高于average十几分，还是拿了B＋，真的难过。
不过帅成是好老师，即使出分后我们的忿忿不平。
总而言之，这课就是workload轻，但是我自问认真上课也认真做每项东西了也没有gpmate freeride，给分还是so so，也许我大一还是太菜吧。
以上。
2 個assignments,,,一份係上網比題目 3個鐘限時交。題目好易　有上堂就識另一份係即堂quiz 要溫BIO個幾課

有好多野做,INDIVIDUAL GROUP PROJECT,MID TERM,EXAMINATION
INDIVIDUAL 10%, MID TERM 20%, EXAMINATION 30%, GROUP PROJECT 40% (PRESENTATION 15%,PROJECT 25%)
MID TERM同EXAM都係佢上堂講嘅野,同埋佢會係MID TERM EXAM前UPLOAD會考邊幾份NOTES,只要背晒溫熟晒就一定識
INDIVIDUAL同GROUP PROJECT最好有關係,咁你就唔會有太重WRKLOAD
GROUP PROJECT 大約10頁, PRESENTATION每人5分鐘
INDIVIDUAL就每人5頁

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
MID TERM難,同之前唔同晒,變左幾條LONG QUESTION,PRESENTATION正正常常
利申MID TERM唔低分,PROJECT正正常常,出到黎得B

哩科GE算係投資低風險極高。Project topic 可以bold啲。好多組別嘅project都係做business ideas，唯獨是毫不creative。Midterm同final嘅T/F 都視乎你有冇背slides。Logic題目可以參考Law School Admission Test (LSAT) Section 2,4同5。而fallacies就不妨睇下readings 同自己search吓online exercises。如果個人英文底子好而個腦冇乜大問題嘅都不妨試下哩科。P.s. 哩科個grade都可以好爛，唔係純勤力可以應付到。
a quiz + a group project + in-class worksheet

Hea 教
Hea 改俾Airlie教
唔熟悉文學嘅人會誤會自己能力低
識文學嘅人會睇得出 Airlie 無乜料，連基本概念都搞唔清楚

再一次證明GE指南唔可以信哂
呢科無想像中咁靚grade, 更加唔係d人講到咁個個A range3個quiz 1個project (present+report)
對於一個對電腦同physics無興趣既人的確係有難度
上堂好難有興趣咁認真聽
不過d notes都幾詳盡 可以cover哂quiz既題目
真係對EE有興趣既人先好讀
唔好為個grade狗衝 你會後悔

I am not very good at Chinese,
yet Mr. Tsang wholehearted teaching inspired me to think a lot about the project
He gave us topics, and we could choose to do the given one or other topics we could think of
You can consult him for more than one time:)
He always shared funny jokes and stories to make the lesson interesting
Rmb to attend the first tutorial lesson

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body:
呢個sem 只係上堂take attendance同埋一份report
---------------------------------
上堂講既野差唔多完全唔關份report事, 唔識既上足堂都唔會識做, 識既一堂都唔上都會識做take attendance 話就話嚴謹左, 仲話會睇返attendance黎adjust你個grade, 就算你功課好好出席率唔高都唔會好grade, 但根本都係好多人幫手take

早前已經聽過呢一科較為輕鬆，又可以學到點樣整化妝品，所以就報左呢一科。
其實工作量唔算多，只係需要每個禮拜做QUIZ（約六個），4個實驗+ 即場交既Lab Reports，同埋Group Presentation (最後兩個禮拜present)利申：Major Chem

Hea都核爆，基本上做齊佢啲野就一定過
唔點名，基本上走晒都冇所謂，不過有兩日係做inclass assingment，走左你就：）
個final test值30%，今年一半MC，一半填充，啲字都幾長幾深要溫下先識
推介推介

course name: The Cantonese Language in Use: Language, Grammar and Culture
body:
如果你以為自己係母語係廣東話就可以輕鬆過關就真係大錯特錯啦＠＠
Workload:
一個presentation (25%)：諗個同廣東話有關既topic拍段片present
一份report (50%)：2000字，同文字展述返你個topic
Final test (25%)：考晒成個sem教既嘢分組係professor隨機分配的，所以唔好以為可以同friend一齊合作，如果你分到個freeride你就真係先死左一半，因為佢會直接影響你75%既分，情況之惡劣可想而知（＾＾），而且份份lecture notes都超過60頁，基本上冇強大既意志力係冇可能溫得晒，final test 都幾難下同埋pass paper作用不大，你唯一可以溫既可能係得粵拼或者係字詞結構呢啲冇咁抽象既野⋯
如果你對語文科冇乜興趣可能上堂會覺得好悶，最好就咪reg因為真係會死人，不過做人唔可以太勢利，加深下自己對母語既認識都係一件好事嚟既，我覺得⋯

呢個GE簡直大伏 本身似為有BIO CHEM底會OK (DSE bio lv5) 點知中晒伏
第一, lecturer D英文難明又講得快(佢好似德國人?) 自問英文冇返咁上下真係唔好reg 第二, 有exam, 難度可以話高, 考試係MC 加4條LQ 。由於大部份佢個course既ppt係多圖 少字, 上堂要drop note先夠材料溫到書 ,所以就算好勤力溫晒個ppt 考試都可以唔識。第三 group presentation(4人) 要求好高 guideline 又少。 大概內容係去field trip (濕地公園) 每組簡一種動物去研究習性, present你個研究內容大約係 要先諗個假設後利用係field trip既片作證明 個假設係岩定錯, 其實好似做份REPORT咁 但要以presentation形式做, 真係要有個好GPMATES先做得好 。
真心建議唔好REG , 除非覺得自己太得閒 鍾意早起身上9點堂 MAJOR科又唔洗溫書既去REG吧。

course name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship for Young Professionals
body: Fairly speaking, the grading of this ge course is better than my expectation ( because of the previous comments).To get a fair good grade of this course, I recommend you to do the following:

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body:
先講下呢個COURSE 既 COURSE WORK 先
3個每份都唔多於1000既assignments，每個10%
1個in class Final Exam (2hrs) 60%
仲有attendance 10% (不過好多人走堂)每一堂Dr. LIN 都會預先比2-3份reading你叫你睇左先上堂
唔睇都唔緊要，佢上堂就係講解返份READING
不過你預先睇左會上堂易明好多
Assignments 同 Final 都會容易應付D
因為assignment 係就某一篇reading 去幫佢寫個總結
基本上唔洗點樣諗，搵返D重點再Rephrase就OK
1000字難度唔算好高，佢大概比2個星期做

chinese course name: 全球信息技術 (IT) 案例研究
body:
Funny course, Andy is very nice. Heavy workload but good grade. Suitable for hardworking students. 努力嘅同學可以有好靚grade. 一定要答多啲問題加分，一定要上齊堂 唔上堂會扣2分 5分就一個grade喇！Weekly work:
- 10 mins Quiz every lesson, allowed to take one page notes. [15%]
- Weekly post on canvas --> share article [5%]
- Each lesson, 3 students with the highest "likes" of weekly articles on canvas, can share, add bonus 0.5 marks. [bonus]
- Weekly Projects update, each student has to write one A4 page of paragraph about your project. [5%]
- Brainstorm and present the brainstorm idea of your group. (The best group can add 1 bonus mark) [10%]

呢個tutor係幾好人，overall grade算係幾好，不過學到嘅英文真係唔多
上堂超悶，好似中學嘅單向式教學，基本上係照住啲powerpoint或者notes黎讀
每堂都會有1/3人瞓着，特别係坐後排嗰啲多數都瞓晒，不過佢唔會理
呢個course係計出席率，所以要點名，不過次次上堂都係自己簽，試過2次上堂唔記得簽名之後嗰堂簽翻都無事；另外Yuki係唔多理人有無遲到，遲好多去到都無理
成個course要交3份assignments，分别係infographic、argumentative essay、reflective essay
infographic係group project，topic自訂，呢個assignment有個識design嘅groupmate會着數啲。佢比較重視個design，例如啲字係咪attractive、title同contents字體比例、infographic用嘅graph/圖片能唔能夠清晰代表成set data etc.
argummtative essay同reflective essay都係individually做，喺份argumentative essay用多啲你探討嘅topic嘅行内術語佢就會覺得你寫得唔錯
係reg得過嘅tutor，不過學到嘅野唔多

course name: Probability in Action: From the Unfinished Game to the Modern World
body:
呢科on9科如果唔係cs compulsory 真係冇人會去讀
堂堂都聽唔明個prof 講緊乜野
lecture 同tutorial 又要計inclass,即係冇! 得! 走! 堂! 
而且又出得難, 見到成大半班除左mainland 次次都鳩做
佢有2個quiz, quiz 雖然話mc 同matching 但又好難,溫完同冇溫係冇分別
我真係睇唔透

course name: Probability in Action: From the Unfinished Game to the Modern World
body: 簡單又輕鬆, 好Grade之選

要買本幾百蚊既ebook先可以做到assignment每個禮拜都要做1個assignment
(mc, 可重做到答岩曬為此)

course name: The Cantonese Language in Use: Language, Grammar and Culture
body:
大伏！！！！！！！！上堂無聊教啲野又難 個老師講到好易咁 其實得佢自己明 下面有人話workload ok grade ok 吸引左勁多freeriders讀 唔好以為同fd一齊reg無事 佢隨機分組 實分到幾個freeride俾你
Assignment：得一個project 連present 佔75% 勁多freeriders report靜係俾寫2000字 完全唔夠寫 pre個sent 要又要人拍條片黎pre 增加大家既workload 又要突登翻黎拍又要慢慢剪
Exam: week14 翻去考 考晒咁多堂教啲野 個format 又同佢俾我地份pastpaper 唔同 堂堂啲ppt打底有60頁 有啲有成百幾頁 自問閒閒地背到一千幾百頁紙大包圍既可以reg既 不過背完都唔包你識

Wiz 好人又nice 12點堂俾人帶埋野入去食 教啲野實用又有趣 又有堂食野既workshop 每堂都過得幾開心 有啲堂同present 要着suit有啲煩 上堂最好多答問題 幫到你高分啲Quiz: 有一個midterm 無final所以上完頭半個sem唔jot notes hea hea地都得 後期可以空翻啲時間做project quiz唔難 不過要星期六翻去 
Assignment: 唔難做 不過最後都唔知幾分 佢要求中午12點交 唔少人中左伏
Project: workload 唔算細 好在有人carry 又係唔知幾分

課程：依科要係咁睇readings 唔睇上堂得個坐字亦唔會明 啲readings都幾難 無得走堂亦唔係hea科
功課：要寫食評 故事 同一篇critical essay 要好識咁形容食物 色香味 寫故仔 英文水平亦要有翻咁上下 英文唔識花巧整色整水嗰啲唔建議讀
Project: 佔30% 20% 係整網頁 介紹香港一個地方 幾睇同咩人一組 每人打啲 大家有用心唔會低分 10% 係present 個人俾分

本身有讀過類似既course，上堂都無咩用，自己睇notes仲好。
final quiz 只需要溫2個lecture既notes，唔洗背書，佢話會出額外既野，要自己上網睇我都無理。
project 視乎groupmate本身有無創意，但present果陣lawrence好似雲遊，好彩最終都有A。

course name: The Sounds of the World's Languages
body:
呢個course主要係教IPA Chart入面嘅符號嘅發音方式，而D lecture大致上可以分為4個部分：speech production, consonants, vowels同埋stress/intonation & tone.
初初上嘅時候有D淆底，因為D linguistics terms好technical, 好似上緊Bio咁，不過上多幾堂就會適應左。我每次上堂都會打醒十二分精神，因為有時候聽漏左少少野你就會好難catch up返，最好唔好走堂。
我覺得上呢個course最得意嘅地方係知道我地平時講野嗰D音係點樣發出來，會知道口腔入面嘅運動，例如你條脷、牙齒同喉嚨之間嘅互動。講下workload先：
1. Tutorial - 20%
Tutorial會喺2粒鐘嘅lecture接住落。Dr. Lee每堂都會派兩張Worksheet俾你，有一張佢會同你一齊做，另外一張就係自己做然後要交出去當計attendance。如果上堂有俾心機聽書嘅話張worksheet唔難做，想攞高分嘅話就要睇清楚題目小心D做。D worksheet通常都係叫你睇圖match返D consonants, 填IPA symbols, 畫線同填充。

course name: Celebrity and Scandals: Contemporary Issues in Hong Kong Popular Culture
body:
5 online assignment + project + 2 quiz
份online assignment 係post上fb個群組到 明明話briefly explain，個個作到水蛇春咁長。。。不過我無理到，照打番正常既篇幅。
然後project都算幾易，不過我覺得我個份做得唔係太好。 
Quiz 全mc + T/F，有溫書唔難，好多人早走
我Quiz 1 above mean 幾分，quiz 2唔知，其實普通溫下notes，個project正正常常就一定有 b range。
個professor都好nice 係啲英文差左啲。。

Tutor好好人，俾好多guideline去訂題目
可以consult好多次
其實呢科有付出就有收穫
無expect過有A range
自己本身讀緊cb 自問好俾心機上堂 每次即堂quiz都識得做 但可能proj做得差（組組present都有介紹chem嘅concept 例如介紹moisturizer裡面有咩chemical 係咩構造 用咩原理去保護皮膚等等 總之就好pro啦 但我哋組就冇咁深入 冇乜講過啲chem嘢）最後得B...sad 但真心輕鬆嘅
我唔信GE 指南啲人講揀咗Airlie中伏。佢真係唔鐘意教書。個grade真係算高，要A range嘅人唔好reg 呢個tutor呀。
吃力不討好，唔係俾人彈，就被迫要彈人嘅嘢，壓力好大，一場惡夢。
冇想像中咁好grade...

course name: Sustainable Development in China and its Global Impact
body:
之前take過teresa另一個course，覺得佢幾nice所以就take左呢個GE course試一試。
呢科既workload一d都唔多，兩份group project，一份individual assignment，再加每堂都有group discussion。
呢科有一半學生都係exchange student，因為有group discussion既關係，好快就會同佢地混熟左。
另外教既野主要係圍繞China既一d議題，環保，社會，經濟咩都有D咁。Teresa有好多insight同埋好多上網search唔到既資料會同學生分享，所以都幾值得take。

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body:
上堂帶個人入去坐就可以，tick下attendance，每堂會有ilearn同埋group / individual exercise，有做就有1分，都幾輕鬆！
有兩次project，interim交一次report，final交report同PPT，同埋有present
final果次基本上1/3 report內容都可以直抄interm report
exam雖然係close book，但佢最尾果堂會講tips，邊幾個week出幾多題，我主要溫左頭6，7個week
其實呢科exam佔30%，project重好多，比心機做好project啦！

當初諫E個GE course 係有人推介話靚grade + 輕鬆, 佢係2015-2016 sem b 讀拎a-
所以就reg黎讀
我為左拎靚grade,所有計分tasks都好認真做到最好,結果得B,知道個grade呆左一呆
點解同ge指南果d comment講發唔一樣, 問左幾個fd都係b/b-
上黎留言見到有今個sem讀的2位都係b-, 知就咩事了
今年應該改左評分準則
利申:理科人,bch1100(chem) A, 本來aim a- , at least 都以為有b+workload的確好少 成個sem總共12堂 :8堂lectures , 4堂labs
no exam , 100% coursework
40% lecture quiz (total 8 個) , 30% lab report ( total 4個) , 30% group presentation

course name: Sustainable Development in China and its Global Impact
body:
成科workload 好輕鬆，學期兩個pj 加individual 
上堂有group discussion 同少少group task 但整體workload 唔chur 
而且individual 既題目都係上堂有講過唔難做
Teresa 好nice 好free 比好大自由度學生自己揀題目
整體唔錯!

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
雖則叫video game course, 但係成個sem 一隻video game都唔會玩
每堂只會玩board game然後寫個簡單reviewassignment 1 係2人一組寫隻video game既 report+present
final project 就5~6人design 隻board game出黎

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
唔值得讀 堂堂都有野做
Final project 做完晒出黎唔收 所以你要係PPT 入面SHOW到你既努力
我個組用左400幾蚊整左隻GAME出黎 佢完全冇睇過 亦冇收
有TAKE ATTENDANCE 堂堂都有答問題
俾評語既時候話VERY GOOD 但最尾得B RANGE
評分準則模糊
PS: 冇讀CM OR 唔識DESIGN 唔好REG

不錯...好好人 日日都著到西裝骨骨咁
研究中國畫家

I always get As in all literature and ENglish writing classes. I worked hard during the course and I get C+.This tutor, Marco Yan, is extremely mean and harsh. It seems that he likes teaching in the beginning, but soon I found out that I was wrong, because he kept on critising his students' works. Although the course stresses 'creativity', it does not mean that you feel free to create your story.
Marco Yan teaches very badly, he doesnt seem to like teaching very much. He is not helpful at all. Just another GE instructor who teaches to make a living.
Overall 有八十幾分都係得B 好失望，想靚grade唔算易，d assignment 係偏容易但多野做而且唔可以走堂

功課：2份札記，睇完文章再寫有咩感受同體會，家中做。
1份自學練習，做下錯別字同認下簡繁字，有做就有分，家中做。
1次3-5分鐘堂上個人短講，題目選擇會提前比你，可以係屋企預先準備，題目多數關於時事議題或大學生活，唔算太難。
1次30分鐘堂上小組討論，形式似城市論壇，每人自擬一身份，根據身份取適當立場發言，題目選擇亦會提前給小組，小組內同學可以預先傾做邊題，商議發言次序同內容。
1次堂上說明文寫作，形式似綜合，比文章你，再整合內容，但唔洗加自己意見，大約寫500字。
1次堂上論說文寫作，最後一堂寫，題目關於時事議題，大約寫1500字。
功課大部分唔太難，可以係屋企準備。

文科人揀之前要諗清楚，班上基本上係讀science或者係有science底。
Workload 主要有 quiz, lab report 同 group project & presentation。
Quiz 大概有6-7個，每堂lecture完左之後會有10分鐘溫習ppt跟著quiz, ppt大概20張slides。雖然總括來說題目唔算好難，但每次會有1-2題係難少少，係lecture無直接講。所以文科人可能有d輸蝕，答唔出嚟。同埋最後兩個quiz既題目係來自每組既group project。
Lab report 要寫4次，係每次係lab做完實驗到即場寫，題目多數會前一兩日up左上canvas，可以提早預備。lab做既實驗好簡單，教你整下body lotion, lipstick, soap 同hand cream，都係將d唔同既油溝嚟溝去。lab report 題目大概有5題, 每次都會問state your observation in the experiment 同 compare the texture of raw materials and final product, 另外2-3題就因實驗唔同有唔同既問題。
Group project 自由分組，4-6人一組，大題目要係關於cosmetics and beauty, sub-topic 自定後要經dr wong approve。最後2堂present同每組出2題題目for quiz.
總括而言，workload唔算重，平時lecture 同lab 都會早放1小時，group project 唔算難做。Grade方面，冇讀過理科野既，難有保證。但如果話唔計較grade又想挽下實驗同學少少chem野既話，呢科都係一科幾輕鬆既科。

course name: Sustainable Development in China and its Global Impact
body: Workload 唔算大，sem中同尾有 present，再加一份 assignment。- Teresa 幾鼓勵同 exchange students 一組，Lecture 有討論時間，好 interactive

course name: The Sounds of the World's Languages
body:
Assignments: 40% (4 assignments, 10% each)
Tutorial: 20% (except the first and last lecture without tutorials)
Final exam: 40%Prof Lee is very nice and friendly. She answers students' questions patiently. Overall speaking, the course mainly focus on phonetics and using IPA chart to analyze the sounds of different languages. The course is very technical and not very difficult.

professor教書有時搞下笑 唔會話悶
in-class exercises&final 只要有上堂聽下都識做
project只要冇free rider都輕鬆輾過
只要你對criminology有興趣 一定靚grade利申：final 溫左一日

Workload is heavy, as you have to do a 5 minutes film.
It really depends on you and your groupmate familiarity to apps for film score and editing.Other than that, two quizzes re almost straight forward and not difficult, can even skip a lesson or two
Film paper is not a hard thing to do.
Sumie makes the lesson interesting, showing film clips, discussion etc.

呢科都算幾有趣，但文科人讀就要諗諗。
Workload都又唔算好重既，不過堂堂要Quiz（要即堂Close Book，即係佢教完就比十分鐘你溫，之後就Quiz，問題係全部short questions。）
咁我中學中三之後就無學過Science既野，第一堂上課Dr. Wong 就問有幾多個完全無學過Chem既，一睇加埋我得幾隻手舉起⋯⋯不過見個course幾有趣就無drop喇，唯有次次上堂前一日就上網預習，預早溫曬佢既Notes。(咁大個人都係第一次咁有心預習）
而另外係做Lab report，有得一早上網搵曬答案，Lab分組佢會同你分埋，所以無得同FD一組。
最後有個Presentation，Topic自己諗，諗好Send比Dr. Wong通過，四個人一組present 8－10分鐘，唔係好清楚佢想要咩因為無咩guideline。
講真Dr. Wong上堂教係教得幾好既，連我理科白癡預習埋加上佢教完都會明教緊咩野，不過派左grade就打左個突（Quiz除左一定有條超級難其他有溫都會識Lab report又有得上網搵答案，present正正常常），原本以為無B+都有個B喇，點知出黎得個B-，所以文科仔Reg之前一定要諗諗，因為我除左覺得係Quiz比理科人屈左機之外都諗唔到有咩原因拎呢個grade。
當然喇，如果你係一個想要個course上堂輕輕鬆鬆（次次都會早放一個鐘），又想有Lab玩下既話唔太理grade既文科人，呢個course就岩你喇。

course name: The Sounds of the World's Languages
body: 呢個Course適合對於各種語言發音有興趣嘅人，或者希望透過IPA有效掌握語言發音嘅人。上堂會聽到唔同世界語言發音嘅錄音，感受語音嘅多樣性。同時，為咗方便標記世界語言嘅發音，亦都會學哂全套IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet)，會接觸好多英文唔存在嘅符號。Prof 每堂都會準備好筆記俾同學，亦都樂意解答同學問題。

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body: Sem B開始有exam，就因為個exam累事。成個course都唔知讀咗咩，個assignment 完全同教嘅野無關，in class exercise 做到好高分，到exam喪背書都係炒咗。一個字，伏！

course name: Celebrity and Scandals: Contemporary Issues in Hong Kong Popular Culture
body:
完全同意樓下同學既留言，明明professor俾既sample都係得幾句，啲人就寫幾百字，寫埋一堆偏曬題既野。不過我唔係求高分，次次都係寫幾句就算。
成個課程係易既，接近一半堂無返，兩次quiz前照notes溫一日，成績都有over average。
present又係好易，5-6個人present十幾分鐘。
整體黎講，課程係有趣簡單既，啲concept就算唔明，都可以google下就會識，推薦。

这么课1字打头不是没有原因的，真的非常轻松。拿出两天时间就可以按要求完成全部功课。Tutor李铀所有的选题都是古代绘画艺术，每个组选一个朝代，每个组员再各自选一两位画家进行探究。说是探究，但实际上总结的成分较多。对学术界已经达成共识的观点没有必要强行critical thinking。李铀在绘画方面学识广博，强行标新立异的观点会遭到全场有理有据的反驳。
一天完成presentation绰绰有余，上午查找资料，下午梳理资料制作幻灯片，晚上讲幻灯片的内容梳理一下背背讲稿就可以了。
report是presentation的延续，主题与presentation一致。以报告形式呈现presentation的内容就可以，只需2000字，一个上午完成。再和group mate商议一番500字序言，也可以很快完成。online discussion只需500字，选好课题多找些reference也很简单。
SemA李铀一人教授8节tutorial，忙到哭，所以不喜欢反复consultation。在每节tutorial结束后简短地请教就可以，他是很乐意提出建议的。
李铀对细节的要求不高，没有明显错误就可以。尤其要注意图片的来源，他看一眼就知道配图是否正确。
李铀给分十分整齐。。。。嗯，整齐。全组七人，一个A，6个A-。整整齐齐。

今年新黎既TUTOR
比想像中輕鬆 上堂算HEA
自問英文差DSE都係拎3
拎到B+都好驚訝
但聽講成班都無A同C以下
保3之選

course name: Social Innovation and Entrepreneurial Venture Exploration (SIEVE)
body: This class is more like an exchange students club with only around 1/3 of students are local students. There is no textbook and no examination for this course. Assignments are given well ahead of time and thus, it is much easier to arrange travel plans in advance. There is minimum attendance requirement of this course. The only downside is the relatively heavy weighting of group project, which relies heavily on the quality of team members. We are unfortunately to have an free-rider that pull down the group grade substantially. Toni is a very friendly and understanding lecturer. Just don't try to fool her with attendance record. She has very good memory of names.

Readings and assignments would kill you. Please don't. You will regret. Honestly, I swear I have paid great effort in this course but this grade is sheerly disappointing. The judging criteria is way too vague. If you think you may not be creative enough to please the tutor, then never register this course, no matter how brilliant your English is.

As a business student, I think this course is not hard, especially to those who have taken Financial Management. The workload is not high, only a project, an investment report and an assignment about mortgage. The exam is not difficult, the math part is very straight-forward, and the MC mainly tests your memory. The teacher is very nice and always willing to help.

讀過Econ先好黎
讀過Econ而又讀得好先好黎PS DSE Econ Level 4

1. Inforgraphic
獨特性！美觀！不斷Consult！保你高分2. Argumentative Essay
獨特性！Counter argument！不斷Consult！保你高分

Sarah Sin loves her classes, enjoys teaching and encourages discussion. When students had very different ideas on a topic, she ensured everone could express ideas in a respectful environment. As University English is a course that offers students a foundation on writing academic essays, her attitude, receptiveness and critifcal approaches give students from diverse academic backgrounds a common ground to exchange knowledge and experiences.Her feedback to our essays is truly valuable. It is not just a grade, it is a useful hindsights about how we can do even better.

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body:
工作量唔多，最重要係冇quiz同exam
但係佢勁煩有類似weekly assignment ge 野，每堂tutor之前deadline
無錯呀，呢個ge係有tutor架，仲有同lecture唔同日子
個lecture成百幾人 Dr.John份人又好林 想專心既同學除左學霸位你唔洗諗除左weekly assignment 佢仲有份25%既assignment 係online ge mc or fill in the blanks，其實唔難，但某程度上會google到發火
Project ho easy, one grp 7 ppl sooooo輕鬆，但好似都係得10定15%小灰
份essay係final boss，final grade 是要靠佢的

course name: Celebrity and Scandals: Contemporary Issues in Hong Kong Popular Culture
body:
呢科比下面班人吹捧得太勁，今個Sem我可謂中伏。不過咁，我就希望造福下人群，所以就講下啦。Lecturer係好人，不過課程嘅實際操作多弊病課程內容:
5 Online Assignment(30%) +1 Presentation(20%) +2 MC Quiz(35%) +Attendance(15%)
呢個Sem有2堂係有Guest，一個悶一個有趣
簡評:
1. 佢syllabus有寫Attendance計分(15%)，不過執行上就好Hea，Lecturer亦只係試過一次公開Take Attendance(其實幾正)
2. 有Friend waiting list入黎，點知第一堂一早就已經分好哂Present嘅組同題目，搞到佢之後要自己喺個Lecture Hall R人比佢入組，易做嘅題目根本冇佢份，我勸大家冇咩事都唔好Waitlist呢個Course
3. 網上功課有5個Online Assignment,全部都係喺個Facebook群組度打野，每個Assignment預你一星期完成。條題目的確唔難，Tutor亦冇要求多字數，不過個個都做爛市，都打N咁多字，好似多字就有獎咁，根本冇人敢打好少字，我真係多_謝哂一班做爛市嘅好同學。估計每次Online Assignment平均最少都起碼700字UP(除咗有一次係打一條問題問Guest，不過仍然有不少做爛市之人出現，打條過百字嘅好問題問佢，真好野) ，搞到Workload大好多。你可以話「車，某啲GE要求啲字仲多啦，你呢啲算咩」，其實食一舊屎同食兩舊屎都係食屎。
4. 到Present，Present會喺堂上進行，每堂會有3組Present。但幾時進行由Lecturer決定，有時一上堂就Pre，有時Break完Pre，有時......另外，話就話最多只係得12分鐘做Presentation，不過好多時Lecturer都比你超時(大前題係嗰日課程唔趕)。咁呢個時侯一眾同學又發揮做爛市精神，一於Pre多啲，有幾組Pre到夠鐘落堂都未完。有心做爛市嘅人注意，如果真係超太多，Lecturer係會叫停你的。
仲有Present個分佔全科20%，有10%係同學比(Lecturer會叫同學將3組嘅表現依次排)，10%係Lecturer比。基本上你個Powerpoint係必必必必必需要有條好笑/吸引人嘅片(比班就瞓著嘅人笑下，大聲夾好笑嘅片先有人鍾意，就係咁低質，請向現實低頭)、有色彩繽紛嘅圖案同背景(引人注意)，除咗Lecturer之外係冇人會想睇你份Powerpoint嘅內容架，想人地比高分啲你，自己稔下點搞。
5. Quiz方面其實唔難，係全MC，有睇Lecture Notes/冇睇都識答的，不過佢陰D陰D就扣你分，而且題目唔算多，變相錯一題=扣幾%咁濟(不過Lecture好似之後意識到有呢個問題，不過都只係加咗幾條題目)。總之個TEST搞到個個都唔高分(高手例外)

I have economic background but still find this course not easy to handle. 
I did quite bad in lesson assignments (they are quite hard, dont know if it's because I didn't pick up the DSE syllabus for years) 
The course has new things other than DSE materialsI did revise hard for the 2 exams, especially the final exam (i almost lost half of the mark because of the long questions). Need to review hard, very very very hard and I mean it.

Devoted much efforts, time in the group project 
Quiz also had a hard time to revise (the day before) but i jot notes during lesson 
In overall, though this is a good grade GE you must contribute much efforts, otherwise the results will not be very good.
And the competition is keen for registration of this GEFor your reference: 
Quiz 1: 87/100 (mean 72-73) 
Quiz 2: 84/100 (mean 76, i know the highest is 100) 
Group project: 27/30 (my group as the highest one, mean is 22.5) 
Twitter assignment: 7 times 3/3, 1 time 2.9/3 
Attendance rate: 88/100 
Bonus mark: didn't answer any questions during the lesson, but filling in survey for 1 mark (basically all ppl got this)
Not that bad as expected. Have in class ex every lesson & samples for writing. A bit demanding in the Gp PJ though.
What a ridiculous grading scale. 84.5% = B.Having a high ranking on QS doesn't mean you have to have a pretentiously high grading standard, or maybe that's how you get into QS top 100? I don't know.

Hannah Brant teaches very well, offering clear instructions on what we should do. For many beginners in academic writings, she leads her student to write with highest accuracy. Though many students may not be very articulate in English and she knows no Cantonese, she is able to untangle the communication knots by asking meaningful questions, suggesting new ways of writing and talking about an issue. Very little stress and absolutely inspiring. Where can we find a better teacher?

course name: Reading Lives, Writing Selves: Autobiography and Culture
body: Sarah Sin enjoys teaching very much so we all have a very nice learning experience from her. She engages us into meaningful discussion, never dismissed our ideas simply because she thought about the same issue or literature work differently; she helped you develop your ideas, thought it through clearly and presented them in a convincing way. She truly knows her stuff, encourages critical thinking and creativity. At the end of the course she lets each of us present our own life story -- it was very touching because she made everyone felt it was ok to present the true feelings and true experiences in life. Sarah Sin makes us love learning more and thinking wide.

Marco Yan shows favouritism towards some students in particular. His teaching? Like he dare tell students that 'lamb' only means food, haha! He also says the angels in bible and goddesses in Greek Mythology are the same. Wow! Okay, take his class if you like. Most my classmates get C from him.The class can be extremely stressful. He encourages students to criticise each other negatively. C'mon your first language isn't English, you try to write a long story but you don't know how to write it well, you are told that you are strange you write badly you create confusion you are incapable, and then Marco Yan claps his hands, taps his feet, shows his excitement of seeing you being criticised. You won't be that miserable if you are his favourite though.

Everyone told me that this course is great, the instructors know their stuff, teach well, so much to learn from.But then when it's my turn to experience this wonderful course, the instructor becomes a very different person. My friends had Professor Cavendish-Jones or Miss Katrina Marshall, I have terrible Airlie Heung.
Mrs Bautista performs her role as an instructor well but she may not be very inspiring.She doesn't teach Travel Writing anymore though.

course name: Words and Images: Reading and Writing in the 21st Century
body: Alice truly loves teaching. This semester she offers relatively better grades than in previous semesters. It's a great loss that she is going to leave CityU.I forgot to work on one of my assignment and submitted it late. She only let me pass for that homework - fair enough.

Airlie Heung is a terrible teacher. I still love Shakespeare's literature very much but I feel regret for choosing her class. Poor spellings, inadequate knowledge about Shakespeare, she doesn't know about the sonnet in Romeo and Juliet which is so very basic... she says a line written in trochee is iamb. Gosh! I can't believe she is an instructor in uni. She imposed her ideas about Shakespeare's works on us, I disagree, she gave me a bad grade. But I always have very good grades in literature from other good professors. Can't believe it! Is it because she doesn't have a PhD?

想爛Grade, 緊識揀 Airlie Heung 啦。
唔鐘意教書，唔識教書，唔理解文學。講真，聽同學分享都仲好過聽佢教。佢教亞洲文學但係唔清楚亞洲國家嘅近代史，即係佢要教南韓文學但係南韓有無民主選擇呢啲咁基本佢都唔知，佢要教雨傘運動文學又唔知香港嘅選舉制度。
你以為佢竹昇啦，因為佢聲稱自己係Canadian Native, 個真相係佢根本喺香港讀一間本地中學，考過會考Alevel，仲係讀BU嘅。咁點解一個喺香港生活咁多年嘅人會唔清楚香港選舉制度呢？呢個只係佢缺乏一般常識嘅例子。
唔識串生字，即係基本文學修辭技巧啲字都唔識串，真係誇張到咁囉
你話呢個instructor係咪有能力教大學喇？
講真，教一班半班啲學生成績差，可能真係學生渣囉，但係如果佢教咩班都係成績差，咁係代表咩呀？唔係嚴囉，係佢無料到，提升唔到學生能力淨係識 「彈」。
算啦，成本控制請個平嘅人係好慳嘅。
總之爛grade 首選係 Airlie。我見好多同學嘅quiz, 有零分，通常三分 （十分滿分）。

If you love literature, you will love the class. Birgit Linder is very knowledgeable, she has translated many Chinese literature into English -- you will learn more than you expect.It is to CityU's great loss that she is going to leave us for another university.

This course is horrible and the marker was extremely harsh. The quiz's mean was C-. The majority of the class got a really bad grade and you might consider this course will be one of the worst course at cityu.

A good professor or lecturer can be reasonably strict, but Airlie Heung is unreasonably restrictive. No creativity, no critical thinking, no sophistication. She asks so much from her students but does not seem to care so much about how she teaches and what she delivers.I feel very sorry for my classmates who score even lower than me -- it's not their problems, it's Airlie Heung, who looks down on her own students.

Airlie Heung does not like teaching at all, not very articulate in English. I get an A- only because I write in the style that she likes. Some teachers help you write better by enhancing your style and expressing your ideas in a more sophisticated way. Airlie Heung? Her face tells you that she is not interested in your ideas, she simply hates teaching.

Airlie Maria Heung does not respect student's ideas on literature. Airlie Heung does not like teaching, Airlie does not read your work with any patience. Airlie Heung is not as encouraging as other professors. I have had a very bad learning experience with Airlie Heung. I feel regret for choosing her class.Airlie thinks the grade is everything. When students tell her that she may improve the quality of her feedback or teaching she thinks that it is only because of the grades. Her attitude is disappointing

Airlie Heung does not like teaching.
Airlie Heung has poor knowledge on writing and literature but she teaches about Shakespeare and literature. She replaces the renowned good teacher Colin and Katrina. 
Airlie Heung discourages creativity and critical thinking. She does not discuss with students, she simply gives you a bad grade if she disagrees.
Airlie Heung offers the useless comments because she does not have a solid foundation.
Airlie Heung only offers bad grades.Airlie Heung studied at a secondary school in Tai Po and BU in Hong Kong. She got her master degree from Waterloo U in Canada. Airlie's teaching is old-fashioned, one-way with little interaction. Her conservative attitude towards critical thinking causes problems in classrooms.

chinese course name: 說服力－理論及日常實踐
body:
This course mainly have 4 things to do:
1. In-class assignment/discussion (20%)
For most of the lessons, there are a worksheet for you and your groupmates to complete. The tutor also use it as a tool to take attendance. The tutor also required everyone to have at least 70% attendance (i.e. do not skip more than 3 - 4 lessons)2. Individual Paper (20%)
Basically ask you to find a speech or article that are trying to persuade others. then, making use of the theory and concept taught in lectures and write up an essay, taking about how good that article/speech is. Very easy though.

Katrina 雖然缺乏教學經驗，亦都無之前嘅教授Colin都得咁好
但係佢畢竟都係有心人，無奈係個班太大，令佢唔可以發揮到最好，有時上堂會有少少無聊但係只要學生願意嘗試，佢就會好有心機教，就算妳想法唔一樣，佢都會好接受妳嘅見解。

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
open book quiz真係簡單到無朋友，簡直就係考驗智商同視力
ted個人幾好，但上堂係幾hea，讀完個ppt就走得
又唔take attendance
要拍條講電腦安全嘅片，而片嘅內容幾乎組組都相差無幾重複又重複
要突圍可能就係要夠on 9，引到ted笑

Pieta係個種會偏心overseas既tutor，對local既要求比較嚴同惡，同一樣野對兩邊既態度都唔同。上堂唔可以玩電話，唔可以走堂遲到早退，有功課，會逐個逐個捉嚟答問題。總之係Pieta到上堂，佢個人nice唔nice係根據佢當日既心情，躁起嚟可以相當得人驚，你group disscusion耐左佢會因為遲收工而唔耐煩黑面。而且比分相當嚴謹，我infographic同essay 1st draft都係得C-D range，用左好多心機先係last essay拉翻個course既分上B-
總之係一個中小學式教育既tutor
利申DSE英文5PS.呢到同shakespeare個邊都見唔少佢既打手，不如試下要登入證明reg左佢個class先寫到review啦⋯⋯

Angus平時會遲到早走，有時請假，一個學期得9堂
不過我有ICT底同少少program底，完全無乜點出席過，一個sem翻左2堂
Mid-term好難，要求你做既野你會睇得明，但條題目寫咩真係睇唔明lol唔記得mid-term計幾多%總之好少好少
成個GE比重最大係project
Project一定要有好既groupmates同大神carry，Angus作為deadliner的恩物，所有野你遲交少少解釋返都唔緊要唔會扣分
一科超輕鬆同靚grade既GE

Airlie Heung does not like teaching. It is not surprising at all that she is unable to teach well. Her English, attitude and knowledge are not good enough to enhance your level.Never choose Airlie Heung if you would like to have a positive learning experience.

今年第一次個course轉左，用英文教，同埋冇左tutorial，3cred全部一個lecture上曬。整體黎講幾好玩，上堂會有真實樂器演奏，又有片睇，又會揾lecture入面識彈中樂嘅同學表演，如果對中樂有興趣一定唔會悶，係因為呢個sem 9點堂，所以我有d眼訓。
平時上堂會有classwork,一定要番足呀。
1 final quiz: 有聆聽題呀，同埋睇樂器圖配對，唔難，全mc
1group project:題目任定，關中樂事就得，只要你有創意，present唔悶，高分在望(其他group mates都係a range)　
呢個真係一個好輕鬆嘅GE! reg得過
In the very first class, Airlie shows that she does not understand the basic concept of Said's orientalism.第一堂，Airlie就已經表現出佢唔識一個好基本嘅概念: 「東方主義」。

Airlie is a bad teacher. She has poor background knowledge that she often seems to forget about the content of the lectures. For this reason, she is incapable of leading any meaningful discussion. She teaches very poor writing skills -- she forces everyone to write in a very unsophisticated style. Unlike most other professors and instructors in university, she discourages students from having critical thinking and independent thoughts. As long as your interpretation or understanding about an issue is different, for her, it is wrong. She also commits quite many spelling errors and grammatical mistakes in writing.She does not write very well. But in this course of University English, you are supposed to learn how to write essays well. She will harm your academic growth.

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body:
內容有趣，不是教徒也適合讀。其中一兩堂會教簡單希臘文同希伯來文Dr. Lee 教得非常明白，而且power pt好清晰。如果係christian讀都會覺得好有幫助，D野唔會係同教會既野重複，tutorial好有啓發性！有online assignment but very easy!
Gp prj present only for 10 mins and 5ppl a gp. 
term paper is little bit difficult but able to search many information on google!

course name: Computer-Aided Visual Design & Electronic Arts - Programming with Image, Audio, Animation & Interaction
body:
实事求是地说，要不是我的group mate给力，我根本拿不到A range。
我没有programming背景， 当初选这个课原因是想接触一点coding的东西，对于一个从零开始的学习者来说，这个课真的真的有够重workload，individual assignment还应付得过来，test也洒洒水啦，但是group project真真需要硬实力。
大家若是冇厉害的朋友一起上这个课，就要慎重啦！
有中學ECON底就B Range無得走,不過個final並唔簡單。人院學生表示温完書都未必上到去。

Work Load:Quizz 1 (60 Multiple choice questions, 40%)
Quizz 2 (15 Multiple choice questions and one essay question, 30%)
Presentaion, Poster and Booklet (30%)

好好人，非常gentleman，成日鼓勵學生參與多d課堂。
教識我好多野

chinese course name: 說服力－理論及日常實踐
body: 我吾知係我冇bussiness嘅低定因為咩 上堂淨係覺得好悶 仲要係九點堂真係好難吾訓 自問吾係freeride又有gpmate carry 應該係個quiz出事

EAP 1
工作:
只有一份argumentative essay(1000字),題目會比埋你,十分容易handle。除左Week 13交final draft,大約Week 9會叫你交draft, Week 10比feedback你。感受:
Miss Au係典型中學老師,上堂好似返左中學咁。有問題唔識可以隨便問,佢會好樂意答你。上堂會教下grammar and 點寫term paper,又會成日早放。不過,全部EAP course都會take attendance,唔夠80%即fail,所以唔好走堂!

course name: Real Estate Development: Principles and Process
teacher: Xiaowei Luo, Ivan Fung, Mei Yung Leung
body:
老師:
Xiaowei Luo 負責lesson1-3 and flied trip,主要講real estate finance
Mei Yung Leung 負責lesson 4-6,主要講feasibility study
Ivan Fung負責lesson 7-13, 主要講construction issue工作:
Individual assignment 1: Week 4-6,叫你分析China real estate property market(1000字)
Individual assignment 2: Week 8-10,叫你描述下construction quality measurement(1000字)
Individual report: Week5-12,叫你分析Hong Kong residential housing problem(1000字)
In class Test 1: Week 7,考lesson 1-6 d野,有MC and fill in the blank.
In class Test 2: Week 12,考lesson 7-12 d野,只有MC
Group Project report: Week 6-13,分組5-6人,自己做自己果part(1000字)

老師: 
Amy係主角,全部PowerPoint都係佢講嘅Mr. Poon主要負責課外活動(field trip),包括Solar Lab, Star Lab and去可觀天文教育中心

今個sem聽聞比以前workload低咗好多，但當然比重相對上升唔少。Infographic x1
Essay x1 (~1500words)
Self-assessment x1 (800words)

要做啲咩係下面講晒
成個SEM得兩份功課
基本上CRITERIA SYSTEM要上佢堂先會明佢想要啲咩
POSTER最後出到黎好分得出邊啲有上堂邊啲無
就算有ARCHI學生都唔代表GP會高分, 因為佢可能唔知咩叫CRITERIA SYSTEM
排版用返ARCHI方法排就死硬

course name: Brain Machine Interface: Technology, Culture, and Society
body:
基本上成個course好多嘢要做，好似讀左2個ge course咁。
工作量：
news report (1 page)
lab report (3 page)
quiz x 2
video presentation (要作一個同brain machine有關嘅產品拍片介紹)
切勿走堂因為attendance 值10%
本人因為quiz全部冇溫所以得B
好多專業用語，你預5會明hea過就算
真係好多嘢做!! reg 前請自行三思或尋求專業人士意見!!

老師好人，熱心解答問題
分組和理科人一組，但佢哋反而對文學仲深認識 LOL
題目研究宋代文學思想，本身真係無文學底，但都能應付，大路分析下就得
成績滿意 :)

One group project and an open book examination.
The project requires the completion of a mobile application, a report is required. The workload is quite heavy because you need to start from scratch.
The examination is easy, basically just copying things from notes. It is open book exam so as long as you print your notes its fine.
Got in class exercises and that is difficult. You gain bonus points from that every week but the tasks are usually much difficult than the lesson content.
Good for you to acquire new skills and train your thinking, but if you do not want to pay effort then do not take this course.

Sumie係一個又靚女又好人既tutor
雖然要係禮拜六上堂，但好體諒我地
我地有時會遲到都唔會點罰
仲要係Sem B尾既時候都會改grade
將我由B-升到上A-
如果大家想有突如其來既驚喜
就一定要reg Sumie

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body: 這科勁多交流生，LOCAL學生PRESENT有D蝕底，建議找英文比較好的GROUPMATE。WORKLOAD不算重，但不能走堂，因為每堂有CLASSWORK，計ATTENDANCE用。課程不是很深奧，但要背好多TERMINOLOGIES，TONI是不錯的老師，課堂有趣，但考試需要溫TEXTBOOK，考試不難但很長，CONCEPT 不熟會做不完。

I am not a BBA major and thus, I found this course quite challenging, especially there are a number of management theories involved. My team members claimed a majority of the theories are taught in their year 1 management study and thus, this course is easy in their eyes. (Two of my BBA groupmates received A) For an ethics course, it is a nice surprise because the classes are quite interesting. Toni is a very responsible and knowledgeable lecturer. Early revision is a must if you are not a BBA major. She has very good memory and thus, don't try to fool her around with the attendance, or sign for others. You will receive an official warning. (also apply to illegal copy of textbook). Toni is a very kind and understanding lecturer unless you try to break any rule foolishly.

tiffany係少數我會上足堂既老師....睇得出tiffany係well-prepared先黎教學生,俾分/點樣先俾分講得好清晰,有哂sample參考,跟足要求就可以,唔似ue死左都唔知咩事.但呢科都好睇gpmate,因為最後個project同present佔幾重,luckily part到唔錯既gropumate所以個grade都唔錯. Overall tiffany係相當reg得過,只要自己下啲功夫/gpmate唔太伏,好grade唔難, in tiffany we trust!

除非你對宗教好大興趣
如果唔係千奇咪揀
上齊堂交足assignment都係B-
極度慎重考慮
揀左都只好上屈sir堂 其他全部仲爛grade

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong
chinese course name: 建築業是建構現今香港的其一基石
body:
一份20條mc quiz同2000 words up essayQuiz唔好話太容易
有部分你上左堂先知answer
當然大部分係被你拎分
Mable's instructions are clear and easy to be followed and she is a nice teacher.

Cannot use mobile phone or laptop.
His lessons are funny and casual.
But the content of EAP is boring.
冇exam,但每個星期都要去睇gallery然後寫blog,要花比較多時間,最後要寫1000字final paper + present

Tutor好好人,你可以早D做完D assignment叫佢比意見你,只要你跟佢suggestion咁改就一定拎高分
上堂氣氛唔會太緊張,個tutor有時仲會同我地吹水
大家一定要reg佢~

只有classwork 
上堂大部分有解 有聽下 其實唔難做
上堂真係學到好多野 toni 非常有心教 落堂可搵佢解番一d唔識ge野
Break的時間toni也會搵你傾計 非常親切 
只有groups project 同exam
Groups project只要有留心聽一聽 用番上堂學ge野加解釋番小小就得 太仔細 反而有負效果 ！
最緊要搵好gpmate
Exam不難 本人只是溫一溫每堂抄的note 便能答到約7成的題目
最衰我懶 唔係a+並唔難
！GE想拎a+必選 ！
付出與收穫乘正比
我愛Toni！！

course name: Computer-Aided Visual Design & Electronic Arts - Programming with Image, Audio, Animation & Interaction
body:
以GE黎講WorkLoad係重
冇學過prog.既 入去讀 會輕鬆B/B+movie poster 打左3000行code 用左2晚 輕鬆A+ (呢個唔識prog.冇問題)

Workload:
Small technique practice
2 online open book test
Film music critic, presentation
Final music projectLectures were boring and teachers' English were a bit unclear. However, the course tasks were fun. Tests were not that hard but need efforts to find online as some are mentioned during lectures only. The critic is like a 1000word and the presentation count for only 5%. Final project requires making background music and SFX using sources were given and websites. I have little to no music background and do not compose any music for the final project, but still got a good grade. So, Robert does not emphasize on composing your own music and more on the creativity of the arrangement of music.

Workload:
Group presentation
2000 word essay
1000 word reflectionSome lessons were a bit boring. Tutor values participation and eager to help you on your assignment. But the guidance on the essay is a bit vague. Last, he takes attendance every lesson.

Homework:
Infographic
Short essay
Reflection essay
Cindy was a bit annoying. She liked to check every part of our drafts and presentation. Also, she likes to talk a lot about basic writing skills and her personal experience. However, she was eager to give comments about your writing and help you to get a good grade. I got a B+ simply because I was late for handing my last assignment

Don't trust the good comment about this tutor. My classmates and me got similar marks for tasks but resulted in very low grade instead.
Don't trust her!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ):

She always smiles and well-prepared for the lesson. Passionate in teaching and very nice. At first, I enjoyed her lessons. She always accomplishes our writings as well.However, we were very shocked after the grade has released. We paid lots of effort and surely the grade should not be like this. Classmates from other classes, generally, higher grade than us.

上堂照ppt讀 完全悶 0 interaction 
Assignment淨係知infographic個分 係above mean (仲要問先知幾分 完全冇諗過同我地講)
後面嘅argumentative essay 同 reflective essay 係冇俾分我地知 
完全冇透明度
自問都俾心機做 真係死左都唔知咩事
Consult得好hea 每人得嗰幾分鐘 想問多d都黑面
伏到喊 
真心建議 想靚grade嘅人唔好reg佢
比分極嚴格，個mean可以同其他班差3-4分（20分滿分)，連first language係英文既外地生功課都係岩岩及格，結果我自己過班mean就出c+。上堂極之無聊，對ppt照讀，但係佢好like nds，建議唔係nds或想hea既就唔好reg佢，個人認為係大伏killer一個。

HO is a very nice tutor who will answer your questions seriously. However,this course is really hard for students,especially not from BBA program.
In-class quizes,presentations and the final exam are all with great difficulty.(complex calculations and wide knowledge field)All in all, a useful and good course but be careful to reg.
我本身英文弱，但只要早d做好d assignment，交個draft比佢，佢就會幫你改。同埋佢會比好多sample我地參考，做個陣就輕鬆d
一個非常好既老師，講野有意思，但又受人尊敬，可以學到好多野。我台灣人，來香港讀書前亦在內地讀過一段時間書。我一直覺得對兩岸三地理解好透徹，但上完伍老師堂後，先知道自己知道的只是冰山一角。好老師！

Maggie係1個有心教既老師, 但要求你上堂要多參與, 例如多啲答問題同埋幫佢做下啲濕星野.
基本上上堂都會講晒Asgn既所有requirement, 都幾清晰, 其實照住黎做個分就唔會差. Asgn既分數range好細, 好似全部人都係13-17分左右.
Asgn2係group discussion, 佢係random分組俾我地, 所以如果遇到唔好既組mate(對手)就預左分會低.
中秋節有請我地食月餅同最尾果堂請我地食蛋糕.
hard to get high grade because people who take this course are usually good at maths.

She is very strict with grades. VERY. 
She seldom available for consulting. 
She gets annoyed when students asked her how she graded their assignment. 
I don't think she likes teaching AT ALL.
Don't register her if you want to get a good grade.

我頭4堂無上
(因為一開頭見同FD一樣時段,以為同班, 所以就一齊上
去錯左去同一個時段第二個SESSION嘅UE, 柒到爆)
不過之後到我知道自己一直去錯SESSION我先EMAIL番佢, 同佢解釋
之後就去番呢班
一黎到呢班UE D人都好熟, 好有中學FEEL LOL 可能教授係比較中意輕鬆同互動嘅人
所以呢班UE開埋WHATSAPP GROUP
不過上佢堂好多時候都係玩LOL 但其實我自己唔太中意玩
--功課方面--
essay我真心deadline前寫, 無咩比心機
佢好似俾我地consult左一次, 不過佢consult左=無consult
無咩俾意見(佢係我地見佢之前無睇過我篇ESSAY)
我題目係寫中學應唔應該強制學生參與同宗教信仰有關嘅活動
內容一般 GRAMMAR無咩點執過LOL
好好奇點解有B+, 聽人講佢係KILLER我覺得功課上佢未必幫到你拎好GRADE
不過如果想上堂好玩佢都幾好
同埋有時佢講野都幾啟發性
最尾果堂佢直頭唔教野, 開P , 不過當日中學SPEECH DAY無去到

其實我覺得教嘅野係幾難
好多唔同嘅理論, 理論名都係拉丁文
以前有玩開辯論, 所以覺得都OK, 但係整體黎講覺得教嘅野都難
CREATIVE THINKING佔好少, 果2堂都訓左
教授係用心教, 不過上堂就多數只係講野, 我地聽, 無圖/片睇, 會悶
同埋教授講英文一般, 唔太流暢, 會聽得小小辛苦
不過無咩野做
得一個FINAL QUIZ, 一份PRESENT, 一個ASSIGNMENT
assignment係將段文字嘅邏輯用符號表達
final quiz open book, 我有溫書所以幾得心應手
project有好projectmate, 大家都努力做, 唔洗REPORT 所以都易

文科人 c
真係難,唉 GG

course name: Experiencing our Built Environment: Appreciation of Contemporary Architecture
chinese course name: 體驗環境：賞析當代建築
body: This course is about studying STARchitects' work which taught by the architecture major leader. The course only requires a case study of a designated architect, a mid-term quiz and a group project on evaluating several architects to be awarded the "Pritzker Laureates Award". The whole course is open-ended even the quiz, so don't worry if you have no architectural experience. The tutor will assign groups for all students which include architecture students to be fair. Interesting course and the grades are good.

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body: iLearn Online Questions and quizzes are pretty easy. The tutor is nice and seems to give good grading on assignments. The workload is not heavy, only an individual report (include a short video) & a group project. The final grade is a bit disappointing as my quizzes and individual assignment scores are above average. Guess our Phase 2 group project wasn't done well... But overall the course is fine, light workload & fair grades. Recommended if you are not looking for an enlighting GE course but fair result.

Nice teacher, not much in class assignments, mainly group discussion. I don't have a perfect attendance, I skipped 2 lessons, I guess that's why my grade is low.
But he is not a generous marker, everyone got a low score for the infographics and essays.In general, he is a nice teacher but a harsh marker.

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body: Written assignment is difficult. But turn out grade is quite good.John is nice!

Lecture做in-class點名 遲過15分鐘就唔派
Tutorial每堂一組present take attendence就ok
Tutor 全程有一半時間以上係瞓緊覺 present果陣都係照住讀 好hea
雖然係group work 但其實好大部分都係計個人嘅分
就算遇到freerider都唔會死得好慘
無文學底 都係喺個database搵左幾篇summarize下就打出黎就ok

唔好睇呢科好grade唔計attendance就reg
冇用過英文讀bio reg 前請三思!!!
佢好多technical terms,查字典有排你查
見到好多冇讀過bio even用中文讀過嘅爛grade
除非你平時睇開國家地理頻道啲紀錄片,又唔怕背好多奇奇怪怪嘅動物野
想去下濕地公園睇成日動物,得閒走下堂,咁呢個course就啱你啦
Quiz (MC) 20%
Individual species report 15%
Field trip report (cancelled in this semester)
Field trip presentation 25%
Exam (MC+LQ) 40%
***個prof好憎人ppt唔加ref link落圖片附近,記住present前check清楚
***Exam係一定一定一定會抄past paper少少,尤其MC,某啲LQ past paper做過就輕鬆
利申做過哂past paper 由predicted grade B+變 A
Generally well-prepared tutor. Clear instruction and guidance.Assignment 1: Complaint Adjustment Email 16/20; Read the examples and try to use the phrases.

course name: Accelerating Professional Growth on the Web
body:
頭幾堂一個人教之後另一個 同上幾年一樣 堂堂都要上，盡量要答問題
頭幾堂好好玩，係咁做心理測驗個啲引起左我興趣 做既class assignment 唔好錯grammar,好易做！
之後既堂都幾悶 但有電腦玩，in class exercise 好易，叫人tick名再叫人教下，係屋企都做到。
Self exploration 搵份工，對份工都要有詳細既research, 最緊要include哂上堂得返黎既資料，輕鬆A-左
之後gp pj搵份工/Industry介紹, 好易做, 搵啲大路啲既工多啲資料講會好啲, guest lecture要去聽幾有趣同埋要寫少少感想
感覺第2個tutor好肯幫人，但我無乜點問野有啲後悔 帶到野走，有CV and linkin resume

1 individual
1 group pjIndividual 揀一類Chinese architecture 分析beauty criteria, 4頁字 single spacing font12. 都算麻煩因爲要打好多字，但內容都算有野寫既，要用criteria system
Group揀一棟現代建築，用criteria system 分析beauty 9-11個人一組，workload輕。講你個criteria點得出黎 要講survey結果，10分鐘present再整poster，分組好好佢逼你一定要有一個archi Student, cm, engine呢啲分得好平均。每人做到既野都唔同既
基本好多堂都走左 佢show sample個堂要上唔比人影相，最後present兩堂都要上，要比分人地
Li shan有心教學比分都唔hea 但上堂悶英文難聽，有興趣都可以揀 分析下中國唔同建築結構等等

個人認為工作量算少，要做的事我基本是前一兩日或當日才做，分數一般，因為英文不算好（dse4，writing 4)。至於tutor，他很nice，但好像什麼都沒有教過，對於功課，他也沒什麼guidelines和意見，所以想topic的時候有點迷惘。還有，想topic時，真的要想好（先認真找好sources才定下topic），不要半途轉。
無論如何，還是建議reg他。我看到grade的時候還是有點驚喜。
還有關於participation，因為我口語不好，從來都不會主動回答問題，只是他點名問我，我才說兩句。上課有時會有in－class writing，有些我還沒寫好就交上去(因為趕著去吃飯，哈哈），或者hea寫，不過看來這些對我的grade影響不大。
細分：
1，infographic (忘了，只是記得是在b－的range裡）
2，First Revision Soft Copy（15／20）
3，Final Draft（18.75/25）
4，Reflective Report（16.5/20）
感覺自己的essay寫得不好，不過當時我花了時間作出大修改，顯得有點誠意，估計因為這點，我在Revision的分數不錯，而他也提到這點。
必reg 工作量少又靚grade 唔知點解就a+左

course name: Words and Images: Reading and Writing in the 21st Century
body: Alice幾好人，但比分手緊，一個SEM要做三份漫畫分析加gp project（設計網頁）加一份critical essay，都幾多野做，就算你平時功課幾高分，都有利8/10咁，最後都係得B，可能大部分都係印象分掛。

上齊堂30%做好sample paper 去考quiz 30%
(講真D數唔算好易,勝在有sample,溫晒都有8,9成)

先说workload
32%group work（要做presentation但不计分 final report记27%，comment记5%）
10%BI-WEEKLY JOURNAL （其实就是五份200字小作文）
8%attendance(任选四周找一个小伙伴互签即可)
50% final课很好，老师很好，很有趣。
但是切记：一定要看书！！！不要只温ppt！！！（注意了我这个是低分低分低分，这个课讲真给分很好，当然你final要考得好）前面那些分数是大家都能得到的，所以最后grade多少关键就是看final了。

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: sem b今年轉close book , fk 中伏

課程編碼：CHIN1001-T09
CRN編碼：14764
地點：AC1 Y5-109
時間：16:00-18:50（約3小時）
課程長達13個禮拜，計出席率，唔夠8成就直接唔合格，最多可以走2個Section計分Assigment有：
20% Week 2 and Week 13 Need Analysis and Self-Assessment Commentary （約750字）
25% Week 5 Infographic
20% Week 8 Argumentative Essay Draft（約600字）
25% Week 12 Final Argumentative Essay（約1000字）
10% In-class Participation

The course is relatively easy to get a grade, like an A or A-. The quiz is also relatively not hard compare with other GE. My quiz score are 53/60 (quiz 1) and 26.67/30 (quiz2) for reference. If you want to have a GE with light workload and secure an A range grade, this course might be a good choice.

成個UE workload就得3份功課
Infographic (Group -three people)
Argumentative Essay+ peer review (pair)
Reflective essay
Cindy 好好人，有問題問email 佢，佢都會好詳細答。但上堂預左會悶，同埋佢係individual consultation 比嘅 comments 唔好跟到十足十，佢D suggestions 用字好多都係好簡單，未必一定係最好嘅option，聽完自己再諗下跟唔跟。

course name: Mobile Social Networks: Practices, Challenges, and Beyond
chinese course name: 移動社交網路：實踐，挑戰，及未來
body:
有趣，有用。
考試高分，但5知點解present 完好個grade 變到得B。

course name: Probability in Action: From the Unfinished Game to the Modern World
body:
幾有趣既科，原先怕數底差會肥。
但數式差既我都對某D topic 幾有興趣，Antoni 教得算係生動。
如果想搞Machine Learning 又對D 數想有intro ，哩科可以比到哩類數既簡介和歷史。

Assignment
40% learning plan (deadline: week 7) (~2500 words)
吹水為主, 好似做自我介紹咁, 講下career goals同埋exchange想去邊,
有一part 要用頭幾堂嘅theories做self-commentary, 每個星期寫300-400字,
好快寫曬. Mary會捉grammar & wordings, deadline 前一個星期consult一下,
改完再交. 前期比較輕鬆, learning plan 系拉高grade嘅好機會.30% group presentation (deadline: week 12)
響佢嘅list入面揀一個國家, 社經政民環 全部research一下, 講下自己去到會做
啲咩, 吹下水咁. week 11 有consultation week, Mary會好嚴, 問完suggestion 
之後番去大執. Present嗰時Mary好注重present skills, eye contact, 背稿...
超時兩分鐘會扣分, 30mins其實好chur

Celina is a good tutor.This course is not a difficult course for moviegoers but quite a challenge for university beginners. As long as you revise and pay effort onto the assignments this course will pay you back and you can learn a lot about movies.

Let me start off by saying that my final grade is not reflective/conclusive of how easy it is to attain A range in this course. I'm a final year student so I applied this course just to fulfill my credit units, I had way too much workload for my core courses (meaning that I didn't really care about this course, I just revised last minute and did my part in the group works). With these being clarified, I'll tell you more about the course below.1. One group presentation, one group report (2000ish words group essay), one examination (closed book; MCs + Qs). Workload is light even in the eyes of a deadline fighter.
Dave好肯覆Email 同埋你問野都好肯答 上堂頗hea

teacher: Dr. John lin, Dr. Alan Fong, Dr. Sun, Dr. Norman, Dr. TT Chow
body:
整體黎講workload唔算重，但每堂都有quiz唔可以走，佢有8次quiz,跟住計最高分個6次，另外仲有一份site visit report, 一份report+presentation. D阿sir講書就悶悶地嫁啦,不過D野自己睇應該都會明，唔會話太深。
利申讀building

今年呢個course轉咗導師，但第一堂見佢介紹course work嘅時候覺得workload唔太大，只係得幾份assignment，包括兩份400-500字嘅reflective writing、一份1500字嘅individual writing同一個video presentation。（因為佢聲稱上年有5份400-500字嘅reflective writing，所以聽落依家得兩份reflective writing就唔算好多咁。。。）
佢雖然上堂無特登剔attendance，但佢每一堂嘅最後一個鐘會做discussion，然後要交番張張寫好答案嘅紙俾佢，之後要寫埋自己嘅SID落去，言下之意剔attendance嘅位就喺呢到。但其實佢啲題目唔太難答，所以好容易拎到A range嘅分數，而我大多數都拎A。
可能我份video presentation同individual writing B同B+咗，所以即使嗰兩份reflective writing A-咗最後都係得個B+。

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
課程的內容不難，workload都適中。是不想太辛苦的同學可以考慮的一個GE。
總共會有四份assignments，一個exam。
assignments其中一份是group presentation，其餘三份都是individual written reports。而每份都要讀一編reading，reading不會很難，回應professor的問題即可。不過group presentation是不可以free grouping的。
Exam方面，有上堂考試前溫書的話一定不會難。而且一定要上revision week那堂因為professor會派tips。
然後要注意的就係attendance方面，因為professor在take attendance方面比較注重，所以不建議走堂。一個不難的GE full attendance算是要求不高。
所以如果沒有想讀的GE, 這是個拉GPA不錯的選擇。只是最後攞左B, 不知是否因走了一堂有關。

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
真心幾好既一個課堂
唔會有好深難理解既專業知識，感覺輕鬆，對Game industry有興趣既人會上得好輕鬆上堂即使唔聽都無咩所謂，做D assignment都幾簡單hea hea 地
主要系Game Review（兩人project） + Game Design（6人左右一組）
平時有玩開遊戲，寫report唔會覺得好難好悶。
問心果句呢份系我寫得最開心既一份report，因為可以簡自己中意既game去寫。

course name: Urban Green City: Pollution and Solution
body:
呢科本應好grade，但自己問題
冇溫書,漏交&遲交assignment...grade range好近，1%都好重要

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body:
無野好講但好輕鬆.
Btw 樓下個d A range既朋友仔好似中曬deceptive comment 既症狀, Exam 肯定冇溫呢part ,點解禁都可以A range 0.0 ,我個A range 依家攪到好似公廁禁 ...
(話說我都好奇 Sem B 唔full 反而GE2313 個神伏course 竟然full過 - -)

平日非常輕鬆，課前和friend分工google查一下練習題
上課不需要聽，玩電腦也不要緊，上課內容和課件一致
每堂課最後有在線quiz，quiz內容和之前查的練習題內容一致，而和當堂內容沒有多大關係，之前預習過的話，10分quiz可輕鬆攞7 8分
中段有個小組presentation，分工一下不難的
最後的final quiz難的過分，內容與ppt有關，考前應該好好過一遍ppt課件。考試形式是mc和填空，其中填空題有倒扣分。
最後b+可以接受，總之，較輕鬆的課程。

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
個人功課: 84分
group功課: 唔知，但係我覺得係good look黎，因為個prof係咁讚我地組
十堂左右上左half
考試有溫有準備paper入去考
但最後B左，睇唔透
所有野都自我感覺良好，但最後c range，唔知發生咩事

Anna is really a nice person who will give you clear instruction. You only have to ask. She listens when you present and this makes me feel good.
It is sure that you need to find good project mates and start early that can make you free at the end of the sem. About the quiz, must study for the quiz 1 which counts more.

真心輕鬆
Jon好搞笑
上堂多D參與嘅話會更好啦
essay hea 寫都冇咩問題
靚grade之選~

Louisa本身應該係一個學霸，所以佢比分都好緊手，要求你好專心上堂，唔玩得電話唔遲得到，但唔使擔心佢係好helpful，會成日行過來幫你。不過不算靚grade，而且大工作量，你要每份文都有first draft,final draft,peer review，仲要有group project 同self-asessment commentary.本人自問有比心機做，上堂專心，功課準時，只係得B。

同學present佢就訓足全程
唔會話好大workload
非常注重"參考文獻"部分(寫錯少少都會指出)
全組都好認真+努力
自己都有中史底
唔知點解最後咁嘅grade
新一代killer!?

完全認同呢科主要係做野唔係學野
除非你係對電影有深既認識／好有興趣，否則唔建議你讀呢科ge。
Gp project/presentation （30%）: 基本上係鬥多內容同有趣，有好多組係拍片+ppt，有10%係peer evaluation，呢pt先係決定你個分既因素
大家諗清楚先好揀！！！！

guest lecture比平時lecture好聽
要做Self exploration analysis同group project
都算好Grade

5個quiz(week3,5,7,9,11) 60%
Group project 40%

Field trip好玩，prof會帶望遠鏡

Project

但係如果想認真學英文佢都唔錯~

logbook chur， chur多字，要吹翻上課他講過的東西就可以了。

Gd Luck everyone~

course name: Real Estate Development: Principles and Process
body: MeiYung is a good lecturer!

作為一個英文應該唔錯同埋讀law嘅同學報到Louisa嘅堂真係三生有幸
佢嘅要求會因應你嘅能力而提高 所以你嘅grade低過讀中文嘅同學真係好正常
佢上堂認真，準備充足，睇得出佢好有熱誠
遺憾嘅係佢比grade真係有D手緊，同埋要求好空泛，永遠唔知點解高分點解低分。自問做得認真過其他讀law嘅同學 有做research有搵書有問佢點解First draft低分
儘量跟住佢要求改自己篇文 最後反而仲低分左
真係睇唔透佢想要D咩
隔離班做左兩三日有A 我做左成個禮拜得個C+

- There're a few short readings every week related to different kinds of madness. Take this course if you're interested in reading literary texts related to madness, you will find the readings interesting.
- There're too much information in the ppt where it's quite hard to recognize the keypoints. 
- You have to read the readings and recognize the keypoints in the ppt in order to get a good grade in the quizzes.
- The creative project is interesting too.
- The lecture is a bit boring.

miss 上堂就搞gag 話記唔到個名都記住佢好charming 就得 very fun

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body: As an engineer student, this GE is a real challenge especially of the difficult and new psychology terms. The workload is heavy due to the time required to revise for the exam. The exam is not tricky but long. The assignment workload is ok, only one group assignment. Picking up responsible groupmates is very important for this class. There are classworks every week, more like a give-away and not difficult. As long as you write more, you will get more points. (Note: keep all the classwork sheets, especially those with notes taken when watching class videos). There are 2 questions in the exam taken out from the classworks. Good english is needed to score higher points in presentation. Lecturer is very friendly, knowledgeable and approachable. You will need the textbook for exam revision.

course name: Brain Machine Interface: Technology, Culture, and Society
body:
我覺得year1呢科reg得過
Rosa好好人，知你唔係科工啲fd所以d assignment其實唔寫好多scientific wordings都可以接受同會俾幾高分
Workload係有啲多同煩不過其實好多都幾易
只要肯花時間做research再搬啲入assignment就ok
Quizzes有啲送分有啲要溫書
Final project拍5分鐘video就ok，扮要invent樣野然後講少少course學過既concept
整體黎講算一分耕耘 一分收穫既科
利申: year 1仔非科工人

我開頭reg左pth班都好驚伏，所以一早已經決心努力做好assignment.. 老師今個sem比既題目係有關宋代既文學或文化 正常同學仔都會少接觸 我都唔例外 所以係做assignment前都要花唔少功夫去睇好多既文獻了解同做資料搜集 而老師都好好人 識聽廣東話 有任何問題佢都會樂於解答 email都會耐心覆 佢本身對題目都有好深入既見解同認識 :) 點都好啦 cciv真係一分耕耘 一分收穫 就算本身個底幾差 只要比心機努力做 點都唔會太差 （雖然我覺得睇文獻好辛苦TT 大家加油)
利申 理科人 好憎讀中文 大課冇走過堂

估唔到份份keep住八成成績都只係B+
有啲失望，仲要咁多人無乜付出之下攞A/+
佢俾grade應該都俾得幾嚴下
王景松老師為人非常偏頗，特別偏袒女同學，我們全組同學用心合力做好報告，亦依足其中期報告時所給予的意思作修改，最後除了組中一名女同學取得Ｂ＋外，其餘同學均只得Ｃ。

Anna is a good tutor with clear instructions, she is also a nice and kind person. I did pretty well in both mid terms, reaching the 75 percentile or above, I expected a better grade to be honest.
The final grade of the course is adjusted due to the overall performance of all the young psy courses in the semester, that's what made my grade lower, i guess....

course name: Chinese Cultural Canons and Their Modern Application
chinese course name: 中國文化經典及其現代應用
body:
Work load is really light,
Have in class exercise,
1 group project,
1 group report, each members 1500 words,
Easy to score a good grade!

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body: Just need to do one of the assignments, and if it is good then don't need to do the others. One group project, mainly just make it pretty and have some sensible points. For examination, he will give tips on them and it's open book so it is not so hard too.

有三個部分，有一份ESSAY，兩個QUIZ，跟一個參觀後感。
QUIZ是挺難的，要多去看一些READINGS, 但整體還是不錯的。
困難的是ESSAY， 要求3頁，題目很難要很用心去做。

就算之前有讀大學程度嘅Micro Econ 都覺得唔容易，因為一來要溫多次，二來佢大部分課題之前嘅Micro Econ都係無詳細教 (e.g: externality, pollution charge, pollution permit, environment subsidy deposit refund system) 呢D課題都係base on externality 進一步延伸嘅。上唔上堂分別唔大，都係要自學，但係又唔可以唔上，要搵同學互簽計分。test 佔50分係grading 嘅關鍵，個test考得唔好基本上成科已完。功課曉飛都無用。其他功課都唔係難做，present都唔計分，係report真係要花時間寫。
It is really a very interesting course.In-class quizes are very nice and easy.(Only a little bit calculations and some short-answer questions)

This course requires students to attend every lecture to get high grades as the professor will randomly take attendence and will add bonus mark to those who attend the class actively and punctually.The logbook is quite demanding as you will have to type and prepare for the class every lessons. No one has ever known how the logbook is marked. If you do not do it regularly, you will suffer in the end of semester.

body:
好伏，幾份inclass照炒（open book)
兩個Present冇計分方法
擺明亂比, gpmate inclass照抄share可以a range

總結: 越technology = 輸家，越吹水英文好 = 靚Grade
