teacher: WU Keung Fai, Joseph + DUAN Wenjie
body:
Workload : 
2 tests (1個全MC, 1個MC + Essay一條)
1 Group project (booklet + poster + present) (自由分，4-6個人)Workload黎講算係非常輕鬆的一個，
整個Sem除左Test之外就得Group project一個，
Topic係揀個職業，然後用心理學的角度分析下 (即 : Apply notes D theory落去)，寫成一份Booklet + 一張Poster介紹。
雖然睇落好似好煩咁，但其實做落唔太多野做，
因為份野就完Sem先交、一開始又俾你自由分左組先 (Therefore記得Attend class) 、上堂又會俾時間你同Groupmate傾 / 問佢野，時間其實好夠，
一個人分D、份Group project幾易搞掂 ^ ^~ (當然，認唔認真做係睇到的:P)

對教學充滿熱誠的老師, 處處為學生設想
用心提供意見予學生, 講課亦十分有趣
只要用做好功課便能有弋得的分數

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body:
一份小組研究同一個考試

小組研究最好定個易做既題目(但同時要有深度),不然寫個時好難同好煩
又因為差唔多10個人一組所以分工要分好d
今年close book考試,冇買佢份野,淨睇ppt安全pass

chinese course name: 死亡：重探索的學習方法
body: workload不算多，但個個都係大伏。Dr. Lam好希望我地係assignment 到表現到critical thinking，但佢上堂就機乎冇教過書。成個sem佢都冇出過lecture notes，堂堂都係到free style今吹水。成個course最有用就係佢請其他lecturer黎教嘅堂。Dr. Lam對呢個course有好大理想，但佢衰在懶。成個sem我send過幾次email問佢野，佢一次都冇覆過。都算。最嬲係佢自己取消咗啲tutorial 同lecture但佢唔會事先通知！有次佢取消咗堂lecture但冇講，搞到成班係lecture hall 到呆坐咗半粒鐘先知。成班都對佢冇物好評價，由奇係班上嘅長者學生。總括而言，想爛grade中大伏就reg 呢科拉！

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
分成3個部分，每個部分唔同lecturers教，每個人教4堂。Part 1 - Chaos (混沌)
無take-home assignment，但每堂都有堂課(1張worksheet per lesson)，要返，張WS當take埋attendance。通常會早放，打風冇咗堂依然教得曬。
上完堂後先會upload notes。
WS有2條問題，1條印左，另一條要等佢show PPT先知。通常係open-ended，唔洗溫。
Topic其實有啲悶，冇EE或Math底可能會唔明。有講butterfly effect、physics野，最後講到Applications都幾得意，都算connect到chaos同現代科技。
注意Group Project 份量。
好靠sense,有音樂底會好好多。

唔take attendance, workload very low
每個week都有10題mc ,睇下slide就搵到ans, 不過要即日做, 最好上堂果陣做啦, 唔係好易唔記得 (我都冇做3次) 
gp project 指示清晰, 跟住個guideline做就ok
final exam 只要你有睇曬一次份notes, 再做埋佢比你果d exercise, 基本上你都識做, 同埋exam比好多時間你, 夠你check 幾次卷PS: 中學冇讀過BAFS

咩都無做A+左
只要group project 唔差, term paper OK. 輕輕鬆鬆A+

絕對reg得過既一科 因為個course hea到爆 
但係個course plan同professor做事就比較令人費解既workload輕鬆既
有三份assignment
第一份係跟topic拍條片
比啲誠意既要拎9/10 OR 10/10唔難
第二份就係去完個field trip（可以唔去）
之後整啲poster呀之類去promote field trip間公司既業務
有infographic就ok
之後有一份group project
要大家去大陸開個bank account 因為要開間淘寶店
個project就係做你間店既business plan

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age

body:
The workload of this course mostly comes from the Group Peoject which is basically the most important part. But it's easy to achieve a good grade if only you put more effort and be more creative. And there're two open-book tests which are extremely easy as you can find all your answer accordingly from the ppt and most of the students could achieve 98 even 100 marks. 
Anyway, just be more creative for the project and everything's fine!

見13/14 d人插到呢個prof.咁...諗住爛硬
可能佢轉死性點知A左-_-
workload:2篇1000字essay+30mins group presentation+final report+discussion
除左第一堂同present果堂我全走
後尾take返晒d attendance
所以in class discussion我應該零分

report present我地成group都hea底

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body: 本身唔係教徒，但中小學都係基督教學校。我係個course入面學到既野，仲多過我12年來上宗教堂學到既野。而且個course係從唔同角度客觀教學，而唔係逼你相信神，所以非教徒都唔會覺得唔舒服。導師好人又認真教學，workload唔太重，非教徒亦冇唔著數。Group work淨係占20%，所以都唔怕group有freerider。
如之前既留言，好導師之選。

course name: The Bible: Its History, Literature, and Influence
body: 呢科唔算多嘢做.一份問答,一個present,一份final paper.問答好簡單,40分滿分,唔識可以抄人,present20分鐘,6-8人一組,佔20%,題目佢比,無得揀,之後可以問佢拎comment,final paper 1000-1100字,佔50%,題目佢比,4揀1,唔係research paper所以唔使有原創見解.即係佢都預咗你上網搵.不過英文係評分標準之一,英文唔好會打折扣.以上功課都係圍繞住聖經,如果你唔熟或者無睇過聖經都無所謂,只係要做耐啲咁解.呢科適合對聖經有興趣嘅人讀,係咪基督徒反而無所謂,因為個course完全唔會提及教會.只係分析聖經+藝術同聖經嘅關係.用學術角度分析經文內容,由創世記至啟示錄+Canonization,每堂lecture講1-2本書,唔會每章每節都講哂,只係講重點,有啲好悶,有啲都幾有趣.會計出席率,lecture同tutorial都計,10%.
Alfred幾好人亦願意解答問題，但要求真係唔太清晰。上堂冇stani咁hea，每堂都學到野。quiz(MC+SQ)我個人覺得比較tricky，所以好意外有咁既成績。
輕鬆好grade之選

Group Paper X1
In-class assignment X2
上堂好HEA, 睇MOVIES, 照讀PPT
Group Paper係搵Case 好煩
個QUIZ 真係無言
出D 完全未見過嘅問題(short question part)
可能佢上堂有講,但PPT冇
跟STANI 正! Part 到好gpmates 都緊要!

2 Quizzes
1 Poster 
1 Booklet
1 PresentationBoring lessons

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
頭幾堂要番,會講Paper,Presentation嘅要求 同要分組!
其他可以走堂
Paper 主要關carbon footprint calculator 事, ppt 得幾版講, instruction又唔多, 所以都研究左一段時間
Poster 要多字,好大發揮空間
Exam 只係背DATA 就可以
我覺得郭老師真係好好好人, 性格隨和,而且好肯幫人, 無論我們在功課上有甚麼疑問,他都必定盡心盡力解答我們,就算有幾忙甚至犧牲吃午飯時間都願意分配時間比我地consult. 十分令人尊敬, 是一位很有熱誠的好老師。好開心cciv 可以比一個常為學生設想的老師任教！

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: This course is a very relaxing course and the workload is not that heavy, we only have two open book quizzes and one group project.The course grade greatly depends on the group project. The group project requires student to produce a promotional video. A creative funny video is certainly required. Do not worry! The instructor (Ted) will provide you a lot of support and comment. His comment is very useful and indeed help you to turn your video to be more funny and creative. Therefore, you will receive a higher grade for this course.
present完之後, Q&A環節佢會同我地成班討論一下, 講下一D歷史方面既細節野。另外老師會比返意見, 講下成組既表現同個人表現, 同埋每個人會比返 recommendations。揀得過 (Y)。
assignment full mark, but exam is for finance students, so GG
笑裡藏刀 各位小心

body: Miss 幾靚幾好J

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body: 考試不努力便PK了, 但十分低WORKLOAD

內容:
communication theory model (e.g. SCT, HBM etc.), 教你點樣分析到一個人思維過程, 中間有咩因素影響佢做判斷等等... 然後佢會教你點樣應用到health communication with other peoples。 後半部教health campaign design ,用marketing 既SWOT analysis 。間唔中會睇片, 睇下外國既health promotion廣告係點樣設計。有一堂係guest visiting lecture, 請人黎講下點樣推廣預防AIDS比唔同階層既人。每堂都有問答環節, 答到問題既話 Crystal 會派coupon加分 。
中大伏tutor,
DLLM li lin
好撚多PROJECT LAB REPORT
diu 比人拉CURVE拉到PK

1501既工作量係輕鬆既！
1) Presentation
2) 學期報告（論文）
3) 網上評論張為群會設定哂題目，然後分組抽籤。佢個人係主打音樂、藝術範疇。五組題目分別係對聯、詩詞、園林、繪畫同埋音樂。可能大家見到咁既題目，會覺得好沉悶、好難做，但其實都係上網搵資料，做落唔難。

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
Little workload in this subject
Open-book during mid-term
Can get nearly full marks in both mid-term
If you can fulfill all requirement and consult Ted Sir, you can get high grade.
Ted Sir is helpful to answer the questions and give comments or directions.
Try to make a funny video then the project grade will get high marks.
A good subject for getting high grade~

- 聽聞我班組員大部分都係 B range。
- 唔知 Li Shan 母語係咩，只知口音好重，成日聽唔明佢D英文。
- 佢有堂會 show 以前學生的 individual essay 良文比我地睇，可以參考。
- 最後幾個 week，無論是否你果組 present 都要全組出席！平日話之你走哂佢。【關於分組】
話說 Li Shan 想每組都有唔同科的人，原意係好，但一組十幾個人，加上成個 lecture room 過百人，最後搞得好混亂。有人一聽到分組咁煩、就離開課室 drop 科，人數分唔"暈"，第一堂根本分唔成組..... 有 D 組要搞成幾 week。有人 drop 就自然會輪到 waiting list 的人入來，所以就算你交左名單上去，Li Shan 都可能派個唔知乜水入你組，或者，佢見你果組太多人讀同一學系、就會調走某些人。總之就煩。

本身我係好有興趣先會揀呢科 ,以前仲會睇課外書同資料, 而家見到就想走
呢科Chur 到爆先得B range, lecturer明知考試同quiz範圍大到我地背唔哂, 出到又難答, 改卷又手緊, KIller黎
第一個quiz 1分要寫4個point, 題目無講, Give examples of...., 寫得兩個point果D人就中伏, 第二個quiz又無講但變左做1分=8個point, 結果又炒一堆人, 得一半分Exam = Open book 既考法同範圍 但係 close book 既exam
佢一開始會問你open定close book, 話close book 會易D, 結果都出到咁, 如果再難D真係大獲
Chur唔係最大問題, 始終都新開, 問題係我地反映左個範圍太大, 佢依然無理, 咁先死...

Report及presentation的形式與其他GE的沒有太大分別, 題目自選, 由導師安排分組Workload大 主要是因為兩個quiz和exam的範圍太大 都是"Close-book"
教學內容基本上與nutrition沒太大關係, 比較傾向wellness部份, Bio的同學不會有太大優勢. Quiz 和exam 亦像文科, 需大量背誦和每個point都要跟ppt一樣才有分 (可能因為有大量卷要改, TA改卷比較rigid節省時間, 而且有改錯)
Have good grade and interesting! Worth to reg in year 1!

attendance 10% - easy to get
project x 2 15% + 25% - show your effort
exam 50% - not very difficult if you have really revised hard
A gd Ge to learn managing your finance!

course name: Mobile Social Networks: Practices, Challenges, and Beyond
teacher: Yan Kit A. CHUNG, Ka Chun K. LEE, Kristijan MIRKOVSKI
chinese course name: 移動社交網路：實踐，挑戰，及未來
body:
CS part contains a little bit calculation but not difficult and Kenneth is a good instructor with well-organized notes and clear explanation. 
IS part is so boring with many conceptual things. But the midterm had an essay question about gamification so better to memorize as much as you can.
I think the innovation matters a lot to Group project since many of the groups use the same and existing business idea or just evaluate different apps.
Additional effort also counts like video, posters, booklet. So, do them even you just produce the simplest ones.

course name: Science and Technology: From Past to Future
chinese course name: 科學與科技：過去與未來
body:
好輕鬆既course, 但grade不太理想, 可能大家都hea住咁做啦, 同組兩人拎B-Details:
-每月會有一次presentation on group pj (幾個組員就可)
-1 quiz of MC on lecture notes (around 20 mins)
-1 final presentation on group pj (每個組員都要present)
-1 individual pj (2 pages)
此老师上课迟到，忽视教学安排。GPA随便给。大坑，莫选。

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong
chinese course name: 建築業是建構現今香港的其一基石
body:
全年得一份Project要交，2個人一組
其實份Project唔算好難，好多都係網上資料copy and paste
我見人人都做到成本書咁樣交俾佢，我地組都做左100幾頁
當人人都係做咁多俾佢既時候，可想而知佢根本唔會仔細去睇你既內容，所以outline都幾重要
上堂要take attendence，佢話多多少少會影響final grade
佢堂堂話自己零廢話，但其實都幾多廢話……
上堂就算唔聽書都唔好傾計，用notebook都要間中望下佢，否則有可能會俾佢點名話你

e科夜晚上
official話上到10半
但其實好似未試遲過9點放
每堂最尾會有個online quiz (10題mc)
題目黎自佢upload左既exercises
所以只需要係上堂個時google 定d ans
同proj mate分工1人google 兩題就搞掂
跟住quiz之前基本上做咩都得
quiz可以做兩次
每次做完都即刻有ans同分睇
不過quiz完miss 會點名叫人答exercises d 問題
每個人係個sem入面要答到一次gp proj 5個人左右1組
8 slides ppt + 1 張a3 poster
poster講番ppt既main point 就ok
今個sem連present都唔使
淨係出去對住miss 1個用1min講下你proj既main point
跟住問你一兩條問題就完

1 acct group project and 1 exam and after-class MC exercise each lesson (about 5-9 MC questions, very easy)The grade is so surprising and unbelievable to me
As an engineering student who have never studied acct before, the exam is quite difficult to me so originally i assume that I need to retake next sem
Exam = 40MC (if i dont remember wrongly) and 4-5 LQ
MC is quite direct but LQ is complicated, especially for people who are not familiar with completing balance sheet or income statement (like me) thats why I have left half of the LQ blank and therefore i guess i must need to retake this

only need to do
4 online responses(~250 words each)
1 individual paper(~800-1000 words)
1 youtube video about virtual tour(in group)
This course has very low workload and it is quite interesting to know more about cities around the world. Ivan is very nice. I expect to get a higher grade though...

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
only 2 midterms but open book
almost all people can get 100 marks
but it does mean that it really relies a lot on the group project
To be honest, our group video is very very "hea" and boring compared with all groups in the course
Therefore, i wont suggest this course to year 1 students, especially for those who have no friends in the course
the only reason is that you will encounter many free riders who will lower your final grade, even you have done a lot to improve the report and videoWith the 'hea' video, i believe that B grade is the acceptable grade to me
** please hv at least 1 fd to study this course with you!!! 
btw, the video must be interesting so as to get a high mark :( 
Ted is a good teacher, you can really learn a lot here
本身唔想reg呢科，但朋友話一齊reg, 結果出奇地唔錯
想好grade，又想學到野就簡呢科la，無econ底讀都無問題
概要: 好Chur好多野背, project指示唔清晰+唔同人有唔同deadlineQuiz 10% x 2: 兩個, 每次範圍4/5課, 不過每課就至少60頁ppt slide, 後期有D過100頁, 每頁幾段字, 而quiz係0.25@point, 10分滿分, 要一宇不漏背哂ppt先有分

重Workload

+

course name: Understanding and Improving Enterprises for Future Leaders
body: Workload: 每星期都homework要交(總共7-8份)，有final exam, 有長達50 pages既group project要做（50頁不計reference and graph, double spacing），上堂要舉手take attendance（不過我走左兩堂都無事）. Reg依科既你地要接受至好好彩撞到個FD一齊讀依科加上有project source，變左homework同group project相對輕鬆。而exam period都無用過時間溫依科，只花一個下就溫powerpoint。final grade有B相當滿意。

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
其實workload唔係太重，佢係有4份assignment 但計best 2 out of 4.
所以其實你做2份已經可以
佢俾分跟足問題做，你言之成理已經有80分
我見好多同學都拎到80 or above
要做兩次presentation 
你俾多d real-life examples就會高分 （想再高分D就加堆international examples)
佢鐘意同學用graph present 愈清晰愈高分
exam 佢有兩個week係for溫書 一定要返因為係90%既 exam content
呢科你可以遲返，但千萬唔好早走
因為每堂計attendance 既in-class exercise 係最後個半個鐘做
好簡單既discussion 你唔鐘意答就叫group mate答
佢計分係你最尾簽個張inclass-exercise 紙 有你名就得其實個professor 好好人 鍾意講笑 亦都幾encouraging 
都可以揀下

1份essay 1個project 同埋end term quiz 
Project 和 Essay 都好簡單
Miss 幾好人 ，教得幾好，PPT 清晰 ，同埋平時會早落堂。 Quiz 有上堂多數都okay 。

可能我廢啦

有份paper要寫 跟guildline寫再用返堂上教既野答就得 份野派grade個個唔係A就B+
最尾兩堂有present 都係輕鬆野肯用心做就得

讀過stats可以揀黎屈下機 不過全場大把人讀maths睇你點睇

course name: Understand Global Projects for Business and Engineering Professionals
body:
此課程雖然有engineering 個字係道，但係一D關係都冇，主要係講企業管理和商業企劃，工作量為繁重，四份assignment 交3份，有mid-term，有group project，攻略如下：
1. assignment (20%)： 一共四份，計最高分的三份，第1,3,4份，係寫評論，第2份係根據excel答幾條問題。第2份最easy, 得9分，其他D評論份materials廿幾頁紙，睇死我，第1,3份都有8分，第4份最嚇人，建議放棄，有D人見第2份有數計，唔做，結果gg，要做第4份，當時仲要做group project. tips：去問professor議建，同去elc改文 。
2.mid-term：(30%)考頭6課既野，有溫書，一定識，我78分，得第2，第1名唔係高我好多，82分，其實我細心D就高過佢，當然我煩左professor好多次，他人品很好，好耐心地教我，小心上堂太大聲，佢會angry.
3. group projerct(45%)：presentation(15% ), report (30%) 一半睇overall寫成點，一半睇你自己寫成點，找好group mate好重要。結果都OK，有中上。
4. bonus (5%)：第一堂，他會有幾條問題，一定要搶答，然後presentation 前個堂，見人少，會抄低你個名。係一個學到好多野GE，或者智識將來用唔到，但被啓發的思考是不會變的，終生受用。多謝你睇完依扁野。

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
其實workload唔算太大,表面有四份assignment但其實只做兩份就得 正常當ls吹水都80分打上
exam mc sq答案上堂會講明 longq亦有教基本要點答 基本上唔使溫 考之前一兩粒鐘整理下資料就ok
難就難在有兩個presentation 對毒男而言絕對惡夢 不過都唔會有人認真聽hea左去ok
每堂有group exercise 亦都hea左去ok佢當tick名有到就有分
但就真係冇乜學到野 內容比較吹虛水
Very nice course with such an amazing professor. Prolly, the best you could dream of with very good teaching and grading.. I wish i can get this course again :P
Exam 好多野溫......

teacher: Dr. Dave Kuo,Prof. Andrew Leung,Dr. Danny Li
body:
有1份site visit report(大約400字), 參觀機電工程署
有4-5份open note quiz 上完堂做，10題mc
有1份final project + present (4人一組)，揀一樣renewable energy 係香港/外國既application, 10分鐘presentation
有1份energy audit report, 1個禮拜交1份，做1個月(好很煩)除左有quiz 果幾堂，其他堂可走(Lecture好悶)

1份assignment 
1個MID-TERM
NO EXAM 
1個PROJ
ASSIGNMENT 有2個簡, 一份寫CV 一份寫明人個人形象分析
WORKLOAD 真系5大, 平時分佔得重,多舉手答問題,我自己答3次ONLY, 盡量5好走堂,有GP MARKS, 系計GP 答問題同做WS
MID TERM 系MC 同LQ, MC好簡易, LQ 要APPLY THEORY 麻麻地
PROJ, WIST 好好人, 佢會盡力幫你, 鼓勵你去搵佢傾PROJ
做完PROJ 要寫REPORT (<3000 WORDS) 
最後一堂系去學TABLE MANNER
OVERALL 呢科系輕鬆, 冇點好大付出都有B+
同埋學到GE野真心對出黎做野有用
值得REG GE 一科

overall, good tutor with good grade!!!

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: 唔係傳說中咁好grade
英文唔好千其唔好報依個course, 伏己中

Lecture 超hea, 聽5聽都冇問題因為冇project, quiz, test, exam 係拎返屋企做，佔50%,3題揀1題寫essay . 佢最尾個堂會同我地溫書，再重温一D佢認為重要geh topics. 姐係比tips. 另外，有一份court report, 佔25%,都容易，比曬format ，你只需填D答案上去就ok. 呢份我B+左。最後就有一個大約5 min presentation, 自己任揀一個relate 呢個course geh topics 。present 時可以咩都冇就甘講亦可以整ppt。呢part + 平時participation mark 佔25%. 但佢好小mark 低邊個答左佢問題，而我重來冇比佢mark 低過，但turn out 有A-我覺得exam 好重要，因為我court report B+, 上堂又吾積極。呢個course 係hea+ 0 freeride +好grade 之選！
機本上輕鬆到喊…冇乜點上過堂，叫人take attendance,就算上堂都冇乜聽書，但professor其實好好，所以有d guilty *_*功課要用心做就ok

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
呢科無d人講到咁變態，係有考數據，但都係d大路野。
不過，exam時有十題到好似notes係無。 可能係自己温得唔熟掛。
呢科透明度好差， 問佢poster 幾分又唔講。同埋第一份功課如果你拎八十幾分都唔開心住，因為佢好似遍向俾高分，即range會比較細。
拎a- 比想像中差。

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News
chinese course name: 通過時事要聞，理解全球經濟
body:
基本上等同Macroeconomic既一個Introductory course，如果本身有econ底就更容易明白，不過就算第一次讀econ既都唔洗太擔心，課程都係由淺入深。
兩份Homework (答幾題typical econ題目) + 一個Project (Report + Presentation)，另外仲有Exam，Workload比很多GE多，但不算chur，好處係一個task做得差都可以其他task搭救。Peter Jor教得非常好，唔好走堂一定聽得明。如果有econ底/對econ有興趣，絕對推介呢科
有一点广而不深，不过老师讲课逻辑还比较清晰，商科生来读会有优势，International student很多。因为Project占比蛮高，有没有人品找到好队友很重要……认真对待+抱大腿+最后final前的拼命复习，结果还好。

分組6-7人一組 仲要係由佢幫你分 今年超過一半人都係exchange 一組入面local係仲少過exchange 如果你想識多啲外國人就讀依科
不過workload好重 note多字+內容好亂
一個Presentation 15Mins內
一份report 內容係based on 你的presentation 3500字內
Exam要寫2條Essay 30條mc(唔知係咪年年一樣)上堂會傅紙take attendance

there is only one presentation, report and some online exercises throughout the course. it is quite a light workload. to be honest, i never learn anything from business or accounting field. I am a totally science student. Why i choose this course is just because i cant reg any other GE course at the time. Yet, I don't think it is so difficult for me. if you attend and listen to the lecture, i am sure that you can understand the content well. I believe that business students have an advantage to take this course.

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body: the workload of this course is relatively high but i think it is reasonable. It includes 2 presentations and around 4 essays with 3 pages each. And there is a final exam. However, the lecturer will give 90% of the exam questions and answers to you so what you have to do is just mark them up and bring it along with you to the exam.

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body: the course is so hea and you actually do not have to listen to the lecture as it doesn't really help you with your assignments. The assignments of this course include few essays and one presentation.

stephanie is a reli reli good teacher and the content of this course is useful in daily lives. This is the first GE course that gives me the feeling of worth-taking tho I only got b range. Honestly, if you aim to get A range, efforts must be paid. The coverage of the final exam is quite much that it may take you a week to study all. Yet, I believe that give and take in balance in this course.

中學讀過Econ覺得唔太難,2個TEST 考之前先溫
Group Project做得好比心機,但因為佢有比example, 跟住A grade果D 既format 做就得 Professor 好好人 真心覺得呢科唔錯

body:
個Test真係好緊要

所以test影響好大

Reg個陣見到幾好grade先報，但出泥好多人都c range。 Workload都幾多， 有兩個presentation,第二個present係要幫一個人度身訂做個fiancial plan,要計好多ratio同數,又要幫佢諗唒投資，儲蓄......出泥個分都唔低。
另外， 每堂tutorial都要做功課，然後搶答participation分。

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
1 individual presentation on selected topic ( i have 6/10) although i present not good. And near me there are people with 9 or even 9.5/10 
1 group project consists of 9 ppl. It is not difficult but it is hard to find the interviewee and to find out their personality when face difficulty, etc. My group is around 51/60 
finally , there is an exam which consist of MC , T/f and short question . If you work hard and attend all lectures, it is normal to have b+ like me. However, if you want to be better(A-/A) , you need to have good English skills to present answer clearly and comprehensively, as the short questions are not easy to handle.

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News
chinese course name: 通過時事要聞，理解全球經濟
body: 2 Easy 4 me
有兩個project再加exam，今堂都有tutorial work要做，會court participation。project有比心機做，但唔算非常好，grade都唔錯，但exam真心伏。其實每堂notes一份都有80幾頁，在exam真係唔知邊到讀起好，計數還可以，不過MC好多都唔識。Stephanie係個好tutor，不過如果要reg，自問係勤力比心機既先好reg。

考試內容好多，而且個exam唔易。平時堂堂都有功課交，project兩個，workload好大，但係Stephanie係個好好既老師，想學野可以報，否則建議add其他GE.
利申: 冇bba底，但要喪温

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News
chinese course name: 通過時事要聞，理解全球經濟
body:
so breaking down this GE
1) do your assignments on time and attend every class
2) talk to the teacher about the project and heed to guidelines
3) do well in exam its not hard
4) its a good ge to learn eco
5) have fun!
預自己死死地都有b range, 點知晨早流流一check, 第一科就c+，Exam大伏， 隔離班有cheat sheet 我地咩都無。不過公平咁講，stephanie係一個好老師， 問咩都好有心機答。計數好嘅應該會好grade d。
正如眾多留言所講，鄧立光絕對係一個好老師。老師上堂帶給學生寶貴既知識。喺課堂上，佢好少教中文上既知識，因為佢認為大學中文呢一科，求其搵一個中學老師來教都識教，反而佢帶比學生好多人生上既哲理，反思自己既不足之處。好多時都係傳授道德上既道理，令到學生有所啟發。

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News
chinese course name: 通過時事要聞，理解全球經濟
body: 成個COURSE正係要做2份ASSIGNMENT+1個PROJECT,雖然有EXAM但係佔30%,其實我EXAM真係接近全部唔識,無ECON底,出到黎有B算係唔錯,雖然課題好悶但PROF好人+NICE,讀左5個GE最NICE係佢,上堂會幫手印多十幾份NOTES驚有人上堂無PRINT,ASSIGNMENT唔算難,肯花1日時間就做得完,睇下NOTES就識,PROJECT比較重要,PRESENT+REPORT佔40%

要做1個PRESENT同1個PROJECT,分比得好鬆手
但EXAM就伏到爆,LQ好多條都要計數,但係式就一條都唔比,大大話話大既小既加埋30幾條式,如果無商科底真係唔係太建議讀,MC都需要溫晒13課NOTES先得,一開始我以為依科係派GRADE,無諗過功課4X/50出到黎會比個C我
所以真係依句:無商科底真係唔好選

workload is not that heavy
1. Weekly Tweets (most of them can be done within 5-10 mins)
2. Two quizzes - as long as you are willing to spend some time revising the notes, you'll be fine
3. one Group project ~7 groupmates 
(one presentation + one group paper --> divided workload)
The tutor Crystal is really nice too!
Lectures can be at times pretty boring though.

body:
自問唔係聰明人，所以拎到B已經好心足。DR SUN 個人好NICE，上堂氣氛好好。但GROUP PROJECT 唔可以自由分組，要我同其他系GE 人同組。上課GE教埋FINANCIAL PLAN，同組的同學有心創業就覺得有好，可以寫一份創業計劃書，又比意見我地去改善。但我無咩心創業又係讀SCIENCE GE 我就覺得悶悶地。總算明白創業唔容易。
大家可以試下GA....WORKLOAD 唔算好多。

body:
第1堂就分gp project既組
每個禮拜既堂尾每組用1-2min heahea地report番個progress
上堂悶 可以report progress時先出現
會有guest lecture同field trip
gp pj要present都要交report
最尾有個quiz係mc 同埋有份individual既report要交
prof.幾好人

一個好好既miss 好nice好盡責仲會請我地食野
交功課之前交既draft佢真係會用心睇用心改
只要跟足黎做就唔會差得去邊
主要係揀project既題目要小心d唔好簡d太難

classwork有2-3份random俾 主要都係幾個gpmate一齊做大家幫下手咁
上堂講d theory有d悶 不過有時會有d片睇下咁
係交果份paper訂題目上有d難 我地組訂得唔係好好
約左佢con幾次 次次講d野都有d唔同咁 唔係好知佢想要d乜
最尾有個quiz 雖然係mc+short q 溫左但係都唔太識做咁

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
Dick Sir好好人,上堂好free.主要講下game既歷史,發展,會講到好多平時有玩開既game,講下d公司(eg任天堂,mario個名點黎lol)鐘意打機一定會鐘意呢個course.
冇考試冇quiz.有份個人present介紹一個遊戲.pre果日撞正dick sir發脾氣(好似),頭個幾個俾佢con到爆,不過主要係因為果幾個人照讀稿,唔熟自己present d內容.dick sir唔鐘意人上網down份功課落黎,最好用usb啦.
gp project遇到班幾好既groupmates,份野應該A左.要設計一個遊戲.dick sir話尾二個禮拜要已經設計好可以俾人玩.我地照做拎到d feedback搵到bug就改,present都okay.dick sir有讚我地俾人測game(因為全班好似得我地組有測game lol)

A 200 word report about an artwork every 2 weeks, stating its art and science sides. Not very difficult for me to find the works because I am a CM student, you can use songs, installation and anything (I sometimes wrote about artwork I learnt in ContemArt class)
A report and presentation comparing two artworks. Not difficult unless you meet free-rider.
Exam is very difficult. You need to study enough to get good grades in exam.
I get mostly A in my coursework but I guess I failed the exam.

body:
真係好多野做0.0
第一堂一聽到個prof.係大陸人差D想Drop左呢科
直到sem 尾我都接受唔到佢d口音堂堂都要答問題落紙度計attendance

VERY VERY VERY VERY HEA!!!
Assignments are easy and no one goes to the class.
If u wanna choose 2 ge in one sem, and u better choose this course to make u like only took one ge but got 6 credits... 
However u can learn nothing from this course.

For Finance major, especially QFRM. 
Excel skills rquired

A真係好易拎。
教授係個好可愛既大叔，鍾意溜人去行山。
超級注重準時，如果有一堂係好少人準時返，到左既人就有bonus哈哈！
其實log book唔多野要做，每星期打兩三段就得，加上個mini project真係好mini，mini到每人打一兩段就搞掂（你個scope愈大愈易扣分.......）
比多個tips, logbook主要講你點同組員溝通同互動！
英文差的不要㨂，因為SEM尾有個考試，D 社會學的THEORY讀到癲。當讀到癲既時候，你會發現身邊的同學一早已經識哂D THEORY。同學決定（你個分的）高度。

Wisteria was good in teaching, Vincent was so hea..
I would say attendance and participation were quite imporatant
I put much time on assignment , but finally no one knows what grades of their assignments and no one announce the result of quiz.... as a student, I think the lecturers were not responsible... and all of my friends got low grades too..
YEAR 1 SEM B係JAMES教，佢係一個好用心教既老師，而佢教完之後會令我成個大學生活寫PAPER都好大得著。首先，佢打破傳統沉悶既課堂，係佢堂坐法唔係傳統既課室坐法，而係將D櫈圍成半圓，令全班同學上堂時都好融洽，因為咁既坐法令同學與同學之間係面對面，增強大家之間既互動性。
下學期重複上學期東西，只加多summary writing 和少少citation techniques. 冇mud新嘢學，但又要捱一星期六個鐘class time. 最無聊是9-12小時的額外independent learning，被逼幫嚫Writing workshop 或其他services 拿印仔.無聊得很.每星期共花我七小時...我還有很多堂要上和功課要做呢！

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society

body:
Pay effort = Grade
Got open book exam. professor would gave hints to you during lecture before the exam period.
Well prepared !

This GE course is very difficult. I am not BBA student so I spent a lot of effort on this course but still cannot finish the individual project( even could not understand what the questions asked and need to ask my classmates to explain the questions to me).Luckily , I got A in individual project and formed group with some BBA students (maybe got A in the group project). 4 assignments were easy, 1 individual project was difficult. 
suggestion: If you are not a BBA student or not good at finance, never choose!

course name: Urban Development and Construction - from the Past to the Future
body:
CA's student.
High output with low input.
But of course you must submit something that has good quality.

AL PA B
Final Quiz 棵考

One Individual Report
One group project + Presentation
In-class worksheets + Participation (Answering questions)
Quiz (mc)As this is a marketing course, attendance and participation are highly valued. If you are active enough in classes, willing to answers professors' questions and try to involve yourself more in discussion parts, your good grade is guaranteed. This course is meaningful in ways that it actually teaches you how to better manage yourself. The professors are kind to share a lot of their personal experiences. The project is not difficult, but it depends on your luck to bump into good project mates as I met some bad ones.

Definitely a hea GE course, but good grade is not guaranteed.
Spencer is a nice professor, though it cannot cover the fact that his lessons are kinda boring. The course is basically about Chinese history and has almost nothing to do with marketing knowledge, except the project part that you have to come up with a business plan out of nothing provided from the notes.
You cannot control yourself from wanting to escape the classes, because they are really boring. But please don't, because attendance accounts for a huge part of your grade, especially the last few ones when you have to comment on the presentations of other groups.p.s. The notes are printed for you ( which are useless ).

chinese course name: 歷史與文化中的中國女性
body:
Attendance is very important in Calvin's classes.
If you want to hea, don't choose this course.
This course's workload is relatively heavy according to my experience in taking GE courses.
Field-trip report with 600 words (Went to Po Leung Kuk... )
Project, post-project report with 1500 words...
In class participation... You have to answer his questions... a lot
In class worksheets for every single lessons.. (to count your attendance)
Attendance for both lectures and tutorials..
p.s. If you are late, Calvin will mark the time you arrive classroom specifically,
and I think it definitely affects your grade.
So, don't mess with Calvin.
I messed with him and that's why I got a B.

body: Estella is a helpful tutor. Besides 20% on active class participation, 40% is on presentation while the last 40% is on term paper. Easy to cope, highly recommended.

course name: China in the Eyes of World Media
body:
I think I was lucky to have this Taiwanese lecturer (as I see most of the comments here are not referring to him).
He is a good guy, with detailed explanation in PowerPoint, a lot of attractive video clips in his lectures to see how the western media see China.
2 Quizzes (MC + SQ) + 1 Group Present + 1 Group Report is acceptable for me.However, it is not his turn in the coming semester.

40% Group project presentation X 1 
30% Individual essay (1000-2000 words) X1
30% Class participationGroup project 只係需要做好PPT，之後上堂匯報，唔洗交文字報告，所以PPT要畀心機做，最好有一D flow chart清晰表達到幾者之間既LINKAGE。

teacher: Wisteria Cheung, Raine Ng, Vincent Fok
body: 在暑期讀尤其輕鬆。30% class participation：佔很重的一個範疇，除計算出席率外，還有Group exercise。主動答問題會加分。

非常多野做 兩個presentation加埋堂堂都要點名

呢位呀sir搞好多gag出黎，上堂氣氛好，如果你係內向要預左爛grade。
呀sir話就話Earn your own grade，但係結果出黎我堂又番足，功課交足，class activity都俾到野佢，竟然咁既grade，真係好失望。
各位如果係gpa派就唔好揀呢個計時炸彈。

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body:
Heavy workload for a ge course, you will need to revise.
If you are not good at maths, you will need to drop the course.
Many of my gpmates dropped it due to the difficulty of the questions and assignments.
The professor can remember your name and your face if you are girl, so better not to skip class.
I screwed up the test and ended up within C range. 
The professor made a lot of broken gags.

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body: 20% Participation︰上堂hea下hea下做role play，答問題吹兩句水。但係唔好走堂囉。鍾意可以做埋Class rep.，傳說有分加。40% Presentation︰其實都幾hea，最緊要夠搞笑同有interaction with audience，PPT最好小字(這是常識吧！)

course name: The Art and Science of Data
body:
非常伏，切忌選此科。
有test有assignment有presentation有lab or tutor
而且算係一科數學科，自問無腦或者懶得學野既人要預左quiz時乜都唔識做。
首先呢一科學既野不太實用，上網都可以學到更多野。
本人上齊堂而且非常專心亦係多次assignment同quiz拎到a級成績，什至滿分。
雖然group project抽中多位free riders，但拎左咁多a，竟然唔過3！？
終於明白個人努力係大學既分數比重原來係咁低。
如果唔想gpa唔過3既同學唔好揀呢科。
如果想做free ride都唔好揀呢科，因為有quiz。
最後要讚下呀sir有時會早放堂，而且會嘗試減輕學生workload。

除左GROUP PROJECT,其他ASSIGNMENT都算易做
GP係要DEVELOP一個NGO,再為佢設計一系列既宣傳物品,包括POSTER, LEAFLET, LETTER HEAD, SOUVENIR 等等唔建議完全冇DESIGN同PS/AI底既人讀,因為D PROJECT好大程度都要用到
除非你自問係一個好有IDEA, 好創新既人

course name: Light: from Double Rainbows to Optical Fibers
body:
老師有耐性, nice person, 講既內容非常易明,話晒係GE course, 冇計數,佢解釋光既特性有好多demo,老實講, 中學學時都冇咁易明, 呢個course 有quiz (30%), project (present+report) (70%). 
1.	Attendance(0%) 佢冇要求學生上堂, 但上堂要守規矩, 唔好傾計(靜) 同食野 (尊重),用wtapps 電腦冇問題, 最重要靜.
2.	Closed-book Quiz (30%) 2個quiz, 有聽佢上堂, 有溫書(背少少definition), 就好易, 因為佢講重點, 冇廢話, 例如: What is material dispersion? (Ans: definition from course material) What is the basic principle of optical fibre? (Ans: Total Internal reflection)
3.	Project (70%) Report(1200-1500字左右)最重要有optical principle, interesting,
Present (no rule, just ppt).
(I)	COURSE MATERIAL 
11 份word (pdf version), 好多圖, youtube link, 字既話係definition, explanation
(II)	COURSE CONTENT (no calculation, only principles)
Wave, EM waves, Reflection, refraction, diffraction, interference, polarization, light, optical fibres, Laser, LED有咩問題, sit 第1堂睇下咩環境, 唔中意內容/個老師 既話就drop/唔好add
總之, 一分耕耘一分收穫

事先聲明呢個COURSE係新開既 我係第一批學生
因為自己本身鍾意CHEM先去REG有2個in-class debate分別各佔35% 
而最後30%係15 min gp presentation
lecture唔洗tick attendance (不過成班得2x人 你唔去其實好明顯)
prof非常唔鍾意人地遲到

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News

教得好深 
WORKLOAD又大

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development

body: 堂上有好多唔知做緊咩既ROLE PLAY，比左好多時間4-5個人小組傾計，成日傾另一樣野，唔洗好認真。上堂問問題，除非佢點名問問題，唔係我都唔會主動答。(會計入參與分)

大家都話Dannis係killer.
其實佢份人好好。耐心解答你D問題。
上堂要自己抄notes好煩。
poster同booklet要求都比較清楚，問多professor幾次一定搞得掂。
最主要係睇三次quiz...其實如果考前溫書都冇咩問題。

如果中學學過bio, 咁個course入面嘅bio野係冇難度嘅, 但之後有一大堆device同technology就難明同難記, quiz前就盡記啦, 問題都係問notes野
個兩份assignment就麻煩d, notes入面冇咩野抄, 一定要google, google完仲睇一大堆野, 要用好多時間搵答案, 但慢慢搵, 有機會搵到佢d題目來源連ans
group present都ok鬆手, 我覺得我個組prepare唔係幾好, 但佢都冇話我地組

冇考試

之前完全無讀過商科,

Heavy workload

course name: Words and Images: Reading and Writing in the 21st Century
body: 雖然d assignments話係限字數，事實上係300字既要寫到700-1000字，1000字既會寫到去差唔多2000字，如果淨係照佢既字數要求寫，佢會話你仲有好多野可以寫。自問英文唔好，所以只要language clinic有開都會拎去check grammar。每份功課都幾用心做，個分數同其他同學既都非常接近，大家既平均分都係7成左右。mags好nice，係比分有d緊。

只有2個in class reflection (15% x 2)，1份gp project (max. 3000 words) 和1個 end-term test
要take attendence，但找朋友幫忙便好了
2個reflection很簡單，主要是take attendence用
gp project是一個case study，4-5人一組，因為我組裡沒有free-rider，所以挺輕鬆的
end-term test大部份是MC，少部份short questions，有點難，主要是考concept對psychology和criminology有興趣的話，這科是個不錯的選擇，我miss了一個reflection，沒了15%的分數，考試又沒有很努力溫習，都有B+

Exam 比想像中容易, MC挻容易的,LQ 有部分直接出Tutorial exercises.
Individual assignment:15/15 (15%)
Group project:85 (25%)
Exam : NA (50%)
Tutorial participation: 10/10 (10%)
Workload 一般
主要看你想放多少力去individual and group assignments
我覺得上堂敎學一般,可以不去也行, 當然最好別撓課,特別非商科學生
最好買書,因為上堂挻多解釋得不太清楚. 如果exam出得困難一點,應該很多人會死
這門課還滿不錯的.

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
三個lecturers
分別教三種唔同概念: 易經與DNA, 混沌理論, 分形現象
介紹完基礎概念之後 三個lecturers會講下自己點應用落電子工程學既research除左K. F. Man之外 另外兩個都會比堂課同計分
K. F. Man會比一份book report同兩份assignments
要花D時間研究
3 essay+ information graphic presentation我都唔知點解,自問頭2份 essay同information graphic 都算有心做, 係第3份撞正另一個GE PRESENT 所以HEA左, 但係得C+...... ?! 連B- 都冇............

內容:
人體構造同相關既醫療器材/ 技術/ 工具, 呢科學到好多野。由最基本既角度去解釋人體既生理結構, 對於冇讀過BIO既我真係大開眼界。 仲有每堂PPT 成百張slide,計quota既同學要留意啦!工作量 : 
2 assignments +2 quizzes + 1 final project, 今年唔駛做LAB REPORT, 工作量會比上年讀既同學降低左。雖然對我係一般,但係英文底子唔穩既同學可能係幾辛苦, 因為好多專有名詞要識。

Zach is really nice and humorous and always fully prepared for the classes. He always tries to convey the difficult literature terms in an easy way and never gives up on any of the students in the class. This course itself is interesting also. If you like reading and writing this is one you definitely do not want to miss. Do pick Zach's section if it's available.

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body:
其實讀D野幾好,以吸收知識黎講
但係唔知點解得個B仔
明明present都ok,佢問d問題基本都答到晒
可能exam唔太識......
仲有份paper可能揀左條淺既...........

summer workload同正常sem一樣
3 test+1 project(booklet+poster+presentation)course pack唔一定要買(買完返黎冇睇過)
但上堂一定要留心聽書同抄低d point
(tutor放上blackboard同上堂既ppt頁數差好多)
溫書背晒上堂既ppt同記例子
3個test就袋足大部份既分

每堂tick attendance
上堂active絕對重要,每答一條問題有一分bonus mark一個presentation,一個project
present要做role play
present完有錯要改,tutor會用改左既ppt計分

course name: Thinking Philosophy: Bridging the Gap between Arts and Sciences
body:
老師有耐性, nice person, 呢個course 有present (30%), essay (30%), exam (30%), attendance (10%). 
1.	Attendance(10%) 佢要求學生自己簽自己個名,一經發現就會好嚴重, 不過佢冇發現過代簽. 相信學生好自律.
2.	Present (30%) 一班45人分8組, 每組5-6人, 睇完一篇哲學文章,然後present 作者既idea, 如果冇接觸過philosophical paper既人都未必能體會有幾難明, 但present 唔使加其他reference, present 漏point 會扣分, 文章大約4000 – 8000 字 (大約4- 8 頁), 30 分鐘時間present , 然後15 分鐘以上Q&A (by Challenge Group), 所以全組最好明晒篇文. 
3.	Essay (30%) 700字左右, 寫d argumentative essay, 最重要logical, no contradiction.
4.	Closed-book Exam (30%) 佢叫test, 其實都算final exam, 40% 20 T/F, 60% 2 Essay. T/F 係答中2分,答錯扣1分, Essay 似功課咁.
(I)	COURSE MATERIAL 
12 份ppt + 13份word, ppt同word相似, ppt 大約50-70張slide 全字冇圖
(II)	COURSE CONTENT
Philosophy of science, Political Philosophy, Philosophy of mind, Environmental Ethics, Philosophy of Religion
Philosophy of science: e.g. Induction, deduction, etc
Political Philosophy: e.g. Minimal state, civil disobedience, etc
Philosophy of mind: e.g. Dualism, Materialism, etc
Environmental Ethics: e.g. Anthropocentric, Bio-centric, Eco-centric view, etc有咩問題, sit 第1堂睇下咩環境, 唔中意bloody philosophy既話就drop/唔好add
總之, 一分耕耘一分收穫

body:
本課的內容很豐富，但不同lecturer的風格都很不同，有几堂lecture可能會悶。
但總體來說十分有趣，體驗活動也多。
至於兩次考試，ppt是主要的來源，但僅僅看ppt恐怕沒法完全應付。
coursepack中reading固然很多，若能一一看完消化，考試不會有問題。
記憶力很重要。
按照標準來說工作量不算大，算上reading就會很花時間了。

每組最後都要交一樣實質既野比佢, eg: poster. 呢個比較煩少少, 但groupmates一齊做既話都唔太難
而presentation個陣, Scarlet會錄影, 可能會幾緊張
此外, 仲有一份individual assignment. 需要study legislation 先做到.
Scarlet 每堂都會計attendance, 不過佢好好人, 好多野都會唔明講到明, 佢亦都嘗試用生活化的例子去解釋法律概念同條例, 覺得真係學到野, 認識好多條例去保障自己的消費者權益, language底子好既可以reg下

chinese course name: 死亡：重探索的學習方法
body:
My name is Yun and I am the instructor of this course. Last year has been the second time I taught this course, and once again, I enjoyed teaching it tremendously. My sincere gratitude to everyone who has taken this course.
There is one minor mistake on this website. This course does have a final examination. One commentator remarked on the cluelessness of the exam. Let me explain. The exam requires you to use this course as a model to design a new GE course on other fundamental aspects of life, such as work, money, family and freedom. To get a good mark, you really need to remember the aim and content of every lecture of this course - otherwise how can you use this course as the basis for your course? As I told the aim of the lecture only during the lecture, you will need to attend the lectures in order to understand how each lecture is connected to one another and to the main objective of the course. In other words, the one-hour exam is a way to assess how much you got from the lectures - both by reviewing the materials and by attending them. This, by the way, is the purpose of all examinations.
都唔知係我黑仔定係點，全體佢教既都被降左一個GRADE！都唔知DEPT搞乜鬼，SEAFOOD痕咩，拎學生D分黎好似當泥沙咁玩！

如果想知guest speech report等平時分可以send email問, Dr.Lau會話返你知:)

body:
呢一科內容幾淺, 上堂都算HEA, DAISY個老女人就會麻煩D, 上堂比較多INTERACTION, KELVIN上堂就HEA D, 佢講你聽, 唔會答問題, 時間好快過, 有一半堂係DAISY教, 有另外一半係KELVIN教WORKOAD
1 individual field trip report
1 group field trip report
1 group presentation (設計環保家居)+written report (4-5 人一組)
1 FINAL EXAM

有一个大型PROJECT, 一个QUIZ, 一個JOURNAL. 咁就搞掂曬
個PROJECT最多可以11人, 一人做一D, 所以都好輕鬆, 大致上叫你拍影片PROMOTE下環保的題材, 然後要寫PROPOSAL個D, 好快搞掂
之後最後會有個QUIZ, MC題, 大約30題, 內容有7成溫書都溫唔到, 係時事野, 所以靠自己分析啦
個PROJECT組組都唔會差距太大, 所以你係咩GRADE好睇個QUIZ, 個QUIZ係定生死的
至於平時上堂可以唔多理, 因為教的野好淺, 簡數FORMULA個D唔考, Victorius同LAWERENCE, HO WAI HO其他教授唔同, 唔著重ECON野, 所以你無底子都無所謂
呢一科上堂超HEA, 上完一個鐘LECTURE後, 會有一小時俾你同GROUPMATE討論, 然後就有45MINS全部組分批REPORT, 都係HEA野, 你講咩教授都會話你啱, 所以有9成時間我同FD都坐好後傾計HEA, 唔洗理DISCUSSION, 無野學到
呢個COURSE真係值得推薦, 好野泥的, 又好GRADE, 又HEA

課程有兩個ASSIGN, 一个PRESENT, 一个FINAL EXAM
上堂一般, 教授唔FUNNY, ASSIGN上網有得抄
課程大概係關係LOGIC野, COURSE去到一半要記住上堂, 因為D野幾難下, 自己睇會睇唔明的
FINAL EXAM 有一條題目係10簡6條, 幾難下, 有一條係考你畫畫, 叫你畫理想中的課室出泥, 我好多都唔係好識, 靠呢條 A-左

Although the work load is quite heavy, You will really learn a lot if you pay attention to the lessons as Dr Chung tried his best to deliver great lessons. He also invited one of the famous professor from Qin Hua University as guest lecturer for 3 lessons talking about the current chinese energy and environment policies.I recommend those who are really interested in studying environmental and energy policies to take this valuable GE course.

course name: Accelerating Professional Growth on the Web
body: 係電腦室上堂，其實可以做自己野，但係會佢問問題要出去答攞平時分，不過係分組既，簡單黎講就係你個組有人上堂聽書答到問題就得。WORKLOAD有D重，不過認真做哂既話，其實都會有好既成績既。

course name: The Cantonese Language in Use: Language, Grammar and Culture
body: proj好重要，present+report占成75%！一開始完全唔知proj要做D 咩，好在我拍住兩個本身就讀language ge女仔，有距地lead住，慢慢就摸索到方向。Tom Lai上堂好悶，講解好模糊，d answer永遠模棱兩可，點都解釋到...真係距玩曬,不過上距tutor有用,記得做埋D exercise,因為D體型同final quiz果D好似。

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy

但最緊要都係要溫書GE黎講 呢科都幾好玩
有得去茶室

lecture內容我覺得又幾有趣

悶,伏,無聊

但D TERMS 邊個記到
對科幻野有興趣都覺呢科真係唔建議做FIRST CHOICE

因為吾洗考試,,所以上堂都係發下夢,睇下片就得,,,
D課堂成日有活動,吾算好悶,,個TUTOR好好人,WORKLOAD吾多,,基本上都係整一個BLOG 講一個ARTIST ,,PRESENT可以用中文,同MISS吾想我地太多WORKLOAD限我地PRESENT只可以一板POWER POINT,,,最後B+但呢科好似吾可以走多過2至3堂
INTERESTING COURSE

body:
寫唔少字 冇文科底人 成組最高都係b+ 呀sir講書都幾悶 答野都幾唔中pt 
miss就好少d 不過tut唔係跟佢 唔佢係點
成個COURSE要做個REPORT.....同上LT之後跟question寫ESSAY 揀既時候記住要睇睇你REG個個TUTOR係咩科既 因為我個陣是但REG REG左個請CLOUD COMPUTING .... 好彩有好GPMATE :) 所以小心啲 !!!!
其實只係要做一篇1000字既ESSAY (3揀1) 同1個30mins 內既marketing presentation 輕鬆 :) 上半堂就可以放BREAK走堂

呢科大workload
所以讀得好唔好幾睇tutor自問英文底差 + 冇興趣
不過上Ada堂都幾開心
你問佢野都好肯答
guidelines亦頗清晰

好多assignments，基本上全部assignments都係寫essay，有individual又有group既。
Final group essay要做一次presentation。
有一次mc quiz，勁難！
堂基本上唔需要上。
但要好grade最緊要係啲essay做多啲research。
寫一份關於一個城市既individual essay，最後整一段關於一個城市既group video，極輕鬆！

超好人嘅tutor
好有心教，唔洗你買書佢會印埋俾你
而且Hannah會再額外教d好實用嘅內容
assignments只要有心做，佢都會盡量俾分你

chinese course name: 全球信息技術 (IT) 案例研究
body:
2篇reading report、1份group project + presentation
佢會好仔細咁執grammar，交assignments之前check清楚d
每星期分組present reading materials
最煩係上堂要上Bb做好多peer assessment
每堂TA會嚟對樣take attendance
整體嚟講都唔算太多workload

professor好有心教，主要教返中學ICT範圍，仲可以學到少少EE嘅嘢
但上堂比較悶，不過有ICT底人可以唔聽、做自己嘢都冇問題
有4個MC quiz，hea背powerpoint都已經應付到
自願show and tell同埋上堂問問題都有得加分
show and tell盡量早期d做，做1次已經夠
sem尾有1份group work，1份individual (可2人一齊做)
you have to pick the right groupmate in this course

上堂輕鬆 topic幾有趣
仲有一堂去左跳舞 比我地感受下運動既樂趣
Workload唔算多
兩個人一組睇套戲寫film review (A-)
Final present 幾好玩 要創意 (B+)
最後交篇reflective essay

workload唔算大 
經常走堂+無geog底 
quiz主要溫tutorial比既mc 再望下d ppt 唔明d term可以係youtube search下睇下片 睇完就明
又輕鬆又好grade 值得reg

老師教得唔錯..
PROJECT很輕鬆,
但考試超難

course name: Ironman: The Art and Science of Robots in Our Society

body:
1 mid-way presentation 1 final presentation
1 final group report
2 assignments
2 quizes

上堂好求其，個阿SIR印度黎嘅，都好求其，請過個仆街黎上堂仲要遲到成個鐘，
佢份人又無乜野，真係亂咁搵資料亂做都會過骨。
走堂都無咩所謂，佢都唔會認得你個樣。
不過就真係學唔到野囉，大部分時間都係打手提玩電腦。

course name: Architecture and Space in Chinese Culture
body: 多同老師傾就ok，給分都不錯

呢科只可以用"付出同收獲唔成正比"黎形容
D GRADE完全係亂比
就算你幾俾心機都唔會A RANGE到
鐘意音樂同MIXING既可以一戰 但真心成個SEM上足堂都唔會學到D咩野
特別一提final project Robert鐘意d學生自己整背景音樂 如果唔識作曲既話其實好難高分
身邊好多朋友已爛grade :)滿心歡喜reg左呢科但發現中左伏所以特登係reg科前上黎忠告各位不要犯人類相同的錯誤既憤青 上

workload大到喊 每兩堂要prepare小組present 而且present多過15 mins 
上堂內容都幾深 可能係我yr1的關系 好難follow, 大部分的人讀過business law 好勁
ｓｔｒｏｎｇｌｙ　ｎｏｔ　ｒｅｃｏｍｍｅｎｄ　ｙｅａｒ　１　ｓｔｕｄｅｎｔ　ｔｏ　ｔａｋｅ　ｔｈｉｓ　ｃｏｕｒｓｅ
上林SIR堂幾開心,我覺得CCIV係我入CITY之後學到最多野既堂話林SIR KILLER個啲應該係自己冇比心機,佢比哂指引教我地做好份野, 又容易約出黎CONSULT

得一份功課，一份presentation
上常要take attendance (9:00am)scarlet好好人，有唔明即管問佢

佢俾分真係OK

chinese course name: 死亡：重探索的學習方法
body: Yun上堂其實唔悶, 上lecture 講既解其實好有趣, 上三個鐘唔會覺得點難過. 但係做assignment 果d 就要小心d. 其實唔係點樣先叫做係好...有小小覺得有d 有 bias.唔洗Take attendance. assignment 量一般般, Yun好接受學生既意見.有人話太多野做佢就減少左一份. 但係exam就真係唔知做咩. 你可以話唔關lecture 事走哂佢都得, 因為上左都唔知exam 要點做先岩. marking criteria 完全唔清楚... 有d 伏既感覺

course name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship for Young Professionals
body:
peer evaluation就是一切, 無視當中努力的成果
一組人(~10人左右) 去完成一份powerpoint+ present
大家workload相若,workload平均分配,各司其職, 為何最後個grade可以差別咁大?一堂lecture 3小時, 可以2小時左右就走得
仲有堂所謂tutor 係廢, 無一堂需要返 搞到個schedule大失預算
lecturer早放 學生可以早走 大家固然開心 
諗住上呢堂GE可以輕鬆學習 點知最後比分個機制係咁不公

Mr. Law is a very bad instructor. He scolded people without a strong reason.
He expects others to respect him but he didn't respect his students. He is very subjective in giving comments about the individual presentation. I personally think that he has his preconception already before we do the presentation.I couldn't learn anything from him. He talks something that are really hard to understanding. The homework requirements given by him are not clear. We just don't know what to do. During the whole semester he just kept on playing videos.
自問有art 底，但遇著過不知所謂的老師。有bias到不得了！最慘系唔知佢會鍾意邊一類型既學生，只系知佢鍾意果個學生就高分，唔鍾意就低分。呢位instructor 可能自尊心好重或者好自卑又或者佢ff太多，成日覺得人地對佢無禮貌，無啦啦會話人地對佢無禮貌，好多人都比佢話過。人又mean 又鍾意話人，成日妄想學生challenge 佢
上堂教的東西對engine/science同學一定簡單易明，所以可以不上，但4個quiz要溫習，否則最後的分數會有頗大的分別，一定要去"show and tell"，就可以拿"A range"!!

冇exam,但都Ok多assignments,
有5個assignments, 個prof.上堂雖然輕鬆，但比分都算手緊，成日改study plan，所以一直加assignments, mid-term 超難，唔單至考concept，更考埋lecture notes的data/number!!

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body: Only work hard on the project (2 people as a group), 1XX pages can get good grade. If you want to get A range, reg this course.

Totally hate economics...enrolled this course just for my friend...The quizzes were very difficult, especially the second one. If you are like me who really hates economics, please don't take this course. But the tutor was very friendly and helpful.

I don't know 'bout you but I really like the grading of the course was based on quizzes and I think that's why I could get a decent grade from the course. I paid the best attention to every lecture, not just for the grade but I really liked the content covered and the way Andus taught attracted me to pay attention to. I really really recommend this course but I totally don't understand why so many people say this course is very difficult, I mean, you're only asked to study for the quizzes geez...don't be such lazy and then blame everything in the course okay...

The workload was quite heavy indeed but every piece of the classwork accounted for a very small proportion only, so the most important one was the exam which accounted for like 50% (if I didn't remembered wrong). Margaret was quite helpful throughout the course, it's really nice to listen to her lecture.

course name: Eat, Drink, Man, Woman: Cultural Identity of Koreans
body: Workload is not very heavy but the tutor is very strange. Sometimes, attendance is very important which she required us to take one by one, whereas sometimes she would take it by herself because she remember almost all students’ name which is very weird!! The powerpoints have no any structure and organization; one page can full of words, whereas another is just one large photo.For mid term, she asked so many strange questions which are not taught. For exam, she said 40 mc questions originally, but finally only 25 mc questions and most of them are not from the lecture notes.

teacher: Fu Ho Ying, Hui Na Na
body:
- 2 Quizzes 
- individual paper
- group project (report + presentation)
- no exam

Exciting class for cross Science-Art discussion!Workload is not heavy and actually fun to work with. I discovered many beautiful and innovative artists and their artworks when researching. The exam is fine. You just have to do your job and study (what's wrong with studying the whole thing? That's YOUR DUTY AS A STUDENT). Our group project didn't touch deep enough to impress Margaret. Overall, it is an interesting and easy class. Margaret is funny and helpful. Don't be shy to ask Qs.

He had an odd teaching style. He only provided ten ppt slides and requested students to copy the remaining slides. He didn't give back any of the three exercises or comment on the class performance. He TRIED to be funny and his English is...

假如對語言同linguistics有興趣或認識，這個課程就啱曬啦。好似其他同學話齋，得一份essay, 一份 group project (poster), 同埋兩個 open quiz. 上堂要抄 notes, 唔系notes有機會唔明。 Quiz 的問題照抄 tutorial exercise， 所以記得返或問人抄翻。 Quiz完走得， 唔使等到夠鐘。上堂經常有video看， 老師又講得好， 所以都幾爆！

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body:
其實tutorial上咗都無壞嘅, 都係講點做assignment
但係assignment唔係厚就高grade
呀sir一睇就知你係咪copy wiki啦
想高grade要寫多啲分析同見解
我份report字多圖少冇乜排版都有A+

teacher: I forgot his name, he is the chairman of AIIB
body:
2 field trip report( one of them is zero carbon building)
1 group presentation (present a green and intelligent building in HK, no pic can be used in the internet. Doing field visit before presentation is a must.
It's hard to do consultation with the tutor as he seldom replies email~~

course name: Discovering the Living Environmental: How Green Are You?
body:
1 individual field trip report
1 group field trip report
1 group presentation(design green home)+written report (10 ppl in 1 gp)
1 final test(base on lectures and field trips)(even i did revision, i was not sure about the answer of the part related to field trips)
The tips of doing well in this course is choosing good group mates!!
I was in a gp that I know no one!! And they were so hea~~

total 有3次QUIZ 同 1份GROUP PROJECT.
Quiz其實你有溫過下Notes點都會Pass, 有D Quiz 仲好易攞到90-100分。
Group Project 其實係寫Lab Report, 10個人一組，好快做完。
強烈建議中學有讀chem既人讀。

a friendly and nice tutor, who is reli willing to tutor your work till you are satisfied, though no concrete suggestions were ever given, but she gave me a direction, which reli helped with my final essay, even though my final grade is quite poor, but it's reli my own fault

course name: Sustainable Business: Doing Good Business While Doing Good
chinese course name: 可持續發展的商業：謀求做好事與企業發展的共贏
body: killer, gave no direction to individual reports and in-class worksheets, had no discipline in giving ppl those 'panda cards', which made participation marks impossible to get, gave no concrete suggestions on assignments, he was nice though, once bought us some sweets, but harsh on marks

chinese course name: 歷史與文化中的中國女性
body:
Awesome teacher!
willing to dedicate himself into tutoring students, friendly, nice, interesting lectures, if you are willing to spare no efforts into getting good grades, he won't disappoint you coz he reli recognizes ppl's efforts

course name: Celebrity and Scandals: Contemporary Issues in Hong Kong Popular Culture
body:
講下workload:1. Lecture 
每個禮拜都有ppt, 關於狗仔隊、觀眾同名人嘅關係，會介紹一D media嘅theory, e.g. magic bullet theory, 對media有興趣嘅人可以讀下。
對我來講唔悶，間唔中有片睇同guest lecture. 
有reading, 深淺都有，可以加強你對media & communication嘅認識，不過考試唔會出, 得閒睇下會學到野

course name: Eat, Drink, Man, Woman: Cultural Identity of Koreans
body:
其實一開始D lecture都正正常常，講下韓國歷史、節日、飲食文化等
但係讀讀下就覺得伏伏地
D ppt愈來愈多圖，成版都係圖但冇重點，唔知佢想表達乜野，even我冇走堂都覺得佢覺得佢講ppt好唔organize
原本話得一個quiz最後變左兩個，有溫書都識不過要睇reading打定底
不過佢都幾賤，叫你list out K-pop, K-drama, K-movie每樣一個作品, 我冇為意所以有D寫返前面MC D example, 佢就扣左我一分，話唔可以抄前面，但重點係佢又唔喺份卷事先講明D example唔用得，岩都變左錯-__-
exam係25題MC+5條SQ, 有D MC都騎騎呢呢，竟然問你韓國D醬點整，重點係佢ppt完全冇提過
group project一定要係8分鐘present完，佢話想攞高分就要有趣，例如整片/介紹冇咩人講過嘅topic。我地組就整左個動畫，不過佢全程冇表情，都唔知佢like唔like
總括而言，我覺得佢份人怪怪地，有時唔take attendance, 一take就好麻煩= =有時一上堂就逐個逐個叫名，有時落堂之後輪流自己tick名，有時佢又會自己點，搞到下一堂個professor好唔gur阻住佢上堂。上堂就笑笑口，但其實好難捉摸
利申：唔係因為攞左一個麻麻地嘅grade先咁唱衰佢，而係我冇走堂讀完呢個course嘅情況下嘅真實感受！信不信由你 :)

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
上堂主要講中文，講的野都幾得意，
如果有打開機／有興趣，上堂完全唔悶
同埋好自由，你食野，行來行去都唔會理你一個個人present，一個group present，
兩個都唔難，group只要用心少少做，佢都會讚

course name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship for Young Professionals
body: I am the lectuers of GE2304! In semester B 2013/2014, 7% of the students failed in this course! Some are not happy with their grades. Even explained many times, some students still assume (or try to argue) that every body will get the same scores in the group. In fact, the grades are very different based on peer assessment of individual contribution. To prevent friends try to be in the same group and help each other's assessment, teams were divided by lecturers randomly. No students can choose group by themselves. After a few years' testing, the assessment will be even more strict in the coming year.Although interesting and inspiring to many students, free riders and lazy students will have a difficult life in this course.
鄧老師在課堂中集中教授價值觀，大學裡已經很難找到充滿教學熱誠的老師。他的課堂是最精彩最有趣的，

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body: 上堂唔悶氣氛幾好, assignment 要求清晰, 不過6個人一組太多
1401 同呢個都B+真係幾反映到你真實的能力

course name: Enhancing Your Service Leadership for the 21st Century
chinese course name: 為 21 世紀強化你的服務領域領導力
body:
穩陣A-之選
功課要認真 PROJECT要小心 EXAM定要溫

course name: Ironman: The Art and Science of Robots in Our Society
chinese course name: 鋼鐵人：機器人在社會的藝術與科學
body:
2 individual assignment (10 question each)
Write more to present you are well prepare and want to finish the homework
For example at least 100 - 150 words for each question. Some of them i even wrote 400-500 depending what it asked. Mostly searching from Internet and recalling from notes and lectures2 quiz (10 question each) (open notes)
which you write related to what Dr. Ray said in class you will get high marks
Quite limited time to finish the quiz but i write on all the lines it given on the answer paper

weekly tweet x9 (30%): 有topic 3mins內可完成 
group project(30%): 有infographic(5%), presentation(5%), report(20%) 組員平均打3頁就搞掂, 1-2個人present, my group got almost full mark.
quizx2(30%): 20條mc+ 2條lq 有溫書就識, 2次都above mean 1x分
其餘個10%應該係class participation 
9成分數都會係Blackboard出齊, 所以基本上未出grade都知自己grade range

chinese course name: 建立 21 世紀事業發展優勢
body: 兩個Prof都好nice 有幾份reflection要寫，係base on guest talk 既，大約500字就OK，workload不大。有一個quiz，唔難既，只要溫notes溫得仔細D就可以。最尾會有個group presentation & group report，present完之後prof會講下你個組有咩要改下，寫report個陣就會易上手好多。輕鬆之選：）

得兩個ASSIGNMENT 同一個open book quiz. 
如果之前無學過的話, 應該會覺得有d難度。
覺得單睇佢d lecture notes 唔夠, 如果要明多d 就要自己搵書睇。
至於group project, 都唔算難同煩。 你可以選擇畫mind map, redesign or create 一d新野.

總共有三個open book quiz(一個optional), 一個group poster display, 一個group final report
最好上齊lecture&tutorial
因為d ppt slide會留空格叫你上堂填返
Quiz會出tutorial堂上做既worksheet
Poster display係向同學介紹自己poster&題目
張張poster show晒出黎 好似展覽咁
最後既final report deadline係考完試之後 所以時間好充足
有上堂 apply到個course學既野就可以 係一個穩穩陣陣既GE!

course name: Urban Development and Construction - from the Past to the Future
body:
唔洗TAKE ATTENDANCE~~
3篇文加一份GROUP REPORT PRESENT~~
輕鬆之選
有返齊, 做曬d twitter, 不過果兩個test 都 below average. 自問有温書, 雖然吾係日温夜温果隻, 但係真係冇expect 個grade會今.
e 個course 都吾錯, 其實都ok 有趣, 但係真係好多野背, 同d 字真係好難. 但係如果你係會背下書, 一定吾會死.

course name: Words and Images: Reading and Writing in the 21st Century
body:
明明check過aims 依個course今個sem最高都係A-
樓下個個吹到有A -_-
Anyway Mags係個好老師，係唔知點解grade咁緊

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body: 導師好nice,差唔多每堂都早放。一個presentation,做好之後可以consult下佢,佢會比意見你去改好佢,最緊要有自己拍嘅片。一個 MC test，一定要背曬所有notes因為佢照筆記出，溫左實冇死。一份report,每人最少5頁，好輕鬆。成個course都好好讀絕對輕鬆之選，而且仲學到有用嘅野,值得一讀。

course name: Chinese Cultural Canons and Their Modern Application
chinese course name: 中國文化經典及其現代應用
body: A good course with nice lecturers ;)

The course coordinator will upload a lot of reading which includes a lot of difficult words to Blackboard. There are only 3 small notes teaching you how to write the descriptive writing, the narrative writing and the critical essay. You can read a lot of travel stories in this course but cannot learn the skills of travel writing. This is not what I expected and I felt quite upset. For example, when I wrote a restaurant review for Assignment 1: descriptive writing, this course will only teach you what to include in a restaurant review but not the descriptive and food words. When I wrote the critcal essay, I needed to refer to the course reading which really restricted my ideas and critical thinking.導師俾individual assignments 分非常緊手, critical essay 又話可以好free 咁寫, 點知分數只係中規中矩; group project 鬆手好多, 但group project 係要去一個HK 的地方explore, 然後用wix, weebly, etc. 整website and then presentation! 我覺得幾好玩, 但你或會覺得time-consuming!
唔知係唔係今個sem 有CLASS ge students, 對senior students 俾分真係十分緊手! 或可能另外一班的另外一位導師俾分較鬆手!

two exercise (not in-class)
one group paper, not difficult, focus on theory and analysis
one test (MC and few short questions) moderate difficulty
not really know how to do the test, yet unexpectedly good grade

好多野做, 好多野做
唔明點解d人話science底都讀得掂
見到人地quiz係咁寫自己唔知做緊乜都幾無助
b左係因為assignment chur
兩個quiz+exam應該死左
呢科好講自律, 唔會好同你講d功課既要求
上堂要抄note, exam會問返

呢科幾兩極化

題目,presentation要creative d

Court report and portfolio is ok.
Take home exam is a bit difficult.

course name: Information Management and Its Social Impact
chinese course name: 資訊管理及其對社會的影響
body:
成個project都唔知佢想點，一來scope好大，二來guideline入面要你做的野好多，但係只會比你寫 300/500 words，於是基於字數限制，你每個point都唔可以寫太多，你寫的野就會被迫變得好空泛，但係咁樣佢又會覺得你寫得唔好
而且呢科讀既野真係冇咩用，學用OneNote都竟然要開班教足一個sem，問親十個有九個都會話唔知呢科讀緊咩

hea course, 但建議有programming底既同學先take呢個course, 或相約識programming既朋友一齊讀.

course name: Urban Green City: Pollution and Solution
body: 新開科, tutor俾分好鬆手, 所以個range好窄幾大workload, 比較麻煩.

Y-Dang 係必reg tutor, 好nice, helpful!
有3個quizzes, 唔算難, 除左問lecture內容亦會問上堂睇過既戲, 每次都係quiz前一日/前幾個鐘先溫.
有篇scene analysis paper, 交之前會有堂係workshop for你交draft(都會計分), 俾分幾鬆.
group project係拍video, 會random分組, 對冇拍片知識既人來講會係幾大workload, 根據佢俾既concept word要拍一段5分鐘既片, 同埋要交一份劇本, 最後仲要交reflection paper. 不過tutor好好, 會經常俾時間我地discuss, 俾comments我地, 亦會推介係用咩software剪片好, 冇器材的話更加可以問佢借! 未交之前已經講會俾a range全班.
y-dang幾睇participation, 最好答下問題, 每堂佢都會自己take attendance.
上堂氣氛幾好, 幾輕鬆, 會早落堂, 又試過玩問答遊戲. 最後一堂佢會買蛋糕請大家食.
lecture = sleeping timetutorial class = chatting time

鄧立光堅係個好老師，好用心教。
功課唔算太多，印象中都好似係隔一星or每星期一份，有d其實係in class，好快做好，所以冇咩WORKLOAD。
我中文底唔好同埋有份10%功課冇交所以B-。

專心上 lecture 同 mark 低重點對於quiz好重要.
雖然quiz俾你 google, 但係好多都搵唔到, 要靠lecture mark 低既野.Assignment 尚算輕鬆, 但係最尾既 final project 要用專業既電腦 program, 對於配樂混音無乜興趣就唔建議揀呢科.

course name: Urban Development and Construction - from the Past to the Future
body:
呢科淨係上左交功課 分組同 PRESENT 個3幾堂
得一份Individual assignment 同 一份group project 要做 
assignment 要做幾條長題目 其實Google下 一晚搞掂
group project 8-9人一組 打左份6000幾字report 再present 
呢科算係輕鬆

Every week have quiz but most are not difficult
Need to have one site visit and write report
And a final group report
I can't imagine I can get A range
But seems many people get good grade

Wonderful Lecturer, but active participation is strongly recommended to those who want to get a higher grade. You will not be bored by this lecturer.
Personal Consultation is welcomed before submission of your project, her opinions indeed help a lot in producing great personal essay.
Before group presentation, consultations are provided, follow tutors’ instruction to make amendment. It helps to get a good group mark.
After group presentation, tutor opinions are useful for producing final essay. Follow it.
Students are advised to attend the lecture, tutors said that most students obtained bad grade because they did not attend lecture, 12% for 12 lectures, already many grades in that 12%, even from pass to fail. Though some students said the lectures were useless for project and time consuming, but whether take that 12% or not, it’s your decision.

Wonderful Lecturer, but active participation is strongly recommended to those who want to get a higher grade. You will not be bored by this lecturers.Personal Consultation is welcomed before submission of your project, her opinions indeed help a lot in producing great personal essay.

Very nice tutor! She really taught us a lot of legal knowledge, it is not difficult to understand and those knowledge is very useful in the future. 
For BBA students, if you have taken any BBA Company Law Courses, it is beneficial for you to take the course. The first several lectures are about Contract Law, for example, invitation to treat, consideration.....
Workload of this course may be a bit heavier than other GE Courses, students were divided into group and they were required to present and simulate some real cases which had been published in THE CHOICE(選擇月刊). They were required to present 3, 4 times throughout the whole course (FINAL PROJECT presentation is NOT COUNTED).
Active participation in the class is required and strongly recommended. Class participation constitutes 30% of your final grade. 
Teachers render staunch support to you and your group mates in final group presentation project, consultation are available, you may talk with the lecturer about your project plan and she is very willing to give helpful opinion.
Personal consultation about individual essay is also welcomed, but tutor may not answer ALL your question in order to be fair to other students.
Teacher is very helpful in answering ALL Legal questions. Wonderful Lecturer. Great!

course name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship for Young Professionals
body:
伏到喊！
如果自問唔係好　ａｃｔｉｖｅ　就唔好ｒｅｇDr sun 認真有問題 , that on9 peer evaluation can KILL You and seems your effort is not being rewarded !!!!!!!!
睇人地留言個個話佢好grade, 但原來又中左伏, 呢個tutor自己本身英文又差, 比分又冇準則, 千祈唔好選佢

一份3000字既Group Essay
一個Test
幾份class work
其實基本上唔係太多野做,
不過本身個test都炒炒地,
估唔到都有B+
呢一科係新開嘅GE, 由2個tutor一齊教，兩個都好有心教書。第一堂個tutor已經講明唔會俾功課我地，目的係想我地認識呢科同想我地產生興趣，唔想我地有額外嘅workload。
全體降左一個grade

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body:
其實大部分CCIV的課程都一樣
啊SIR 第一堂都講過,
功課交齊 番足堂 至少有一個B,
每走2堂, 降一個sub grade.
功課反而唔係最重要, 只要你格式對就OK, 質素很難差很遠. 
就算你堂堂發夢, 完全唔識平仄, 上網都可以查平仄啦. (PS 我本身完全不會作詩)
工作量我覺得很輕鬆
就總共作2首詩和簡單的評論
相比起那些個個星期寫BLOG..又有TEST 的GE~已經超幸福了

course name: Discovering the Living Environmental: How Green Are You?
body:
上堂悶 學既野有COMMON SENSE
亦有完全唔理解既野 
呢科收穫同付出都係成正比既
主要都係睇你係個GROUP PROJECT到做過幾多野
重點係 千其唔好以為份PROJECT做得好好就唔洗理個QUIZ
我就係咁樣衰左
所以真係要溫好D個QUIZ

Wow! The workload is really...... You have to write a reflection after every lesson (the student log book), finish a mini project as well as random assignment(s).The good thing of this course is that the harder you work, the more you gain~~HAHA =D

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body: The tutor is quite nice and her instructions are very clear. If you study hard and pay attention to her lessons, you WILL NOT die in the quiz~~ In other words, your effort will definitely pay off!Anyway, if you are a fan of math, this GE course is designated for you=]

course name: Ironman: The Art and Science of Robots in Our Society
chinese course name: 鋼鐵人：機器人在社會的藝術與科學
body:
Individual:
Assignment (10 short question ) x2
in-class quiz (10 short question ) x2
Group(up to 8 person):
Lego (design ,build and program+ present)
Case Study ( free to choose the topic) (present + report[4 pages/each person])
we have 3 lab section this semester and the rest of the time is lecture time 
many video were played in lecture (around 2 hour per lecture ?) 
but you have better attend the lecture because most of the quiz question were discussed during lecture 
Dr Ray is kind and you can get good grade if you have good team mate
one of the free rider (free ride in both lego and case study part ) also got a range

quiz好難 基本上要將佢上堂打返份transcript要錄埋音黎溫先會識哂
openbk但係google都搵唔到
grp present好hea只要有一齊grp埋講過套戲既sound就溝通就得
份paper都幾多野寫下 不過個分都幾好
最後final pj用左唔算好多時間做 個分唔係幾好 得79.5
比幾多努力會得到幾多分 不過整體黎講呢科同想像中有幾大既出入
學到既唔多
唔係幾recommend

3個quiz唔難 但係唔溫書會唔識因為有啲要睇textbk上堂無講
呢個tutor好怪
份individual report勁嚴全班得三個a range仲有啲攞c
跟住怕我地爛grade就全班個video pj都A range
有一組真係故事又差拍得又差都有A
真心覺得對其他認真做既組好唔fair
跟住自己心情差多野煩就發洩係我地到仲話自己唔evil
跟住有啲task又話好casual結果就比爛分人
總之唔recommend佢啦

3quizzes+1group pj(poster+booklet+present)
好多野做 每堂只會up12頁ppt 無source無ppt既同學要自己上堂抄ppt 啲quiz都幾難幾難捉摸 每份quiz都自己借reference bk溫因為無買course pack..淨溫ppt完全唔夠
grp pj因為早開始所以唔chur 每教完一個section就開始寫content最後淨係排版同design唔太難
千其唔好reg呢個tutor 我上堂完全聽唔到佢講野完全靠自己 無睇錯 係聽唔到 初初以為speaker唔夠大聲坐正係個喇叭前面先發現係因為佢講野lur 以為淨係英文lur點知用中文consult都係聽唔到 email又唔覆 consult完又答唔到我地又無建議 reg佢同自學無分別 但係比分都唔太緊既

好有heart既老師,
真心想教好學生
唔係想hea過就算,
難得可以係大學遇到一位咁有教學熱誠的老師
雖然呢科得pass/fail,但大家上鄧老師的堂都好專心

好盡責既miss,上堂學到好多野,
可能大半班都係asso,所有上堂好認責,
每堂都有Exercise,功課
如果真心想學下英文,唔想hea過每個Week呢6粒鐘,
可以reg Hebe

上堂好hea,得一個presentation, final report, quiz, 同埋2個assignment,
presentation同final report佔大部分總分,Quiz,assignment佔好少分
建議有programming 底先好讀,唔係比人屈機
個project要用matlab 下Plot graph,分析下data
上堂基本上無乜聽書,最後上網搵code,睇youtube學matlab

miss普通話授課,大半班都係mainland, 
但miss識聽廣東話,所以Present可以講廣東話
miss好nice,present同論文都搵左佢consultation,建議都好實用,
本身中文麻麻,最後都有A-大課要上足,唔好走,
上大課專心D, 抄下notes,之後多數識答工作紙,
因為好多時上堂ppt會有答案,如果訓左,無抄抵,就會唔識答..

course name: Discovering the Living Environmental: How Green Are You?
body:
上堂內容真係可以話無乜特別用，但唔算深。
有field trip有小測有Project，睇落好chur，其實唔難。前提係要有人識Archi，否則份project真係極頭痕......
咁多嘢入面最頭痕就係Field trip report，內容都唔知填乜入去好。

course name: Reading Lives, Writing Selves: Autobiography and Culture
body: 這科的assignments不算多，但如其中一個留言所述，Readings量絕對是繁重，每星期幾十頁有多，堂堂我都只看了一半。上堂都以討論為多，Beth會叫你發表自己的意見，所以看了一半都吹到同答到，如果完全沒看她一定知。

course name: The City in Chinese History and Culture
body:
1107講中國城市，係由三個老師負責教授，分別係錢華、林學忠同馮志弘。
而今次導修係由錢華負責指導。課堂內容方面：
基本上聽同唔聽係無分別，因為同GROUP PROJECT係完全無關係，但因為每一堂都有堂課，計分的，所以我堂堂都上足。

2210教授既內容係關於是1949年以後既中國政治與社會轉變
例如：
1) 戶籍制度的得失
2) 中國城市化發展
3) 香港回歸
4) 中國在1949年後的政治架構事實上，呢個課程都幾悶下，正如GARY自己所講係extremely extremely boring，基本上我每一堂都唔會聽佢講野，但由於2210係有15%出席分，所以即使悶，我每堂都有上。
Good teammates + major in EE = A+

course name: Sustainable Business: Doing Good Business While Doing Good
chinese course name: 可持續發展的商業：謀求做好事與企業發展的共贏
body:
Not much to do . Basically attend all the class and finish all the in class exercise , consult her before group presentation , and you would get a good grade.Useful and interesting lessons with videos and news , definitely worth the time . 
Highly recommended course .

Anthony is a really good tutor with patience .He discussed a lot of daily issues and hot topics with us in class.But I personally think that he focuses a lot on attendance , for example , all of the members in my group basically attend all the classes and all of us got A range. Be attentive and active and you would got good grades.But one point to take note of , it's a heavy GE course which requires plenty of reading and complete understanding of the psycho concept.

有Weekly twitter, 難取高分，有交就有固定分數
兩個Quizes 有温都輕鬆過關，選擇題4 分一題，第一次quiz 20選擇題中錯了約8 題就低過平均分了（大概這是造成Grade B 的主因）。一個project,約13-15頁的報告， 6-8人一組，題目自訂，要認真點做。
再來就是presentation，主要是根據報告內容，製作一份infographic，有網站指示製作，未曾做過相關設計都不需要擔心。

雖然堂上工作不多，但其實不太明白Mr. Law 在說什麼。沒有notes，所以很難catch up。而且，導師較偏心英文好及外國的同學，對其他同學說話較為Mean。不容易去理解tutor的requirements of review。Send了很多的email給tutor詢問，沒有收到任何回覆問題的email。即使理解了，像我presentation得到頗好的comments ，也最後不一定得到相應的grade，因為批改的是不同人。

只需在堂上提問或回答問題以引發同学討論，全期不超過6條。
另再交一份paper 
很輕鬆
鼓勵同學專心待課室上堂，避免較啱時間先入課室並問完問題即走，請尊重老師，同學，自己及課程

雖然我沒有讀過psycho，但本身對psycho有興趣。
上課的時候，我們會以小組形式討論，內容有趣實用。
Anthony好nice，問他問題也會回答。

Although open-note tests and examination are difficult (you cannot answer half of them even you have studied thoroughly), I still get A-. My another teammate gets A- as well. Try to get most of the marks from case reports and lab report. Although workload of this GE course is a bit heavy, you can easily get a good grade as long as you have tried your best in this course.

整個course要分組， 大約三至四人一組， 分group 和 individual work
individual 要做有一份幾百字的 progress report，150字內 email 和 幾百字 reflection. 
group 要做 present 去 introduce 你個 idea 俾你 potential clients, 按 client 要求 design 一份 blue print, 同埋要同另外一組開一個 meeting
d task 唔係太多同埋唔係太難，只要 group mates 
肯做野
Jon 俾分都算鬆手， 全班大多數都係 B或 B+

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body:
淨係做report
好簡單
但你永遠唔知佢點比分 可能同一份野佢改兩次會完全唔同grade
我做左六十幾頁 萬幾字
我另一組fd同我差唔多 佢a我b+結論係個個人做既野都係copy wiki etc
最易令咩grade就睇運
呢科.... 真係鐘意philosophy 的同學先好揀..........

極伏 notes同teat, exam係兩回事 溫哂notes都唔會識
workload之大 難以想像
極懷疑之前話拎a又利申哂無理科底嘅人係拎c range之後走o黎伏人
好後悔reg呢科

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body: 其實上佢堂可能會有d悶或者有d深，始終讀哲學大家亦不斷問一些刁鑽問題。老師教書系好適合香港學生聽，超級容易英文，講解theory 時候用example令我地明白， 不過上得耐3個鐘，有時都會好悶，有人break時候中途走左，始終夜晚7點上到10點，上堂唔比講野唔系會嘭你扯，比食野飲野既（但要盡快).上堂同老師就講完啦，講course structure, 有3樣野，Presentation, Written essay and exam. (30,30,40)(百分比好似喺咁)

内容都係中國發展，唔難，就算無商科底都可以報，工作量唔多，淨係individual essay+group report ppt，平時無功課，上堂氣氛輕鬆，唔洗話咩要答問題先有分，tick attendance已經得，而且Yanni好好人，比分鬆手，功課方面時間都好鬆動，隔離組（Spencer）係跟足Schedule，而Yanni的assignment會延遲啲，所以成個course可以輕鬆應付，如果想報呢個course的話，推薦Yanni。
有得retake我係應該開心嘅

Workload:
2份class assignment (輕鬆5分鐘KO)
1份 group project (有12 weeks 比你做，要你搵個case 分析，Stani 唔太建議common 既case，我果組用外國case......)
1個 final test (其實係exam黎......雖然MC + fill in the blanks，但係MC幾陰濕，用common sense 撞會錯曬。大把人「覺得易但錯到七彩」。Fill in the blanks就祝君好運啦，因為13 weeks 講左好多theories 同 specific terms。所以唔想背野的話，就唔好選呢科。)Lecturer:
Stani - 輕鬆，PPT 易明
Oliver (Guest) - 認真，想學野一定要上佢堂
Alfred (Guest) - 認真，但偏向sharing

Court Visit 後COURT REPORT (A-)
一份1000字PORTFOLIO (A)
一份TAKE HOME EXAM (問題比assignment難)上堂唔洗聽書
功課認真D就得
雖然係School of Law既course, 但係D terms 其實唔難

coursework只有log book同final project
有時中間會早d group discussion要交d零碎野
除左log book要花d時間去做
成個course真係幾輕鬆 tutor幾肯教你野

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
呢個tutor真係hea到冇朋友
堂堂返去聽佢講遊戲發展既歷史
考就唔係考果d野
上上下堂叫你玩下board game跟住寫感受
final 就desigh1隻game 同 ppt present + report佢教既野同考你既野完全係2回事
伏到媽媽聲

Stani教書似sharing多，上堂可以好hea
Guest lectures d professors反而好認真
個course既重點都係final exam同project啦
Exam都唔太難，係short ques冷門d，hea人必選Stani！

上Anthony堂唔算悶
每堂都拎D幾有趣既issue比全班做discussion
例如公主病, freerider 係學到野既
但要注意既係佢上堂教既野同test既野係完全唔同
佢預我地要自己先將所有concept自學 
等我地做完quiz先會教番我地
所以quiz出得唔算難 肯跟住guideline逐個google下都會做到
quiz1&2都係得15/20 quiz3同project個分唔知道
但整體做既野都唔算多 起碼無paper無exam
每個quiz都係前一日先溫 project都係一星期前做
所以有A-都幾喜出望外
錢華老師是非常認真負責的老師，推薦內地生選擇。一分耕耘一分收穫，閱讀文獻，整理內容，製演示文稿，彙編論文都需要小組里的每個人認認真真地準備。能夠學到很實用的學習方法，如何查閱文獻，如何完成論文，連標點符號引用格式都會變得非常規範。GE1501是讓大家收穫很大的課。

chinese course name: 建立 21 世紀事業發展優勢
body: 基本上跟足導師要求，都有b range，而個quiz同reflection 影響到你究竟有沒有a range 。 個quiz 只要你有温都會識

course name: Architecture and Space in Chinese Culture
body:
依個trip要去三日兩夜大陸參觀建築，睇係幾好睇嘅，但係用離做project的話，每個點睇嘅時間唔夠......建議大家諗定個present同最後導覽圖點做先出發，唔好是但影咗d相，返香港先慢慢諗
Paper同最後嘅proj指示幾乎係冇......好大空間發揮但系亦都好無從下手咁，個grade比想像中低好多

呢個Tutor講英文好唔掂
唔係killer
要TAKE attendance
有溫到QUIZ 
但我接近7成堂都無take到
最後B+ 可以接受
作為一個完全嘅文科生，基本上每一課我都係唔明........quiz分數唔低，present同paper每人都係做好少也，比想像中好grade好多

主要要做既野得3 part.
1. 上堂要quiz,不過好簡單 8個quiz計6個
2. 一個site visit report 1000-1500字
3. 一個group project,題目睇你跟邊個呀sir 再自訂, 做完最後present返出黎就得
要做既野唔算多,正正常常都應該有A range.
利申:全組6個都A+

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body:
Nancy講嘢1999 
GROUP PROJECT既指令唔清唔楚 只係叫你係咁搵LITERATURE 做完份DRAFT話呢樣唔好 條題目唔夠其他組INTERESTING 要做過份REPORT
考試要考COURSE PACK, 勁難! 要溫得好深入先會識

course name: Media and Consumption: Food and Fashion in Everyday Life
body: very boring lectures

course name: Urban Development and Construction - from the Past to the Future
body:
one project with 6-8 ppl in a group (10 pages report + 10 mins presentation) one individual assignment
no need to attend the lectures

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
Kenneth 好好人, 同埋問佢野佢會好願意答你. 
成個course 有兩個Quiz 同埋 一個 group project
Quiz 佔 30%, 大部份問題 base on notes
Project 佔 70%, 8-13 人一組, 一定要寫report, present. 
我哋拍埋片同設計書籤.
因為夠多人, 可以 2-5人一part, 所以工作量唔多(如果冇 free riders)

呢科真係伏仆街
初初仲以為佢好grade, 但係當上完第一堂又過埋add drop period drop唔到真係屌一聲!1)上堂係激悶!!!!完全唔知佢up乜!對於啲冇乜physic底既人千奇咪reg!!!!
a hea course with good grade

chinese course name: 歷史與文化中的中國女性
body: Lam sir 份人幾好笑，幾nice，個course内容我都超中意，但睇見個grade,就有少少sad...... 係小組consult 就已經覺得Lam sir 的時候，問他好多時候都問非所答，都唔知他想點......可能真係簡錯tutor，coz 讀過呢個course d朋友話Dr.Lo會好清晰甘回答學生問題，起碼都比我知道發生咩事啦......

香港老師
堂堂有野學
幫到我清CONCEPT

chinese course name: 歷史與文化中的中國女性
body:
英文讀，有4個assignments
online discussion×2 (一個參觀保良局後感想，一個評論其中一組的presentation，各600-700字）
group presentation(題目有關中國女性的動畫，書籍或探討歷史人物，一人至少10分鐘，視乎你個組有幾多人)
final report(整合返presentation你負責講個part另加reflection，約2000字)
上堂講下唔同階層背景的中國女性，幾有趣，特別係個group project會改變你對中國女人的認知，落堂前有工作紙，整體唔錯！

有3個quiz,第3個係optional,3個quiz計最高分果兩次
quiz做一個鐘,有true&false 有dbq有longq 部分係揀題目做 都要寫幾多字
其實我就覺得唔上堂只睇ppt做quiz係有困難的,ppt好簡單做題目未必知道要寫咩,但上左堂quiz b+以上唔係好難 marking唔係好緊group project 要poster presentation 好似展覽咁放哂咁多組poster 要評其他組分要介紹自己個poster比睇既人 之後寫個2000字內的report 係exam 最後一日交 好多時間做

上堂英文聽唔明！
考試更加唔明！
仲要，堂堂都計出席率！
大伏！！！

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body: 成個course得一份group project，2個人一組，非常輕鬆。之前見到話輕鬆好grade就同friend一齊reg。我同佢除左一開始個幾堂有一齊上之外，大部分時間都係我反佢唔反，互相簽到。（掩面）尼個course最重要就係帶notebook，因為大部分時間都係對住部note自己做自己野。講真，尼個course一啲都唔難，你明左最基本的要求，份project就冇死嫁啦。雖然真係無咩學到，但都幾易拎好grade。

繁重難明之選~
勁多assignmens, A-F
A: outing review(10%, 320 words)
一定要參觀他介紹的畫展，然後寫reflection
B: reading n movie review(各佔10%, 各300 words)
套電影冇字幕，有唔有趣因人而異……
份reading得幾頁，但基本上無咩方向，唔知他想你寫咩……
C: artwork exercise(10%)
自己做件藝術品去重新演繹某個他上堂講過的藝術家的idea，然後上堂present…好難掌握，無創意的人就做得好辛苦，而且唔知他expect咩
D: group presentation(20%)
介紹和討論一個畫家的作品
E: individual meeting n final art review draft(10%)
同另外一個女人討論你份art review，她會俾方向同tips你
F: art review(30%, 1000 words)
討論一個他指定俾你的藝術家堂堂介紹唔同類型的藝術品，內容有時幾有趣，但個人認為好難明
attendance唔計分，放break逐個出去tick名，但走多過三堂即fail
assignments基本上冇咩方向，你唔知阿sir想要咩，send email俾他又覆得奇慢，甚至唔覆你……
之前有讀過art，但當代藝術同古典藝術都幾唔同，所以之前有讀過都冇幫助
較適合對當代藝術有認識的同學讀，唔係就好難follow，一頭霧水

course name: Vampire, Monsters and Teen Demons: Representations of the Dark Side of the Mind in Literature and Popular Culture
chinese course name: 吸血鬼、怪物及年輕惡魔：文學與大眾文化中精神陰暗面的象徵
body:
有兩個quiz,主要係mc,第2次quiz有short q
只要有睇Dr.Linder比既reading同埋上堂,高分唔難,我兩次都接近滿分一份Creative group project,形式不限,有好多組都好有創意好正
我地組作左篇poem同畫畫,攞A

hea之選~
有三個assignments: 
film review(1000 words)
creative writing(600-800 words)
video(group work: 5-6 mins)
堂堂都係講下故仔同睇下電影，唔會好難明，大部分人都係做自己嘢
落堂先點命，而且係舉手點
Sureshika好嚴格，要求好正宗的英文，相信一直以嚟接受的香港英文教育唔係她杯茶
本人冇英國文學底子，雖然UE有A+，但讀這個course都係得B-
交assigmment前已經預早幾日send draft俾她睇，她都話冇問題，咩i like your points，但出到嚟極低分，話我唔對題……
feedback完全useless，只能說她冇用心睇我份draft或根本就係玩我= =
但相信只是老師的問題，其他老師應該會好好多
適合對shakespeare的plays有興趣的同學仔，其實d plays幾有趣，好有故事性，不過不能否認上堂播的電影大部份都好悶

Professor 話要捉番緊D, 所以以為好grade諗住add可以按上一頁
呢科唔係真係咁hea, 一開始好多都唔明
不過讀得呢科嘅都想好grade 所以會努力讀
最後話考嗰D無考, 不過為知識呢個grade對得住自己有餘
呢科係比有興趣想學野嘅人讀, 學到野之餘唔洗擔心grade太差功課參考上一個留言

Prof.真係好好人，Email好快覆，仲成日請我地食野
比Grade唔緊手，但亦都唔算鬆手：
AT1: B+
AT2: B+
AT3: B+
AT4: A-
AT5: B+
上面係佢比既Grade，不過EN Department經常性都會內部調整分數，
加甘自問自己英文都唔係好，所以B都收貨。

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body:
簡單黎講，就係一份Assignment定你Grade
如果得閒無野做上下堂TAKE下ATTENDANCE點都好Ｄ既
雖然跟本就無人知所謂ATTENDANCE佔個Course幾多％
最後我份REPORT 60頁，拎B+，雖然無其他人講到咁好Grade，但係都收貨既P.S. 真係咩都無學過......

3個TEST....基本上5成人接近滿分,如果低過9成都好慘....
TEST好易好簡單,得3條,比分好鬆.
上堂好小人上,但其實教授好比心機教,
但係無人聽佢講書,都幾心酸.
依科又好成績又輕鬆,又可以學到有關物料GA野,
我覺得都幾有趣幾簡單,希望大家REG左唔好走咁多堂.
因為教授真係好慘....
LAB都幾有趣,最尾10人做報告2人一齊做幾百字就KO左
好輕鬆好開心
Colin 係一個後生仔, 同時係一個勤力盡責, 無架子既好老師.成個course係就係多野做, 但對presentation 的技巧有好大幫助.

teacher: Richard Kong, Joseph Wong, Alice Chik, Margaret Murphy
chinese course name: 自然科學，科幻小說和超自然現象
body:
依個GE好輕鬆,2份EASSY,比D心機搵下料就得,好易好好玩.
上堂幾好聽幾得意,係最尾講神話個到悶D...
PRESENTATION 幾多題目,有D都幾難做,大約有8條選1條,
因為評分係分開2間房,最尾如果你係做氣功,但評分的係教神話,
咁佢就可能唔明你講D咩/個樣好似唔係好想聽你講野咁,分數就可能會差小小
不過依科係值得REG ~
總體黎講Workload 唔大 Spencer 絕對係一個勤力同盡責既教授,有問必答.一個Group present 3-4人一組唔洗寫report 只做powerpoint就ok

又多野做 assignment指示又唔清晰
讀完完全學唔到野

Assignments: 
1)book review,睇本science fiction，以當中有咩future SCIFI technology為中心寫summary
1.2)好多人做得差，有份叫reflection嘅野加分（optional）
2)final report,詳細分析book review提及的technologies
*兩份assignments都有guidelines, 跟到十足十就無問題，我係做完第一份先知tutors好睇重guidelines, reflection係叫我地依guidelines 每個pt分析自己點解拎呢個分同點improve.quizzes:
總共有四個area嘅topics: 4個quizzes （Mc+1-2 short q）
1) 考physics野，d題目難到無讀過physics嘅我完全唔明佢問咩，考你可唔可以融會貫通
2) 答案上堂講過，notes未必有齊，但叫做4個quizzes最正常
3) 呢個quiz open notes, 但唔好天真的以為好好，因為竟然係計數，當初d tutors話唔會考計數，白痴的我信了，無帶cal機計什麼呢？（相信係太多人中伏，後來quiz只計最高分嘅3個）
4) 以上3個quizzes出嘅人都唔同，呢個又係第一個quiz嘅tutor出，可能太多人投訴，題目易咗好多，起碼有聽書有溫書就得

chinese course name: 歷史與文化中的中國女性
body:
RROUP PRESENT然後用PRESENT D野每人寫一PART組成GROUP PROJECT,兩份網上討論(其中一份系去保良局感想,可以自行去) 
PRESENT拎佐條難題目,所以花多佐好多功夫,要參考既資料比較多.BTW ,主要係報告翻你對個位女性既認識同一D個人感想,唔難.

chinese course name: 死亡：重探索的學習方法
body:
原本諗住mark非常繁重
不過諗諗下都係因為自己臨急抱佛腳
先好似好多野趕咁呢一課計分嘅係presentation(x2)+article(guest lecture report)+reflection journal (at least 13)+exam
其餘唔計分叫你寫吓嘢(唔交扣分)嘅都有三四份

上佢tutorial都只係分組同匯報,分完組就比題目你做,到報告先再要上,好輕鬆
但係最好報告前consult多幾次,佢D意見都好有用
平時分係每組匯報個時問問題,所以要準備好比人問勁難既野
如果答唔出LISA都會幫口,等你冇咁樣衰論文重個人評論同論證,註腳參考書目都睇得好緊
自問寫到最後有D放棄,因為搵唔到直接證據支持我個論點,只能從側面推返,但都有B+

课堂very boring
工作量很大
给分很严苛
Lawrence 好好人，in class assignment 唔識距都好樂意詳細教。兩個quiz 都係考翻econ野，即係上堂教d野，所以其實我覺得有無econ底都唔緊要，有比心機溫d notes quiz就無問題。 因為每堂要交in class assignment 同 in class discussion 要成組討論唔走得堂。

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy
teacher: CHONG Pui Man M., KWONG Yan Kit, GABRAKOVA Dennitza, WANG Xiaolin
chinese course name: 茶道：歷史、藝術、建築與哲學
body:
開頭果堂都正正常常,吹下水咁,同大部分時間都係講英文.
但之後d 堂有時係到講日文,我一d 都唔識,都唔知佢講o麥,連notes都係有好多日文terms,要自己查.
好多Notes, Tests d MC 好深,最慘係好多free riders
冇走過堂,聽足書,都係得C+, 唉,唔想再讀CTL開既GE...

Workload 唔算大, 3個tests, 第1個全MC,第2個一半MC一半essay,第3個3條short essays, 仲有個proj 整poster.
如果對psycho有小小興趣,讀呢科唔會辛苦得去邊. 堂一定要上足,因為多notes要抄. 就算唔上都要搵人抄番d notes .
呢科要背野,但唔洗點明. 如果果3個tests 都考得好, proj一般都有機會A rangeps. 上dennis堂係唔比影相,一定要手抄

Area 3 黎講 2317 算係多野做, 不過就靚grade. 我覺得呢科讀得好唔好同有冇science background 冇咩關係, 因為d terms都幾specfic. D 野唔算話難, 又唔會出d 數去難non-science students,基本上肯讀都OK.
我係DSE,讀過physics同chem,唔覺有咩優勢. 可能走堂太多,所以得B+

好多人話1401出名爛grade，尤其係英文本身唔差ge人。
本身我對呢個course無咩期望，but最後有呢個grade真係超開心，畢竟自己係elc.......
雖然一開始覺得Conny 唔會係放grade tutor，但我好中意她好有時間觀念，所以唔覺得homework 多。上她ge堂而且係學到野ge，對作文方面有新了解，所以有心學野ge你可以報Conny ga。

有時我會懷疑他知不知自己要教什麼和我們要做什麼。
照 ppt 讀，不過人很nice。
B range之選

course name: Reading and Writing America: Peoples and Cultures of the United States
body:
-唔好睇少個七百字, 你係要睇幾萬字ge required reading先寫得出, 問題極度习鑽
-closed-book mini quiz問題亦極度习鑽 睇幾萬字ge required reading, 但只出5條short questions 最火滾係我睇完幾萬字內容, 佢竟然出作者介紹個part, 問佢邊間大學畢業(要識串)
-你要expect唔係American Culture, 係American Literature

3 Essays (Travel Snapshot, Travel Narrative and Critical Essay)
1 Group Project and Presentation (Creating website)Full of readings and boring, final critical essay is related to readings.

Workload high.5 pieces of journal writing (~200 words)
1 large scale exhibition 
1 rooftop planting (5%)

今個sem唔知頭唔知路reg咗呢個衰人tutor，上堂又上得唔好，最後仲要爛埋grade。所以，我決定寫哂以下個衰人既惡行出黎，希望將來其他同學可以幸免於難，如果唔係到時成個sem上堂又上得唔好，最後仲會俾個衰人搞爛個grade！1）為人師表，其身不正 
上第一堂時，佢同大家講話如果同學係遲到既話，最多只好遲十五分鐘，如果唔係就會影響佢對你既印象，繼而影響功課既分數。我呸！你對同學既印象同功課分數點可以相提並論，俾分俾得咁唔公平，仲夠膽死厚顏無恥同學生理直氣壯咁講，豈有此理！
不過，佢自己之後每一堂都遲哂大到，99.99%係會遲45分鐘，有次突然扭軚遲十幾分鐘，殺了不少學生一個措手不及，有多位同學遲到一入課室見到佢，就知俾佢陰到。 
其中有次又係例牌遲45分鐘，個藉口真係離譜到冇人有，聽到就佛到有火！佢話佢自己食咗藥係office度訓著咗，醒番既時候已經趕番上黎。喂，唔該哂喎！如果你係office度訓足3粒鍾我地都吹你唔脹嫁啦，簡直就係當我地唔係野，浪費我地d寶貴時間。 
仲有一次就直情冇蒲頭，係冇任何通知情況下（如email），要d學生返到課室候等多時先至有個女仔黎通知話個佢請假、呢堂取消喎，事後上返堂後佢係眾多同學面前表演假咳。你上堂無返d學生被線到灘灘腰已經係鐵一般既事實，毋須多作搞辯、係度咳咳咳啦，d死人臭口水係度周圍飛、完全無視衛生，好嘔心呀！

I think I enjoy the most of the part of the course so I had felt relaxed during the "research" process.In our group, we had to design a "sensor" which was supposed to be a machine. Although we didn't need hand in lengthy report, we spent lots of time on searching and buying the components.

3篇文, 1個inforgraphic 同present
上堂個氣氛好好, 唔會悶同緊張, tutor 好nice 好好人, 搵佢consult 佢會俾到意見

以GE黎講, 工作量非常繁重

Palos is super nice and the course is really fabulous and relaxing! the journals and presentation are not difficult, one just need to put some own feelings and critical thinking into it

課堂有趣
有大概一半既堂都有guest黎
有d係黎講TALK 有次有大廚黎炸魚比我地食 亦有guest黎沖coffee比我地飲

會有Field trip
冇exam
final project係係u circle做一個exhibition (5-6個一組)
自由題 整野食又得 整board又得 整遊戲又得
講workload其實真係唔細
但係我未上過一個GE係咁豐富咁好玩的
最後個GRADE都唔錯Btw一開學果陣有得比每一組上ac2 天台種食物
但係果次10號風球落冰雹所有野都死哂 勁sad
希望下一次有人簡呢科可以種成功

A very nice teacher.
he is a local teacher with british accent.
never get bored in his lecture.
he taught us a lot more than it should be.
Not only teaching you english, but also the useful stuff in real life.

1. No group assignment.
2. One court visit report plus one portfolio plus one take-home exam.
3. All not less than 500 words but not more than 1000 words.
4. Quite rely on your delivery.

course name: Eat, Drink, Man, Woman: Cultural Identity of Koreans
body:
無想像中有趣
2個quiz佔百分比超細，唔難，但要花時間溫 (睇readings好浪費時間)
Exam出好少lecture notes/readings，要自己諗/估
Video比D心機整，唔好太broad，多D分析
我另一groupmate拎A, 所以exam佔分都幾多

2篇journal at least 600 words, 冇乜講過guidelines但應該唔洗好深入分析套戲
lecture有好多唔同課題非常有趣
有一個presentation都係唔洗好深入既分析
最尾一個open book quiz 只係寫下感想,唔算太難
呢科絕對學到野又輕鬆
識programming先好讀
IVAN好好人，有心教書，又肯答學生問題。上堂唔可以走堂，因為每堂會有個網上評論，50-100字，關佢教的野事。之後有一份GROUP PROJECT，要整片，但因為用GOOGLE MAP再加錄音，所以唔係難，最緊要係資料搜集，CM人都唔會有着數，未整過片(我自己係)都好易整得好好。最後有份1000字的ESSAY，可以寫番片做的城市，分析一下，用下引典，咁就A左。
BURKE好好人，同佢傾計好舒服，問佢問題又肯詳細答，而且有心教書。工作量輕鬆，聽court寫COURT REPORT，一份1000字PORTFOLIO，一份TAKE HOME EXAM。所以如果你要HEA讀又要走堂，都啱你。

一開始揀係因為對PSYCHO有興趣，唔知頭唔知路就揀左呢個PROF，之後先知原來佢係KILLER之中的KILLER。不過可能因為當初咩都冇諗咩都唔知，上堂專心聽書，落堂溫番當日抄的NOTES，最後A左。工作量方面，佢上堂只有十二頁PPT，其他POINTS要自己親手抄，雖然有點辛苦，但係因為咁所以我從來唔敢走堂唔敢傾計，上課專心聽書已經記得六七成。每個MODULE完左之後會有一次堂上的CLOSE BOOK TEST，總共三次。講真，上堂聽書，抄哂溫哂D NOTES就冇咩問題，我自己買左本SOURCE，但其實除了求心安都冇咩用，每份TEST都拿85%以上的分。另一份功課就係GROUP PROJECT，好彩遇到一班好同學，最後PRESENT唔錯。

reading唔洗睇得好深入,佢上堂會慢慢引導你答,就算答唔岩/同主題冇關佢都唔會話你,總之你有嘗試答就冇問題兩篇essays同一次group presentation, 平時有本journal要寫

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body: For students who are interested in statistics analysis and mathematics. This GE course would be a best choice in area 2.Personally speaking, I like the teaching style of Ms. TSANG: clear mind, clear speaking(though not that standard in English), and clear after-class explanation. The topics in this course are interesting and closely related to our daily life(soccer match, spam emails, apartment price, etc), which makes the course more attractive.
先利申: 文科仔,未讀過理科仲記得第一堂上既時候,見到佢教既physics野嚇死我,完全唔知做緊乜我只係一路抄,係到諗到底drop唔drop好...
professor 好人，不過走堂就難喇，因為每堂都有in-class assignment做
有3個TEST,1個PROJECT, 同埋堂堂都有堂課,TAKE ATTENDENCE用,D TEST個人覺得唔算太難.

The course is not as interesting as it may look like via the title. It simply introduces industries like Coal, Gas (Energy) and Food retailing, with some charts and statistics. However, seldom contents of these are really remarkable and worthy of being studied. The topics have not been deeply discussed. Many students sleep or wander their minds in the class.The workload is relatively pressured compared to other GE course in area 2. Two group papers with one group presentation may seem to be easy but actually not. If you want to get a good grade you need to research much and write well in your reports.

course name: Media and Consumption: Food and Fashion in Everyday Life
body:
2份individual assignment, 1份輕鬆既group assignment,
1份final group project,1個based on你group project既group presentation,
2個quiz.
聽上去好似好忙好煩咁不過其實佢d assignment都幾輕鬆,2個quiz又係好簡單,有溫書就識,prof俾分鬆手不過上堂係悶d

呢條友仔係Canadian,英文幾好,比分好手緊,我識既人都唔高分.講番正題先：佢教書好有問題,呢科明明係English for Engineering,唔係Engineering for English,但佢既理解係engine既比重大過英文.大佬,明明係Department of English開架,點解講engine logic多過教英文架!就係因為講logic,比佢扣左勁多content分,我D文同last個份proposal都唔高分,以為C硬,但可能我sem頭個presentation幾好,所以拉番有b-.我最想講既係,繁重既地方唔係工作量,而係應付佢.

呢個GE 真係好伏，d電子野又深，
上堂要抄notes，如果你想高分一堂都唔可以走，
另外，佢d ppt 得圖，又冇咩解釋，溫書果時好辛苦
最慘係，多野做到仆街，d quiz又同lecture notes係兩個星球，
我真係好後伏reg左呢個ge

course name: Words and Images: Reading and Writing in the 21st Century
body: Hard to get A.

呢個好大workload，每禮拜有logbook，final report 寫20-30頁，我consult左阿sir n多次，另一組都係get左好耐先明做緊乜野，其他班研究其他唔同野，例如DNA同電腦病毒。我做地震的研究，given一個真實地震的不同時間點同樓層的frequency同displacement的數據，去找最effective 的base isolator的mass, stiffness, 去計減到最多的震頻(通常唔止一個)，要用阿sir比的電腦運算軟件同modify佢d program再入式計模擬震頻，之後再整個實驗，用真正的base isolator去模擬地震，睇吓實驗同電腦模擬data有咩分別，discuss吓d error,另一組仲拍埋實驗段片。

course name: Global Financial Markets and their Societal Impact
body: 兩份gp essay, 兩份individual essay, 呢個老師的西班牙口音好難明，上堂完全聽唔明佢口音，要靠自己溫書，open book exam 都幾難，有廿幾題MC, 加4條long essay

course name: Smart Auditing for a Better Life
body: 每堂都要出黎present，要整poster,booklet, 拍片同睇紅樓夢英文版一篇文再present佢內容，有兩個quiz，compare其他組拿六成分的有b-至c grade，我自認為應該拿到八成分先會有A grade, 可能更好的A/A+ 呢科會比較難攞~

course name: Vampire, Monsters and Teen Demons: Representations of the Dark Side of the Mind in Literature and Popular Culture
