course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: 做好個project就冇問題
大陸老師，D普通話都唔難聽，不過講嘢超悶又煩，tutor 人少又瞓唔到。上佢班勁多強國學生，會有D俾佢地屈機。中文底唔好最好唔好揀。
開Sem會做兩份assigment，好易做，齋吹水，之後d堂可以完全唔上，唔tick attendance，lab report唔會要求你做到science subjects嘅標準，比分好鬆，我覺得呢科係完全睇你final pj，之前d野交齊就ok，final pj係好空泛同難做，要多d私底下問professor點做，gpmates都好重要，如果勁hea準備，臨尾一定衰present

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
4份individual assignment 上堂有時take attendance 
但ANDY　幾好人　上堂玩ｇａｍｅ　睇片
有一半ｗｅｅｋ　係有組ｐｒｅｓｅｎｔ
我成個ｓｅｍ上咗４堂

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: Ted is the best instructor!!! He gave a lot of courages to students! Simple mid term test and project .There are always free riders.... But Ted can observe and gives higher grade to students who work harder

有4次MC quiz (almost90%考番ppt content, 溫左就識ga la)
不過個人認為上堂較悶... 
group project & group presentation :
topic可以係list揀 或者自己create
而individual paper就係fixed topic
not vert difficult computer knowledge (關於hardware / software/ internet.....仲有個show and tell + answer questions = participation 
share some funny things or things related to computing --> can get participation marks

course name: From Small Inventions to Big Successes
body:
Lecture好悶好難明, 所以走左好多, 唔計出席率
Assignment係三份paper, 同lecture唔太關事, 上網google都做到
Final quiz係好深, MC+兩三題fill in the blanks+兩三題short question
我自己三份assignments(70% in total)都唔低分, 不過Quiz(30%)就得12/30, 
可能因為咁先得B, 睇黎個quiz都幾緊要.
冇engine/science底會覺得難, 所以奉獻唔理科/engine底就唔好讀喇

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
Tutor 唔 helpful 加情緒化
小心為妙

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
上堂悶到爆，條女應該唔係教緊書係讀緊比自己聽！
淨係照讀ppt比下片你睇，自學都唔係問題！
Assignment 基本上有要求等如無要求，極空泛。
設計Poster先係大伏，最早做完全唔知requirement...
你極多字便贏了！多到唔似一張poster就更好。
Exam雖然考mc..但考數據，勁detail...
背哂d數據啦！伏已中。
聽人講法國人PALOS就好grade, 但係德國人KLEIN Wilhelm E.就比較難grade, 個陣waiting list輪街症,排到仲以為執到寶>.< 小心唔好reg錯人!!!

有2堂唔洗上, 2堂畫畫佔分好少,好似興趣班)
, 1PRESENT 1論文 工作紙TAKE ATTENDENCE 2REFLECTIONS
全部唔難, 上堂唔洗專心都OK最緊要你PRESENT個陣比LISA睇到你睇左好多書去做(加哂係REFERENCE到)

course name: Introduction to Kanyu for the Built Environment
body:
堂可走，field trip一定要去。
太hea = B-
吹水科，悶到嘔。

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body: Hea and good grade~

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
D ASSIGNMENTS又多又煩,
仲要堂堂做D勁難的堂課,
想自CHUR的就讀呢科啦,
保證你大學無悔

上堂勁悶，無可能聽得明佢講乜，堂堂都要做classwork交俾佢，計分，不過亂吹都得。
Reflection log 俾分勁緊
有group presentation
Exam唔算易
唔係一個好ge
本身econ拎A,呢科大部分econ野，所以拎A冇難道！

以為一般，因為冇私底下搵個佢傾份個人論文，但照佢present時比個個意見去做，就A-左。
整體唔錯，不過導師有啲悶，怕悶唔岩讀佢，但佢啲意見幾有用下，幫到你諗論文條題目。

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
2 mid term & 1 project.
mid term黎講，我本身冇電腦底，其實有好多野唔太明白，但有溫書基本上應付到，但其實我覺得都難。
project主要係拍video宣傳security嘅野，另加report.自問我地個姐幾用心拍，回報唔錯，可惜人多就易有free rider，project 佔70%同組應該大部分都同grade.
ted好有heart教，比個like佢！notes易明，學到野，又有tutorial示範。
強烈推薦！

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
成個course就係兩個mid term +一個project(report+present)
份project主要係拍片黎做，呀sir唔怕你條橋舊，至緊要你拍得夠creative,present到你個idea出黎
report其實只係sum up 左你做左咩，問卷加analysis已經好幾版，10版完全冇難道，而且8~9個人做
mid term 其實唔算太難，我呢啲冇電腦底嘅人都carry到，但真係都要溫下書，不過佔分唔太重！其實呀sir真係好有心教，啲notes易明，對於冇電腦底嘅我都大概明白呀sir教緊咩，有咩唔明呀sir又肯答，唔明講到你明，而且呀sir好friendly。可惜今個sem呀sir因為某啲同學攪到唔係幾開心，可能之後都唔教ge!但呀ted真係係我大學生涯難得一見嘅好老師！同埋，我起碼真係係呢個ge學到野！

諗報告題目好煩
要多consult tutor
上堂亦要多d發言拎參與分班中有內地生
佢地比較偏激

course name: Chinese Cultural Heritage in Modern Perspective
chinese course name: 中國文化遺產與當代社會
body:
workload較大，
睇完份reading要做presentation。期間要返大陸考察，
好開心
個邊d串燒好好食，旅程好愉快，
返黎要交portfolio，
final就交埋paper。

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
4 reports, 1 present, 1 final project(with outcome game product, present and report)
lessons are fun, spent half of the time on playing games given by the tutor during lessons 
but the if you want a good grade, you better be creative and make sure your product can fully fulfill the topic

強烈推薦中學有讀acc嘅人讀,
哩科程度絕對唔難,好多野中學都已經學過晒
唯一唔好嘅地方就係要買一本$300幾蚊嘅書
weekly assignment唔難,mc題可以google搵answer
本人計過有about 80%岩
group presentation 都幾輕鬆
exam 全mc, 對有讀過acc嘅人冇難道利申: ce拎b, al拎c, 非常喜愛acc嘅人:d

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: 唔明做咩會C+左 上年明明有5X%人有A RANGE 自問份PROJECT 做得唔係太差

好多野同CS1102/中學ICT差唔多，不過自己中學用中文讀，所以要D時間check番vocab，不過就係因為咁上堂有D hea原本話每個禮拜都Quiz要我地唔走堂，不過最後都係定左3 week一次，30-40條MC，溫下D terms都ok
group project，有suggest題目，要寫report，sem中開始每堂抽幾組present。一組約5人原本話比5分鐘一組present，後尾大家都覺唔夠加到max 10分鐘,
individual project固定題目，大約做幾版（有限字體大小，好似係），剩report唔使present
有Show and Tell for bonus，話就話5分鐘，有D人做到過晒都唔理

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body: 開頭讀呢科 , 要買書已經俾佢嚇呆左 , 仲要本書唔平下 . 上堂悶到想死 , 差唔多係照power point讀 . 之後到做present同gp project都有唔錯分數 , 諗住都唔錯 . 但到exam就伏到傻左 , d mc好似係玩緊心理測驗多過你溫書就識 . 我溫左差唔多成個星期但望住份卷係完全唔知發生緊咩事 . Anyway , 呢科我個人認為真係好伏

有4個quiz, 全mc, engine同學應該唔難應付
1 group project+present, 1 individual report
教書都幾悶... 但教得明
最唔好係上堂後先會俾學生download notes

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: 以為點都有B grade, group project都唔係做得差,點知咁既grade.

course name: Smart Auditing for a Better Life
body:
平時上堂3個鐘，少於1/3係講書，其他時間都係Discussion，會抽組出黎present，順便take attendance（冇得輪流走堂，因為係要寫晒有出席ge人名落去），不過就唔計分。中間有一篇reading要睇，上堂每組抽一part即場present，另外差唔多sem尾又有片睇有兩個close book quiz，今個sem就會預早通知，不過遲D可能改為隨機（所以更加唔走得），難度唔算太高，肯溫下書都ok
有兩個Self-reflection（類似ge野），計分但係open book
最後會有個gp project，week 2就分組（同in-class discussion一樣組），要拍一段片、整個poster同booklet，要present，主題都係同auditing有關，不過我地組應該做得幾hea，所以冇咁好grade，不過整體都ok ge

course name: Diseases, Culture and History: Hong Kong, China and the World
chinese course name: 疾病、文化與歷史：從香港、中國到世界
body:
Ah Sir （范家偉）超好人，上堂成日搞爛gag，十分生動有趣！
本人堂堂笑爆咀，可惜sem A先開班；
但，仍然誠意推介～

交齊功課就OK 
Miss Lai 成日都早放

係做篇論文要花少少時間
上堂都學到唔少野

一份 Assignment 唔算太深 + Present 
再是但影張天文既相就交到功課
要做既野唔多
係 電腦室 上課 幾乎做咩都得
不過有時會有 突擊Quiz open book 
不過得 5min 去做
走堂就GG

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
呢科真係Hea都痴線
實際上堂得30分鐘左右，之後都係用黎傾Group Project
可以早走同唔洗點名（聽聞之後改左要點名...不過我已經唔再上堂...）
幾乎走晒所有堂同Tutorial
有2個佔分唔重既Quiz同一個Group Project
如果有電腦底，上堂講既都係D common senseGroup Project先係重點...
要拍片最好有識拍照剪片既Groupmate, 
Present時唔好胡亂拋書包...要拋都要做好功課先
不然隨時會被問及一些技術問題...唔好斑門弄斧...上網隨便抄堆東西黎Present又唔理解
Summer 讀, 伏左 好多野做 不過應該係Tutor 問題

chinese course name: 全球信息技術 (IT) 案例研究
body:
Two reading + One presentation & Report
Not much to do.
如果你打算hea下hea下咁讀,就唔好揀...呢科絕對係一科努力有回報既GE,因為MC test佔40%...但其實唔難!!只要上堂有聽,溫下書都識做...我中學冇讀Account都識,因為阿Paul真係教得唔錯,又好人

course name: Passion for Books: Reading and Publishing in Greater China
chinese course name: 讓我們好好愛上閱讀：兩岸三地的華文出版、閱讀生態
body:
課的內容不錯，可以理解為馬家輝的現場鏘鏘三人行……啊……雖然遠遠不止三個人……作業不多也不難。基本上只要擔心present的那個小組裡有沒有豬隊友就行了……
多和馬家輝互動還能加分，聽完別人的present然後找對方茬問他們問題也能加分，不過就算如此我最後分數也只有B……有點失望啊……

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: 兩個mid-term有溫書就唔難……Group Project雖然人多左少少（一組八人左右），但係個project可以做得好creative，有咩問題可以隨時問lecturer。同埋個lecturer好有心，做好多準備。但可惜佢下個sem開始已經唔會再教GE……

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age

body: 以為好grade, 點知...

course name: Introduction to Kanyu for the Built Environment
body:
大部分堂都唔洗聽
但係最好去哂2次field trip,如果唔係都幾難寫果2份report
最後果個present hea做就得

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
Work Load is heavier than my major courses.
4 Individual Reports
1 Group Presentations
1 Final Project (Real Game Product + Presentation)

【關於這門課】
上課很無聊，想學習的話還不如把要求的幾本書讀一讀更有用。
工作量很小，有attendance要求但是可以讓同學幫你簽。
經常有臨時組隊臨時present這種事，不過隨意就好，反正case和topic基本都是老生常談大家很容易說重複完全沒有新意超級無聊
給分很鬆……paper和final我都……挺爛的……但是paper還有B+我都要不好意思了，final分數未知，但是這門課總分B+的話大概也沒太差……又一次感覺很對不起老師……以及paper是給你幾個topic讓你根據一些商業原則寫論文什麼的，都是很老的case幾乎寫不出任何新意，大概也就是因此老師只能在語法上挑刺兒了……

3 present (Hea)
1 indi paper (有兩條題目簡,最離奇係同上個SEM一樣佢仲會比埋高分文你睇,珠玉在前我都唔知可以點拎高分)
1 final MC+LQ 要睇READINGS上堂無聊 學既野散散修修 個COURSE 名都話左你知
佢話上個SEM 有三十幾人拎A RANGE喎
我都比左幾多心機 都係B+ ZZZZZZZZZZZ

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
堂可以唔上 反正都係照讀ppt 不過lecture 1就最好返返 因為paper同present 嘅requirements都會喺呢日講 最尾嗰三個lectures喺for presentation 返哂對個grade有好處
Paper唔難寫 完全common sense 
Present要求你design張 EDUCATIONAL poster 因為自己唔creative同對photoshop唔熟 搞咗好耐但效果都唔係咁好 當其他人排版整到好靚而你剩係得一pat字同figures嘅時候就輸咗
Exam 1hr 100題MC大半係考數字 肯定夠時間
我無比心機去背figures嗰啲嘢 返正都唔會記得 喺咁而睇吓有嗰印象算 
其實集中溫三課 背熟個三課啲數字 其他課用心睇一次 應該都可以啱到好多 (~70%)
Hea下hea下有個B算喺咁 Area 3 呢個GE對無science低嘅人都係唔錯嘅選擇

course name: Robots in Our Life: How Applications of Robots Affect Our Life and Society
teacher: Wai Chiu King LAI, Yajing SHEN
body:
lecture 唔計attendance 但有三個open book quiz
頭兩個quiz係notes有得照抄
第三個quiz要計physics數
冇讀過physics既人會中伏
lab 就midterm project同final project都係整機械人
要對機械野有認識 如果唔係就會free ride左人我剩係交左兩個quiz (唔識physics)
project剩係負責整presentation 所以得B-

呢個ge可以話係cs1102既進階版 會講得深入d
本身prof.話個個禮拜都要quiz
跟住後尾減到5個，之後教唔切得返4個quiz
d quiz唔係特別難 有溫書就ok 如果dse有ict底更好
至於project, 其實好多組做既題目都差唔多 無咩特別 5個人一組 present 10 mins
term paper就一千幾字啦 fixed topic 唔難寫overall嚟講, 完sem以為出黎個grade應該得b range, 結果有A

course name: From Small Inventions to Big Successes
body: The course title might sound weird, but I think the workload is pretty light and easy. The content is alright if you want to know abt tech companies and that kind of stuff. The 3 HW reports are no brainers, the prof will give you a fully outlined instruction, so you just have to fill in the blanks with simple web searches. Good english matters cuz i think he digs it, and you just hv to find something unique for the 3rd report. The mc final exam is a bit hard, so make sure you go through all the names, years and details in the notes.

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body:
上堂照讀notes不過會attendance
quizzes有d位會係上堂睇video入面既內容
基本上唔知佢點俾分
不過個quiz肯背哂d notes一定好grade

chinese course name: 全球信息技術 (IT) 案例研究
body:
2份reading assignmnents 
-睇reading materials 然後按instructions寫番篇文出黎
1份group project+presentation
-有題目俾你揀上堂幾輕鬆 不過每堂都要預備presentation因為會抽幾組出黎present
積極啲答問題同上足堂應該會更grade

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
上堂超hea
照讀power point
9堂lecture我上左4堂only(其中一堂唔係nadia教的)
仲要上左30分鐘已經冇聽書
當你見到連d mainland都唔聽書既時候真係冇心機聽佢齋讀pptindividual&group assignment都係好簡單
individual要搵一個carbon footprint calculator黎評下點解要搵佢而唔用其他calculator
group就係比較自己同groupmate個footprint既數有乜不同

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body: 上堂要take attendance 唔好走多過三堂 堂上都係做吓role play咁 幾好玩 周不時問吓啲好易答嘅問題送吓participation分咁 Present唔好重覆佢lecture嘅嘢 最好topic都唔同 範圍一樣就可以 英文練好就最好 Paper都喺啲類似reflection嘅嘢 幾好寫 佢要啲乜其實講得好清楚 跟住就OK

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
WORKLOAD:
兩份ASSIGNMENT各15%
一次POSTER+3 MIN PRESENT (每人做一份) 20%
100題MC EXAM 50%
(無記錯應該係咁)
ASSIGNMENT吹水就夠,寫唔到咩同LECTURE有關既野
COMMON SENSE 都OK
PRESENT好多人都會做相似既TOPIC
如全球暖化帶來既影響
因自問ASSIGNMENT做得普普通通
EXAM信心又唔大,應該係POSTER拉分
所以奉勸想特別D/好GRADE D我覺得做D唔係個個諗到既TOPIC會比較好
雖然已經有心理準備EXAM考數據
但無諗過第一題就係考所謂(係基本上無人會識)既COMMON SENSE
除非你過目不忘,否則好難背到好GRADE
因為佢將類既題目擺埋一齊出
4個CHOICE既數字都一樣
當你溫左咁多1234567890落去
再望番既CHOICE就會好亂
除左呢D伏之外,平日朝早9點爬上CMC既堂
唔上真係無問題,番最後個3堂PRESENT做WORKSHEET就得
LECTURE大部分要番, 有計分堂課, 內容可聽可唔聽, 自己睇番NOTES就OKTUTOR上民歌, 無野做跟住唱, 要寫REPORT, 其餘PRESENT

course name: World Economic History: Europe and China

1 open book test 20%

Remember to have one academically strong engineering student in your group
otherwise 100% in pain
Lab report: no format provided. All in all , it is painful.

Exam + project (present, report)
悶到飛起. Course content 1999
Paul都教得幾清晰，平時聽佢講書可能會悶d，但notes都提到basic concepts，如果冇acct底既同學上堂一定要留心聽佢上堂做既數，咁就應該冇死至於工作量方面，大概做7-8份網上既exercises，要買本text bk拎key card先申請到ac，每個exercise限時3粒鐘，不過時間係足夠既，冇必要急住做，每星期記住做就得喇
2012/13 sem B, only one individual project(interview + present+ report). No ppt, boring class, learn nothing

workload輕鬆

呢科純運氣冇努力可言
一句講哂:伏科!

course name: Robots in Our Life: How Applications of Robots Affect Our Life and Society
teacher: LI You Fu, LAI Wai Chiu King
body:
lecture如果有quiz先要返,有3次quiz,可以同同學商量答案,open notes,輕鬆,冇quiz就走哂堂都得,冇attendance
lab就有attendance,分組整robot,頭一次就跟instruction整,計踢唔踢到個波,計robot行既speed,最快個組好似有full marks,其他組就唔知10/20,15/20
final project就自己整咩功能既robot都得,最尾一堂Present+demonstration,交report, 
對男仔/對robot有興趣既人,呢科幾有趣,workload唔算大,都係堂堂lab上堂一路整robot一路傾計,可以帶番屋企去整
如果照instruction整個robot都冇難度,上網搵下sources,final project都唔難
不過有d mainland/indian 真係好屈機,我個組因為頭次robot行得慢,最尾final proj冇特別功能,不過都做足哂,又冇fail demonstration,不過可能唔夠其他組特別,所以得B-
有興趣ROBOT可以一試,雖然未必勁好GRADE,但起碼唔會C RANGE
呢班GE勁少女仔,女仔可能REPORT幫下手,對robot完全冇IDEa又冇興趣應該都free ride哂

course name: Passion for Books: Reading and Publishing in Greater China
chinese course name: 讓我們好好愛上閱讀：兩岸三地的華文出版、閱讀生態
body:
There are only two assignments and a group project. Both assignments are essays which seem to be easy. The word amount is not a lot but I believe you have to write much more to get an only B grade. The group project was indeed a very troublesome one which took me much time. 
Overall, I was shocked to know that I got a D grade because I've done all the assignments. I deserve a better grade although I didn't put much effort. I think Ma Ka Fai is just too harsh. He's a completely different person after the class. You'll see when you discuss your group project with him.

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
之前既留言都有講呢科分三部份，我有以下補充：
第一部份，講易經與ＤＮＡ，最大鍋就係份<the blind watchmaker>book report,本書幾百頁，上限5000字，sem尾先開始做就會趕到甩褲。 
第二部份，chaos，當故仔咁聽，上堂有assignment，short question，一半要你舉番佢講過既內容同例子，一半係open question，好輕鬆。
第三部份，fractal，圖像加少少數學，上堂有assignment，畫圖加計數，最後要交多份report，用software 畫圖，創作為主，但要畫得好頗難。平時唔使溫書，冇present，take attendance, 最麻煩係book report。

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society

body:
Workload:
Weekly Journal: 4份 (計分: best 2 out of 4)
Group Presentation: 2個 (15分鐘) (5個人一組)
Final Exam: 2 hrs (MC+LQ) (Open book + notes) (Professor會比tips)自己頭半個course認真上堂，之後hea上
上堂80%時間玩電話，其餘時間做Classwork寫兩三句交差
Course pack 睇左一半，發現ppt 內容其實係course pack D topic 黎
功課同present問題幾通識，Easy to do
有B+算OK

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
WORKLOAD：
2份assignment
-Carbon footprint Report，分individual part(600字)同group part(3-4人寫1000字)
-A3 academic poster+presentation(3分鐘)
1個closed-book exam(100條mc)
聽聞有計attendance，不過成個course170人又冇點名，真係唔知佢點計內容：
其實上堂好似疲勞轟炸，PPT+播紀錄片直踩3個鐘咁滯，間中有個BREAK，不過會叫你做DISCUSSION
份NOTES真心厚，內容離唔開全球暖化、再生能源，可以學下冷知識，冇咩實際用途
絕大部分人都係做自己野，基本上佢唔會問問題，只會派DISCUSSION WORK SHEET比你填
最後3堂唔講書，專for poster既presentation用

No need go lecture except the last 2 lab and the present.
The open book exam extremely easy even I just study for several hours.

每堂都有lecture之後coursework, 落堂之後交, 確保你冇早走, 通堂都係隨便叫你畫下畫，做下勞作咁, 有art底佢會睇得出, 不過冇都唔大影響

helena幾好人

自問做得唔錯 同埋好早做完 
第二樣就係group proj.
好采我地組無咩free rider

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body: 13 堂中, 需要上ge 只有第1, 11-13 堂, 其實ge 上左都冇用, 上堂只係講notes & 播片.Assignments 方面, WK6 左右交600 字(individual) + 1000 字(group) ge essays, 好易做, 等同吹水; WK11-13 就要交一張academic poster + 3 mins speech. 我自己就一日準備哂, 聽落幾複雜, 但做起上尼就覺得好簡單.

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
分三個Part

所以有好多都唔明 跟唔到

但做assignment果陣你就會知咩事

exam會講晒答案 一定要拎電話影低晒 最好拎相機啦

individual assignment 就 基本上你睇翻note黎打同show自己個effort出黎
就一定唔會差

total 有2份assignment 1 份group lab report 1份business plan

由於馬sir記人名唔太好
建議Project方面可以早啲約佢傾
Q&A section要多啲發問
令佢對你有印象, 覺得你認真上堂
Project內容要重分析
Present時照讀/時間控制不佳會扣分
個人黎講我覺得佢俾grade幾靚

佢會tick你個名, 有時都5知佢會5會tick錯..因為佢睇樣tick,,

以為會有a range, 因為每次d quiz都有a range

body:
1present+1individual論文(題目可以同present一樣,其實基本上就咁將present既內容轉化成論文就得了,所以論文不太難做)+2網上討論(1.評論一則新聞2.評論同學的網上討論,唔知系咪次次都評論新聞)
上lecture堂堂都要做堂課,但其實d答案好簡單,有d系吹下水,有d就ppt要ans(我隔離個groupmate聽書,所以我可以唔洗聽),走佐幾堂,但系叫groupmate幫手系堂課紙寫幾隻字,所以attendance無少到

body:
其實幾輕鬆
算少做野又唔會差得去邊

course name: Chinese Cultural Canons and Their Modern Application
chinese course name: 中國文化經典及其現代應用
body:
工作量其實OK既,係要做下PROJECT姐,篇PAPER其實都係將PROJECT D 野照COP,再加d elaboration,基本上真係冇乜野做
不過上堂要多d答下問題,
同埋格式真係好重要,
我就係因為篇paper冇跟到格式比人扣左分上lecture好hea,基本上個兩個鐘係玩手機玩左佢
如果唔係因為要做堂課,我諗好多人都唔會上個lecture,因為對你做project,paper一d用都冇
d堂課又係廢廢地,基本上唔聽書,即時用手機都可以google到個答案出黎=]
lecture最好上足, 堂課認真做, 我地present前會經常約tutor傾project, 扮下勤力

上堂真係好悶自己做自己嘢都得咁滯
active應該攞到A range
我唔active，logbook好似要做10個week又做唔晒
以為爛grade不過都有個B+
真係幾大workload下慎入

伏到一個點
3 TEST
GROUP PROJECT
堂堂抄筆記抄到PK咁濟

Angus 份人讀過EE既都知hea，遲到早走家常便飯，呢個course都唔例外。
跟ppt讀，成日播Matlab官網既片，d 所謂exercise根本堂上已經做得哂，可以唔上堂都好Grade。
建議有基礎Programming底既人入去拉Grade，冇既都好快上手。

Stani間中有sudden assignments,上堂係睇片，佢d notes無咩用。
Oliver會認真教，會問簡單問題，唔畀用電腦/電話，notes有用，但好多野記。
有gp project,唔使present,自選題目，一定要consult，先知佢想你寫d咩。
Exam我就咁溫Oliver d notes,點知Stani出好多佢教嘅，short Q 用自己terms亂寫，以為死硬，結果喜出望外有A-

Very strict grades, many got C grades.
Extremely boring lessons, just read out the PowerPoint which is extract from textbook.
Better switch tutor if you want a better grade.
Standard workload. Speak in Mandarin but able to listen to Cantonese. Students can choose to present in both languages. Very patient with detailed explanations to students' questions. Many B grades.

計attendence,上堂好悶，照讀ppt,間中問下問題，project係要喺中國開間新公司，要你分析原因，要整business plan(in 2012/13 sem B, 我唔知topic有無轉)，有一組負責向你Q﹠A，自己組內都有得評組員participation,對待free rider一流。individual report個topic自定，只要同佢教過嘅有關就得，或者抄report一次又得。但內容要同economy有關好d,我中伏因為個topic對於"market development"係有d離題。
Final grade heavily depends on the group project and presentation. Good grades in individual essays and field trip report will help.

course name: China in the Eyes of World Media
body: A lot of work to do. Presentation, debate, essay and a take- home exam (essay actually). The main problem is the teacher seemed to prefer students to praise China rather than thinking critically.

course name: Global Financial Markets and their Societal Impact
body:
Fair workload with 2 individual essays and 2 group reports. Good grades for all assignments. 
However, confusing lectures and extremely difficult open book exam.

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body:
幾好玩，功課唔算多
上堂又開心
成績比預期好

Can be absent for all lessons except the first lesson for group formation and the presentation weeks. Just take back all the attendance in the last few weeks will be fine.Two individual essays and a group project with presentation.
要exam, 但有past paper 做, 平時好hea

course name: Chinese Cultural Canons and Their Modern Application
chinese course name: 中國文化經典及其現代應用
body:
Lecture每堂都有短問題(內容深淺視乎tutor,i.e., 張為群係問ppt slide,考你有無瞓覺；董就雄就會要你用腦諗下野)，有無notes派都係視乎tutor，但遲到15mins就唔會畀你。
Tutorial要舉手答問題加分，第一堂唔好遲到，唔係董老師會開你張相畀全班睇lol，分組前仲會叫你起身自我介紹。gp project要做多d research，有問題/大綱可以send email問，董老師會認真畀feedback；2個online assignment, 600字無難度，但見過有人寫近2000字⋯⋯final paper基本上係幾project嘅野寫多次，跟足董老師教的format整content,footnote,reference就得。
lecture教嘅同gp project無咩關係，tutorial就主要聽人present，大概上7堂，董老師講野幾好笑，對中國文化有興趣就讀得幾開心。

11 people formed a group. Low efficiency and NO cooperation. The quiz is a tragedy. You wont be able to do the questions even though you have attended classes. Also once you fail it, you gotta retake it.

Absentees can hand-in their in-class assignments, which are used to count attendence, in the following lesson. They can simply copy from friends or groupmates.At the end of each lesson, a video clip is played and several open-ended questions are posted on blackboard. Each group needs to post answers onto the discussion board. Only short answers of 5-6 lines are required. Group members can take turn to answer.

course name: Vampire, Monsters and Teen Demons: Representations of the Dark Side of the Mind in Literature and Popular Culture
chinese course name: 吸血鬼、怪物及年輕惡魔：文學與大眾文化中精神陰暗面的象徵
body: The quizzes are easy and the class is enjoyable. If you are interested in gothic, you will definitely enjoy the class.

The tutor is strict in taking attendance. She can memorize the name and face of students, there is no way to skip classes. The workload for the class is not heavy, just one individual paper, one group project, one peer analysis and finally an essay-typed exam.

上堂學的concepts幾有趣，但要自己諗多幾次先完全get到。
但個tutor會成日問問題，答唔到就遲d再問你第二條。
功課唔多，三個in-class open notes assignments, 佢上一堂都會講考／會點出(通常係case studies)，一定要jot notes!!!!內容都係上堂教過，考applications，所以平時一定要jot notes。呢科唔計attendence, 但上堂先有worksheets/notes (no ppt slides written form given)
最後有個project, 要諗d新穎嘅"professionals''去研究，都係applications啦！記住要consult佢！
教授好樂意幫學生，email覆得好快，上堂學到野，學既野同做既野又得意，誠意推介！工作量唔大，engine jai讀都冇問題

我因為對中國文化有興趣而揀呢科,上大課當聽故事咁聽覺得幾有趣,
雖然每堂大課都有堂課,不過非常簡單,有時寫百幾字中文,有時做幾條MC,只要專心上堂就會識答,但係就因為每堂有堂課唔可以走堂囉;)導修就煩少少,有小組present同期末小組報告,仲有兩份網上討論,不過因為全部要求都唔算好高,而且字數唔係好多,所以都唔算繁重

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
死因不明，group project 完全伏，勿拍學業本身沉重既同學做project

body:
上堂做下簡單QUIZ 
exam唔難 作文
Tutor好好人Reg之前已經喺ge指南呢度睇過其他上過林學忠tutorial嘅同學嘅意見,一早做好要follow足要求先有靚grade嘅心理準備,不過呢個sem開始限左注嘅字數上限,唔再好似之前咁落勁多注先好grade

course name: Smart Auditing for a Better Life
body:
我讀果陣係岩岩新開，可能你下午上，所以冇走過堂。上堂好輕鬆，幾有趣，所以都幾鐘意。
個tutor幾nice，讀ｄ英文好簡單。會有睇戲時間，同請外面ge人講下，都幾貼近日常生活。
係最後可能做assigment有ｄ離題，雖然唔高grade，不過ｄ野簡單，至少唔係伏

FOLLOW 之前個個POST（ＦＩＲＳＴ　ＰＯＳＴ）:想拎A 的話就要FINAL REPORT 做到好PROFESSIONAL:
FOR EXAMPLE 個TOPIC係做投資，可能要即場ＤＥＭＯ到個投資方法係ＷＯＲＫ。（用ＶＩＳＵＡＬ　ＢＡＳＩＣ）　寫下ＰＲＯＧＲＡＭ　等。。。。

呢科FINANCE 人讀會好輕鬆, FINAL REPORT 好重要, 拎A同拎C 都看佢(前提係EASY的INDIVIDUAL REPORT要識做)拉CURVE, TUTOR唔會放ＧＲＡＤＥ　ＧＥ～～～
ＧＯＯＤLUCK
每堂都有野做,而且個分好睇你同tutor夾唔夾

course name: Revolutionary Shifts in Global Business Practices

body:
Tutor 每堂都會自 HIGH，但好好人。尐 Business 嘅 Theory 唔係讀 BBA 嘅人可能難 Catch Up 尐。
如果勤力少少應該唔難拎 B 或以上。

dont need to attend lessons
group project is way fun

lecture 走左好多,好悶
tutorial 要上,因為係重點,而且有功課
tutor好好人,解答唔識唔明既野
要準時交功課,搵定交功課地點,遲左無情講
btw要留意有個tutorial section番21:00放21:50 (Fri) , 好伏

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body:
輕鬆之選!!!
呢科Lecture得幾堂有class work 做，唔似1501 咁繁重。
Tutorial 都係做返grp presentation，唔洗成日上堂。
Assessment 方面，都係小組報告，評論同term paper，不過全部都係要作詩，要有心理準備。
另外，跟董就雄個班好多mainland，相對水平較高，更易爛grade。

呢科上堂其實輕鬆但好多鎖碎野做
每個禮拜要寫log bk同埋答下問題,又有好多mini project and a final big project!
其實個project可以好簡單咁去做但就可能考必高grade!
讀呢科想高grade既話其實好簡單就係勁active= =
係咁舉手present啊答佢問題啊就應該有A range= =
我是很不active的於是B+了-_-

有testbook 要買 but可以上網搵link
工作 都係 present 5% + project 50%+ exam 30% 其餘attendance 積極性等雜項.....
我自己project 同 present 唔算高分
Exam 前一日喪温但係 B- :(
Exam true false 部分係心理測驗

body:
peter 幾好人 都會肯答問題
都系2份individual homework + 1份group report & presentation + examination.
有讀過少少econ既都吾會覺得呢科難
教既都係introduction既野再加幾個model 
只要你系比心機去做assignment其實好grade吾難.

course name: Accelerating Professional Growth on the Web
body:
Drop左
原因係week 1分組全組gpmate都係fm
一半gpmate係non local，比較難溝通呢科gpmate非常緊要
基本上成個sem既assignment同present都要一齊做

個人覺得呢科真係算幾hea
tutorial上6堂就唔使上
1份group present + final reportlisa幾好人 佢好樂意比意見我地
又會幫我地諗下好唔好寫
有咩可以改進
overall我覺得都幾好

啲人成日話自己冇讀過ENG LIT所以唔敢素揀，但係其實唔難。劇本當睇故仔咁睇下，氣氛同中學英文堂差唔多，上堂睇下啲Shakespeare嘅戲，做下話劇咁。對drama有興趣可以揀。
功課: film review(我82/100, 不過知道有啲同學得60幾70幾分), (2)scene analysis(85/100) 
final project: 演譯一段5分鐘左右嘅Shakespeare劇本(可個人可分group)+拍片(87/100,呢份就聽講好多組都高分返)，佢claim 佢唔介意你拍片嘅technology/畫質音質 whatever，背啲old english 對白都幾係野，但係演譯咩劇咩scene可以自己揀。

呢科冇midterm冇exam,最大workload就係individual learning logbook同group project report
Easy to get a range but 大前題係你要做足佢上堂叫你做既野

course name: Global Financial Markets and their Societal Impact
body: Fair workload. Extremely difficult open book exam, but quite good grade. The professor is also kind and well-prepared.

所以最後都係得B-

温完書都冇用 mc 幾乎識做哂 LQ 唔知up咩
但都係b-

一定要買書

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
都唔小GROUP PROJECT, 會讀到幾多理論, 好多materials比你睇會做課堂討論.
仲記得最尾個份功課好似係寫2000字英文, 喊出黎.
不過你本身鐘意既就唔系好大問題. 唔算爛grade.

如果沒有欣賞藝術細胞的精神....
真的不要讀....
有如吹水的科目....
功課量多...
字數要求亦多....
以為暑假能輕輕鬆鬆讀科GE....
結果....
都是奉勸一句....
你吹水能力強....
又基本認知當代藝術....
你纔應該報....

都唔知tutor叫唔叫killer! 佢對b range要求唔高 但要有A range就難到喊
做到想死都係得B仔
佢中意D評論性同埋narrow d既topics
唔好太general變左wikipedia咁
set題目要set個有趣D既，成個sem都對住同一個真心悶
忠叔都會覆email既都算快覆

course name: Urban Development and Construction - from the Past to the Future
body:
個名睇落好伏，上堂內容又悶，以為呢個GE係伏中之伏！不過workload極之輕鬆，上堂唔take attendence，只係要交一份group project(4人一組)同埋3篇individual essays(交hardcopy)。project4人一組，要分析一個城市發展既案件，例如沙中線對周邊既影響,etc
其實只係實地影幾張相，上網搵曬案件既前因後果咁就輕鬆完成！

Quiz is easy to get low grade. Anyway, all topics in this course is interesting. 
I do not recommend to anyone who need A range or B+ to take this course!!!!

The content and assignment might be bit difficult to those who have no prior idea/knowledge, but if you pay attention and do some research, u can still make it. Chán teaching is indeed useful, especially to those youngsters nowadays who keep complaining about how "hard" their lives are, it teaches the correct attitude towards ones' lives. Strongly recommended.

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
Have individual presentation- Quite easy
Group project
And a final exam ( Did not study but got B+)Need to take attendance

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body: In 2012/13 Sem A, there are no group assignments, presentations, group projects and stuff, only individual assignments. The content taught might be difficult, but it is fun if u pay attention every class. Teachers are real nice. Need take attendance.

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body: 講呢科？！你同我講呢科？！吼！！！

林學忠人好好…基本上跟佢suggestions就好清楚要做乜同點做。
project同presentation上有乜問題佢都好快覆email，呢一點好令人感動。
我個人真係睇好多本書泥抽資料<<呢一點做到林學忠係會睇到，appreciate的。
上佢tutorial，可能係同學好nice的關系，無乜火藥味。林學忠亦會比d suggestion同guide人去問/答。
上佢堂基本上無乜壓力，而且有乜事email問佢, 佢會救你。 
佢好貼心咁send左幾個email提人要交online discussion同turnitin…上堂講到明想我地好唔爛grade就要比心機做introduction同小結，我覺得作為一個tutor佢真係好好人又仁慈...

我自問好俾心機,功課都好用心做,竟然只得B,真係好失望
功課做完唔會派返,根本唔知自己死喺邊
老實講,工作量好大,不過老師好好人,無論LECTURER 定TUTOR都會好盡力幫你
但係建議唔好揀錢華,佢俾分好嚴,而且偏袒內地生

body: Really a piece of cake, playing mobile games as a way to learn the IT cases, quite easy, very few workload, but dun know if it is the case for the regular sem a/b

聽人報告要專心, 積極發問, 做好D網上評論
我小組報告整體一般, 論文題目好似唔得佢心都B+, 證明其他方面要做好D (同埋大課要上足)老師幾好人, 不過好鐘意捉人有冇留心聽, 好鐘意叫人問問題
不過隨時揾佢consult都得, 多D consult真係有著數

Patrick 好有心教書，但呢科需要有phy chem 底，我係純文科人，拎到呢個grade 好好彩！
呢科學到好多平時接觸唔到既能源知識，值得一讀！
有QUIZ，仲要上堂果時做，得5MINS，QUIZ一低分就死得，但上堂又聽唔明D專業字眼

Workload: 一般般，一份presentation, 一份paper, 二份online discussions.
讀文學經典學到好多野，而且grade 唔差

有溫書就OK
group project poster比D心機就得

body:
非常hea, 
兩次test, 一個gp present and gp report
test 係MCQ , 有tricky位但有溫書大部分都識
5-6ppl 15 mins gp present 好簡單, 但topic要creactive
sem尾交多份report就得, report要求每人5-7頁,但可以擺好多圖所以唔難做
總之係科好輕鬆既GE

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body:
課程同其他人講既野一樣
只係今個SEM 份伏TEST1 Louis唔小心印埋D答案出黎 
結果成份TEST1取消左 & 伏TEST2 變左做佔GPA既45%...
所以只要臨TEST前1,2日肯食哂果幾份Notes 基本上一半分已經袋左另外建議第一堂就已經盡可能搵定 Grp mates 
個人Prefer 4個人一組
因為最後份Final Project既Min. requirement 係計組員人數 x 5頁
即使個TOPIC有幾BROAD都好
6個人一組都會有排吹
而一開始就可以夾定每堂番1-2個人 拎NOTES 同TAKE哂所有人既ATTENDENCE
基本上成個COURSE 真係好HEA 每堂飛下NOTES睇下片就完

老師風華絕代, 既玉樹臨風, 又風趣幽默,
上堂一定有笑點,
非常愉快,
拎唔到A,只係上佢堂都已經回本
大學遇到明師, 夫復可求?

The In-class Writing Assignments is not difficult but Eric just gave 2/5 mark to most of the students.
Analysis Essay has a lot of skills to learn but he does not teach us well.

One exam and one presentation. 
Amy is nice but the grade is not good.

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy
teacher: CHONG Pui Man M., KWONG Yan Kit, GABRAKOVA Dennitza, WANG Xiaolin
chinese course name: 茶道：歷史、藝術、建築與哲學
body:
開頭D Lecture內容幾有趣，當故仔聽學下野。Tutorial去茶道房飲茶食餅，幾好玩。
雖然話係英文教，但D notes入面既terms全部都係英文拼音既日文或者根本日文，溫書會好辛苦，我冇日文底所以後尾連睇都費事，走晒所有lecture。
D test我連題目都睇唔明，亂做之後交卷。最尾Project勁hea勁易，求其present到D野就OK。
He is really a killer. Gave me and most of students C-D range

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body:
呢一科主要係作詩為主，如果有心機作同埋D格式冇錯,就唔會太衰
但係TUTOR唔好選張為群,選董就雄會仲好
LECTURE有D悶,有CLASS WORK做同埋會計分,但我就走左一半堂，所以有一半CLASS WORK冇做
如果想TAKE呢科,但冇讀過中國文學就最好上堂,如果有讀中國文學既話基本上都冇咩好學!

1 individual 5 mins present

project同present都係吹吹下
比分鬆手

body:
1 個present + 1份report自問persent做得唔差
report 就唔夠字＋hea做
拉出來B+ 好正常
groupmate a range

1 present + 2 report
三樣都唔難做
上堂好hea，做咩都唔理
又可以搵人tick 名B-係低d，但計返自己勁hea做，都叫ok

好努力
但係都係得b-..
d字好難.....

chinese course name: 文物遺產建築－分析與導賞
body:
3份assignment (1個presentation)，1個quiz，2個field trips
第1份assignment係學期中交，4人一group，compare 2個地方既heritage (我個sem係hk同macro)
有幾條individual同group既問題guide住你做
第2，3份係學期尾，第2份同第1份差唔多形式，只係要discuss既heritage係你field trips既其中一個heritage
基本上頭2份係上網搵料，搵料，搵料，重點係你揀既heritage揀得好，上網就易搵料，揀得唔好既就88
你可以問miss意見，佢會幫你評估下你揀得好唔好
第3份係design 1-day trip，2人一group，只需少量heritage既bg，重點放係trip既detail位，e.g. 落腳點，有咩設備照顧到團員等等，係睇你有冇仔細咁plan，然後用ppt扮tourism guide present
3份assignment workload幾多下，主要係因為summer+d資料好難搵 (e.g. 建築物料，結構)，只有最後果份可以用下創意上堂take attendance，但好似冇attendance既分，可能當印象分掛
miss幾好人，只要你主動同佢講野佢會好nice咁同你傾下計
上堂上2個鐘，淨低果1個鐘會同某幾組傾下assignment，好free的，有野就問，冇野就走得
quiz要溫，幾十條mc，會部係notes有既野，有成2個鐘比你做，佢唔會點理你，所以有人會通*又或者偷睇*****咁
field trip summer去屏山熱死，要比陽光曬成2個鐘 (好似係)

上堂輕鬆有趣,
Project 唔識/方向有疑問都可以去問
俾咗好多意見, 
Present 時俾人質問佢又會幫手解圍
會有進步分,只要睇到你有跟comment 改佢就會讚你
大課堂課只係做MC
有留心聽書一定識

其實都唔算好多野做，只係要做一個GROUP PJ同埋寫一份PAPER。
但係可能我係yr1 fm，對於做paper有d難掌握。
馮老師幫左我好多，佢比左個方向我去做份paper，而且睇得出佢好有熱誠去教，但係就覺得佢好似要求好高咁。
整體黎講如果你比佢見到你有努力做，都會有B。

course name: The City in Chinese History and Culture
body: 用英文上堂，最適合文科底讀過史地嘅同學，理/商科嘅都唔使驚，內容唔算太深，但文科底的話係輕鬆好多。會有一個excursion trip，今個學期中文班去汕頭，英文班去上環、灣仔、跑馬地，要寫一份report。presentation就係揀一個中國城市 (包括港澳台)黎做，4個人一組，做完presentation (1hr，好多時間預備同consult)，然後交report。讀過最開心嘅GE course，你識揀啦！I chose the English MOI class, and this course is most suitable for those who had studied history or geography before. No need to worry if you're from the science/business stream, it's not too hard anyway. There will be an excursion trip. In this semester, the Chinese class went to Swatow, where the English class went to Sheung Wan, Wan Chai and Happy Valley. Then write a report. For the presentation part, choose one Chinese city (including HK, Macau and Taiwan) to work on, with 4 members in a group. After the presentation, work on a report. It was the happiest GE course I have ever taken, I bet you can choose on your own!

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body: Awful subject, in my opinion only, as the project and examination has literally no guidelines, and the lectures are all jus read directly out from the ppt. Maybe I am the unfortunate one as I had to finish all the group project myself, but if you ask me, I wouldn't recommend this course.

馮Sir就好似一本百科全書咁！雖然我地每組嘅topic都好大分別，但係佢俾comment嘅時候可以留意到D好細微嘅位然後elaborate好多出來等我地做report時improve
我地week 3要每一組都present一下大家project打算做嘅topic，佢見到有咩唔係好make sense或者做到嘅可行性唔大就會即刻point out出來，然後再suggest一D可行嘅角度，等我地分工個陣冇咁麻煩
我地組完左tutorial都會consult下佢，佢亦都好樂意幫我地！
總括來講，馮Sir係一個好有教學熱誠嘅老師:D
工作量就視乎你present嘅前後，如果你早D present, 跟住report同online discussion就可以攤長D來做。但係我就最後一組present, 全部野一次過來料都幾辛苦，不過都頂得順。睇多D reference會對report有幫助，我個阿sir都好著重資料嘅來源同可信性！至於lecture, 我就上左郭錦鴻、黃佩賢、王景松同錢華呢個combination，上得好輕鬆 :D
郭錦鴻好搞笑，上佢堂一定唔會訓覺，而且會學到好多野!! Classwork佢仲會提你邊D ppt要留意^^
黃佩賢就有時會悶有時好笑，但係佢教art教得唔錯~ ~Classwork都會教你拆題目同提你邊D ppt要留意^^
王景松教得好似有D hea, 但係幾搞笑，同埋佢D classwork好簡單
錢華出名悶到甩肺，上堂不斷講「對不對」同「對吧」，間中自high都冇人so佢，同埋佢講普通話，都講得幾清楚！但係佢D classwork預先派定都冇題目，上堂訓左就一定唔識答。

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News
chinese course name: 通過時事要聞，理解全球經濟
body:
Peter 教得好清楚同埋好好人，試過夜晚12點send email問功課都好快覆，可能我有一兩堂無翻影響到個grade，所以最後都得b+。
一共兩份homework，一個presentation一個report 再加個final exam，因為homework唔系最後一次過比系分開比所以都唔太麻煩，而final exam 都唔太難，所以都還ok個workload

極之輕鬆
講書好悶，所以無咩點聽書，上堂做自己野
ASSIGNMENTS 返到去睇NOTES 都會識做
但當然有上堂聽下既話，ASSIGNMENTS 就唔使點花時間做
但係因為數學AND PHY 又不太厲害 ，所以成日做錯數
不過正常人無做錯，都可以拎A既
重點一提 PRESENT 極HEA

好重WORKLOAD，好多功課(Assignments/reading review)，但係佔分好少
功課都算係吹水就做到，但係要好花時間先做完一樣
間中會去畫廊睇下(2,3次)，同有一個PRESENT，仲自製ARTWORK(都係唔難既)。呢個TUTOR 都幾有HEART
到最後讀完COURSE真係EXPLORE 到ART 既~
對ART"真係有興趣"既，上佢堂都算不錯既選擇，好似上ART CONCEPT入門咁

chinese course name: 建立 21 世紀事業發展優勢
body:
上堂輕鬆, 有時聽下GUEST PRESENT
1 QUIZ
500 WORD ESSAY*3, 內容多數都係關於自己學到既野點APPLY
1 PRESENTATION + 4000 WORD ESSAY, 由4-5個組員一齊做, 平均每人都係寫<=1000 WORDS
LECTURER幾好人, 睇得出幾鬆手
所有GROUP MATE A-
A waste time course.

Not sure for other tutors but workload is HEAVY for GT's class. Be prepared to have exercises, quizzes, readings every week. He is also very strict with grammar (although he claims he is not), so double check your work before you submit it. Since he writes, he is also very concerned with the sentence structure, how to arrange your content etc. If you are truly interested in writing, you can learn a lot from him.Mobile phones aren't allowed in lessons. And remember, if you want to go to A-range, you MUST be humble and modest. GT is intolerant of arrogance and conceit. No matter how good you think you are, hide it and always ask for consultation for homework. He is much more willing to promote an above average but modest student to A-range, than an outstanding and arrogant student.

Relatively easy to obtain B-range actually. I've heard that a lot of my classmates managed to secure a B even though their English isn't exactly proficient.Work harder on the first assignment (Email) because it will leave an impression on her, which may have an effect on your grades for later assignments. Follow given samples, check grammar and remember to be *realistic*. Ann is very concerned how *realistic* the content is. For example, if, in your assignment, you need to give a reply to customers and offer a monetary compensation, be realistic. Don't offer a ridiculous amount just to make your assumed role generous, only offer what is reasonable. If there is any doubt, look up on the internet to search for what are the generally accepted standards, rules or guidelines in business complaints / customer service.

都幾hea...workload又幾少
一個weekly journal and one group project( 10 groupmates in 1gp)
不過個quiz都幾難,大部分人3,4x分,少數5,6x分
我fail左個quiz...得3X分
淨係計quiz+project平均5X分....但都有B...
weekly journal 最尾先交...

每星期一篇journal 唔限字數
有Mid term同exam 全部mc 唔難 睇ppt就識
佔最重應該係project 要整video 6個人一組
如果大家都肯做野其實都唔洗搞好耐
仲有就係唔記得top幾多%有得去韓國玩 我有2個gpmate去左

好GRADE
其實搵D 中文網 translate 番做ENGLISH 就交到asgn

course name: Construction As One of the Founding Stones of Modern Hong Kong
chinese course name: 建築業是建構現今香港的其一基石
body:
得一份gp project, 2人一組
佢同GE2227一樣, 想功課A, 除左厚度, 仲要用得番佢上堂講過既野
咁就ok!

以為好grade
結果爛grade一個功課重要好多, 何來輕鬆?

工作量非常多
有吾好grade
真伏
Assignment 雖然少, 但比讀Science既人屈機

有2個PRESENT。
第一個可以上網照COPY,完全無難度又唔洗用腦
第二個好難下,要APPLY埋佢D 公式,搵好多information先做到,
絕對唔會比一般bba commom core既project易(又可能因為我走晒lecture先覺得有困難。)exam出題算係直出,所以要背書,都有ok多野背,同埋要記熟晒formula。
A bit difficult for non CB students.

上堂好似冇咩點教過野
所有野都係要自己抽時間去讀
Quiz雖然係堂上做,但要寫太多野
如果轉左做CLOSE BOOK應該死唔少人
Poster指引唔夠,基本上係亂黎
EMAIL問過導師野,但都冇覆過總結唔推薦讀呢科
老師人很好，很認真聽講。

lecturer非常唔掂，講起英文來口齒不清之餘對課文的解釋也近乎照note讀（但note只有很簡單的point）
對psycho有興趣先黎讀既話，你會發現唔係個回事
上了一兩堂之後就覺得得著不大，最後只有mini quiz的堂才回來上課quiz的重要性不知道，只派了第一份的grade，第二三份都沒有派
個人覺得不買course pack也不要緊，自己讀也是沒有course pack沒有source，就是quiz之前花一整晚上網找找theory的解釋準備一下例子，然後quiz就是拚命寫
group project搵到識用PS既人就會很輕鬆而且好grade

每堂都take attendance， 上堂好HEA，講嘅嘢同project冇乜關係（我呢個sem喺啦吓，project topic 好似個個sem唔同）
Project 定咗自己組題目之後要做個簡短present，同全班介紹吓題目，內容咁，會有Q and A， 問吓問題，答吓問題攞participation分， at least 比老師認得你咁
Presentation個flow可以參考吓peer evaluation form啦
Group Report 其實只係print 返presentation 個 ppt （我呢次喺啦吓）
Individual Report 喺presentation中抽你認為重要嘅一part詳細講，最好有多啲reference
個人認為報呢科前睇吓course outline今個sem project係咩 topic，難就中伏（我中咗）

course name: Chinese Cultural Heritage in Modern Perspective
chinese course name: 中國文化遺產與當代社會
body:
好多野做, 每堂leature有worksheet計attendance, tutor又計attendance
Easter會番大陸做考察, 考察完要做本booklet(每個景點兩三條問題,仲要係個人見解), booklet之外仲要寫番幾百字report
Final project話就話分gp做, 實際上係自己做自己果part, 個人咁計分, 有present, 要係blackboard comment其他gp份project, 最後每人寫2000字report不過上堂係有趣既

Lo Kar Kee好好人
上堂和HW同1501一模一樣
1個group project 
1份final repot </=2000字

上堂大課輕鬆,但有時都幾悶,你唔聽書既話,可以問番朋友攞答案黎做堂課
1114 我係HEA上HEA做,咁都有b grade,証明你正正常常咁跟住指示做,
你最後至少有個b

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development

body:
portfolio hea做B+
exam可以拎返屋企做

現在，大學政策已改，已無好grade之歌仔唱了。奉勸各位同學，不要道聽塗說，以為這科仍然好grade。再者，所謂"好grade"，經已是年前之事了!!Sem A,b讀此，不知道辛苦與不。但在SUMMER 讀，將會好辛苦。皆因你會有 Assignment (1)(千六字) ,Assignment (2) ( Group), Class exercise (A)(i),Class exercise (A)(ii), Class exercise (B) ,Class exercise (C) (make a conceptual art), Individual meeting, Reading Reviews (a total of 6 readings)，共有十三份功課。雖則無考試，但要兩個月內完成十三份功課，殊不輕鬆。

body: Interesting lessons, and the tutor prepared lessons well that you may learn a lot from this course.

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body:
推薦~
1) course內容有趣...會令人反思...好值得讀2) workload輕鬆...present只係pre一篇文...唔好對篇文有錯誤理解就ok...又可以consultation...tutor佢會解釋你唔明既地方...present後有Q AND A...tutor一定要另外一組問野同埋佢亦可能會問野...所以最緊要擺多D effort落去理解篇文...就唔怕比人問到口啞啞

不太推薦~
1)雖然係a range...但都擺左頗大effort落去
買左course pack...問人拎左source...
睇哂以上既野都要好大effort...
因為上堂教既野好多都apply唔到落assignment度...
所以想拎好grade就要自己睇coursepack加拎source
呢個course太大想頭
諗住教你少少psycho野...
就想你應用落去d case度...但其實教既野同assignment好多都唔match
所以好難把握自己拎咩grade2) poster 同booklet都花幾大effort...問題係唔知個標準係點...

You really have to work hard to study coursepack and think how to apply the theory in the situation given in the in-class assignment if you want to obtain good grade.What is more, you need a good memory because starting from the next semester all in-class assignment are close-book(!!) instead of open-book(according to the tutor).If you are not good at thinking or the speed of your thinking is not fast enough,please drop this course because you may not be able to finish some in-class assignment in time.

3 quizes = (3 assignments) [open book, in lesson]
1 group project [1 poster + 1 booklet]i think the final results depend on your quiz results much. Dennis is a good tutor, having much preparation in every lesson, just a bit emotional but still understandable. 
This subject is interesting and I have studied Introduction to Psychology in asso, so it's not too difficult to me.

chinese course name: 文物遺產建築－分析與導賞
body:
成個course total 有3個assisgnment,話多唔算多,話少又唔算少,但個workload真係好好好繁重
(係wk1已經有好多人知中伏drop左)
做每個assisgnment之前都一定要花大量時間睇資料,加上我係Summer讀,變左超級chur,啲assisgnment愈做愈hea
可能因為哩科係今個Summer難度減低左, 要做既Built Heritages都係香港/澳門,比較容易穩到資料做report
Quiz都比以前淺化左,就算唔溫書,只要上堂有係咁e聽下書都識做
好彩最後都有B+, 如果唔洗遇到啲認真gpmate,我諗應該死硬的了XD*強烈建議 千其千其唔好係Summer讀 做assisgnment做到你死

SUMMER(跟 MR. MAN) 讀既你會有十一樣功課
"學到唔少野"-一星期至少要睇一個READING,寫最少300字,之後大PROJ要寫至少1600字(個人)
"可以發揮你既所長"-要做一個R爆頭既ARTWORK
"學會準時上課"-15MIN之後當LATE,之後頭ABSENT,ABSENT/LATE夠一定數量直接FAIL
"可以周圍去玩"-有2個FIELD TRIP
"比GRADE唔錯"-做哂呢D野之後,評語仲話WELL DONE都係得個B+(其他同學大部份評語都...唔知班同學點好LO)
"有CONSULTATION"-話就話有,不過係10MIN既CONSULTATION...之後冇得再搵人幫你比意見
"話比你知你自己既不足"-我惟一一個拎唔到A RANGE既GE COURSE,比MARKS相當ARTISTIC,都唔知做咩
有兩種同學本人相當推薦你地跟MR. MAN係SUMMER 讀
同我一樣未拎過A RANGE之外既同學,嘗試下自己可唔可以保持紀錄
第二係未拎過A RANGE既同學,你地可以賭下可唔可以叻過班全A RANGE既人
呢個COURSE跟MR. MAN 讀真係好"學到野","想學野"同"做野快手"既同學記住選

chinese course name: 文物遺產建築－分析與導賞
body: The course follows with a bunch of assignments indeed. And you do sense this especially when taking this course in summer sem that everything is compressed to a 7-week study period. Thus you shall be prepared to imagine how crazy and hurried the submission schedule is.For this course in summer sem, assignments are distributed like every 2 weeks. You must always remind yourself of the submission deadlines esp for those who would spend time on part-time jobs. Luckily, classes were met every sat morning and tue night so it was as a result less disturbing. I myself didnt take jobs throughout the course. However, since we mostly work as group in the course, those who would work please be obligated to involve in group work, even though the course values the individual contribution the most.

Just train your reading and writing skills and those skillls i've learnt are not helpful. You can take this course for a sleep or you can listen to the teacher. Whatever you pay much attention to the lessons, you may still get C range in this course as examinations/your ORIGNAL English ability determine your grade at all. So, just feel free to attend this insignificant course for a year and put efforts to other GE and core courses. Don't waste your time to do revision!
2 presentations (no reports) only1 exam (pretty easy coz most of the questions ar similar to tutorial exericse)

Fong烂透了，就会回忆当年峥嵘岁月然后抱怨attendce太低，从来不检讨自己上课上的多糟糕。
quiz的内容上课几乎完全没教过都是在一本书里要我们自己去看来着，简直莫名其妙。
有一个present要3分钟内解决（本来是5分钟，但他自己没统筹好时间，废话太多于是每个人只剩下3分钟），时间太短了什么都说不好。他还要求别人数present期间你说了多少“eh”“a”之类。
有个paper只要求页数，好像是8~10页，不要求字数。我贴了一堆图进去，reference写掉半页似乎也OK。虽然很轻松但是什么都没学到还要听老师瞎掰简直觉得人生被浪费，如果只为了学分，上这个课无所谓。但如果真心希望学到什么——你还是自己买本信息技术方面的书在家看上三个小时更有意义。

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body:
撞到成班free rider,做野我1個人做.但係project幾易,只要分析數字走勢就無問題,用番佢既字眼.
test就好似考試,要prepare好多,否則就唔識.佢上堂解釋得清楚,我地不斷mark notes,有Ex example,所以易跟.
個individual assignment可以好大發揮,因為題目講人們搜集資料既方法,你對其有何意見.有D人用wiki,但建議唔好用,學校好似係唔可以用.
雖然成班free rider,佢地present遲到15分鐘,仲要我即場幫佢pre,但只要努力,結果都有A-

course name: Smart Auditing for a Better Life
body: Assignment：要拍一條2分鐘片，一本poster同一張booklet交功課。暑sem讀因為時間短所以趕d，如果平時讀就應該幾hea(因為我個組都係2個星期就KO曬功課)平時有2個quiz，十幾題MC加一至兩條填充，只要有上堂有溫書就會識做。

course name: Reading Colonialism and The Modern Experience
body:
Although the workload is very heavy, this course is worth to study.Workload
I studied this course in my first year at CityU, it was hard because of the reading materials but not the interpretation processes. We had to read more than ten pieces of story/article/journal. There were more than 20 pages in each pieces of reading material. I spent most of the time in reading these materials every week since I needed to check dictionary to get their meanings. Students will be difficult to follow lectures when they have not prepared.

course name: Ideology and Creativity: Unwrapping Japanese Culture
body: This course was quite relaxing at all. Instructor is an European and she had stayed and studied in Japan for a long time. Her knowledge about Japan is very wide and depth. I felt that all of the classmates enjoyed her lessons. Dennitza is nice and she always encouraged us to share our opinion as there are no exactly right or wrong answers.I think this course is not difficult as Dennitza prepared a lot and gave very detail explanations on each topic. She explained many Japanese key terms in English, so the lessons were easy to follow. We had to read some materials and watch movies in tutorial lessons. The only thing we had to do was reading before lessons.

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body: 睇個阿sir 平時笑口XX，估唔到佢咁狠，想試下中伏既滋味不妨一試。

一個好好的老師, 上堂氣氛輕鬆 唔會悶
有野唔問 你可以主動問佢 佢好樂意幫你忙
匯報或學期報告 問多D佢既意見 對功課好有幫助
只要做足耍求,B range 無難度

Queenie is relatively helpful and patient throughout the entire course, comments and feedback given by her are insightful and useful which assist students to improve their English proficiency and excel the quality of assessment tasks. Even though it is by no mean an easy task to attain an A range in this course, B range could be guaranteed if you accomplish all the required assessment tasks in the course without late submission especially for Queenie's class.

想好grade就唔走得堂
essay同個人學習檔案好重要
個人學習檔案最好keep住每星期都做少少

course name: From Small Inventions to Big Successes
body:
上堂係有少少悶 但唔take attendance 有重要既課堂佢會email叫你返
雖然area3 但d assignment似商科多 
例如寫business plan, 睇下果件科技產品既market opportunity etc.
total 3份 max. page: 2版 所以workload唔算好重 同埋全部google 可以搵到上堂就偏science&technology多 有science底會易明d 但唔明我覺得冇所謂 佢assignment 同quiz都冇問d好深既野 
雖然我對呢方面冇咩興趣 但知多左好多野 知多左好多間公司背後既故仔
份quiz聽佢講就係用黎分A range/B range 最好溫熟d啦 
我用左一日溫quiz 最後b+ 我覺得算滿意架喇 付出幾多收穫就幾多

course name: Competition and Cooperation in Diverse Contexts
body:
首先想重點表達 這不是爛grade GE
上堂頭三堂會聽唔明佢D發音 但會習慣 聽書有些boring 但有case discussion 迫你講好多英文同人negotiation 可以增加自信同人脈 
有D同學（內地人 小數hk 同我有印佢要我地睇的書 cityu library 被人偷曬 借就上網public library book 但要伸請網上ID先） 不過講真 它完全沒有作用 因為考試同佢教D野最多只有一半有related 
考過陣大部分mc 果D生子見都未見過 long q 好D 佢好鐘意反考 好多時連問題都睇唔明 例如question 誰不是XXx（未見過的生子）？ 咁見過的negotiation 生子就是正確ans 咁if掉反轉問題 誰是丫丫丫？ ( 見過的negotiation 生子）那未見的生子不是ans 
而且唔考背野 個個考完都唔識 以為自己死 我林份卷就是要你吹水 不用你背書 睇notes 就夠 懷著輕鬆的心情去考就算 反而要多留意negotiation case 同時事 因為佢要你舉出來但不用分析 所以人地present 要記著佢地講過既例 反而不用理分析 要事件就得
讀過a-level business studies Dse 企業 識吹水同經常留意新聞有so. 考試我舉咗好多例 eg 林老師講x丫z(power and right) Philippians 人質事件中曾特首的不獲復機 新航誤入跑道空難（conformation bias) But 佢非常不喜歡人走堂！

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body:
同上面講既野差唔多
但presentation就睇你好無彩抽中簡單d既topic
Present grouping最好就前d
Paper會易睇，特別係homosexuality 個份
（paper同notes差唔多，只不過再清楚d)
我個組就抽中social justice 英文好深好難，份paper有成廿頁
佢每堂會教唔同topic
1. Utilitarianism
2. Kant's ethics
3. Homosexuality
4. Animal's rights
5. Racial and sexual discrimination
6. Civil disobedience, political obligation
7. Social justice - Rawls同埋另外兩個Paper就寫至少700字，會畀埋題目你去揀
科野幾好讀，會接觸唔同題材，令人有反思

呢科絕對輕鬆
上堂教基本野, 如果本身係cb 人應該會識曬
有class assignment 所以d 堂一定要上齊, 呢科好重視出席率
class assignment 交左就有分;
另外1個 individual assignment + 1個group assignment(with presentation)
唔難, 交前無問過instructor 任何問題, 全部自己做

The course was REALLY NOT for Non-BBA students because it required adequate corresponding knowledge which will not be covered or delivered in the course. Besides, the schedule was very tight particularly in summer term. You may have to deal with two projects or assignments in the same week. I would not recommend this course due to the high requirements even though the instructor was very professional and nice.

course name: Values and Justice in the Contemporary World
body:
Grade assessment主要視乎project, paper同埋exam
Project不太難, 只是要求你讀一篇與topic有關的article (Dr CHAN會給你哪篇reading) 然後要求你一組人(大約5-6人)present哪篇文章的idea 當中沒有missing/misunderstanding就可以了paper就是在十數條題目中選擇一條來寫 寫大約700字 每一個topic都會cover到

course name: The City in Chinese History and Culture
body: Dr.LAM is quite an excellent teacher. He has adequate patience and distinctive opinions about many controversial points. He teaches more than knowledge---you would master the way of independent learning through those talks with him for preparation of your pre3&report.
Patrick 係幾好人，但係佢太好人，成日答晒人地問佢既問題，我問呢又無時間答......Test 幾難，我無讀過phy同chem 覺得好難，可能我能力低掛....

course name: Navigating and Piloting: Venturing off the Land
body: Funny lectures and seminars with a ship simulation lesson.
Stani is very hea

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body:
勁伏
教d野勁難
份quiz又掛羊頭賣狗肉, 根本係exam

呢一科多數summer先會開,出名好grade,不過你要對唔同既financial products有興趣先好揀 (例如保險,投資工具,貸款,按竭等等...)上堂模式:
分lecture同tutorial,建議唔好走lecture同tutorial
钱华虽然有点啰嗦，但是很负责，很有耐心，只要问她问题，她一定会耐心解答。她对课堂纪律要求比较高，学生不能迟到，不能在课上聊天和玩手机，否则一定会被扣分。钱华给分没有传说中那么低，在我那堂课上就有挺多人A range。

course name: Reading Colonialism and The Modern Experience
body: reading虽然比较多，但是从新颖的视角描述殖民主义，很有趣。老师很亲切，也很有耐心。总的来说，虽然任务比较繁重，但是可以学到很多新鲜有趣的东西。只要努力，得高分不难。

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body: 平时没有任何reading或作业，只要做好final paper和group presentation就可以得比较好的分数。Mary人很好。不过内容不太有趣。

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body:
比人del拎左cm 再打過唔會比ppt你(soft hard 都冇, 小)
好多vocab 
講野1999 又以為好有趣
pj mainland gpmate onxx 唔做野
上堂難跟 exam 難

個pj con左n次 改哂d問題 應該十分唔錯

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body:
quite relaxing..
u can learn something useful during the course

The tutor never cares whether you attend the classes. However, you have to follow the instructions strictly for all of the assignments. He will tell you the marking schemes and only if you follow the instructions can you get a good grade.

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body: 伏科, 講就話係ge唔會教太難, 但基本上係成個stat既core咁, 咩stat都教曬, 冇學過既人真係比佢大死presentation又係on99, 唔同你講format, 等你衰左present完就同你講你應該點做, 你做個d野錯曬...

The work load is quite heavy. The topics assigned by the tutor are difficult. However, Dr. Wong is very nice and patient. If you want to get a good grade, you must follow her requirements on the presentation and the final report. Consulting her more is really a good idea.
The instructor is very patient. She modifies our drafts very carefully. However, the work load is heavy and so many requirements on each assignment.
Visiting Professor is very nice.Almost everyone get a grade over B if you attend the two exams and do all the assignment. The work load is not heavy, either.

兩個Project + 一個open book examination
但其實個Exam先係伏中之伏，就算你溫哂書全部notes比你打開任睇，你都唔會識做。
Project建議搵Mainland同學一組，會有好大幫助。
總而言之，伏中之伏。
爛grade首選，當之無愧！
話唔教program,但其實同教左冇分別。

course name: Sustainable Business: Doing Good Business While Doing Good
chinese course name: 可持續發展的商業：謀求做好事與企業發展的共贏
body: 呢科啲 assignment 唔算多：聽一個講座寫 summary + 㨂一間公司出嘅 sustainable report 做分析 + 一個公司點做可持續發展原先頭兩項係 individual，但因為 summer 嘅關係，Spencer 畀我哋兩個人一齊做呢兩項 assignment，變相一人做其中一個，相當著數！所以全部 assignment 都係 group，可能因為我地太 hea 無乜點用過佢上堂講果啲 triple bottom line、VMV 果堆嘢所以先低分。如果想加小小分嘅話可以答佢堂上問題，又或者上 Blackboard 個 forum 度答都得。

呢科本來話係畀啲本身無學過 Programming 嘅人去讀，但點知有唔少有 programming 底嘅人都走入去讀，諗住屈吓分。呢科係用 MATLAB 教吓你一啲基本嘅 Programming：variable、if、loop、function、structure（類似 C 嘅 struct）、String、Filo I/O，再教埋你用 MATLAB plot graph。上堂就係跟 PowerPoint 講書，有時會播吓 MATLAB 教學影片。之後會有 Lab Exercise 畀你做吓，做完就 email 畀 Instructor。啲 Exercise 唔會太難做。Form 2B 寫話有 MC Quiz，但因為 summer 嘅關係佢 cut 咗。結果得 Lab Exercise 同埋一個 Group Project 要交。

course name: Reading Colonialism and The Modern Experience
teacher: 一个有点地中海，戴眼镜的和蔼老伯
body: 每周都有阅读，阅读量有点大倒是真的|||课前要把阅读读完啊不然上课听不懂，不过有些文章有中文版所以还OK【大不了全都丢进有道或者谷歌翻译看个大概意思上课也能应付只有一个小组presentation和一个individual paper，哦，还有俩test，test都是根据文章进行阅读理解，文章认真读就没问题，presentation什么的可以网上看看前人对于这篇文章的见解，然后会方便很多。paper是要结合三篇上课提到的文章写一篇paper，具体内容似乎没有要求【记不清了

本來想報黎屈機
點知個個報呢個Course既人都鬼咁勁
如果你有Programming底, 呢科絕對係派A科
如果你無, 都唔洗驚, hea極都有A-...最緊要做齊功課
不過唔識Programming的話就有點辛苦
Angus唔識教書...但勝在好人...唉...
功課這東西好玄...叫佢解釋多幾次...
佢就會成份solution拎出黎教你...

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy

Generally, it's quite a normal course. If you do all the assignments and lab reports, the grade will not be too bad, maybe B or above. Lab reports are quite harsh but just copy and paste from the lab manuals.

body: 上堂真係好鬼悶，其次有3個hw同1嘅quiz。each hw就要至少一個全日嘅時間搞掂(如果認真做)，同埋lecture 啲內容都好深，對science冇興趣嘅請謹慎

course name: Diseases, Culture and History: Hong Kong, China and the World
chinese course name: 疾病、文化與歷史：從香港、中國到世界
body:
上堂輕鬆
有時會悶，整體來說，有趣。
WORKLOAD唔大，每堂最尾有WORKSHEET，有一個PPT PROJECT，一份網上評論，一份ESSAY。
做PPT PROJECT，有一份ESSAY要睇，睇完唔明都無所謂(<-呀SIR講既)，睇唔睇都無所謂(<-我講既)。
網上評論大約七百字，寫夠九百字都OK，一個鐘K.O.
寫ESSAY，內容感覺上好似將一堂LECTURE要講既野全部轉化做文字，好輕鬆。
有TUTORIAL，但無乜野做，聽人PRESENT，問問題會加分，唔問問題都可以有A-。
呀SIR好NICE，好好人，PROJECT有地方唔明，可以同佢時間慢慢傾，佢會幫你詳細分析。

伏,多野做,教得唔好
由頭到尾都唔知value creation 係咩
唔係讀BBA既唔好簡
聽你present果陣訓覺
自問做得好,組入面有勁人
最後比你咁既grade

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body:
一直聽人講話好grade，結果中哂伏！
唔知係咪Nancy係mainland既關係，D英講到1999-_-
會本能性地左耳入右耳出。
而且內容一D都唔有趣。
分組project成10個一組，難約時間到爆炸，而且份progress report晨早就要交，又計分，好難咁快準備好。
問Nancy意見又話得唔清唔楚，方向有無錯都唔知就照做。
個考試仲犀利，唔止考上堂notes，仲要睇埋course pack(我無買so sad)~
當然係唔識做啦~
結果project B-，examC+，totalC+
只能說，伏！

呢一科其實我覺得係 Paul 教得好多過本身呢科嘅設計，或者係curriculum。
Paul 本身比較著重 discussion，同埋學生對於 readings 的理解，所以係上堂個陣 Paul 成日都話要用英文——而咁樣先可以更有效咁真正咁學到嘢。呢科嘅 assignment 唔複雜，幾篇 600-800 字以內嘅文，再加一篇 1000-1500 字左右嘅 reflection。
Project 就真係有少少考你之前有無上堂，因為要用得翻之前學過嘅嘢。

One group present, one homework, few googleable exam and quiz

I think he's got some psychological problems...who knows?

GPA killer
各位小心!

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy
teacher: CHONG Pui Man M., KWONG Yan Kit, GABRAKOVA Dennitza, WANG Xiaolin
chinese course name: 茶道：歷史、藝術、建築與哲學
body:
可能呢個course係第一次開班既關係,課程內容同教學模式有d混亂,2個tests難易度飄忽,不過勝在學到野,參與茶會最吸引!!啱晒鍾意日本傳統文化既同學~1. 課程內容&教學模式
呢一科涉及範疇極廣,唔係淨係講飲茶咁簡單,係連茶碗款式,茶道歷史既重要人物等等都要識..雖然分做四個範疇由四個導師去教,但幾位之間無乜協調性,部份內容重覆,整體教得幾悶,難以掌握會考既重點..有位教書成日自high講到off topic,又成日講日文,上堂似教日文多d=_=...唔識日文既同學會比較難理解,不過test又唔會要求寫日文,所以都唔洗太擔心~(個人覺得呢科應該用廣東話教,因為用外語去學另一外國文化有d難度,好多時都唔明講乜...)

course name: Living with the Unexpected and Unknown in Modern Society
chinese course name: 生活在不能預測的現代社會
body:
比一般GE有較多野做(可能之前讀既都較少野做)
基本上做2個PRESENT同2份ASSIGNMENTS (6選2份高分)
MIDTERM,EXAM之前都會講問題,答案絕大部份都有講 
如果比足手機去準備答案去到考個時抄就唔會太低分如果要攞A RANGE上堂要主動積極,REPORTS PRESENT都要好
GROUPMATE好既就更加好,不過差既都唔會有太大影響,係多D野做
忙到嘔，個topic ok 啦，唔怕勁多野做可以take, 成績一般
佢唔HEA既, 佢對ASSIGNMENT都好有要求, 都算手緊, 幾難係佢手上拎靚GRADE, 最後都好多人拎B- 至 C GRADE

course name: Ideology and Creativity: Unwrapping Japanese Culture
body:
ELC的學生讀得很辛苦，導師的用字對我來說有點深，有很多生字要認識然後在ESSAY上運用，不然很難去告訴導師你有留心聽書，認真對待這科。
每個TOPIC都好像很容易，但導師希望的是從中思考，然後得到一些反思或想法，老實說我不知道她真正要我思考甚麼，ESSAY我只能夠對開出一個簡單的相關議題然後找資料SUPPORT。
個人認為此科不易好GRADE，我自問都不是HEA讀，但有努力過去研究，希望可以有多一點想法。但真是力不從心。到最後連B+都沒有。

chinese course name: 文物遺產建築－分析與導賞
body:
呢科係付出幾多就回報幾多
雖然唔計attendace 但3份assignment+mc quiz
份份assignment既字數都好似fyp既預演
但只要比心機做功課既話 成績應該差極都有限
有一個field trip 做assignment又可以比機會你自己同朋友去睇唔同heritage
而且個guest talk其實都唔錯
所以唔怕workload幾重同有興趣揀而讀可能好少少
last but not least 純粹廢嗡既有感而發
商業利益唔應該大過任何保育工作
冇左就冇左 唔通大家真係好想下一代同以後既人只可以係相片睇返先知歷史?
一個built heritage值唔值得保留 唔應該單單用商業利益去計算
因為只要一講到個built heritage本身既建築特色同歷史價值就已經係無價
係"無法用任何貨幣價格去作計算"
真係好希望大家明白點樣去拎一個平衡 
個平衡唔係話為左多少少地有得拆就拆 將來可能建立個資料館做紀念就收得工
一個只講經濟而欠缺對歷史和多元文化尊重既社會 
應該冇乜資格叫做國際大都會
將成件事套係人既思想都一樣
希望大家可以對社會關心多一些 唔好再抱住拆左就算既小市民心態
以為呢個社會發生既野唔關自己事 以為自己生活安穩就夠
而忘記呢個社會仲有好多不公義既事等我地去關心 去了解 去行動

幾多GROUP PROJECT, 不過好易做
上堂好悶, 訓教 用電腦 走堂都冇問題
有MC QUIZ, 幾難但有D COMMON SENSE , 肯溫就唔會低分
整體OK 如果你有FD一齊讀而唔係FREE RIDER
boring but grades not bad

course name: Ideology and Creativity: Unwrapping Japanese Culture
body: Atmosphere in the course is very relaxed but not casual!I think the most difficult part is reading the course pack. There were lots of professional terms about sexology and psychology.

係個超有heart既老師，教得好好，問佢野會好詳細咁答，仲會推薦埋參考書
但要求好高，想hea住攞好grade唔好搵佢

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development

body: Interesting

course name: Music and Human Values: Philosophical Investigations
body:
Prof有教學熱誠
課題由淺入深
建議喜歡classical music既同學讀
我既組員Grade Range:B到A+

course name: Modern Applications of Chinese Classical Poetry
chinese course name: 中國古典詩之現代應用
body: 好悶，文學嘢，又多嘢做，無得撿或者為者夾時間先好讀

course name: Media and Consumption: Food and Fashion in Everyday Life
body: 比佢quiz 1既essay殺左，英文底唔好既千期唔好簡
勁多野寫，但係有心做至少都b＋，最緊要係唔好走堂
可以走堂，assignment睇note同上網都搵到晒，quiz係屋企做，輕鬆又好grade

course name: Reading Colonialism and The Modern Experience
body:
really boring and difficult. 
it had one very long (more than 10 pages) reading for each week.
and the requirement of the assignment is difficult to reach.
i am quite interested in the culture and history of Hong Kong, but this course is really way too difficult and the work load is too high that i cant really handle it with other subjbut i didnt attend one test and have really failed groupmates for the proj so i deserve this grade.

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body:
真係非常輕鬆 上堂我淨係上左3堂 佢中間BREAK TICK ATTENDANCE 可以叫FRIEND 幫你 不過成日唔返其實佢會認得 但佢個人幾好 上堂既時候投入D 俾下反應都唔會太差 PRESENT TOPIC 要有趣D 有氣氛 就OKAY 
ASSIGNMENT 唔難做 都係D可以吹水同係NOTE 抄返好多野既TOPIC不過如果唸住可以走下堂就記得揀岩TUTOR, 唔係個個都走得

2 assignment
2 lab report 
final project + presentation
lab reports are quite difficult
quite heavy workload but you can find most information on the internet

每個星期要做一次Twitter assignment, 有兩次quiz (有溫書都會識), 同做一個group project + present
俾分好鬆手, 上堂好輕鬆!
Good teacher with heart teaching. We were really enjoyed the lesson time through the semester. Highly recommend to reg this course.

The teacher is bad that he gives extremely tough grades to students. He teaches nothing in the class but expects you to submit your assignment with Chinese History AL quality. Drop the course if you get this tutor!

workload又唔算多
啲野都幾得意, 又有debate可以學多d野
但衰在爛GRADE< EVEN你平時幾積極答問題都無用

no assignment
idea paper hea do ok (1.8/2)
class discussion+presentation very hea
project ok hea
exam mc+ essay quite hard
Never choose her. Bad grade and heavy workload. Hardly to reach A range in her class

Tutor 好好人, 好似fd咁好玩得傾得, 
功課方面, Hannah會提你交draft同assignment, 基本上唔需要記住
上堂輕鬆, 雖然應讀既野都會俾你讀哂, 但唔會覺得好強迫
另外佢亦會自己整vocab紙 唔怕唔明readings講乜

Sad....
At first thought Amy is nice and this is a good grade course. It turned out my group is B range.
It had many quizs and exercises in lecture so DO NOT skip lecture. Make sure you have engin groupmates, otherwise it is useless no matter how fast your google search speed.
For the presentation, it is very important. She emphasized CREATIVITY for the presentation. We consulted her several times to ensure we were presenting something she needed. But then she said creative but she didn't understand! \_/
Do not have marks for assignments.
The grade fluctuates a lot now, so it is no longer a good grade course...

chinese course name: 全球信息技術 (IT) 案例研究
body:
又要寫JOURNAL,又有QUIZ,group project又要交progress report,final report,d reading assignment又多又煩.
千其唔好讀呢科

course name: Ideology and Creativity: Unwrapping Japanese Culture
body:
我唔明大家點解話易讀
開頭比佢個名呃左 以為hea hea 地讀下日本d 文化如茶道呀飲食呀
點知要探討埋d勁深既日本gender 問題
又咩salary man 同武士既關係之類
睇完1次video/movie 就要寫reflective journal
佢仲要限字數5句內 點寫呀
D QUIZ 又難到嘔 FILL IN THE BLANKS 唔知填乜 真係OPEN BOOK 都唔識
TERM PAPER 任你作題目 同 PRESENT 做 PAPER COLLAGE 我都覺得係算易做

其實真係唔算好好grade
如果為grade就唔好揀young psy
有3個上堂quiz 但係基本上全部上堂打開抄
無派唔知grade
最終要做booklet同present 唔係hea
同樣effort 不如揀第二科btw堂係可以唔洗上既

做既數量係多 但係全部都好Q hea
可能唯一要concern就係每堂都要上
因為大部分堂都會有quiz 
個d quiz純粹係考你google既速度同你地組員幫唔幫手
正常情況唔啱晒都係錯一題
有present同功課 但係其實呢科所有野都係上網抄
上左咁耐 根本完全唔知佢講緊咩
同埋唔好比佢放2230嚇到
2100先係真正落堂時間

本人中意睇戲，入面學到好多野，功課量系多，不過syllabus應該會有改動，我當時3篇文(短中長各一), 3 tests (好簡單，因為老師會test前再重溫ppt), 另外要拍片+ Reflection essay，佢想睇到一條片無需要太多花巧野但表達主題意思，如果用到多種shot佢會好滿意。本人不是英文底好既人同Media人，佢地讀呢科就非常吃香，投入多d努力，老師會睇到. 但系我中意呢科，就算我英文差都好，我篇文多grammar mistake,佢都比左好多好多意見我，我都有A B 同B+三份功課，幸好拍片Project有好好既teammate一齊都有A-。

course name: Common Accidents in Modern Day City Life - Inevitable? Preventable?
chinese course name: 一般意外在現代都市生活中是否無可避免？或是可以預防？
body: 都幾hea, 學到野既都, 不過MC 都幾tricky下, 要求你細心溫書. Project要求要Creative先會高分, 我自己Test 1 太低分(冇人滿分，最高21/25）, 不過第2個test 高分左, Project都要求高, 因為太多人做同一個topic.
I recommend you to take a revision on the teaching materials before doing the assignments. The lecturer is very nice and she is willing to discuss the psychological theories with you patiently.
Please participate fully in all lectures as there are in-class assignments. The lecturer is very helpful to answer your problems about the classwork.
...Try hard to work on your project

course name: Knowing Ourselves Better in Work and Life
body:
上堂小悶,workload唔重,individual presentation(5mins),project +exam
俾分鬆,exam 算容易,有溫PPT實識

course name: Diseases, Culture and History: Hong Kong, China and the World
chinese course name: 疾病、文化與歷史：從香港、中國到世界
body:
每堂課都會探討一種疾病, 研討疾病與當地人既關係
阿SIR幾畀心機教, 而且課程有趣
但畀分唔夠手鬆
每堂都要做一張工作紙, 用黎計平時分
我依次走左幾堂, 如果唔係應該會B+
個Project 連present 都係選題研討, 程度唔會太難

course name: Preservation and Revitalization of Buildings with Heritage Value inside City Environments
teacher: Raymond Wong & Mr. TSE Chi Kwok
chinese course name: 城市環境中對歷史價值建築的保育和更新
body:
就以下幾點啦:
1. 工作主要係Group report , 搵D Heritage 作為題材做分析報告, 比少少時間肯去Google 同 Library 已經足夠
2. 小組大約3人一組, 所平均每人工作量不大, 
3. 課程內容同講師都算係悶, 但阿SIR都介意D人係咪專心聽書, 所以嗜睡或健談既同學可考慮其他GE科
4. 走堂對Project 分冇咩影響
5. 依科係某D asso 同學既Pre-reg科, 所以BST同學為大多數
6. 對歷史或建築特色有興趣的同學不妨一試

有大量課堂exercise, 但都是考你吹水功夫。
上oliver堂最緊要尊心, 但佢問啲問題都唔難的。
project是group的, 有做research唔難的。
攞不到A range, 是因為走堂太多.....miss了一份計分的堂上exercise。

工作量是一般的。
一個project report+ presentation+ 個人部份
trip是幾好玩的, 也令我識到好好的朋友。
上堂學不到野, 因為不用考試, 基本上是發呆或玩手機。
B-只是因為不幸遇到兩個上莊的freerider。

course name: Identity and Citizenship in a Globalized World
chinese course name: 全球化下的身份與公民意識
body:
呢科主要係講national identity, 不過我讀果陣已經係2011年,
連lecturer都已經換埋人, 唔知依家既模式會唔會同以前係一樣.
所以下面comment都係只供參考, 最好以course online同依家教既lecturer為準.果陣讀既都係外國人居多, 本地學生都係得幾個.
主要有participation (包括present, exercise), mock exam同final paper.
唔知果陣呢科係咪新呢還是本身個topic比較虛, 教果陣好似無乜方向咁.
淨係得D article可以參考下, 而且D article都幾深.
明明講既野唔深, 但係就好似將成科複雜化左.
花左好多堂先至明佢大概講緊乜.
每個week上堂前都要睇佢擺上BB既article,
所以其實呢科都幾多野做下.
mock exam係week 13進行, 
open book, 問題都唔算話太難,
上堂有聽書既話, 大致上都應該會識得做.
final paper就自己揀個topic做, 都係將D concept apply落去.

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body:
工作量比較少, 主要係present, written paper同lecture participation.
Present要盡量interactive少少, 唔好太悶好似講書咁, 但亦都要有concept去support.
Written paper要將concept apply番落自己個scenario度, 同埋英文要好.
上堂就最好上齊, 唔好走多個3堂; 如果週不時答下問題就更好.
做足呢3樣就會好容易好grade.

course name: Video Game: History, Industry, Society, and Creativity
body:
just playing games during the lessons.
An individual present + a group present and report only.

A good teacher
but make sure you have correct footnotes if u wanna get an A

老師幾好人!
不過上堂同FIELD TRIP 內容比較無聊!
另外,功課好有D 難做同多,PROJECT就吾難做!

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
MC EXAM非常伏,竟然考背數字!
而且要整POSTER,佢又吾肯講多D有咩要求!
麻煩的老師!
不過上堂好HEA,自己做野完全無問題!

要求嚴格的老師.她回覆EMAIL的效率挺高,而且詳細.
另外,她要求學生在課堂上主動發問及答問題!

I am the only A- in the class. 
Ann is quite tough and stick to her principle very much, so you must follow her every instruction. 
Also, it is important to get her know you, therefore you have to answer her questions very often.Email B+
Meeting A (this is probably because of the impression, to be honest)
Persuasive letter B
Presentation B+ (different from our normal present, it requires a very high quality of presentation which she minds every wordings...also the slide must not contain your scripts to present but just very few words)
Report A- (just make report look very alike the one in the textbook, it guarantees a good grade.)
Overall: A-
Need much class participation in order to get good grades

1 LAB SECTION + LAB REPORT
follow the instructions. Lab Report is quite time consuming.1 GROUP PRESENTATION
Easily get high marks.
Most students get 6/7 or even 7/7.

no attendance requiredWEEKLY twitter
-share one piece of interesting 'socal issue' every week, upload it to twitter

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body:
Good tutor, easy subj,Class Participation takes for 30% but I barely ans any questions,
attendance takes most of the part.

2 assignments, 1 open book exam (rational thinking)
1 presentation (creative ideas)要溫書. + 聽書
如果唔係考試 open book 都冇用

Sandy好好人，好肯幫學生，Isabel 雖然都肯，但就冇Sandy咁好，同埋黑面程度高…
功課係非Q之常繁重，包括有堂上玩命即做Presentation Powerpoint、個人功課、小組功課（寫到你氣咳都未寫完）、Project Presentation、考試，上堂又好Q悶，不過如果你同大陸學生一齊讀同做，佢地Free-ride嘅機率較低。
同時唔大適合完全無經濟/商業底嘅朋友就讀，你會一舊雲。
總體黎講，你讀Econ/Business完全唔吃力，讀呢科啦，你會拎到好Grade，你讀都未讀過、或者無興趣陪Friend讀，咁我都係勸你過主啦。

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body:
NOTES會擺上BLACKBOARD
上堂唔TAKE ATTENDANCE
極HEA, 試過唔上堂又唔通知
成班人呆坐3粒鐘
PROJECT EXAM都好易
讀過STAT成個SEM唔上堂都A RANGE

course name: Innovation and Entrepreneurship for Young Professionals
body: 作業很少，在group裡面盡職盡責就好

course name: Thinking Philosophy: Bridging the Gap between Arts and Sciences
body: 自我感覺presentation 還不錯，不知道為甚麼低分。
一個好無聊同搵笨既course，都無知做乜，成班engine學生要做演員，扮演一個engine firm入面不同角色同模仿一個seminar，教下你take minutes，progress report等。D assessment requirement又唔清楚，搞到好似要好造作。都唔係好實用。

chinese course name: 認識不確定性與統計推論
body: 本身對business/econ/stat冇興趣，超悶。都唔記得學過乜。grade系死讀返來。

chinese course name: 文物遺產建築－分析與導賞
body:
這科其實蠻不錯的, 內容都實在又不難讀
不過Anthony教書太容易令人想睡…論worklaod總體來說不算多
可是功課分佈有點奇怪, wk1-7只要上課完全沒功課
wk8-13就是你主要開始要努力拚功課的時候了~!!
第一份你感覺還好, 隨著deadline愈來愈密你感覺就吃力了
加上大家都習慣最後一分鐘才把東西做完, 還要通通group work做好馬上就要交也來不及修了
總之就是要找可靠又願意做的組員, 只要一個組員沒出現, 你馬上覺得正在跑向地獄…
畢竟後期時間少, 要求的字數也蠻多的說

Nice class, interesting, inspiring. 
But you cant skip class n need to hand out reflection every week.
Final project is not easy, but if u have good groupmate, you will be fine!
Love the class!
個外國MISS都算nice...不過估唔到最後得到個爛grade..呢科係我臨急臨忙係最後ADD/DROP關頭ADD既..都知奶左野..上堂都幾悶..個人認為..有得揀千奇唔好要呢科..我有幾個FD都係最後B-/C+..有個C-

body:
個course其實就唔使預佢會幫你學到D咩喇, 但係成個course都係圍繞住一個中心主題來講(自己領會啦)

個grade絕對=你個effort, midterm/exam都唔使怕, 咩coursework都唔使怕,
努力寫快D, 抄快D, 吹多D, 佢就會覺得你好hard working, 咁就自然會好grade啦,

present仲有可以summarize下佢上堂講的野, 咁佢又會好中意
Conclusion: 唔會爛grade, 不過想好grade就要多D(扮) 勤力, 
勸力的話, A range絕對冇難度, 岩哂D係靠勸力攞好grade的人!

一, 呢個course不算好grade，而且我建議你對基督宗教有興趣先好讀。
二, 呢個course吾算太多野做，同1501一樣workload(1份paper+1 present+1 網上討論) 但ppt同paper都要求你做research，可能要多花d時間設計問卷/做下訪問等。(因此，最好選擇一d易做問卷/訪問既題目)
當然，馮老師學識淵博，對基督教和中國文化認識相當深入，如果吾太介懷成績，又想知多d野及對基督教有興趣的話，不妨一試GE1115 基督宗教與中國文化

The workload for this course is not heavy at all.
Firstly, you have to write a weekly journal with your project groupmates every week. I am sure that it is not difficult because you have to write down what you have learnt in the lesson only.
Secondly, there are two small quiz to test your understandings. Not difficult as long as you have read through the notes.
Thirdly, there are two field trips. No related assignments have to be done for these two field trips. But the two field trips were memorable to me.
Lastly, the final project presentation. Not quite difficult. Mainly about environmental conservation.
The last thing I want to note is that Mr Lawrence Khoo is a good professor. He has great teaching heart. Just ask him more questions. He is nice and willing to answer your questions in depth.
一定要多多搵佢consult！！佢好NICE

The workload was not heavy except for the last one. the video editing is difficult. The instructor delivered the course in relaxing and easily accepted ways with a lot of materials and activity. So would he share the own career experiences. HE IS REALLY NICE! BTW: Attendance is important as well!
Good choice

每堂课开始有小测验，就是一个问题，一行话就答完。只是迟到就没得拿。
整堂课分三个module：诗歌、小说和剧本。每一项都有一个exercise和一个大assignment，后者在长度和分数比重上约是前者的2-3倍。
reading数量一般，其中一半真的是让人会想反复咀嚼的。我留作收藏。
写作这件事当然见仁见智了。因为我的小说assignment得了90分，其他部分都有75-85的成绩，小测验只错过半道，所以有A-拿。

张隆溪大牛讲课，Heidi是他的博士生，tutor。张大神除了讲课什么都不管，作业考试打分都是Heidi一人。
presentation, midterm, final各一次
张教授是个很厉害的人。上课不用ppt，不用教案，不板书，一张嘴一个高容量大脑全搞定，你在底下记笔记还记半句丢半句。出彩事例如和钱钟书通过信等，不一而足。
reading不少，考试内容都在里面。有很努力复习但还是B+，文科得到这个成绩也算能接受。

Even though the term 'Islam' may sound boring to some students, this course is definitely one worth taking. The assessment tasks include one reflection essay, one book/film review and a debate held during the last lecture. Moreover, students had the opportunity to visit two mosques, enabling us to really learn outside the classroom. The materials covered in lectures were boring from time to time but in general they were fine.

差不多就像大家说的那样啦~
每两周有art diary，写两件艺术品，所以是一周一件。没有特殊要求，就是挑一件艺术品写艺术和科学的联系。选什么都可以，我甚至写了迪士尼门口的米奇喷泉，又一城宣传活动时树的雕塑和深圳地铁站里很有特色的座椅。老师一定是偏重你个人的思考的，有自己的观点即可。
附上我的一个思路：又一城timberland环保主题塑像，用刷白的塑料桶粘合成的机器人→作品本身是科技与艺术的结合→展开：科技是把双刃剑，塑料很难分解→把塑料做成艺术品也是解决办法之一→人类应想到更好的处理废弃塑料的办法
每周有discussion board，也是观点为重，100字左右就够。但最最重要是不要忘记deadline，有拖延症和the last minute习惯的同学请绕道。我忘记了最后一次discussion board，否则我觉得应该有A拿。
一篇博物馆展览的参观感想。观点！思考！
一次presentation，挑两件艺术品阐释选题原因、异同与它们和科学的关系。小组互评占10分，所以不干活的人下场会很惨哦~
考试当然要复习啦，付出都不一定有收获，不付出你指望谁呢。murphy人很好，出了几组一样的MC，如果你复习到了就会都做对。questions也是有选择余地的（似乎是10选6？），时间肯定够，就看你学不学东西。
----
Murphy作为一个生物系的老师，研究之余有对美术这样的喜爱，令我佩服。并且作为一个理科老师，上课条分缕析逻辑性强，板书利于笔记。另外，New Yorker的美音正自不必说。虽然我知道语言的作用是表达思想，发音语法什么的位列其次，但在浸泡在各式口音的生活里把上她的课当做洗耳朵，实乃学期一大快事！
爱思考，爱艺术，不怕写字的同学上课一定是享受。虽然不记attendence，如果你热爱如我，必定不会缺席。

Students are just required to write two 500-word essays, work on a group project and complete the end-of-term quiz so the workload is in no way considered heavy. However, I do find the group project somewhat challenging since the questions given by the professor were rather problematic. As for the quality of the lectures, I believe that they are not that beneficial to me as the materials covered were just general. It is not that easy to get a good grade but it is still a recommendable course because of the extremely light workload.

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body: 課程由淺入深 lecture易明 tut就technical d,不過都簡單好玩，平時讀ge好驚唔知教乜鬼，好驚唔識d野，但呢科就算冇底都會handle得黎，professor 又好nice, project 同professor confirm好方向，就冇咩大問題。呢科先係真正既G.E . 輕輕學到野又唔會好似core咁chur。

上堂就講 powerpoint，播吓 RTHK The Pulse
每個星期都會有 group presentsem 中有一個 midterm，close book 寫 essay，基本上要你背晒教過嘅 notes。（聽讀 LLB 啲人講佢地啲科考試通常都係 open-book）
之後果個 individual assignment 又係寫 essay，畀啲情景你之後要你判斷點做好。份嘢仲話有案例更加好，我唔係讀 LLB，我連去邊度 search 都唔知，個 database 又唔係好似 google 咁求其打啲 keyword 就有啲啱用嘅 case 畀你引用。我上網揾啲相關新聞睇吓啲內文有無講啲啱用嘅法例可以放入去個 assignment 度，好在都揾到幾條啱用。但結果果份嘢得 B-

你話呢科係伏我都唔信, 直至真係TAKE左先覺得係
之前D人講得岩, 呢個Frankie Har絕對係伏中之伏
上堂HEA不突至, 佢個計分方法係偏向D成日同佢傾計的人
做D ASSIGNMENT又ON9 學唔到野, 總之有得揀TUTOR就一定唔好揀佢
否則包你爛GRADE

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body: Ok 啦，course pack 勁多嘢, 好多睇唔明, 好彩有A. 仲諗住坐B望B十。記住take 呢個tutor, 第二個估佢唔倒。呢個hea D.

科野得三個tasks
拍片、寫份lab report同做corpus consultation task
會計attendance 
Lab report無乜特別，佢會畀唔同grade既example你睇（偷偷影低佢做參考）
Corpus consulatation task好易做
拍片今年個topic唔太好做，講毛既特性
主要想講講個tutor
上堂唔知自己做乜鬼，對住個mon讀都算
有時要我地讀返比佢聽
佢連要教咩都要上堂個時諗諗先「教」到
教之前好似無做過preparation咁
另外，幾次都要等到上堂前二、三日先話你知要做咩
有時我地仲清楚過佢要做咩
問過其他班原來早一個星期上堂時已經講定黎緊既堂要做咩再講，問佢問題好似唔太知咁，唔太想答，最好唔好煩佢咁
我自己主要都跟返course leader(christoph?) email既要求交功課
至少d tasks要有咩野會比佢清晰
完全唔建議揀佢，per-reg左既話最好轉另一班
Easy to get good grades but learn little.

course name: Security and Privacy in the Information Age
chinese course name: 信息化時代的安全與隱私
body:
2 test 係 easy ge, 但group pro好多組好多extra ge 嘢(eg 拍3-4 條high quality ge video- -, 印T-shirt, 作歌, 印年歷).....有 cm 同學做gpmate係好好 多
admin work extremely heavy!!!!(around 12-14 人一group, 要有心埋準備一定有D人搞到你嘔血!!!!!)

I think this course best suits people who are active in class and is attentive. Without participation, I would say, it's easy to lost track. The course contains 3 quizes, which are quite easy, if you really pay attention in class, cos all the questions have been covered during lecture. So it you really pay attention in class (I know it's hard, but it's really helpful), you don't need much time for your revision (it took me around 15 min each revision for each test). 
The final group project is to make a booklet and poster. Not really have to do much coordinate work within the team, cos all parts are easy to be devided evenly. 
The course stressed a lot on logic, on how you answer the questions in a systemic and organised way. It's not hard though, just remember to show how you process the question and answer it step be step.

course name: Love, Sex, and Relationships: Psychological Perspectives
body:
Fair workload. Overall, it's only one big project that devided into different phrases, which is easier to keep track of the process of your project,
Groupmate selection is very important, students who have studied research before (e.g. psychology/ marketing majorwould definitely an advantage). However, the group size is rather large (around 8), which takes time for admin work. 
Easy exam, just around 40 MCs. The exam covers the course pack and notes, so remember to buy the course pack although it is really expensive :P (around $300)

course name: Low Carbon Footprint - Energy Saving Practices in Everyday Life
body:
D堂好悶
讀PPT、播片、BREAK
冇乜野學到
我會做自己野OR訓覺...2份ASSIGNMENT
A) Footprint Report(吹2頁A4紙)
B) Poster + Present(中左伏,最早PRESENT,佢又唔講要求)
係後尾先知佢鐘意張POSTER多字
不過付出同收獲都算正比
有人用幾十蚊印張A1定A2 POSTER =>真係贏成條街

Tutor will take pop-quiz attendance in class.2 take home assignment (v.easy if you study geography in high school), 1 open book in class quiz (no talking, but can use computer and search answer in google), 1 cloud observation project (whole day observation or consecutive day observation), and 1 poster presentation. But, the peer evaluation of 2 present will seriously affect the final grade(~20%), so it is hard to get a good grade if your classmates are unfriendly.

有5個assignment,難度唔算高,不少答案可以係note or google找到,不過assignment的問題無限字數,想有高分的話可能要多花時間做詳細一點
另外,project方面,每人要present 2-3分鐘,最後仲要交final report.
上堂都幾輕鬆,好多野都係common sence,你唔想聽可以做吓自己野,感覺損失也不大

正常。上堂好悶。d in class assign同project好多source,唔算難做。tutor都幾好人，唔覺得係killer。

每堂都Take attendence。
每星期都會有一條group exercise Question. 有d要present,有d要roleplay,有d就咁做就得。last lesson要將所有exercise 既softcopy一次過交俾tutor,所以冇得唔做。
除左呢d仲有一個2個鐘既quiz,一個鐘既問書(form 2b既in class debate,grp base)，一份individual 既assignment(1000字左右），加埋一個poster presentation。
好忙既科，但tutor好好人，上堂都幾開心。

The course consists of weekly 3 hr small-class lectures and 3 compulsory outings to exhibits (excluding one visit to the CMC). In class, various art forms and art movements were discussed chronologically; students who're not genuinely interested in the subject might find these lectures boring as certain concepts could be quite abstract to grasp. Anyhow the course has been very enjoyable with a relaxing learning ambiance. Our instructor never failed to give his own insights and feedback to students.The workload's fairly slight, with only a minimum of 3 art reviews based on the outings, a 5 min presentation and a 1000-word final paper. The art reviews (blog entries) did not require much artistic knowledge/background but rather, focused on students' ability to justify their interest in or opinion regarding a particular artwork. The final paper however was an assessment demanding a more technical and articulate analysis as well as understanding.

郭錦鴻都係我大學入面最欣賞既一位老師,佢教識我地點命題,寫一篇岩既論文,同點搵資料去支持論點,呢d對我讀自己d core都好有用.

佢係對命題同論文內容方面有要求,但同一時間佢都會放好多時間比學生去問問題,同比學生約時間上佢DEPARTMENT consult佢.
我果次約佢consultation既時候發現佢個時間表真係爆曬,寫滿曬學生約佢CONSULT既時間的.
如果真心想學到野,上堂又可以開開心心,揀郭錦鴻係一個唔錯既選擇.

body:
paula好好人,上堂又輕鬆,又NICE
秒速回email 其實俾分都已經好鬆(b+應該係因為個dept d rules,而唔係prof.既問題)
但睇唔睇READINGS就睇你咩人啦
都係寫左3篇文+兩次QUIZ
感覺良好

冇走過任何lt/tutorial
但prof.都幾nice既 幾似小學老師
同佢傾proj.都唔會有咩Hard feeling
相反其實佢都幾HEAHEA地,因為佢自己都話中意上少d堂 同早d落堂
試過一開始話搵唔倒資料email佢,佢都forward左幾個reference俾我,
論文先係主打,盡量俾d心機做d註腳

輕鬆奪A, 除非你hea到完全唔肯溫書
基本上得兩次quiz 佔30% 應該算係最大,
COVER PPT 唔算好難
又唔take attendance
但呢個男prof.有點煩,present最後有片先吸引到佢睇
有組人present都幾有心咁做晒問卷,做晒圖分析,個prof.極唔友善咁同佢講 夠鐘唔洗再present lol個女既應該都好grade
呢科其實係得兩樣嘢煩：present 同埋論文。唔知係咪篇文寫得太普通所以 B+。

要作四篇文、整一條 YouTube 片讀英文同埋要去同學啲 blog 留幾個言
基本上每堂都要睇果啲文章，但 Hannah 好好人唔規定要上堂前睇晒啲文，仲會有 vocab list 畀你。四篇作文交之前果堂要作好個 draft 做 peer-review，開頭果幾個星期隔個星期交文，都幾麻煩。但去到後尾就開始鬆動返。臨尾篇文其實唔係 research essay，只係一篇用 APA style 嘅 proposal argument，Hannah 減咗 reference 數量。最好交之前拎去 ELC proofread 一吓，因為呢篇文佔重分。

course name: How Do You Turn Sand on a Beach into a Trillion Dollars?

body:
workload:
2個mini project﹑1個individual report﹑1個quizmini project：佢上堂會俾兩個鐘我地做，但係次次都係唔夠時間present而推落下一堂。present題目唔難，都易發揮﹑易吹水
individual report：題目係「試行一個實驗：沒有了_____(mobile phone / computer / tv / ...) 的_____(1day/2days/1week/...)」
有哂guide lines跟住吹就得 (不過個個都做 a day without mobile phone= =)
quiz：open book，都係係一大堆上堂派過既資料度抄返d答案落問題簿，不過有少少唔夠時間
(* 原本係3個mini-project，後尾佢話唔夠時間先轉做individual report)

workload:
3個assignment﹑2個quiz(其實都係assignment)﹑1份projectassignment同quiz既分別係：assignment係出左題目後3星期交﹑quiz就係一星期後交
d問題有難有易，易既common sense﹑難既google都幫你唔到要自己ff
(個人意見係 佢都分得幾平均：30%易﹑30%中等(google到)﹑40%難)

course name: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern Science
body:
分3個section 每個佔30% attendance 10%
第一個section係易經&DNA 
Assignment兩份: book report + 解卦(唔會好難其實 notes都寫得幾清楚)
第二個section係chaos&fractals
Assignment兩份: demonstration(用software整fractals 之後即場show比instructor睇) + demonstration report 
第三個section係network
Assignment一份: 一張reflective worksheet (吹水同抄notes野落去就夠)
呢個section有時上堂會有group discussion (今個sem 有兩次) 再有 1min左右presentation 但計好少分除左group discussion, 全部野都係individual assignment
雖然睇落workload好似好多 但感覺上我唔係好辛苦 可能因為佢唔係堆積埋sem尾交 
成個course d野係ok深 同埋佢地教得好蜻蜓點水 好難完全明哂
但佢地比既assignment 唔算好難 唔會唔識做 就算上堂冇聽睇notes 都識
自問我好多時都一頭霧水 上堂都唔係好知佢講咩 
但你assignment入面show到有比effort 個grade都唔差得去邊

a bit chur near sem end but not difficult to pass

pre3做好D。

This tutor never gives A+, but it is extremely easy to get an A, if you aim only an A, choose this professor, but i am not talking about the course, the course itself is too boring and you dont know what to do in lectures, you just simply give some presentations, and do a final project, with a poster and a report, without a final presentation. The most workloading are not the project but the own individual learning logbook, you are required to write every week and this may cause you lots of time to complete if you are lagged behind about a few weeks.
Overall the course is not bad, but it is boring, good grade, but workload quite large, but as an GE course it is acceptable.

工作量不算繁重，有兩次group assignment，一次大考 (大考佔 30%)
所學範圍，從改革開放前、到改革開放後，教授農業、銀行、工業等方面的改革，又有講述國內人民收入不均、環境問題、股票市場的課程。涉獵範圍之廣，如不早已認知、課前備課，定必跟不上，亦難於掌握課程。
總括而言，得C 是低於一般的grade，我身邊就讀這科的朋友，平均都只得C grade。
好難明

body: 本身lee 一個course 係full 左，但係上完第一堂之後有 2x 個人dropped 。我記得有4 份功課，一份2500 字group work ，field trip ，話劇，仲有report (唔知有冇記錯)。我唔明點解會有人話lee 科hea ，我覺得都算多野做。好唔好grade 就唔知。

course name: Interpersonal Skills and Positive Personal Development
chinese course name: 積極個人成長及人際技巧
body:
can't skip more than 3 lessons,
have to role play in group every lesson,
but it's ok.

對比起1401, 其實2402已經係好好讀 workload算ok
呢個tutor係ok既 但係佢2013/14就唔會再係度教架啦讀呢科既意見係: 最最最緊要係要知道你既tutor想要d咩 唔同tutor比分準則唔同 你要高分就要做得岩佢口味
你tutor肯既話 最好勤力少少 早一個星期做好份assignment比佢睇睇有咩問題
一來加印象分 二來改過一定會好過1st draft既

其實真係好輕鬆 推介大家讀既一科好GE.
我take之前做好晒research, 話說另外兩位(alfred, oliver)既grade比較上無咁好上堂就三位都上過 oliver上堂會不斷問問題迫人答 幾大壓力下
alfred比我既印象係真係好悶好悶 不停講自己係singapore個d野 之後ppt都包左好多singapore野
而黎sir就上堂氣氛比較輕鬆 人好好

course name: The Japanese Way of Tea: History, Arts, Architecture and Philosophy
chinese course name: 茶道：歷史、藝術、建築與哲學
body: dropped this course becoz from the 1 st lecture you might realise that you will be a loser if you don't know any Japanese language, the culture and the characteristics of Japanese people, you will feel alienated becoz most ppl around you jot notes in jap and they understand the Jap jokes . the tutor spoke in fluent english and japanese explaining the terms (already difficult to understand in chinese, now is explained in english) workload is acceptable if u really like the cultural stuff, but i was quite disappointed by the teaching style (a biased one)
個test好難(40%), 用左3日溫ppt, 死左 .pj唔知標準係邊度, 好難做.
超有heart, 有問必答,覆email超快,把聲ok好聽XD

course name: Competition and Cooperation in Diverse Contexts
body:
堂堂都個幾兩個鐘講書(悶)，有一個鐘discuss
individual assignment C左, 冇句係下面冇橫線既...=,=
又有GROUP PROJECT加WRITTEN REPORT, 仲要有FINAL EXAM, 要寫好多野又要用上THEORY
但係唔知點解A-左,可能靠PROJECT掛.....

不算難讀!! 而且上課lecturer有熱誠教學! 不錯!
工作量會有2個QUIZ(晤算難, 溫PPT就可以了!) 聽真d歌曲!
最後有個大project,但都唔算難!
呢個 tutor 非常古怪, 刻薄, 情緒化, 小心為妙

每堂有幾題online mc exercise, 有2次機會做, 基本上有記低佢tutorial ppt d ans就會岩哂
assignment 2 SQ(計point), 1LQ(寫600字, 吹水題)
lab photo, 影一張天文ge相, 上堂會提供足夠機會去影, 亦可自己影
project 好多人一組, topic 自選, 想突圍可以從presentation ge形式著手,當然普通地present都ok(自己組係咁)

body:
Ron Sir 上堂生動有趣，教書係唔錯
但係評分準則唔清晰，Mid-term*1, Assignment*2 (煩!), Online Ques*每堂大約10條 (有D無聊,超煩!), Project 所有分數都唔知
我知道好多科都可能係咁...但係呢個好多校隊/IS DEPT人讀
同D TUTOR好熟...有黑箱作業之嫌!
(PS 佢地成日話你運動叻唔代表分數高WOR...唔知呢?)

course name: Uncovering the Global Economy through News
chinese course name: 通過時事要聞，理解全球經濟
body: Tutor 幾好人, workload 唔大, 有讀過Econ既人揀都ok

Easy to get an A
Not many assignments to do
tutor is very nice

認真
我淨係番左第一堂同present果一堂
其他全部唔上
test用cheat sheet加睇隔離都係僅僅pass
project freeride 乜春都冇做過(到project deadline果日我連project個題目係乜都未知)
weekly journal唔洗經turnitin
咁我咩上網copy and paste囉 10分鐘之內搞點
結果咁就A+左 = ="
想take一科超好grade既ge而且完全唔洗比任何effort 
Green Econ是你首選 :O)
正正常常上堂，唔hea交嘢就冇問題

上堂好悶， 佢咬字有少少問題，grammer又唔係好
上堂啲嘢講得唔清唔楚仲話到明你問都唔會答
又成日暗寸人

我原本都費事打cm話個tutor,不過我想講留下唔好陷害人啦, Meg Lau係終極killer lol
上堂交n咁多篇文等佢交俾D HEAD 懶威威, 一堂成3-4篇呀大佬sosad...不特止
又唔識教書, 上堂其實目的都係作文俾佢... 你作到點佢唔理, 多就夠, 
係呀, 平時ASSIGNMENT D consultation 係幾多ge, 係咁插你呢樣唔好個樣唔得, 其實係好事, 不過態度不良好, 嚴格泥講唔係叫consultation, 係有D串人咁款...
平時一係就勁遲放, 一係就上得一鐘走人, 見佢化到成隻雀咁, 都知佢係去搵條仔sosad...
平時都話你D assignment幾好呀, 唔錯呀, 最後爛左grade得b-, 好自為知, 大家睇下2012/13 sem b reg 佢的人數就已經反映緊個事實
樓下你係佢手上有b我真心勁得你好勁
利申:本人DSE雞英文5*...

We were asked to compose and discuss all the time.
Although I thought I have learnt a lot, the workload is a bit harsh.
Miss Lau would also point out your problems in the consultation concretely, for example how can you improve in your transition.

上堂學到好多，林老師的確是博學多才，亦對學生有一定的要求，但對此說明得十分清楚。
特別是對參考資料的要求十分講究，說明大概多少參考材料才可以弄到他給予的成績。
報告之後會跟同學十分仔細討論名指出問題在哪，令大家可以做一份更好的書面報告。

course name: Reading Colonialism and The Modern Experience
body:
It's really boring and requires students to read lots of essays and readings.
If you are not really engaged in reading, I strongly advice you not to choose this course.For the presentation, it's not that difficult.
Sometimes, our lecturer, Dr Sheung may join our tutorials and listen to the presentations.
However, although we were asked to discuss, most students kept silent.
